string: I've got him. Let's get out of this bekakin' place.
Hector was the traitor! He tried to set us up as a part of the Rats job. No wonder the cops found the meth lab so fast. All along, he was the fucking rat.
Get to the controls and turn the crane. You're going to like this.
Alright. The code. Well, my first thought is that it is probably on someone's email. Find a terminal and get in.
OK, that's all we need.
The van has to split. I'm sending Bile in the chopper right now.
Smoke incoming guys!
Woah! Woah-woah-woah-woah-woah!
Are you in the West Wing yet?
That's it. I have to send a team over and notify the police.
The van is coming back. Get ready!
You just headbutted the motherfucking hornets' nest!
Nice work guys! Grab me a burger while you're at it. See ya back at the warehouse!
Now wire up those breaching charges. One for each of the four locks, if you please.
I can arrange for extra ammunition to be left.
Take off all the screws, yeah?
There you go. Exciting, yeah?
Great, that's enough. Now get in the elevator. You gotta get the hell out of there!
There's one more lock on the door, so you'll need to re-aim the weapon and shoot it again.
I hope this hunk o' metal has air bags!
I'm gonna drive a spike through your eye!
Check the shoe store's stock in the computer.
Boom! That couldn't have gone better. All four trucks are stopped and ready for your attention. At 'em, gang!
That's it, guys. This will take some time. Just make sure the power stays on.
Alright, I'll meet you at the docks.
And don't think about billing me for this shit.
... put the product in the car...
Alright, now find the control panel to charge the weapon.
Throw the bag on the table.
You are one stupid asshole!
Thankfully, I have a supply of C4 right here.
You gotta get that code.
New plan, people, 'cause the old one is dead.
Bile's chopper should be here soon.
That girl made you, here we go.
Good afternoon. My name is Randolph, and I'll be helping you today.
You're looking for two points of access.
You better look in the boxes, guys!
Look out guys!
You guys never disappoint. Full house gentlemen. Vlad will be proud of this work. We are in business for real.
You made a bad mistake!
We're gonna fucking crash!
Smart, very smart.
BFD's without power. Reconnect the power sockets.
Jesus H-Goddamn-Christ that took long!
You can't leave without finding that safe.
Grab that C4, gang.
Fucking suits...
Drinks on me, that was a classic hit.
As the lady said, get searching these terminals I marked. One of them is bound to have the code we need.
Search those crates. Should be some C4 in one of them.
That could have gone a lot worse. Now untie him and let's get going.
All right, got the show's schedule. We can do this.
Really great so far.
Our last closet door, gang!
... when it's done, we'll give you what you want.
Another four and we're done.
Kill them all!
Oh, a JÃ¤ger Mark II... difficult things to get through without destroying the contents.
Don't comply with them, we will secure you.
Get down there and locate those guns.
That was too damn close. Now, we don't have time to stand around, gang. Get him off that chair so we can get this over with.
Kill'em!
I have root...
Like the priest said to the nun, I'm droppin' you a hose.
Pull over. This is it. Teuer Automotives.
You're all dead men!
Come on, get Matt!
Tin Boy is all coked up!
We are after the server. Stay out of view guys. Cameras and guards.
Guys, please. A professional man needs his snack when working. Get me that coke and make the mechanic a happy man.
I hope you got a lot of cameras. It'll make it easier for us to find all the devices.
Damn, they got the power for the scanner!
Pick up the keycard so we can get to the next part!
You need to disable the metal detectors. Cutting their power will do the job. Look for electricity boxes.
That's enough to keep Christmas cheery. But, you know, you want to keep those elves churning out goodies, I can always spread a little more cheer, you understand? Or you can leave. Up to you.
Activate the elevator!
Green lights. Now let the time lock run down, and it'll open like a summer flower, and you bees can get busy with the honey.
Don't mess it up now. Time to hit it!
That's it. Now we can start the scanning.
Damn! This was the wrong pc! Cops are on their way. You don't have much time now.
More money in our pockets and it should also win us some favor with Locke.
That's 14!
Ok, now mount the tanks onto the vault.
When you've figured out which one it is, place the tracker on the bottom of the truck.
Saw that one gun down a village in Uganda. Good man.
Enough of this!
You think I'm asshole? Well, in Russia, asshole fucks you!
And... Jackpot! Moretta specs including comm frequencies. Great work! Now look for the nearest radio, and let's talk to the Captain.
The drill should be finished soon. I'm trying to get through to my pilot...
Logged in. Alright, I'll have that lock open soon. Head back to the van and grab the C4. Might as well get the escape ready.
Here! Here!
You won't make it anyway!
I guess I should be surprised to see a GenSec truck out there... But those guys seem to be spreading.
Ha, he always said he wanted to die in a brothel. Well, at least he got fucked, yeah?
Clowns! Vlad here. What the hell are you doing in that - nevermind. There's a pig marked with an X in there. The Fed's will notice it when forensics come in. Get it out of there for me.
Jackpot! Let's get it out. But if you wanna be greedy and stick around, I won't judge you.
You will board the meat truck and accompany our shipment to the harbor. My people will offload the coke. A speedboat will be on standby to expedite the transport of the goods.
Standard bank job, if there is such a thing. This one looks cash-rich.
Fire in the hole buddy!
Ok, time for the money, guys. We're gonna loot Ernesto's floor safe. Hook those winches up to the floor.
That's the guard down. Don't have to worry about the cameras anymore.
Still don't know you're there. Look for the keycard.
Three minutes...fucking Prius drivers!
Get that server to the van! You got it!
Boom! Good! Now, inside. Skop, skiet en boomklim!
Another guard up ahead. Stay in the shadows.
They're sending in Minigun Dozers too!
Two more!
Good, now get out to the main hub and use the crane to pull the box out of storage, yeah.
Chrome skull? Whatever, just do as the mechanic says. Go to the clubhouse and use the blowtorch he gave you.
This is fine, we'll take it.
You have to restart the drill!
I'm coming in the elevator. Meet you up at the gates.
I promise you will pay for this!
Won't take long to squeeze this guy for the code. Hang tight.
Everyone feeling good, yes? Anyone with, I don't know, skin peeling away and showing bone?
Alright, that's four.
These fuckers are going down!
You got the explosives? Great. Get over to the radar and plant them so we can blow it up.
Sorry guys, the place is full.
That's it. We got the turret. Im sending your pick-up ASAP.
These Californians are so rude. Teach them some DC manners.
Ah! There it is! Now, please, out of the airlock and into the inner complex!
We don't want them stopping us from getting the intel before we get it. Find the safe, it's probably there.
Cameras got us, time for plan B.
... got the pedal to the metal!
You must reconnect hose, is pumping air!
Someone must've got suspicious. Cops are on their way to check things out.
You got any of that lying around?
There's the alarm. No problem. Plan B. Put on a show, gang.
OK team this is it. The trucks look like they're getting ready to leave - so hurry and find the one carrying the container. GPS is ready to go. Move out.
Great you got the keycard.
I don't think he'll last much longer.
I'm gonna kill you!
Look at that beauty. It's called The Beast. Now start it up.
Cash job in the branch bank. Let's hit this thing. Should be a good win.
VR - Vlad's Rejoicing. That's what this means to me.
Now, we go! Get on ship!
Alright, get to the house and find the address, be careful.
OK, cool - might come in handy.
We're ready. You seeing the balloon?
Deploy C4 inside the vault! Then get ready.
Wait for the helicopter.
All right. Safes are in. We're getting out through the yard. Make sure the truck is there!
There are snipers on the surrounding buildings.
Don't let the cops focus on the truck.
Now the helicopter won't see where we load the containers.
Good afternoon, ma'am. How can I help you today?
The Elephant will be very excited. That's his campaign funding by big oil until 2050 right there. Very professional, folks.
Keep moving and get inside.This might be a game to you, but there are guards all around.
Engage the cops! Make them forget about the truck!
Gather up... At least 15k and then I'll get the driver to pick you guys up.
It's alarmed, so don't open it yet. we need to disable the alarm first.
Ok, you got what you came for. An old acquaintance who can possibly bring new information, yes? Make sure to keep him locked up tight.
All right. Container 61 is where you need to stash the gold. It's out in the yard.
The Inside Man has marked a ceiling vent for you to secure the loot at.
Looks like we've hit the jackpot!
If you want to dump bodies into the sea, you can use the windows.
Have a look around and and see if you can find a utility closet. Maybe there will be some useful tools.
What the fuck do you think you are doing?...
Mr Blonde is waiting on us to get the cops off him!
No snoozing, friends. Garrett could be heading back at any time.
(drolly) Good job, fuckface. Great fucking job.

Straightforward job, this one. A bunch of thugs are running a little operation. Got a bunch of "elves" cutting coke that Vlad wants. Deal with the thugs, and then get the elves producing. Shouting at them should do it. Get as much coke as Vlad needs, and we're done.
Keep an extra eye out for Murkys.
Put all the stuff in the car!
Good job, now let's get you into some scrubs.
Come on, gang. Out of that hidey-hole!
Murkywater like their technology, so they should have some kind of mobile command center nearby. See what you can find.
That's it. Let them piss their pants while we do our thing at the bank.
The saws have done their part, excellent.
They stopped the scan! Start it again!
They're blocking the road with vans! And... Uh... Heavy units approaching!
Just sit back and let me negotiate a deal with the cops.
I'm on my way guys.
Listen you fucking poes. You're only getting on the roof from the store room ladder, and you're only getting in that with the keycard. Look for it!
There's a lovely little prototype in one of those crates, dear friends. Open them to find it.
Where's the shit?
Whoa, that's a nice little coke stash they got there. It's up for grabs if you ask me.
Hell, Commissar just sent more coke straight down the pan. Hurry before it's all gone!
Get to the chopper!
Gentlemen - lobbyists inclined to stay on the current path of energy policy want your help. It is lucrative indeed - I say we answer their call.
Get those bags here!
Blerrie! Murky bastards!
You'll pay for this!
I'm at the pick-up!
Nothing left to do but make like a bush, yeah?
We need more.
There's something electronic and glowing in the Admin Office.
Incoming! From the lumber mill! Stay on your toes!
Time to go get Vlad's money.
Okay. I'm outside. We're good to go, right?
Fuck Yuri. So... When do we crack these crates open?
...Plan A looks like this.
This was found by our "tomb raider" division. They're great guys. Drink like fucking micks though.
Put the wares in the car...
Great. Now, blow the doors!
One

On the 22nd floor of the Garnet Group Building, owned by Nathan Garnet, there's a safe with millions worth of diamonds. The building has high-tech security and trigger-happy guards but luckily for us there's a birthday party going on to keep them distracted.
That's how the pro's do it! Awesome work gentlemen!
Okay. Now get it over by our exit. Use the control panel.
Get hauling those tablets to the mixer.
Damn, it's the cops! Just what we need!
Steady as she goes, folks.
Goddamn backstabbers! Make them regret the decision and find the information! Look for safes!
That's what you get for trusting the internet, I guess.
The money is yours to take. If you have the codes you will be able to defuse the planted C4s.
I'm there, in two minutes!
Great job! I'm sending the helicopter, keep looting!
It's a pretty good layout for us. Vault's in the back. You in?
We want the Mendoza cash stream stopped completely. Their entire cash reserve is here in DC. To get to it we need to disarm their soldiers by destroying their weapons cache.
I've got twitch coming with the van for you, yeah?
Well....I guess that makes sense. I may do that too.
This is fine, we'll take it.
That's it! I'm off now!
Well here's our cops...
The hostage has been recovered. The clowns lost today, over.
That was last seen in the Iraqi National Gallery. These guys are shameless.
Get out! Get the bags before the FBI catches up to us again. I know, they're persistent little bastards, aren't they?
That's the alarm - time for plan B. Do the countdown.
Coming in now - just can't tell you what dock yet!
I just saw Ralph, go get him!
The escape vehicle's waiting in the garage.
Crew, I'm guessing that that construction yard across the way is your best bet for getting out. They have a truck. Sending you some C4 to bring the wall down now.
Don't forget the C4 in the limo. Man, cops are close. Hurry!
Yeah! Treat it like it's Keith Moon's birthday.
While we wait for that, and if you've got the stones, get to the roof and get the zip-line set up.
The helicopters are flying away. It's working.
Damn cops are trying to cut power to the router boxes! Stop them!
Yes, that is the epicenter - right there. I wonder what kind of treasure that house can hold. OK, on with our heist here.
Keeping my foot off the gas. Make sure you guys keep the road safe and clear.
Chopper is back guys!
You have sent message and it was good message! I think it was - "fuck you," haha! Loud and clear to everyone! Money was good. Hey! Have vodka and weekend.
Well done, nice and quiet. Secure everything if you can, but we need at least a few bags to make this worthwhile.
One of the pallets is on the roof of the diner. What would those burger-flippers do to have that kind of cash, eh?
Now get the cable on both the pick-up and the hatch.
Almost there guys! I'm trying as fast as I can!
Okay gang. Time to put on a show.
If you run short of equipment, go take another look at the drop site.
It's trying to auto-update! Stop it, friends!
Let's meet in the building next door. You can probably enter from the roof.
... kill 'em!
Ahhh, and another vault is ready to be plundered!
Sure. Thanks for keeping us safe. Bye! Phew, looks like we dodged that one.
All right. Get that drill set up on the gate.
Thats everything, nice doing business with you gentlemen!
Crew, this is us ending Mendoza ops in DC right here and right now. Hit that bus hard and take their money. Hector just wants these clowns ended so the money is ours. Set down in 3, 2, 1, go!
Oh, we got eight!
The fuck you think you're doing man!?
If you need more equipment, go back and check the stash outside, yeah?
Good, now go ahead with the drills.
Only two of you at a time up the zipline, please. And it's a one way trip. But what a trip, yeah?
I'll tell you what - we were never gonna deal with you guys! OK? We, we gonna take it all...
Meeting Rooms are a good bet for finding one of those laptops.
Hit him!
OK, the door is locked. We're gonna need a key. I think finding Chavez will mean finding the key. So search the building for Chavez.
Vlad really doesn't like this Dmitri guy. One of these old-country feuds, maybe he shagged his sister or something.
How many skeletons will be getting thrown up with this earthquake.
Hey, culeros! You fucked with the wrong gang!
You clowns ready? Hose is coming down.
Mobster down. That should get Commissar's attention.
Drills incoming!
Two minutes.
Get outside, friends! Twitch is incoming with the van!
Smoke? The wheel stopped on smoke?
There's a cop entering the bank. Here's an idea: take care of him.
Touch down! Now load the plane with loot!
A little bird told me the Mendozas are flying in more weapons in preparation for the war with Hector.
You gotta blow the floor, friends!
Where is it!?
We got enough now...
These civilians don't give a crap about you as long as you act normal.
Check in the employee lunchroom. There's a router there that'll let me unlock the door for you.
Blerrie! Bain klopped that Murky good, yeah? Drill through the door and get his keychain!
You'll have your winch in about a minute, yeah?
Still good. Still good.
Cops on the street...
What's taking so long?
There's the ladder, guys. Get up there!
Seriously though, if they got them ray guns, they're coming with me.
It would be best if these radars were destroyed. Yes?
Get the water hose running.
Wrong wagon. Crap! Keep looking!
Trust me, you won't regret acquiring this asset.
That's it! They just flushed the final bag down the shitter. Give me a minute, I gotta mentally process what just happened...
Yeah my gut feeling told me that wasn't the right ingredient...
The Harvest & Trustee bank just got a big gold shipment from South Africa. I think we should make it go away. I can't see they'll miss them much.
Bullseye! For once, we're helped by a pig.
Alright, I'm on my way back now.
Get out of there. You're blocking the sun...
That red ladder will let you get onto the roof.
These people don't give up! Let's show them, shall we?
I want the ashes of their money to cloud their eyes. Get to it.
OK, Hector wants us to record this so first set up the camera.
Pull over here. There's the warehouse up ahead. Let's do this.
Well, this dump is the perfect place for a rat like the Commissar to hide out.
Can't believe we're going back to this place.
It's open, take our stuff back.
Thermite is the best way to get through reinforced steel without making too much noise.
The fuck do you think you're doing!?
Four bags. Hustle! Hustle!
How are you coming along with that floor?
Confirmed! I'm coming in at dock eight!
Holy shit! Help!
What's that crane doing? Opening a new route for Kerels?
...I'm seeing a lot of talk on Murkywater comms, so don't stay long. They might be wanting to join us, and we don't want that, yeah?
Are those elves working as hard as they can? Perhaps you can "motivate" them?
Pinky Demon schnapps? Huh. Find it, spike it, serve it.
Ten more seconds!
Now stop any pursuit. Blow that gas!
Mr Sturr. Comply or we will be forced to take you down.
This is the deal, right here:
Woah-woah-woah-woah!
Is he dead... guys?
Just took a .50 cal. Fuck! I'm going down.
Yeah, yeah.
At least seven more.
Guys find that tiara and find it quick.
Oh, no-no-no-no-no! We got a traffic jam of cops on our ass!
OK, get ready, here I come!
Looks like LMG Dozers are part of the assault this time.
We need approval from the security station. I would do it myself, but alas...
Amazing job! Now, climb up on top of BFD and the blimp will take you to safety. Or grab more loot. Your choice.
That's the house. Go on in, he's probably taking the air.
The guest list, guys. Get it from reception and we can see who's in our room.
Good find. But you'll need more C4. Keep searching.
On approach now. Closing in...
Maybe if you dog-whistle, Ralph will come out.
Who the hell do you think you are!?
As expected, they've got helicopters. A smokescreen will force them away.
I'm coming in four...
Here they come!
Great! Now get them up to the station on the roof and connect them.
Three left.
OK, you guys totally emptied that hangar, time to get out of here.
That's enough. Now put a gas can on it and shoot it to light it up!
You gotta help me get it working again, friends.
Banking is dirty business. You guys ought to stink by now, let's clean you and the cash ASAP. Cleaners will be sent into the bank later on to tidy up.
The alarm. All right. Time for Plan B. No mercy, crew.
Great. That's what we came for. I'm sending your getaway. Just stay alive a little longer.
Fuckin' Locke, always gotta spoil the fun.
There's one of the closets. Get picking that lock.
Pick-up coming in one minute. Don't let up now!
Preferably take them as the money will be great that way.
Muriatic acid will be in a greenish gas can looking thing...
I require your assistance in a matter...
(coming close to the phone)...so then Sid wiped it all over Keith's sandwich, and said it was just mayonnaise! (laughs)
The gold is inside the safe. Drill it open!
Keep freeing the Butcher's people.
Find those fucking bundles, will you? Analysis of trajectory indicates...they must be fucking close!
Get through that door! Twitch is standing by with the van!
The Mendoza cartel is hitting our methamphetamine operation here in DC. It appears they have grown bold or desperate. Go there and make them sorry.
They're crazy! Shooting up the building with missiles! What the hell is this?!
What's taking so long?
If you put down your guns now, I will be merciful, and only cut off your fingers and toes.
Now get the hell out of there!
I'm off in 30!
You've got to free Vlad's brother-in-law first!
Thank you. I see the fireworks. On our way!
Who are THESE fuckers?
I've already got interested parties lined up to take the bullion. I'll also dig up what I can regarding this blueprint.
Remember: the mechanic said something about a bunker, and that you would find a seat for the bike there.
Dammit does anyone have an ECM jammer - that's about the only thing that'll crack that door. Othewise you need another route.
You made a bad mistake!
Thermite is slower than C4, but it gets inside without the noise.
We gotta get the USB stick. The head of security should have it.
Crap, they're fast. Get the power back on!
Great, now just hold the fort until the thermite is done.
Good, now hurry back to the gate and open it up, yeah?
I got one!
That noise is pure poison cooking - get the fuck out once you got enough.
The plane has the parking lot locked in for the pick-up. Get that area ready.
You're all dead men!
That's 18!
You have ten seconds.
Friends, fancy a bit of fun in the desert? There's a Murky facility that needs looting.
Another eight and I'm off.
Are you getting the loot out of there?
Oh, just the secrets of the universe and the means to end humanity.
Hurry up and go inside.
Get on ship everyone. We must leave now!
OK, take a look around and see if you can find something to get us past that gate.
Kerels are coming with an assault.
Watch the cameras, usually these branches have security rooms where you can kill the cameras. You're going to need to get into the vault, bag up the loot, and move it back to the escape car.
Get to those security boxes.
Have you forgotten where the mainframe is or something?
You need to power up the cannon.
Alright, I've got the target's location. Go get him!
Yeah, so anyway...
Ey, who the hell are you!?
Who the fuck said you could come here!
Zero
Apply some C4 to the wall!
That's the right panel. Now search for the other keycard. Get the other panel activated.
Well, that was a second place solution, not my preference to be honest. But no votes will get cast from those machines at least. Time for a payday.
This is going better than I expected even from you.
Guys, the safe! Get the drill on it - pronto!
What we need to do is go in, place a GPS transmitter on the truck carrying the containers and then get out unseen. Easy.
Listen here...
After you!
I'm gonna write a fuckin' movie about this some day. Maybe a TV show.
Ok, I got the doors. But they won't open until the ECM jammer stops.
Sleep tight!
...This is how it looks.
Get the shoes with my cocaine!
Mount the drill on the safe in the truck. Hurry!
They're outside!
How's it look in there?
Hey, there he is. Looks like he's in the garden area.
One down!
Screws don't usually unscrew themselves. You gotta help.
Get ready. Bile's almost back. Connect the hose!
I just heard the police scanner light up like a goddamn christmas tree. Get ready for company.
So far so good. Don't screw it up!
Remember, we are after the rat, Head for the bus, keep your heads low and move from cover to cover.
Right panel's activated. Now get the other keycard, and let's get the second panel done.
The game is on, motherfucker!
Alright, the cops are on the way. This caper is less Pink Panther, and more Reservoir Dogs. Get to the security room.
Get to the West Wing! There's no time to dally.
Stay lively, friends. Assault wave incoming.
What if I come back? And bring salsa!
Alert! Intruder in the building!
Guys! I'm waiting on the bags!
OK, it's drilled all the way through the safe.
Remember to screw that winch down good.
War must go forward - Kalashnikovs must be mine! You go! Go and fix the problem!
Here's what I want you to do:
We got them. Thank you, my guardian angels.
Keep your eyes peeled. Something's up.
Search those boxes. I'm not willing to take any chances on this one.
That chick? She'll do it, but wants another ten k.
You know I just got out of prison. I like prison. Is invigorating for a man to beat another man to death with his hands, which I did not do, in case you want to know.
Get to the library!
Yeah, it's only ten thousand dollars a day.
...Now start up the winch. And keep the coppers away from it!
OK now, the intel I got indicated that there might be thermite stored around there somewhere, so start looking. Once you find it, put it on the barrier.
Looks like we hit the spot. Those are the guns we are after.
There's a service ladder leading to the roof. You'll need a keycard to access it though. Got to be one here somewhere.
The walls are thick concrete, but I can still hear that concert. Nothing stops the music, huh.
Like a precision clock, gentlemen - keep ticking.
You don't think our time's important!?
Get the valve open again, crew!
That's it! We got the Commissar's location. Time to haul ass. Those crates gave me an idea...
Be ready!
Turn off the flow of coolant. That should make the secondary servers overheat.
The damn scrambler just went down again. Get it fixed!
This Tasteful Club was mine. After prison... No longer so. I know the owner and his ways. He's a useless (prick).
If you want to move the bags faster, you can set up a zipline.
Hey Duke, what's this Ark of the Watcher business about?
You still have to find the second artifact.

The Taxman thought he was clever making a deal with a big corporation, but the information leaked, and now bigger sharks want in - all in. We have a complete, run-down building to ourselves, overlooking the deal. We've got a set-up installed. Alex will help with the crane. Scare the Taxman into his limo, shake him up, and he'll be sure to give us the server and the codes. When it's about $25,000,000, anything goes.
I like hurting people! Makes me feel like little boy. Or two...
Don't worry, I've got a driver standing by. He'll come and pick you up. Eddie, get cracking, you need to pick the Payday Gang up!
Go by the construction site. They must have a laptop there.
There's one of 'em!
Open the valve!
Son of a bitch!
Listen, the chicks wanna take a swim. You guys hurry the fuck up!
Student comes in, looking to renegotiate their loan. I know! Hahahahaha. What an idiot!
They've got snipers in position.
Those Murkys will be rather angry when you return, but we'll deal with that later.
I'm there in two...
One minute and we're through!
Guys, eight bags, that's what we need.
The way is blocked. You gotta find the controls to the walkway and extend it!
Hurry man, my ass is gonna be grass like if the cops had lawn-mowers!
Only two riding the ziplines at a time, my good friends. And once you're up, that's it. So come on.
Gang, hurry with the parachutes. Don't get off course.
Make sure all you fine people are inside, the outer door must close before the inner door can open.
... waste 'em!
Wish I were at a burger joint with my girl right now.
Streets are calling with cops, but I got us a sweet ride. Just get down here!
Don't make plans for that cash just yet. Remember we need to get it to the blackmailing asshole first. Don't worry, we'll find him.
No way to get you more supplies from the chopper. You'll have to make do with whatever you find around there, so look around while I'll try to get you past.
Get that red diamond and this'll be a double payday.
There's one!

Deal in importing high-performance supercars from Europe and Japan. Those cars are a work of engineering beauty. And they're expensive - we're talking the price of a house in Georgetown here.

Murkywater's been moving stuff through DC by convoy for months. I've resisted hitting these til we got a shot at a big prize. Here it is. Gold bullion. Got a "diversion" on the Woodrow set up to get it where we want it, then we're gonna seperate an armored truck from an armed convoy. Once it's isolated, hit it and boost that sweet bling. Au yeah.

Gentlemen - an opportunity to change the world awaits. Your effort will count!
Don't let that gate stop you. I want those boxes searched.
Mr. Sturr, I presume? You got the data?
The 6 o'clock news ate this story up, and Reddit lit up like a Christmas tree! The senator is done for. Enjoy your spoils, gentlemen - my party is pleased.
I'm heading off to unload these - but I'm coming back, hold on!
Found anything yet?
Vault security requires pressing two buttons, in seperate rooms. They'll be guarded, though.
I got one!
It's fine, we'll settle for this.
Got your box. Get over here! Get that crap stowed.
Kerels got to the terminal. You've got to restart the hack.
Yo! What the fuck! I can't work if I have these cops right in my fucking face!
Great it's open! Get Taxman outta there.
Consider this quote by George Washington: There is no short cut to achievement. Life requires thorough preparation.
Ey man, the deal ain't here. Turn around, this place is ours.
It's a goddamn po-lees ambush!
When the coast is clear, throw up a flare to let Bile know!
Okay, we'll need to use the saws to cut the room free from the floor.
It's getting dangerous here!
Keep it together! You can't fall apart now!
That looks like a television news crew. You don't want to be on TV guys, stay off their camera.

Good. Ah, fresh air! Now, the pallets are secured to the deck by mechanical fasteners. These fasteners are controlled by the logistics officer, and his controls are... ah, up there. And the access to the upper deck is at the front of the plane.
There's the chopper! Bile, lower the hose. Gang, get ready.
You can't take me! I'm Ernesto Sosa and you're going down!
Fortune and glory, kid.
Chopper coming in.
There's a zipline you can use to secure the bags of loot.
Hook me up again.
Be careful now, don't let the guards see you. And find that cash.
Politics is as you know global - I need you for a global effort.
Our escape by helicopter is imminent, but we must cover ourselves. Beyond the door Murkywater has an impressive array of radar equipment.
That's all the coke nice and secure. Even for you, this was a hell of a win. Let's get the stuff to the boat so we can get our payday on.
A sniper is moving in to deploy on a rooftop on the other side of the highway. Don't let him stop you.
Hector is gonna kill you!
You have to wait for the time lock to end before you can get in. Shouldn't take too long.
Use the zipline to secure the loot.
You got it? Nevermind, I don't want to know. Just follow me.
I'll ask my main man Chavez to fetch you guys' shipment. You guys hang around.
This is crazy, the hospital is surrounded. Looks like private military... mercenaries. You gotta go... NOW.
We are finally almost finished! Please, join me at the helicopter!
You ride with the drugs. You ensure my product arrives in the harbor and makes it onto the speedboat...
Just one more.
Prepare to get fucked up!
Jump down into the vault and get the dough!
Ok, that's the last of them. Now we need to make sure no one knows what happened here. I'm gonna make a call, hang on, guys...
Made a big mistake comin' here!
They are coming in from the forest next to the road! Keep them away!
It's soooooo damned quiet...
Be quick now. It's got two code locks. You need code breakers on both. And stay hidden!
Find a terminal, guys.
Them keycards open the dock gates. Use one in each control room.
Hey, you're supposed to be hacking those routers, remember?
Dead civilians bring the heat, guys!
I've an idea to pop that hatch you saw earlier. Bile's on his way with a little something for you. Hopefully something down there will lead us to the Commissar.
Not much more.
If we succeed with this, we'll have the whole criminal underworld talking about it forever. Ladies and gentlemen, this is how you make history.
Well, what have we here. Only the Maretto's cargo manifest. Now we know which containers may hold loot. Good find.
Just one more and you're done!
Just get these bollards out of my way!
It's ugly business, but it's gotta be done.
I am a kind of person who you tell one thing and I remember that thing forever. I have a long memory - like a library.
They're clueless so far.
The escape vehicle is waiting just outside the main entrance!
Good. Now we can open the trucks up and see what that crazy Ivan was shipping.
I'm ready!
Nice. Out in the yard, I have a container ready to stash the gold. Number 61. Get it there!
You made it! It's right there! Grab the diamond!
Gang. Gensec need the time lock codes. I'll stall them as long as I can. Can you see them?
Comrads! I managed to throw out some explosives for you, better to be prepared.
Loot van is here.
Hack the ship control terminal!
... you guys are kicking ass and taking names!
Chopper's not leaving without you.
Just attach the cable to the pick-up and the hatch.
Man, I loved coming here as a kid. Made me feel like an adventurer, y'know.
Ey, what's up homes?
Near the door!
First World Bank, can I help you? Yes sir, we offer a full range of financial services. No sir, not that kind of "fine" and definitely not that kind of service! Good day!
OK, now get to the Oval Office in the West Wing. Find the access point.
You gotta get that code.
Dump some gas in container 12. It'll cover our escape.
Kidnapping? That dirty Russki has no boundaries.
That's Russia for you, gang! These guys do not mess around!
Right, this is the place. Get to the traincar and look for your contact. They said they'd meet you there. So far it all looks good. Just trade the paintings and get out fast. Keep it rolling.
Can you please loose ship from dock!
Almost through the vault door. Get ready.
Luck has nothing to do with a successful heist.
Don't forget to take a look at the security checkpoint, yeah?
Hey guys! Knew you'd come for me. You got a way out of here?
Soon as the bail money gets here, I'm getting balls deep in high class booty!
The senator loves to collect art - outsider art in particular. Lucky for us, the Capitol Art Gallery is hosting an exhibition this week.
Okay, going in.
Get ready for the tenth wave!
That's the first number. Need two more.
You should be able to hold your ground inside the park.
OK, we're pumping! Let it fill the vault.
The control room manages the bridge. Use the buttons in there!
I promise you will pay for this!
We microwave everything so it is as hot and fresh as you can possibly want.
This is the same type of vault as the one you did in that LA job last year. But we'll have to hack our way into this one.
Don't let the cops interfere with the elves, crew!
The containers are ready for you. Get searching.
Two blocks away, I'm real close!
Press are going to party on this poor guy. Seems the deal went down in public office too!
Welcome.
Don't let the cops reach the hacking device! Now you're gonna have to reboot it.
I have information on a team tracking the inventor. Find them, find the inventor and end that chapter in history. Quick and clean.
Muerto!
You found it. Now get it open and get that address.
I respect your stringency. Discipline under pressure is admirable. Enjoy your payday. I will be in touch.
We gotta turn those lights back. Get on it!
Those Murkys can still spot you if you get too close, so be careful, yeah?
Load the bags!
You need to patch me into those boxes, friends!
No time to take in the sights.
That didn't do it. Try a different one.
Gentlemen - voting in DC is about to commence. We need to swing a few voters the right way. You can help.
The Mendoza cartel runs a lot of guns through DC. We need you to hit one of their weapons caches here, weaken their soldiers.
Hey, there he is. Looks like he's by the pools.
Security clearance granted.
You might be having a few more kerels coming soon, friends.
Mr Garnet won't let you get away with this.
Hey, if you don't find the lead scientist, you're not getting through that door.
Guys, Kento. Kento, guys. Oh, I guess he's dead. Oh, well.
Get to cover!
Into the mansion! Hustle!
The escape vehicle is leaving in six minutes.
Ouch! Careful with that crane, guys. This is a gem of a building.
They shot the driver! You'll have to continue on foot!
Prepare to get fucked up!
That's it, you made it! Throw the coke in the van and let's go.
I'm gonna fuck you up!
Vlad wants us to hit the four stores for cash and other knicknacks. Show him how we roll fast and clean. Easy in and out.
Stay on your toes. This's gonna be tense.
No! Dammit, gang... Wick wanted to take care of them himself. He really had it in for these bastards. I guess he will have to be content with the idea of them dead.
Now, get through there! That's the way out!
Six
Now find a terminal in IT with internet access. Upload that data to me.
Chopper will come back for you, so while we're waiting, why not get looking for Vlad's packages. Could be a nice little bonus.
You can use the modified drill I sent with you to get through.
I'm coming in.
That's gonna be worth a fortune! Great job!
Over there!
It's a straight cash hit. You know how this goes.
Don't stick around, net activity is increasing!
Gensec pumped a lot of money into this place. Look at it.
Time to pick up the C4 and then plant it on the floors above the panic room.
This is in a neighbourhood with police. They don't like party crashing.
Dammit! That's the FEDS!
Ach, watch out, the Cloakers can put you in cuffs now!
Okay, you're good to go. Start the hack.
Don't shoot.
Whoah, that is some crash!
The van got trashed by the cops!
Ain't no bailin' on this one. We're finishing what Bain started.
Don't hang around, crew. Everyone - into the boat!
Collect the cage bags. You need to assemble it in the street.
The manager's office is your next stop.
Head up to the apartment, my associate has the info and the cash to pay for the extra meth.
Run a bypass in the control box!
These guys can drive!
You guys OK? Bikers sure act like it is war - go get 'em!
He is balding and wears a black suit. You probably scared him off, so look around the offices or in the corridors!

Thanks guys, I'm glad to be back. We've got a shitload of intel that I need to go through. Hopefully it's enough so we can find whoever ratted me out, that backstabbing cunt.$NL;$NL;Isn't there something like a thieves code or some bollocks? I'll tell you guys as soon as I find anything worth sharing. We'll find this wanker, and when we do, he'll be sorry he fucked with the Payday Gang.
It's tacky, but it's fun, and knows it. Welcome to Vegas, gang.
Ok now, which transport is he in? Saw them all open and find out!
We've got a chance to make this the greatest political comeback this town has seen since Nixon. Get in there, clowns.
That's all of them! No more bodies to scan. Now we need to get the server or we did it all for nothin'.
Might want to pick up the pace gang.The keycard and code are all you need.
There he is! Ach.. he looks bad, friends. Let him out right away.
... by the looks of it, these bars are pretty thick. We're going to need something to help get through.

I heard about the outstanding job you did sneaking into that Murkywater warehouse. Most impressive. I need you to go back there. Those mercenaries've got a 'little something' tucked away. A little something I would like. The Murkies are pulling out, and I need this before it disappears down some rabbit-hole.
Nice, just like in one of those old black-and-white movies, yeah?
Alright, I'm coming back soon
Check the computer. Got to find the shoes!
These guys are fucking jokes.
Maybe that equipment will come in handy later, so hold on to it.
In! Right, need a few moments to get the lock. While you're waiting, head back out and fetch some C4. Let's get our escape ready.
We've got the hostage secure. The clowns just got busted and will go home empty-handed, over.
She doesn't? Well, how does she keep in touch with rest of the world?
I sure hope they never get rid of banks, but the way you guys work you might make 'em extinct. I love it.
You knocked him out? Really?
That hard drive will be perfect! Once you plug it in, I should be able to access their system and get the vault open.
They're in the house!
Mr Sturr. Don't give them anything.
If the Dentist is up there, he's getting his teeth kicked in.
The blueprints are in the archives. My guess would be the employee only areas.
Great. OK guys, first you need to access the vault. Blueprint says it's in the back office.
Lost power friends, you need to get it back on.
No no no, that can't be correct. Get another barcode.
That's all three digits for the code. Head to the vault, let's see if they work.
Gang, remember: boost the gold out to container 61.
Look at that. The kerels must think we're idiots, making an offer so low. Let's see how far they will go, yeah?
Remember to check inside the buildings for the remaining keycard.
Nice. Now get him to the panic room. Get past that scanner.
We're not going to get in there without the code. You'll have to find one.
The stuff must be in the safe. Open it!
We came, we saw, we kicked their ass!
OK, let's see here. Got an idea for the code. Find the telephone pole connected to the house. We're gonna make an interesting phone call.
Check the safe - find it. Fast!
You're going to make it... Just think of the money!
Get those bags. They have the pieces of the cage. You need to put it together in the street.
Ballots: wiped. Asses: covered. Looks like a little heist accident. We didn't get the loot but we'll do better next time.
Damn! It's the alarm. Well, this just got more straightforward. Forget keycards. We're blowing our way through. Light a flare and drop it. Bile will drop you some C4.
Security is still quiet. Now find the bomb.
An engine. That's what we need. I think I saw some inside the clubhouse before they started beating the livin' shit out of me.
Use the thermite I sent to weaken that vault door, friends.
The keycard we need is in the Oval Office, so get inside.
You sure are some thorough sons of bitches!
Up!
The police is on our back like a fucking pony tail here!
OK, that's enough, get the recording and lets get out of here.
Oh man, he's really drunk! Gonna be tricky to escort that guy.
Punch in the code.
Ey, I said we need more!
I can't shake 'em!
We gotta get outta here!
While you're at it, see if you can find anything in those stores that's worth some cash.
Oh no! They've seen the hacking device and called it in. Plan B guys!

The Benevolent Bank has history. Oldest US bank, sacked by the British in 1812, held Civil War gold, issued FDR's first bonds. Hell, you'll even find it on the back of your ten-spots. And guess what - in all that time, it has never been successfully knocked over. "Successfully". Well, today it is your turn to try and change that. You're going in through the front door. Scope the place to figure your best way through the lobby to the vaults beyond. I've got some ideas of how we're going to boost all that loot. Trust me. Make history, guys.

The artifact is probably behind the door, but we didn't bring anything big enough to get through. Maybe if you mix some chemicals together... see if you can find any good formulas there. What could happen?
Broadsword calling Danny Boy. Deploy the skyhook, our boys are waiting. Over.
Remember, you gotta smash up that meth.
I can't pull you out of there until you've got through that floor, friends.
The symbols. There's a correct order to them.
Don't stray too long though, friends. I'm seeing a lot of chatter in Murkywater channels. Looks like they're tracking us.
Uh don't please!
...sorry friends, but I had to put it in the sky-rocket [portable toilet] out by the construction site... you call them porta-potties, yeah?
Blues are trying to pull the plug on us, make sure they fail!
That manifest you picked up will point us to the right containers.
30 seconds more and I'm off!
We can leave one you've got two samples in the cooler.
They've booby-trapped it!
Did I just hear a present falling from a tree? Seems to be more of them stuck in there. Find 'em, crack 'em open.
Great! That's the door open! Only thing left is disabling the lasers.
Just got a message from The Elephant. Your bonus for keeping things clandestine has been dropped off. It's near the escape van.
You'll have about seven seconds to take out the cameras before the alarm goes off.
You'll never get me! You fucking clowns are DONE!
... then, we'll trade.
Chopper coming in! Roof guys, roof!
That's everything, wait for their call.
The Mendoza cartel is threatening us. But this town is ours. It is where power is and we control it. We will show them who the threat truly is.
It will be waiting for you.
To the pillar guys!
Great, the server has been secured. Now Jimmy can shut up about it. We did our part.
The elevator shaft is open. That's the path to the van. Start hauling.
More cops! Give 'em hell!
Should I know you? Sorry.
Cabot's is gonna have to fuckin' pay extra for this shit.
Fucking hell!
We're almost finished. Get to the escape, come on!
Do whatever you need to do - but finish the job.
I'll be there in three minutes!
A little free intel from the Dentist - Commissar has a basement safe room. That's where his prize stash will be. And our best chance of tracking that rat. Find it!
There. Now just give me a minute.
I wanted to ask if you guys offer financing for auto-mobiles?
And... it's locked. Damn! OK. Stay quiet. The manager must be around there somewhere. Take him hostage. He should be able to get us in.
Dallas still got what it takes. Impressive. Now, get the gold to the van and let's get out of here.
Guys, don't keep them waiting. Get in there.
There you go, better get those stones to Mr Blonde. His boss will be able to move them.
It's burning, get the coke out of that truck!
Hey, I know how to make a proper donut.
You're ride's here.
Hurry up!
They'll be digging chunks of cop out of the rubble for weeks!
Put the goats down!
I thought we lost that damn helicopter in the tunnel!
And that's the second keycard. Nice job!
Confirmed!
It'd be very helpful if you could deal with those snipers. Yes?
Ok guys. Busting cars I hear. Attach the magnet - this one's going for a swim!
...Find the wall-boxes that control the blast doors, yeah?
What the hell! It's the cops!
Those tunnels will lead you into the warehouse.
Nah, friend it's in the batter, yeah?
My line of work has allowed me to lay the groundwork for an impressive network of contacts.
Perfect! Now gimme a second...
We need Ralph Garnet's keycard. Find him!
C'mon friends. It'll be fun. Blast that door.
Get that keycard in the panel, quick
... then, we'll trade.
It'll take years to rebuild this. Just one minute, be ready.
The gate has two control rooms. One on each side. This is the first.
It's open... No cash... Hit the deposit boxes...
Guys! There's another closet door!
You guys keeping an eye on the saws? They're all running?
OK, don't think the doors can get much colder.
Get to the boat!
One more!
Good work getting the meth out. That was not exactly an easy gig. I'm sure whoever ratted out the lab is going to get Hector's full attention.
Ten left.
Now turn on the water!
... The deal's off!
Tiara's gotta be there folks. Keep looking.
That's it for the sneaking. Thankfully, crowd didn't hear a thing.
Press the button. You can't miss it.
I mean you could try a trip mine if you have one... But it'll be loud... So I don't recommend it.
There he is!
Miso Prawny!
And it was the right thing not to mess with Hector here - playing with fire would have gotten us burned.
Have a beautiful day friends, until we never meet again!
Your package is being lowered. Hope you have a great party. We'll wait here awhile. Over and out!
Who the fuck said you could come in here!?
Hot damn! You're on a hot streak!
Seven bags!
Ok, now just down the ramp and out.
That was intense, but you did what was needed. Pick up the key and head back to the panic room.
What the fuck is this!?
... then we'll give you what you're after.
We need two keycards to open the vault. Keep looking.
The escape van is ready, go when you're good!
I need covering fire to get the door open!
Just keep hacking those machines. The more shit we fling at Schwartz, the more will stick.
Door - check. Alarm off - check. Get in there boys.
Open the storage cage to get the shoes!
Nice one.
... the head honcho loves detail-oriented motherfuckers!
That's enough for the fifth floor. Good job.
Hey, was that the vault? Can't argue with your sense of style.
This will get more than a little hairy!
Two minutes.
Do you know who i am?!
Finally! Now you just gotta go inside the vault.
Another two minutes and I'm out!
OK team ready your gear. This is what we do best, bank jobs. Get your loot bags checked, leave your cell phones home, bring the gloves, load up those guns and get the payday attitude on.
Good job! Now reactivate BFD!
19 bags!
It's fine, we'll settle for this.
Things got a little wild, but you got the job done!
I don't think I need to mention what happens if you get found out.
Captain Ford here, flying the Vegas Sky Express. We're ready and waiting for your signal.
Who let them in, eh? What the fuck!?
Pretty soon we're going to be swamped with news choppers. Our escape chopper? Blend right in.
So what you're telling me is, if I have this straight, what you're saying, is that you ain't interested in investing in a pager business?
Just walk straight into the bank.
... getting closer!
You have to get off the gate before it will open. Health and safety bullshit!
No-one's seen you. Keep it that way. Now, the gate.
Third placed. One more.
Eish, didn't see that one coming. The Elephant had one too? Just take it and get out, we'll figure this out later, yeah?
That's the exit! Just a few more steps to clean clothes and hot baths.
That's it, I'm done!
You're through the first truck. Now start cracking boxes and bagging loot. Five bags, so move it, guys!
That's the last one! Perfect!
Be ready!
We got rice. We got fries. We got mashed potato. We got grits.
Next time you'll have to pay for these kind of "special" favors. My contacts risk their asses and they expect some good cash in return.
They're pretty antsy - just get the paintings on the table and keep both eyes open for anything weird.
OK, that's done. We got a pretty good payment this time but we could probably have held out longer.
We have enough diesel now.
The cops are right on top of us!
If you get the code order wrong, all hell will break loose.
Now that's hydropool euphoria. Get the loot!
Now! Drop them!
Keep an eye out for anything you can hustle out of there. The Murkywater containers are your best bet - get them open.
Scout the place and hit them hard. Get those jewels and keep the civs at bay. Let's get rich!
Someone pick up the phone. I'll talk to them.
Fucking hell. Me ears are bolloxed. Was that C4 or a demolition charge?
Bah, that offer is for chops. We can make them do better fo' sho'. Stay frosty, friends.
The code begins with a nine, according to my source.
Just throw the bags in here, god damnit!
What?! The timelock has paused. Hmm, could be your ECM jammer that's messing with it. Better leave those jammers alone for a second.
That they do, but we aren't letting that stop us, are we?
That's the depot where the machines are kept. Move out, you clowns.
You're locked out. The system is gonna take 30 seconds to reset.
Two more minutes and I need to go!
Reinforced time locked doors.
We are doing good - keep away from the guards.
BFD needs cooling. Refill the tank with water Hurry!
Right console. And the left.
I wonder what happened to Mr Pink?
Ach, kek! I've lost the connection. Turn the power back on, for me.
See if you can find a clue to where the entrance is. They wouldn't make it obvious.
You need to get onboard the helicopter!
You are one stupid asshole!
Remember guys, you're looking for the head of security. We need his USB stick.
DC now has a jewelry shortage - this is where we come in. Well done team!
The Golden Grin Casino: Very wealthy. Very secure. Very soon emptied by you.
I've set up the meeting location. You meet in an abandoned trainyard. Good luck.
Son, you have exactly two minutes to put them here on this phone, or I'm sending every goddamn available uniform right now.
Maybe if you cut the power nearby, he'll come investigate what's going on, yeah?
Your first job is getting into the depot. Scout the area, check for cameras and guards. Keep it quiet.
Damn, the mercenaries got to the EMP and stopped the charging.
...Kerels right around the corner, friends.
Can't blast through that friends, but have a look at the security reader there.
In politics, you have to be the change to make the change.
Great! That's one of our voting machines! Hack it when there's no one nearby. If they see what you're up to, things will get loud.
The wall is history. Move!
Maybe try that thermite you found before.
These assholes need to die!
To the boat, gang. Come on!
All right. Good. But the door's got two locks - one for Mitchell, one for Wilson. You'll need a codebreaker on the second lock.
One of the civillians is making a run for it, better keep em' in check!
BFD's guzzled a whole coolant tank already. Fill her glass, gang. Bathroom's have water.
We gotta get the ship moving! Lemme think... Alright, just hack the ship control terminal and make sure it stays on.
Don't forget to pick up that saw.
C'mon guys, find that safe.
Get the loot to the van.
You looking to rent an office? What's the delay?

That blueprint you found was for a new type of infantry turret - codenamed RC1. Real next-gen shit. Digging a little deeper, I got word of a specially chartered train, headed in to the Pentagon. I've hacked the rail network, and they think they've stopped due to a glitch in the switches. Three railcars. One has the hardware. The other two have its ammo. It all sells, but your priority is the turret. They won't be expecting you.
Fuck!
One down, two more to go. Find the other numbers and we get easy access to the vault.
Great! That's one of the closets!
Friends, I know this is serious but you still have to have a bit of fun, yeah? Watch now!
Bain, I heard nada... This guy in the elevator keep messing it up! Anyway, let's do it!
We count eight paintings. Good job.
Get the hell out!
I have information that someone is out to destroy the Payday Gang.
The helicopter is in bound for the lumber yard, gang.
... you guys really ARE the PAYDAY gang!
I was ready to go all night!
We need chemicals to cook. Muriatic acid, caustic soda and hydrogen chloride. Easy.
Promising... Very promising...
Have a look around - there has to be a way in, we're losing precious time.
Just one more bag.
Yeah, baby. No, I'm working. I'll see you tomorrow, ok?

The Teuer dealership is one of the few East Coast showrooms that sells Falcogini cars. They just got the hot new model in - the La Troienne. I got some people overseas who are willing to pay big for this little beauty. Get in there, get to the wheels and get them out. Simple, right?
Nine to go.
... Alright now, be cool.
Got anything on the symbols yet?
The mainframe... you should get back to it, friends.
Amazing! Just climb up onto BFD and we call it a job done. Or stay behind and really pick the place clean.
SWATs are incoming from the forest next to the road, be careful!
What the fuck. Cocaine in toys? It's brilliant! I have to remember this.
Over there!
Merry Christmas! Let's get out of here!
Cameras. Everybody hates cameras. I set up a room with a couple variations for you to test your stealth. No shame in failure and also no one shooting at you, which is nice.
Are they gone yet? Is it safe to come out?
Bag it up!
Sorry guys, Bile had to leave you for dead...
It landed right out in the open.
That's nine.
Come on guys, get the prisoner to the tower!
Fish in this town grow fat on corpses.
Get those bags over here, now!
You gotta find a way in. Keep looking!
Shit, gas, gas!!! Get out! Move it!
I'm sorry, I don't think providing a loan, to buy guns, to rob a bank, is very sensible.

So, might any individual in this here room at present, be able to present to me, a constitutional provision regarding treasonous acts against the United States? Anyone? Well, Section 3, article 3 of the Constitution provides "Treason against the United States, shall consist only in levying war against them, or in adhering to their enemies, giving them aid and comfort. No person shall be convicted of Treason unless on the Testimony of two Witnesses to the same overt Act, or on...?....on...? Would anyone care to finish? Anyone?... Bueller?
Got a deposit box opportunity in this bank. I have inside info.
They got us in a god damn ambush!
Uh... David, uh, Jones. Gang, you're going to have company.
Coming around again. Going to leave this on the road for you.
Bravo! Now, second step - find the local security station, cut through and approve the opening sequence.
Find the security panel so we can get that door open.
Crap hit the fan - well, crap hit everything, judging by the stink off you. I'll call in a cleaner crew for the evidence left behind.
Hector wants this recorded. Don't ask, I didn't.
How about that escape? Is your driver coming?
You need to deal with those fires. Use the sprinklers.
Heads up, Dallas! The cops are here! Take 'em out!
You need to secure the loot at the positions I've marked.
And that's the guards dealt with. Cameras are no longer a problem.
What the hell? That's the wrong elevator. Hold on.
Once more, the code is...
Well, there goes plan A. Glad the crowd didn't hear any of that.
Hey, man.
Ah! Get inside that vault, friends! Almost done here!
You've still got the element of surprise.
30 seconds more and I leave.
Mu... Muriatic acid - we need some more in there.
The vault code reshuffles every 10 minutes for extra security. Put a blocker on the keypad to lock the code in place.
Bueno we're gone man.
This could have been your chance to make at least...a billion dollars!
What the... Another one? Guys, there's another switchbox, rewire that one too.
Wait. I have his cell number. Let me call him, try and distract him. Get ready to fill his glass.
There're several doors that could be a security room. Don't know which one exactly...
Just... a little... longer.....
I'm gonna KILL you!
What the hell, I'll do you guys a favor.
Settle down Hox, it's like an old war movie.
You did it! Now, throw the cocaine in the back and let's head out.
OK, to make things a little more interesting I'm sending this feed live to all the big media outlets while we upload. Lots of coverage.
Nice security. OK. Two magnetic keycards, one key. Alright. Start looking.
The civilians might get ideas. Don't let 'em have 'em. See you at the safe house.
Someone alerted the cops. No matter. We got what we came for.
Now, we convert this preparation into success.
The code is...
You clever bastards, you'll get around them using those tunnels.
There's the briefcase! But you can't drill that gate. See if you can find some thermite.
Connecting. We can only do them one at a time, so fingers crossed this is the right one.
Watch out, they're bringing in a sniper team by chopper.
Shit, the mercenaries stopped the EMP charge! It's beginning to discharge!
Hi, I'm trying to reach Reilly-Needazheet. First initial "I".
Go, men - and get me what I want. The night out has just begun!
You fucked my car! Bastards!!
Now get into the chopper!
You don't want us to leave, do you? We're having so much fun together.
We got a fucking police caravan on our ass!
Ah kak - those poes are bringing in more SWAT turrets, with the express purpose of bringing me down. All right, I can't pick you up in town, but I am prepared for this.
Hehe, fucking clowns.
There should be a button or something that opens the safe. Look around.
Careful, looks like the bags are gonna explode!
Gang, you need to get the truck down. Maybe a little firepower.
Over here!
Our guy likes Red Dragon scotch. Find it, spike it and serve it.
Is there anything else I can help you with, ma'am? Would be interested in an auto loan?
Ah, don't wet your knickers, Bain! I have buyer. Very far away. Is all good.
Ok, the doors are open. Get inside.
Six!
Thank fucking god you're here! These bastards were going to kill me, and for what? I just came here to get the bike... Jesus Christ...
I can't last more than a minute here.
We are going to need ingredients, so scout the place and see what you can find.
Keep the heat away from the circuit breakers.
We can't use the lab anymore, it's gone
The drill can't be dropped through that skylight barrier. Gotta open it from the security center.
The hack is almost through...
Power's down! Get that goat!
Yes, it would be most agreeable to get some fuel in this chopper.
I just wanted to make sure that you know that our All You Can Eat buffet is now available.
Nice! Go through the gate and head to the vault. Find the counting room and pour out the thermite. We're burning down to the vault!
Find those trucks! And don't shoot Vlad's guys if any of them are still around.
You are worse than pond scum! I will silence you forever for this!
Don't forget: we're looking for voting machines. My money is on them being in shipping crates scattered about.
Come on guys! Remember to get that winch up and running again!
Bring the shit!
What are you doing!? You didnt even make it inside, Let's go to plan B, and next time, stay low.
Good, now get back in there.
Don't let them turn the power off again!
If you can get through this quietly, you should be able to just melt away with the crowd.
OK, now get into the vault room.
My friends! Can you help Vlad balance cash registers in old stores? Small thing really.
Garrett's not going to be gone forever, so get to finding those boxes.
Four!
That's one shiny piece of carbon.
They deployed a gun turret! Stay low!
There's another guard here.
Risk it if you think you can, folks.
Achhh! MORE domkops! Courier dropped the winch parts all around. You'll need to look for them friends.
Hmm... there seems to be another switchbox. Find it and rewire it, same as the other one.
One in place.
Next, old Locke needs to put a nice little computer virus into the system.
All of this has happened before. Fuck me.
Activate the charge cycle, yeah?
Put these sons of bitches down!
Yeah, I'm getting the new car on Wednesday. New wheels man, it's good.
...you gotta take all those winch parts into the vault room and assemble it.
Start hacking, friends.
Gear up, we got a bad ass police force coming in!
What matters to me is that people take their lives seriously. That's all politics is at the end of the day: be serious and present.
There are bandit barriers in the bank. Shut 'em from the security office. They'll help keep cops out of your way.
OK, the data is scrambled! It will appear as an ordinary hard drive crash.
Vlad's pretty upset about these safes. Wants to talk to you.
OK guys, the authentication is almost complete. Keep an eye on that timer.
If you find a laptop at the computer station, I could use it to help you.
Good day for a jewelry hit. I'd recommend casing the joint before you hit it, though.
Pick up some precious stones for me!
That's... A lot of money. I guess we're in the meth trade now. We really needed that information, though. Remember? Saddle up and let's get those pricks - with or without the information.
Absolute class my friends! Thanks to you, we will have a better outcome tomorrow. Much appreciated!
Are you looking for something to use?
Uh, I hope I got this right...
This is First World Bank. No, sir, unfortunately the ATM's do not have a code you can hack.
Kill all those pieces of shit!
Over there!
Good - the seal is history. Now keep watching that drill. If it jams, you need to restart it.
Get the fuck outta here!
You've seen enough TV to know where the West Wing is, so go there!
You got 'em! Now get back to Operations!
They built it on the bottom floor.
Fear, as you surely know, is a powerful motivator. The District Attorney can now be considered properly... motivated. He will be ready to help your friend. I will contact you in due course.
Mendoza's people are on the scene doing the cook - get them clear and reclaim Hector's meth. You can leave right here when you have the stuff. Go for it.
Check the cafeteria for a computer. Bring me a cappuccino while you're at it.
There's one!

The Elephant's PR will claim he came to power through depth, leadership and integrity, but that's bullshit. That oily bastard's going to cheat his way to the Senate, and this is where you come in. There are trucks at Pier 39. One of them has voting machines. Find the truck and attach a GPS-tracker to it. We'll deal with it down the line. Naturally, The Elephant wants this done with as little chance of bad press coming back to him as possible. So he's ear-marked some of his considerable campaign funds for a special black-ops bonus. You guys do this quietly, and the good politician will see you well rewarded.
Woah, we lost some loot in that explosion! Well, no time to waste! Look trough the rest of the deposit boxes.
...muriatic acid?
Damn it, this one seems to be malfunctioning! I'm sending the chopper back to pick up another one.
What's taking so long!?
Good evening, sir.
The gate should be open for you now.
Don't put on your mask and case the area first.
Step into the closet when you're ready.
Why are we here? What's going on?
A luta continua!
What the hell. They're deploying tripmines in the parking lot! Deal with it before they close it off.
What are you doing? Follow Bain!
Now, power up the weapon again.
Cold fusion energy may be the next big thing for my clients. Unfortunately, they do not own the most promising prototype - yet.
How can it be empty!? Aah!
Bain is making short work of the Murkys. To get through here, you'll have to drill the door and get the dead guard's keychain.
Take care to enter the correct code.
This is not all of we had agreed on.
The doors will only open once the ECM jammer stops.
Over there!
There should be four prison transports.
Jesus, is this the fastest you can be!?
Find the bank manager! Black suit, balding. Tie him down - get the keycard.
You get into that computer yet?
And I believe that about does it, my friends! Now, please ensure that our hard-earned loot is placed on the cables and conveyed up to me.
It will be there. I assure you.
Time to leave the PEOC, hurry!
Yeah, well. Tell him his ass is on the line if he isn't available for the regular time-lock check in.
You need to load both boxes onto the heli before boarding, yeah?
And... off we go!
You can't let them kill the power, it'll slow everything down!
Now you get paid!
Pull the switch and see what happens
That's four bags! It's what we need - but if you feel you can handle some more, go ahead!
The C4 did its job. Get that vault floor cut open. Impenetrable my ass!
The vault is going to be in one of these Murkywater shipping containers. Check them!
OK, guys, here they come. Get that crane moving!
I thought we lost the fucking chopper at the underpass!
Gold is golden. You're going to work hard on this one. Get into the bank, control the room, open that bank vault with the thermal drill... I'll try to have my guy drop it off for you.
Get inside - we need those cooks.
That's one in, great! We need at least three more.
Jewelry store! My favorite place!
Emergency services are trying to commandeer my chopper for evacs. I'll be there in 2.
This isn't the right truck. Dammit. Find the right one.
SWATS are coming in from the north!
I bet Vlad gets his money tomorrow. Ha.
You're dead!
Escape is here in a minute!
No reason to stay quiet now. Chopper's on it's way!
Damn it! More frickin' laser beams. All right, no time to figure out where the system is controlled. Just watch the pattern and hurry through.
I'm in, might take a few to get the door open.
The vault with the artifact is behind these doors. You gotta get them open, friends.
My associates will see it done.
Don't forget those stones, get them to Blonde!
That's enough for Vlad to be happy.
All right. Safeties off. Get down there!
That floor needs to be blown open, yeah?
Hey guys, I can't do anything until you find those routers!
Set up the laptop to the anti-aircraft gun. Maybe I can work my magic.
Well, what does a goat sound like?
Bain is heading for the roof, try to keep up with him, yeah?
One more time: sneak in, watch for cameras, guards and any other alarms. Go in fast but careful. Don't get sloppy.
The display cases are smashable.
Just chill.
It's open! Bag the gold!
Gang, you need to locate that turret.
Get out of that damn lobby!
There's a boat on the lake. A zip-line can get you across.
What the fuck!?
Get to the escape car!
Now just let the timelock run down, dear friends. It will be worth it, I promise.
OK, friends. Hurry out and rescue Mr Pink, right?
... on my way!
Blerrie courier threw the winch parts all around. Sorry, friends but you'll have to round them up.
Pilot dropped the supplies. Get them into the house.
30 seconds left. Get in the van or you'll be left behind.
OK we can rest easy - no votes are getting cast today. And we got cash to boot. Good win, and good times.
Gunship's firing! Move! Move!
Kerels are trying to take back the hostage.
The pardons will be in the vault, so I need you to take a look at it.
If you move across the roof into the next building, I can meet you there.
Find anything useful nearby to use on the crate?
You should be able to find an escape route if you get out and cross the street.
They're on us like fucking flies on a turd!
Get out there and take the AA guns offline!
We could have done with you guys in Rhodesia.
I'm gonna kill you!
If you happen to drop one of the guards, you should be able to hide the body under the train so it doesn't get detected.
Have you started looking in the terminal yet?
I had a contact hide a cooler in the elevator for us. Drop the vials in there!
And now we wait. The Commissar can't hold up in there forever.
I can move sapphires too, if you grab any along the way.
Hmm we got a slight problem. Chopper is running out of fuel after all these back and forths. He will be back after refueling. Hold you ground!
OK, we're inspecting it... So far so good... He's running tests now...
Wouldn't surprise me if Garrett, trying to be clever, put it somewhere stupidly obvious.
You want to get out alive? Then move it!
The CFO has the master code guys. Find him!
Whoa. Did I win?
A prudent person foresees the danger ahead and takes precautions; the simpleton goes blindly on and suffers the consequences. I'm quoting the Holy Book.
Damn, that guy is blocking the stairs. There's only one way to do things now.
That's the second color and number.
Get the loot to the roof, gang. I got a chopper en-route.
Keep it together! Get him!
Fuck! The Hondurans! They're here! They're going to kill us!
Oh, no... now we're going to be here until tomorrow, for sure.
It's not like we um, can't get more.... riiiight?
No worries, friends. I'll get Bain. Just keep those Murkys away from us, yeah?
On second thought - we'll take everything you have!
There you go, that's the vault.
Look for Twitch in the alley!
Careful though, don't get discovered.
...You got about a minute until the kerels get there. Keep those civvis under control, yeah?
They're coming into the bank!
Here! Here!
Who is this? Who the fuck are you?
Took you long enough!
I got an inside man who tells me the color of the money on this job is golden.
And another one.
Can't unlock the doors until you patch in properly.
The mechanic said he wants you to bring him some kind of special tools from the workshop. Hurry up.
One down, one to go.
Move your asses!
The house is on fire folks! Call it!
Get out of that burning steel coffin, gang!
Where is it!?
Phone's ringing, time to pick it up and start this trade off.
Need the Moretta's frequency, guys. Get searching terminals.
Don't believe Duke's superstitions... get to the archaeology lab.
Yep,that's 17 bags!
The game is on, motherfuckers!
I'm gonna drive a spike through your eye!
I'll be there in one minute...
Tick tock, guys! Cops are on the way!
Think the drill is finished, guys. Time to get into that basement.
I got real bad news!
Really, Bile? Gang, the EMP ended up inside the lumber mill instead of outside.Need to get in there now.
We're gonna sail around the world, you see the boat over there? You know...put out a mill for it and, uh, I dunno... Maybe we'll put it to sea this year. Huh, we'll see.
Are you guys ready to get the hell out?
The FBI's onto us! Guns up! Don't lose that coke!
Good, now hurry up and turn the lights back on or people will go bossies and sound the alarm.
The wagons are all over the place. Could be loot in 'em. Might also be C4. If there is, grab it. You're gonna need it.
Well done. You move silently.
This piece of junk is from the 70's. Hurry up...
Move the pieces of the cannon to the pick-up, gang.
Guys, take him to the retinal scanner and force him to use it!
Let's make like a tree and leave, my friends!
Ach! Some poes has been joyriding this bird. Gas is empty. Can you be a good chap and hook up the fuel line?
Okay, here comes the cops to investigate. They're just checking things out, so if you can deal with 'em quietly...
This one is a hit on the Teuer dealership. High class joint.
C'mon, take all the pardons. You need to leave.
Looks like a good spot to cut, yeah?
Remember the plan. Get the keycards, keep the civilians in check and set off no alarms.
Time to collect on that tiara. Vlad will be happy. You guys just crashed a wedding.
There's still a goat in the scaffold.
Get that sniper!
The bus is all set up to... Well, you worry about sending the signal. Then you'll see.
You need to leave, friends!
Damn SWAT van's blocking the route. Move it!
BoKung... Finally a good china store!
It's a setup! Damn brak sold us out. Swats incoming. You'll need to fight your way out.
You need to find the emergency power lever friends.
Gentlemen? The crates with the strobes? Please?
You'll die for this!
Remember, stash the loot in the vent.
You're getting whacked!
That's it. The Commissar is dead. We're one step closer to getting Hoxton back. I'm sending in a helicopter, so stay put. Good work up there.
Charon is waiting for you, guys! Get moving!
OK, he should be out of harm's way. Place a flare on the table outside the yard. Set it off to signal the evac.
Switch that terminal back on, gang. Let's get this ship moved.
Had a look at the barries yet?
What the..? Power's out. Get it on!
The side door. Nice short cut if you fancy avoiding the front door.
One of Gage's guys is in a nearby parking lot. You can toss loot over the wall to him.
Try not killing anyone, but if it has to be done, then hiding the body under the train should be safe.
Alright, that's all I got room for.
We got four!
What took you so long?
Look inside the containers. Find what cargo they're carrying. Maybe that could help you figure out which is the right truck.
All right, we got what we came for. You can bail or go back, clean The Grin.
There's the call - cops are on their way!
... you made us come for nothing?
I've had some problems with pirates in the Caribbean. I need you to go to Miami and solve these problems for me.
Oh no, they sent an attack helicopter!
Almost there now, just a few more bags and we should have enough.
The auctioneer has fled the building! You'll never get the keycard now, so just stick a drill on that door and bore it open.
Haven't spotted you yet... Still good.
The guard rotation is changing, so there might be more coming soon. Keep a lookout, yeah?
This is the warehouse. You can bet the better loot is right here.
Give me 30 seconds and I will drop that EMP.
Hmm... Yup, there's no way around it. I'm gonna need to get into the garage and take apart one of the bikes there. Only way to get the stuff I need. Take me there and cover my ass while I work.
That should do it. They'll overheat now and cause that reboot.
Ok, that's great. Now for that server... If you get back to that laptop and hook me up, I should be able to open the room where the server is.
Guys, you need to get moving.
I can't believe you destroyed my car!
That's close enough! I got it!
I'm here! I'm here!
That was a hell of a bar brawl. And now Vlad's probably on top, cagey old Russian. Let's go get you that payday.
Crap, heavy reinforcements moving in. You guys better jump in with the loot if you wanna get out of here.
Look for a code that starts with zero.
Chopper's here, get out! Get out!
Keep looking for those router boxes, I'm working on a plan B.
Yeah, hahaha. Yeah, told 'em it was an "accounting error".
I'll tell you what. We were never gonna deal with you guys! We'll take it all!
OK, you're out. The gas will clear up - just hang on.
There's one!
Help me! The've got guns!
1600 Penn, maybe we go there for our next big score.
What the fuck did you guys steal!?
I guess this will be a nice change of pace from D.C. and politics, right?
Two bags. It's all gravy from here. Don't stop.
Get inside the truck! The chopper is going to airlift the whole damn thing out!
O kaek, I wasn't counting on that. Never can it be easy.
Here! Here!
They interrupted the computer. You gotta protect it, guys!
Our chopper will be over the train yard in a moment. Get ready!
Burn it all. Most of it is marked anyway, the feds would be all over us.
Right, now let me just get this sorted. Will be done in a jiffy.
I'm a self-made millionaire. When I run dry, well, I just make another million.
Stop wasting time, yeah? You're risking the job!
Got it. Please tell me we're done now.
Hey guys, there's nothing left. Get out of there!
You want charity? You're gonna get it, 'cos you're headed right to welfare, sister!
That'll keep nosy bastards from spying on our business. Good.
This place looks like it hasn't been decorated since the 60's.
This is fine, we'll take it.
The daily code for the time lock on the vault. Shall I send someone over?
At least seven more!
Just the guys we've been waiting for!
That's gotta be the cops calling, checking things out.
Old Locke has arranged a stash of gear for you,friends.
I saw a conveyor chute over there. Throw the loot in. It connects to the kitchen of...hang on.
They cut the power! Get it back up or we can't continue the download.
Ready or not, here I come!
Damn! Alright. Expect company, gang!
You got most of it, and most of it is better than none of it. Hector will be happy with how you handled yourself. Gotta get to the boat now.
Take care of that food yet?
Right!
A little C4 will deal with that. I'm sending some now. Hold on.
Hang in there!
Guys, if the Commissar gets away, Hoxton will rot. So move it!
Okay, get back to the body and hide it.
This type of situation is often fluid - you reacted well. Decisively. Enjoy this payday. You will hear from me in due course.
Great. Now get the stuff. As much as you can, but at least a few bags.
Kill these guys and bury 'em!
Was hoping we'd do this without police for once.
Hey, look, everything is fine here. You don't need to do that.
Great. Now bring on the waterworks!
You could probably get some good covering fire going from one of those roof tops.
