That's a second hatch, guys. The Commissar must have something sweet.
That was messy but sometimes, it gets messy. But you ended up on top. That's what's important. Great work!
You got it. Excellent. Time to bring it all to the helicopter. Bile's waiting, get going!
Your escape helicopter is here,I suggest you get the hell out of there!
Get a zipline up if you want. It'd be great for moving the bags.
All right, gang. I've found some terminals that might have a suitable code. I need you to run a little hack on them.
Picked up a tail!
This didn't go as planned, guys!
Can't do it, Broadsword. Got a lot of wind shear on that vector. Over.
Are you looking for the second box?
...See if you can open the doors via electrical boxes. Should be a couple nearby on the walls.
That is all, good.
They're breaching the wall!
Hey Tin Boy! You got a drug problem!
The bluechip hired henchmen are here.
Ah. I see. Hector told me there "might" be booby traps on that bus.
We got a cash situation in this bank. They have missed their delivery to the HQ this week. Don't everyone sigh all at once...
It's getting dangerous here!
Come on let's get a move on.
Spent the weekend polishing the Longfellow. Took the chief's wife out for a spin. Let her polish the.. you know it, man!
What the fuck?
Its vent connects with the Security Center.
Quite the view, huh? Well, I've got something else to show you. Get to the control booth.
You guys're dressed pretty sharply for pool repair men. Guess you got your overalls in those bags.
Dogs! Dogs! All of you, pig asshole dog fuckers! I'll find you. I'll skin you alive.
The cops opened the entrance gate!
Make sure you keep the power up.
This one is a hit on one of the high-class auto joints in town. The Teuer car dealership.
... you should see me coming any second!
That sounds sensible. Yeah. Maybe I'll put a little aside for that.
The drill has stopped. You gotta restart it!
The chopper can't wait forever, crew. Get the loot up there!
Looks like enough to me...
That's your way out, but you can't leave yet. Wipe the crap off your shoes and secure the money.
You've come to the wrong neighbourhood, motherfuckers!
Guys, it's fewer bags than we expected, but we can still do the trade and hope they agree to give us the information.
I'm going as fast as I can!
Hey! That's expensive!
Time to get out of dodge - let's split the loot at the safe house and take the weekend off.
Boom! You've hit the motherload!
Security door. Huh... Someone must have a key.
Robbery is vigilance, folks.
Bad news, friends. I can't come and get you while they have active air defences online. You gotta go and deactivate them!
Well done. All the machines are reconfigured. The Elephant is going to get an uncharacteristically strong showing in this district.
Gang! Get out of there! What the hell are you doing?
That's two!
It's all part of the job, isn't it?
Looks like the curator's basement office.
This will reduce the effectiveness of their surveillance.
Find that safe and control the people.
You will die for this!
That's 17 bags!
Ship's there. Get on it! Maybe deploy the zip-line - might speed things up.
Everything working again.
Traffic is backed all the way along the southbound I45. If you were planning on getting through that area, forget it.
I'm here, guys, but I can't come closer as long as the roof is filled with cops.
Be quick, gang. The guards will notice an open vault door.
Hey, hold the door!
You need to patch me in so I can open those doors.
You are looking for blank paper rolls and ink. Grab both and feed it to the printing machine.
That's the alarm. No more tip-toeing, gang. It's all about speed and violence now.
No time to waste, take the artifact. Hurry!
Is anyone going to pick up the phone?
Great.
Looks like we're about to get busy!
FBI in disarray. A lot of people about to get called into their bosses' office. Mendoza crippled and we're about to get paid. Nice burn, folks.
That dumpster should do the trick.
Guys... Can you see any hints on what the correct one should look like?
The roof? Are you fucking nuts, Sensei? I'm not doing that.
Get inside the vault and see what's inside!
Put them down!
Leave the EMP at the escape area. We don't wanna risk it.
There's still thugs in the building. You need to deal with them.
The hell do you think you're doing!?
Fuck! I don't wanna die today!
There's gotta be something behind these shelves.
OK, here we go.
Papa John's long stocking boutique, how can I help you?
Let's see if there's anything else of value while waiting for the drill.
Gang, you still need to blow up that radar.
Moretta's comm frequency will be on one of the computers. Check them out.
You got the sequence wrong, friends. Either the symbols or the order.
Today is the day. The day the Benevolent Bank goes down.
Excellent, that's a part in the bag. Bring it back to the mechanic.
Could be useful somewhere down the line.
You have everything to you need to open the vault. Keycard first, then enter the code.
I know there's C4 in one of the wagons. Check 'em out!
Get the bags here, quick!
A civilian escaped, must have called the cops!
There we go!
Nice! I'll detonate these when the time comes. Get back to that storage room. I got it open!
Blackhawk! Blackhawk coming down! Gun up team!
This is R.G.
Ten left.
The deal's off!
What the hell, I'll do you guys a favor...
What are you waiting for, fire the cannon!
Alright, I'm here to do some heavy lifting!
You need to find crowbars. They are most likely in the warehouse. Jam them into the vault fans. The heat builds inside, and... voila!
That should do it, you can place the drill now.
You're breaking up... Can you hear me ok?
How I make my money? Well you could say I make.. a lot of it.
What the hell!? Hey, you wanna look where you're throwing that stuff!
Great, now get that drill on.
Okay, take a look around and see if you can find one.
Encryption download is complete.
The pilot just signaled that he's deploying the lance. He's done his job, now you do yours.
Come on! Fuck 'em up!
You responded to a changing situation with admirable proficiency - and impressive firepower. Enjoy your payday. You will hear from me again.
Let the drill do it's job. We'll have the Commissar soon enough.
Up top!
I think you underestimate me!
Get the fuck outta here!
Ah crap! Security locked the containers when the alarm was triggered. Looks like we're drilling.
Get the crate open, friends.
Like... a glooove!
Listen up, gang. I'm sending in a boat to pick you up. Look for the small water access near the river.
Don't let them burn the intel. Jesus!
They're shooting at our tires!
Well, this was harder than I remembered it to be.
Cash time. Bag it!
I got one!
And that's the second. Oh, I can smell the wealth! But greed is good, yeah. For sure. Find the third pallet.
Couldn't get a positive ID on who the DNA belongs to, but we got a sample, so that will help. Now, get back to Hoxton.
Something wrong with pump.
The power is down. You need to restore it.
No time to waste, we got to leave!
There's thugs all around the building, gang. Take 'em out!
Casino manager has the first briefcase. The Pit Boss has the second. And then the head of security. Need all three for the code.
Hey, I'm having trouble with my account on the computer. Do I internet?
Bang that gong folks.
Hey, I have plans for that tree! Don't destroy it!
Got our seven bucks back, gang. Stretch goals are good.
Ey man, over here!
Do I look like a store clerk? Leave 'em.
Help Charon! Take 'em out!
Man... This place... Find that gold and we can buy one of our own.
...The plan breaks down like this.
I'm gonna break you!
I think that rug was quickly thrown down, probably hiding a hatch. We'll check it out later.
Typical, I'm being locked out of the network. Must be a firewall. See if you can bypass it from another terminal.
And...
Trustee bank is up ahead. Go in, find the vault, blaze the money, video the whole thing and get out. FBI is on the highest alert so make it quick and clean. Let's do it.
Have you checked the tool shed for the laptop?
It doesn't look good, guys - it doesn't look good!
This is First World Bank. Yes, ma'am, you can deposit that here. Yes, we have a very secure vault. Yes, ma'am, even *those* kind of people bank here.
Find me a telephone around there and I'll try to get Mr. Garrett to take a little walk or something.
Get that cage built before you deal with the money.
Have you found the gate yet, friends?
You should find evidence related to Hoxton's case in the Evidence Room. Get searching.
We're about to test this ride's air bags!
Get them off me!
Awesome! With all those bags, the trade should be smooth.
While it's burning I'd start getting some of those deposit boxes open. You didn't think we were just gonna leave empty handed, right?
The front of the train, gang!
Stay low! Snipers took out your driver! They must be deployed near by.
This is gonna take a while. Make sure to protect the winches while they are working their magic.
Help me hack into the mainframe computer. Maybe I can take care of the vault from there.
Manager's got a black suit, thinning hair. Find him, tie him - that might make him more helpful.
Welcome to the greatest night of my fucking life. Great job everyone!
Good. Now get a breaker on the second code lock.
Good job, that's the second number found. Just one more.
Get my cocaine!
We go to our backup plan. Have a look around and see if you match anything to those wire boxes.
Stay clear of the guards.
We really need that escape car now! How long do you think it will be?
Hmm... Ah, okay! I need some exhaust pipes and a gas tank. There's a ceiling lift in the workshop. They store them up there. Get me both and I'm all happy.
What!? They're shooting our tires!
There's a sniper covering the large alley, watch out!
Now if the cameras are giving you a hard time, there's a surveillance operator around. He's in the security office.
Toss those tablets into the mixer, crew.
... hope you guys are prepared!
Got this bucket of bolts pinned!
Okay, first things first. We begin by "casing" the surroundings like any professional heister.
Another C4 - defuse it!
Washington P.D. just pulled up out front!
Those Murky bastards are going to be trying to ship the goodies out, so check their containers!
These jewels will be easy to shift.

I know what's going on over there, and I want a slice of the pie. Load a bag with money, and toss it over the yellow wall near Jimbos, the auto-repair shop. Ya hear me? And I see one bag crossing the street, I'll call the cops.
I don't feel so good...
As long as those anti-air defenses are functional, Fedor won't be able to drop the EMP. Find a way to disable them, gang.
The Oval Office is right there. Hurry, yeah?
Here! I'm getting to that server. Kill every last fucker ya see!
The Murkywater trains will be locked by some kind of security panel. We'll most likely have to hack them to get the doors open.
You need to get to the cell blocks, right away.
Ok, you know which wine we're looking for! Find it!
The choppers ready. Get moving!
Fuck you!
Account reports. But no codes. Try the next one.
There's the second one.
There's one!
Light 'em up. They will ping back up.
More C4. Not quite enough. Find the last batch. Keep searching.
So, joke over, right? This just big joke? Dont do this!
Ok, he's off... now follow him through the laundry room!
I'm about thirty seconds out, keep cool.
Guys, the FBI boss has fled the scene. We needed his help to get past the retinal scanner. Crap. Time for plan B.
Didn't you hear the man, gang? He needs a gas tank and exhaust pipes from the workshop. Get over there and deliver.
Find and deal with the manager, crew. Gotta get that keycard!
They tailed me and they're flying close!
There it goes. Remember, this isn't a speed boat. Going to take a while. Keep a low profile. Be careful not to trigger $NL;the alarm. Or search for extra loot. Your choice, guys.
The code is split onto three laptops.
Ey, what's going on, ese?
Hurry up!
Close one guys, better not take too long.
See you later muchachos.
Hook it up guys.
Let me remind you - look for a ladder.
Sweet baby Jesus protect me...
Mr Blonde, did you bring a few cans of the cold stuff like I asked?
The EMP should have released the magnetic lock. Once you're down there, find the scanner and the test-subjects.
I need you to help me get past the blocker in the mainframe.
I gotta dash out in two minutes!
No question, Bain sent us to the right bank, yeah?
We got an Inside Man there. They'll be able to open the gates leading to the vault area. Patching them through now.
Ah, it's stuck. Gonna need to shoot it down.
I've marked them for you - get to them, and cut the wire.
What are you waiting for?
Gate's are open. Great. Time to move the ship. I knew that comm frequency you found earlier would come in useful. Now just find a radio, and let me do the rest.
Sweet! Bring the bag to the van.
About half of it is gone already! Push forward, push upward, you gotta get to that coke!
More Russians on the way. Vans coming around the corner!
That's it! I'm off!
The EMP took care of the magnetic lock, so you have free passage to the laboratory.Let's go!
Burn that trap before you leave! Hurry!
Mitchell's by the pool. Introduce yourselves.
That's it, guys, but we still need to plant more C4 on the fifth floor and the roof.
Sales-people always have laptops.
Can we be gone in 60 seconds? Else cops will be here.
Be very careful with those bags, gang. They don't take the rough stuff well.
The Mendozas are about to leave on a jet plane. We need to trade this product for info on them. These guys are scum, but you don't wanna mess with them.
I'm coming in two!
You need to find those code fragments.
This server has secrets, recordings, data that can change the world. And all my saved games. Yeah, for sure.
Flying like angels over...that ruin of a city. Great job!
My special tools. Yes, I definitely need my special tools, and you'll find those in the workshop. Look out for toolboxes.
Anti-air defenses?! Are you shitting me?! Turn the plane around, Bile! Do it now! Guys, take the parachutes and jump out!
I have an inside man who's set up surveillance drones and spy cameras. The camera access is on the roof.
Control those rooms.
Find the tiara!
Don't let it keep ringing, someone's gonna get suspicious!
You can quit searching those cases - you found the bomb!
Halfway there with the painting collection. Now just get the rest and we're home free.

The Harvest & Trustee is a vulnerable bank so I see an opportunity for us. Case it so you can find out where. You're going to need to get into the vault using a thermal drill, get whatever's in there bagged up and moved back to the escape car. Use your judgment and don't be greedy... Good luck, folks.
Alright, our dealer is arriving, hold on for a second.
Our plan is solid. Nothing's going to go south.
There's one!
Great, you're in. One more door between us and the server.
They're trying to shut them down!
This is Randolph. Roberts Bank is happy to serve you.
If you're feeling rough, maybe spend a keycard and crack the Infirmary open.
An off-shore methlab? Clever. A methlab in a metal box? Not so clever...
Can't move forward. What do we do?
Smile for the camera, assholes. I see you. Yes.
Your driver had to bail. He left behind a drill. Get it, and use it on the vault.
Hurry friends, get that dinges charged.
This thing has secrets that can topple the government. Wanna see what the President keeps in a folder called "Gentlemen's Interests"? Yeah, you do - for sure!
Almost there.
That's the heaviest truck the cops have got, so expect their best shot.
Let's get the fuck out of here.
OK, now reactivate the computer.
Let Bile know you're ready by lighting a flare, yeah!
Christ, we got cops!
Any second now!
Blerrie, how long is this thing? Let's hope it doesn't interfere with our connection.
You're going to have to crack open this crate too.
Find the water hose. Bring it to the safe!
Fuck, one of us got caught and placed in custody! Bain, we need new transportation! Now!
Now, only one vault can be opened at a time, and not all vaults are containing the loot. I will leave it to you to figure out which is worth opening.
I see one of 'em!
We got the train moving the prototype turret stopped at signals outside the city. Get there, get that turret.
We need that plane!
Remember: set fire to the tires. Get gas all over them!
Don't let them run off!
Find me his server room. I will scan his stuff for info on the arms deal.
Are you guys insane? Leave that bag!
Guys can't we work something out?
Great. Now keep the cops away from it.
Why does it feel like I shouldn't be here right now?
And the price? 18 bucks. How you like that, huh?
...You'll need to find the box's shelf number by hacking a terminal in the computer lab.
Plan B guys. Go find the teddy bear, rip it open and use the saw inside to cut open the ICU doors.
Nice shooting my friends. Dropping of the C4 as agreed.
Ralph's got to be hiding somewhere. Find him and get that card!
Tin Boy's got a snow-white soul! Hahaha!
Gotta be a way up to the office.
Would have thought all those weapons would have got you there faster, yeah?
Ah, there we go, friends!
You're pushing your luck by staying...
The goddamn fuck is taking so long? I'm bleedin' here!
You're going to have DC's finest crawling up your ass. Cops on the scene.
Helicopter will be here in one minute.
Don't let the guy lag behind!
Expertly done, gang. You guys are like shadows.
Oh, shiny! Whoever looted this liked the finer stuff.
Well, you have to get the oil temperature just right.
I'm gonna drive a spike through your eye!
OK crew...
Bliksem! Operatives from Murky are in the area. Watch out for them, friends!
They will wonder how this happened, but they will know who did it. And they will learn not to fuck with me.
Dammit! The plane snagged the cage but there was no goddamn cash. You guys need to pick it up and haul it out.
Keep in mind: If you cross me, I have the capability to make you disappear in a way that makes it impossible to identify you even by your teeth.
...Maybe someone forgot a keycard or something.
Run run run - feds are inbound but you can make it!
Yeah, how much money do I got in there? How much?
That's all of them, let's get out of here!
Move the box to the entrance with the conveyor in the central hub, yeah?
Alright, we gotta go to plan B.
Is it too much to ask that you keep the cops away from the power?
Good job, we are gone.
Great, now plug the usb into the computer. Look for a laptop, it should be near the house.
Hope that cable holds. Wait, did I add the weight of the safes...?
Bile managed to drop some explosives for you. They should be near where you landed, so grab 'em.
Another successful acquisition! Well done, my friends!
Who believes in fate? People with shit luck.
OK, now how about those laptops?
What are you trying to pull?
Little old grandmothers walk right by their blood money every day. Hidden in plain sight, Hector says. At least $100 million in black cash.
You guys are professional ghosts. Now get to the computer.
We've gotta hack it. Patch me into the PEOC mainframe, yeah?
He missed! That asshole missed the cable. Hold the cops off, he's coming about to try again.
Very nice, bringing more than we expected!
Halle-fucking-lujah. The access codes worked.
... I'm coming back soon!
Chavez has a panic room filled with cash and we're gonna steal the whole room. Yes, you heard me correctly.
The code is likely in the auctioneer's office, but you gotta get in there first. The auctioneer has a keycard to the door. Make him give it to you!
There, now let's move on to the next one.
Prep the next part, and hope nothing bad happens.
Get inside the vault, gang. See what's inside!
Who are those people?!
Hold on guys...
... You made us come for nothing?
Don't forget about the caches!
Come on! Fill the barrels!
The van's coming in. Get the bags ready!
Green and sweet! Bag that cash!
Look out, tear gas!
This is it. Right, I need to get on those servers. Clear the room!
It's quiet out there tonight. Keep it that way.
The head of security will have that USB stick.
They're deploying SWATs on the roof!
The office has a special lock system. It uses a spoken pass phrase. But I had a special cocaine package smuggled in through a drugs deal. It has a hidden microphone recorder in it. Find this package.
Crap! It missed the cable. Alright, don't panic. He's swinging around for another pass.
They interrupted the hack! Get it going again.
19... 20... 21... All that money and Garnet is too cheap to pay for a faster window washing rig! Ok that's it, 22nd floor and... go.
You have to find the whiteboard while we still have time, friends.
Thermite is our best way into the vault. We've done this before.
You need to find where the camera footage is kept. Move it, guys.
Soon as the money goes through, gonna smoke me the fattest fucking blunt you ever saw.
You will die for this!
Now just mix it all together. Steady... careful now...
Now you get paid!
... when it's done, we'll give you what you want.
Pigs will fly.
30 seconds guys!
I am pleased with this outcome.
First, you need to break into the depot. Try and keep it quiet. If you can't keep it quiet, make it fast.
Watch the neck!
OK, busting out of here!
Fuck me!
Let's give Mr Blonde a diversion. Make a break for it over by the Big John's Burger Joint so the cops will follow you and not Mr. Blonde and the loot.
"Screaming"
Funds have now been released into your account and we have received the asset. You got the upper hand on this one.
We need to lower those bollards. Find the control room. Gotta be one of these doors.
I have access. While you're waiting for me, grab the C4 from the van and get it planted in the street.
Seven bags!
Hey, that's a GENSEC armored transport! If you break it open you could steal some cash too!
The helicopter will see where we load our containers. Gotta deal with that.
Yet another successful collaboration! You have my thanks, my admiration and, most importantly, your share of the money.
You know what happens if they overrun you!
Where are you taking me?
Looks like one of our machines. Start the hack, and then keep the feds off it.
The Payday Gang! Welcome! Let's teach these guys a lesson, yes?
Aah christ in a handbag, are you two cops?

Hey. I spoke to Locke. Bain only has a couple more days. Those Kataru motherfuckers saw fit to shoot him full of virus. Same fucking stuff we stole from Mercy Hospital a few years ago. Whoever we got it for, they sold it to Murkywater and now it's killing him. Knew from the start that was a bad job. Bain did too, but he wanted that Cagliostro manuscript. That fucking book. Should have told him to fuck off, but he said we really needed it for something, and to be honest, we'd never be where we are without it. You reap the consequences of your actions I guess. That fucking book.
Guys, the lance is out there. Go get it!
Is everything alright over there?
Shit, the alarm! You need to find the security room. We can't do anything while this place is in lockdown!
There's one of 'em!
Okay gang...patching Locke through to you.
Near the front door!
There should be another wheel around here somewhere.
Use one of those cards on the security terminal. Then, use the second keycard on the keypanel by the vault door. There's a short window, so don't shilly-shally.
Let's get out of here. After you, please...
That's the keycard! Now, grab it and let's head back!
Probably a good idea to throw that dinges on the conveyor belt in the main hub- let the machines carry it back to the entrance for you, yeah?
The saw is through, so get in there and check the patient.
It's a beautiful building. Serene. Try and keep it that way.
OK the intel is good. It'll help us plan the attack on the big villa that the scientist seems to be hiding in. Let's saddle up and go there.
Attention! We are authorized to raise our offer if the asset is undamaged!
Don't forget the cooler!
Chopper is on the way! ETA 2 minutes.
Come on, you can afford it I am sure.
You heard him. The trucks are around here somewhere.
Ah bollocks. Server's encrypted up the arse. The code keys should in the Security Office. Get over there, grab 'em and get them back here.
Almost there!
See if you can find fuel tank and hose somewhere near.
You made us come for nothing?
You guys are fucking with the wrong people!
OK folks, my inside man stashed the thermal lance you're gonna need for the vault around the back. Recon the spot to find it.
That's my guys! Good stuff!
Ernesto is always paranoid, so once you start making that call you better finish it. Treat it like a pager
That boat needs people inside it. You people. Do what the boat needs, yeah?
OK now, I got you a pick-up driver, patching him through.
Here's the second control room. Between the two, we can open the gate.
Get him in the back!
Hack me into the lobby computer and I'll unlock the door.
Ok. I can override the main panel now.
It's uploading... It's almost there.
Okay, I'm here. Just watch my back while I work!
I'm reconnected. Thanks.
There are Heavy FBI units all over the place, be careful.
What are you waiting for?
That scanner will need an authority, like a FBI boss. Watch for him and for God's sake don't kill him.
Sorry about this friends, but I've got to pull you out via the sewers. Get to them outside... and you'll need some thermite to burn through the grating.
Get that C4 placed guys.
Fix that pool I want to take a swim.
Over here!
Sure, I got it but what good's it gonna do now?
This isn't right. Not even the Feds do this kind of crap.
I am so glad to hear that!
Okay, listen up - there's a bunker in the backyard, yeah? Don't ask me why. Get in there, and you'll find a fancy lookin' seat.
They're here!
The screws, friends. The screws.
The lance is on the ground. Fetch it, and set it up. Let's see who's in that panic room.
It's been what, two years? And you're making me do this shit?
You need to find the laptop, friends.
The terminals, guys. Get the power back up and restart the override.
In the meantime, see about finding those three laptops with the code snippets.
Superb! Everything is proceeding perfectly. Now, please, everybody into the airlock.
Hit him for his gold but do it as quietly as you can - no one must know our affiliation. If you frame him and his party I will increase the payment substantially.
What are you waiting for? Grab all the pardons!
The laptop should be near the house, maybe in one of the smaller buildings?
I've stowed some plastic explosive in the DeLorean. You can use it to make that gas station go up like the Tsar Bomba!
Sounds like he's not too far away, yeah? Go get him!
Now we wait. Remember we get a bag of cash for every painting we throw into the chopper. All we need to do is be patient and lucky.
The drill is in the copy machine here, but hopefully we won't need it. Just remember, though...if we should.
Gentlemen - I need you to assist me in transferring someone's wealth to benefit my party's best... Interest.
Make sure, to floss.
... then you get what you came here for.
All right, the numbers for the code are:
That's it. Now wait for the pilot to signal in.
Nothing happened? Must be the wrong one. Keep looking.
Great. Now get to the zip-line and you're job is done.
Look outside the Tiffany Room. I can see a laptop display in the security feed.
Look at the crowd. Insane. Right, focus on the job, and let's give them a show.
Remember where that ladder is, gang. You can access the roof there.
Every last one of you leaves here in a bag! And it's not zip lock bitch!
We're short on product so for now I think we're best keeping Hector in the dark. Maybe we can solve the issue another way.
Right, you need to use some of the thermite I sent on those vault hinges, yeah?
Tap into the security boxes.
No, something is wrong... now you gotta wait until the reaction dies down and start again, yeah?
Blerrie, they know something is up and are scanning the building for trespassers!
You got in and out without making a sound. Good job, Dallas. I mean it.
Right! And...left!
Two minutes and I am out of here!!
You are lucky I'm a kind man...
I like the way you're thinking.
Get that door open.
Try not to be late guys, don't want to look unprofessional.
Think that shield will save your ass?
That should get things cooking.
Couldn't hurt to pick up some extra things we can sell.
I'll deliver this and then come back for more!
This is where you die!
The lab we are after should open by hacking their server. Find the server room.
All right, gang, up ahead is Chavez' crib.
Garrett's office, yeah?
That goat belongs to Uncle Sam now, asshole!
Disabling one more box should be enough.
Seven bags. You guys are fucking Olympic champions.
These fuckers went to driving school - I'll tell you that much!
Gang, cops have set up a three block perimeter. The hard way through is the only way, so you're boots on the ground. Stay with the truck, and the truck will stay with you.
13 to go!
It's a blank. Keep searching.
... going as fast as I can!
Find Chloe's desk and computer.
The Harvest & Trustee Bank just got a fresh shipment of cash for transport runs out of town to casinos. I propose we have a little monetary "intervention" of our own.
I hope this hunk o' metal has air bags!
I'm like God damn Mother Teresa here.
Hit the left and the middle.
Right. Now find the comms relay and get access. We can make it look like the call is coming from the house.
If the cameras are giving you a hard time, you should be able to get rid of the surveillance operator. He's in the security office on the upper floor...
No good dropping vials, guys.
Now load up on C4. You'll need it.
This whole enterprise will be for nothing if you dont get that time lock tick-tocking again.
Hurry, get out of the PEOC!
Who am I? I'm the opposite of every politician you've ever known.
What are you looking at?
The second keycard. Great work.
Okay, keep an eye on what's happening. We want to actually see the server.
It's done! Open the lab door!
That's the code! Great. Now get it working on that time lock.
And...open sesame!
You need to go to the West Wing, that's where the Oval Office is. Find the access point.
If you call in the chopper, things are gonna go loud. Don't do it until you're ready.
The drill still isn't moving!
Five
... Flying as fast as I can.
I don't know about you guys, but I'm dying of thirst. Would any of you be a sweetheart and grab me a coke from the vending machine?
Fuck!
Ready guys?
I don't say superb often, but I'm saying it now. Good work.
Mrs Shevchenko would roll in her grave to see her little boy now.
Looks like some codes, that'll come in handy.
Hell no, don't try no games, sucker!
Four left now!
The drill is through. Open the safe!
That's every single one of 'em! Great!
One of the staff terminals is holding a code. Find it, and start hacking.
Metal detector's down. Nice.
... we do not have a deal!
The other party is now a minute away.
Alright, locate the server room and get inside. There's no point in disabling the alarms now.
I'll be there in 30 seconds.
You're still good. No one has heard you yet!
Well my friends, it's time for me to leave you to it. Much to do, and all that. My best regards to Kozak and Simmons!
Epic days.
Crew, remember - Locke needs you to light that flare.
Rescue from above is coming soon, my friends!
Everything OK so far?
Now get to that vault.
They're on the roof!
Go go go!
I thought we lost that damn helicopter in the tunnel!
Alright guys, we've got a three minute window here. Get moving!
Fuck these guys...
Outstanding! That coke will be a nice bonus. Bag it, gang!
Bag up the loot - gold is heavy remember - and wait for me to send the escape car. Clear? Oh - my guy left the thermal drill to get into the vault out back. Let's roll.
Are they cops? Are they fucking COPS!?
Now plant that C4 on the gas pumps. We'll light a fire they'll see in Moscow...
You have impressed me, Dallas. Two years hasn't slowed you down a bit. Now, get out there!
Hook the winches up to the floor!
Come on, just do your thing and do it right.
Two minutes.
Run! Run!
Six left!
Behind you!
There must be something we can use to get past the vault security system.
Get in there and get the deal started.
What the hell are you doing?
Hurry friends, get that storage unit open!
Pretty fucking fitting for a Murkywater hideout.
Blerrie, they're closing the air space around the White House. You gotta go now! Hurry!
That's it, so much for the quiet route!
Damn it. Local channels just lit up! Expect company.
They'll keep the keycard in a safe, no doubt.

Ah, this almost feels like a real war! Did I ever tell you about the time I did a covert mission in the Middle East? Anyway, before we land I gotta tell you some things. You will need to find a security keycard to get into the PEOC. No way we can drill or blow our way into that place. I reckon the best place to start looking will be near the Oval Office!
This is the McKendrick Museum, how can I help you?
Ditch the charges at the door, guys.
Shit! The police are here!
19 bags!
Good, the scan is under way again.
My associate is ready for you. Just go to the apartment to make the deal.
Grab the thermite. No time to drill so we're burning through the wagon itself.
*grunts, wheezes*
OK, just one more to go.
Shiiit!
Personally, I would love to see a wall built across the Canadian border, but the bank can't finance that.
Hurry!
Alright team, this jewelry store has a number of display cases flaunting some medium range gems and gold.
Yeah, I brought it, so what now?
Here you can hang all your modified weapons. It will be quite a rack.
Get bagging the money, gang!
Come on, Bile, what the hell? Sorry about that, guys, you'll still have to pick up the C4 and place them all around the floors above the panic room.
That's it. That's it! You're almost here, come on!
Now find the storage room. That's where the keys'll be.
We're going in for a golden bank robbery. It'd be smart to look around before you make your move, lots of security, then get in and drill the vault. Lift the gold into bags - remember it's heavy.
Good work. We'll need these three digits for the vault once we're through the Security Center.
Son of a fucking bitch!
Cops are on their way. Looks like they had a lot of guys in the neighborhood.
Great! Now get to the counting room, right above the vault, and get that thermite to work!
You executed on your plan with ruthless efficiency. I am impressed. You will hear from me when I require your services again.
I gotta bust outta here in one minute!
Alright, we're working again. Just hold on.
So guys, where's that laptop?
We'll move at your pace. Just keep the road clear of cops.
Great, that one's hacked. Get that crate closed, then find another.
Good. Let the bastards squirm in fear while we take care of the bank.
OK. Second act in our little drama - get the vault open.
Jesus... how the fuck did I get involved in this bullshit...
I'll be there in 3 minutes.
The Mendoza money in the US is gone. You have done well. We will not stop here of course. I will call upon you again.
We want to get away cleanly so these must be destroyed. I can leave that to you, yes?
I should just have ran when I had the chance...
This won't end well for you, sucker!
You probably want to hunker down by the warehouse.
We can get better acquainted later, but I feel now would be the opportune time to, how you say, GTFO, yes?
We're about a minute away.
Why, you snivelling shopa! For this, I will scoop out your eyes and feed your bones to my dogs.
I see one of 'em!

Over there!

Boom, bang and tumble! Great!

My legal business identifies me as a practicing dentist. My real vocation is the organization of heists, or the application of criminal theory if you will. I am a facilitator. An agent. Some choose to hide in the shadows, some behind monitors and servers.

Look for the armory. Intel says they're holding C4. For "extraordinary cases". Well, this is one of those extraordinary cases.
I hope you're ready!
Keep the cops dropping, and the elves hopping, gang!
Get that loot moving!
No one attacks the Sosas and lives!

Got a line on a recent drop of hard currency. It's tucked away in the vault of a branch of Roberts bank. It's a quiet area. Nothing happens here, so they won't be expecting a hit. Let's punish that complacency.
The boat driver needs to know when he should come in. Look around in the warehouse for the floodlight switch.
There's a laptop with info on where the cash is stashed. Charon provided the password. See if you can find it!
You can dump bodies into the sea through the windows.

Ah! Yes, I believe that ladder will be useful!

You could get a zipline up to move the bags.

The Golden Grin Casino was founded on post-war wealth. The time has come to redistribute that wealth. Thorough planning is essential. Observe. Assess. Execute. I'd wish you luck, but luck has nothing to do with it.
More troops will be there soon.
Yeah, die you fucking cuiter.
A rare job. Hit the Teuer dealership. Boost the new models.

SWATS on the roof! Looks like they won't give up that easily!

God damn!
Hello? Open the door at once!

There should be more weapon caches somewhere, see if you can find them.
Pick up that keycard, and get to his room.
Booth team. You better be on goddamn point. I'll give the word, you'll hit the button. Comprende amigo?
Our guy is waiting to shut down the gig. Just answer that intercom when you're ready. Make sure all the loot you wanna take is secured.
Hey! Come back!
Ahhh, I can smell the wealth from here! Load the bags!
It's way out there, behind the parking lot. The door to the unit is pretty thick and I don't have the key. We'll need to cut it open. Should be a saw around here.
Two minutes, guys.
You can use that keycard in the control room. Just swipe it, open the dock.
This should look like a regular robbery... As regular as this can look. Keep them away from the hacking device.
They have no clue you are there. Now get out of there.
Who is this? Who the fuck are you!?
You better make it happen, Bain. I'm not losing one of my guys over this rookie-ass mission.
Get him down! Tie him up!
So did you...? Better not tell me. Less I know, y'know? Come on.
A boat's coming in to get Hector's bags. We need to get 'em secured first.
Alright, I'm going!
Blerrie, this guy is persistent. Alright, time to bring in the big guns. Kerels can't say no to food. If you can find some around there, stick it in front of his office, yeah?

I lost connection, I need you to get the power back.
You'll need to get it some juice from a wall socket.

OK... You're gonna need a thermal drill for this gig... My guy stashed it around the back of the bank. Get it and get to work.

What's taking so long!?

Keep cool.

Take that ladder, my friends. Take it, and profit!

Check the owners office for his briefcase. Pit boss will be around the main hall. The locker room is where the security chief's briefcase likely is.
It landed on sniper again. Get ready guys
