And another grate. Same as before. Just use the thermal paste.
Get that valve open!
The whiteboard guys, find it, yeah?
Intel tells us the EMP bomb will be two parts, and that's what we're here for. But with that said; if you see an opportunity to grab other valuable loot you should do it.
Put holes in 'em!
Only one left now!
That's it, yeah? Can't see what's so special, but it's why we're here. Same writing that Lindenhurst found.
Place that keycard
It's getting there!
I hear ya, brother. Let me know when it's ready.
Guys, I'm on my way back in!
Hey, is it safe out there yet? It's smells like old ass in here.
Roberts Bank is happy to help you, sir.
Well, I would describe my management style as bringing a new synergy to the boardroom dynamic of parallel....styling.
No, no, no!
Sit tight, it's gonna get rough!
This is Bronson, what do you need?
The Sosa's Miami operation is fucked. I don't think they will be giving me more problems. Thanks to you.
The alarm shut down the time lock. Stay cool. There's a maintenance office on the roof. Get there. We should be able to rewire it.
You can just play this safe man and call it a day...
There should be clues around to help you figure out the truck. Get Sherlocking. Look for open containers, they might indicate what the trucks are carrying.
Someone just bought the toy and walked off with Vlad's stuff. You need to get it back!
WHAT! Guys get your heads down.
There's one of 'em!
Good afternoon. Benevolent Bank. Martin speaking.
The door's not going to open until you get that drill going!
That terminal isn't linking. Murky always had crap IT people, except for me of course. Find another one.
You don't say. According to our schedule... Ah, God damn it. Looks like the calendar is messed up. Someone screwed the pooch!
Now light up those tires. Get the gas on them. That'll deal with the chopper.
Keep an eye on that crane, friends. Kerels will have a new route to you.
There oughta be a cargo manifest on one of those computers in here...
Throw those cases into the helicopter before getting in.
We really doin' this? We're really doin' this!
Expect me back in a little while.
Good. Secondly, there is a security room close by. Cut through to it, and approve the airlock sequence.
He was officer material. Was!
What sort of world do we live in where a rat bastard like that makes demands on honest, upstanding badasses like you. But better do as he asks.
Waste 'em!
We're almost done, but may I remind you again about bringing the bags to the helicopter?
It's open! Get the stuff out of the deposit boxes!
Now this qualifies as a score. Clean it out, gang.
They got to the control box and stopped the shutdown. You need to get it going again, friends.
The boat can't wait forever, gang.
What the hell just happened?! Just grab the loot and look alive! The cops are moving in.
Look, my friends, if this is going to work, sometimes you have to do what I say. And I'm saying find those fucking bundles!!
As with all things, this too must end. I will see you again, my friends. Very soon.
What the hell just happened?! Just grab the loot and look alive! The cops are moving in.
His penthouse is on the top floor. My guess is he's headed there.
Great! Add a few more, we want a proper blaze.
Hey! My stuff!
I'm just guessing at this point... These internet descriptions are iffy.
Grab as much C4 as you can, gang.
Ah, it's empty! Find another one.
... I'll be back in a moment!
Good. We're done with the fourth floor.
Alright creeps, you had your chance. We're coming for you.
First briefcase is held by the casino manager. Second by the Pit Boss. Lastly, look for the head of security.
Heading for the docks!
Damn, this gold was likely boosted from Saddam's palace!
I think we will come out of this alive after all! Of course, I never doubted it!
Keep the people in check...
Gotta hurry, guys. The Continental just called, you're going to New York on a rescue mission.
And... Alex made the requested drop. Somewhere.
Everyone! In the car! Now!
Ok guys. I'm opening container 57 remotely. Get ready to run.
Find the right wine now!
Can't unlock the doors until you patch in properly.
Who the fuck said you could come here!?
There it is. But step carefully! Those floor tiles are pressure sensitive. Don't step on them! You'll have to make a safe path across! Use the circuit box over there.
Shiiit!
I'm sorry, but I don't think there is much demand for confederate flag bedsheets.
They set up a roadblock. And heavy reinforcements are on the way too.
Watch out friends!
I've made arrangements to drop off some equipment for you, friends.
You are one stupid asshole!
C'mon guys, lets change the change!
You need to pick up the pace. Get that bag to Mr. Blonde.
Tap into the security boxes.
Oh, look. I did it. Do I get a treat now?
Well, you can escape, sure, that's fine. Or.......here's an idea. You can stay, bully more elves and make more beautiful snow!
Hello? Who is this please? Yes, well no thank you.
Come on, gang! Get the truck moving again!
I see one!
Watch your heads, guys. Ass bombs aren't the only thing dropping into here.
These mercenaries must have some C4 or something around here that we could use.
So, here's the thing. My car died, but I managed to haul away some diamonds. Stashed 'em in a nearby storage unit.
Mr Sturr we will get you out.
Do it like you did it at the warehouse. Yeah, I saw that. For sure.
The senior family of the Mendoza has sworn death upon all of you... A good sign you have now made a important impact on our cartel's future in the USA. Muchas gracias por todo, muchachos...
Half the fucking police force is on our ass!
Great. Now, get to lock picking that door.
Damn it! That's the alarm!
Now Hector tells me we need to hit the Mendozas themselves for information. Where they keep their money, in fact.
Hurry now, take all the pardons so we can leave!
You need to add the caustic soda to keep the process going!
Keep those routers safe.

The Golden Grin Casino is the largest casino in Vegas. Their hard currency securities rival that of small nations - and they keep it all on-site. Gangster founders had a healthy suspicion of banks. This will require a plan. Study your options, use your intel and carry out your plan with stringency.
Aw man, it's almost all gone. All gone! Please, try to get a least a little!
That must be one of the test subjects that Jimmy talked about. Get the body to the scanner so we can get the information we need.
Hector wants at least four bags.
They've got mines attached to the cameras... Don't get spotted for god's sake.
Time to split! To the right and down the stairs. Go!
Get out there and use the crane, friends.
Gotcha, moving!
Wonderful! I believe that that is enough to make this a worthwhile venture. Please, ensure all of the bags are placed on the cables and sent up to me.
You gotta hang on a bit, chopper is coming.
I see one!
You cut off his hand? That's some dark stuff, but a job is a job. Place it on the scanner and get the door opened.
Great, you actually found a blowtorch. Head back to the train and get through that door.
I need 17 more!
Good,OK, the reaction seems fine, keep going.
Damn, the door must be locked from the outside. Maybe there's another way out.
Don't break his jaw!
Time to leave, friends! Get into the chopper.
The target is spotted. Just need to get you into position and...
Sniper... building!
... hang in there!
Ah! There it is, but hold up a second. Those tiles are pressure sensitive - stay off of 'em. You can use that circuit box to make a safe path across.
My chosen associate will go to great lengths to ensure it is prepared for you.
There we go. Is he moving?
Kill all those pieces of shit!
Hey, over here!
You got the whole database. Great work. Absolute badasses!
Remember guys, we need four bags to escape.
...Listen up.
Not a single bag?! This is a nightmare!
Time to get you out of there. Grab whatever loot you can on the way out.
I have to leave!
I can only take four at a time...
Ah, look. See what that button does, yeah? Maybe the whole place will self destruct? Probably not.
I'm in the elevator and will be headed straight for the gates. Meet you there.
Real professional gentlemen! They don't even know what hit them!
There you go. Nicely done.
I got another idea: Finders keepers, assholes!
Time is ticking, gang. You have to move the loot to the container to secure it.
This area is wide open. Vulnerable to snipers. Sparse cover, but good for spotting.
Don't fuck up. Hit it!
Oh. Yeah. The Manager was showing the system to his new assistant. An "early bit of 'key and lock'", he calls it.
Greed is your guide. If you want it, go get it.

We got a bank here. Not a big branch but I've learned the vault is temporarily holding stacks of cash in transit. Foreign exchange notes. Anyway, you know how to do it - your way. Sneak in silent, or unleash hell. Either way, I got a little idea for how to lift the money out of there. You'll see what I mean. I think you'll like it.
Was that a coke-filled present falling from a tree? Christmas really is the time of miracles.
Now let it do it's thing, and remember to keep the cops off it.
The alarm timer will start as soon as you open a door or window. That'll give you a few seconds to disable the alarm.
That's it! That's what we're looking for. I'm sending the drill now.
That was an epic ass-kicking you just handed out, and you got the whole database. Let's hope I can find what we need to make the blood you spilt worth it.
Your call.
Damn it! Those oil barrels are in the way. See if you can release the straps, and do it quickly.
Get the C4 in there, and get ready!
Coppers incoming everyone, they found you faster that I thought. Take care of them!
You don't think our time's important?
Allow me to quote Colin Powell: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
If you shoot me, who's gonna feed my fish?
You know your job - keep them back!
Okay, answer the pager then hide the body in that janitor closet you passed by.
What a messy situation. Let's get out of here.
Remember gang, we need Garrett to keep breathing... for now.
I gotta rush out of here!
Put the wares in the car...
This heist will go down in legend. I'm already writing the wiki entry. It starts with 'Holy crap!'
Garrett is married, so maybe his wife's birthday or anniversary?
Ah, I see. Sure, that happens. OK, just try to call us beforehand next time.

That is a good amount of loot, friends. Enough to make this worthwhile. Still, if you feel like you still got a little lead in your pencil and wanted to fuck Murkywater a little longer... you can get more.
And... In! Great. Now keep the connection secure. Going as fast as can.
Keycards can open many doors.
Reboot the charge cycle.
Don't let any civilians get near the alarms!
You gotta use the thermite on the barrier.
That nice marble floor has got to have a big hole blown into it. Our prize is right under there, friends.
It's rock-the-clock!
Out of town job. We're headed after a counterfeiting operation in the Pensacola suburbs.
Good, now hang back while the tanks empty.
Another two minutes and I'm out!
Really, Bile? I might have expected that from Alex, but not you... Anyhow, gang, go pick up the C4 and plant it around the floors right above the panic room.
It's the police! They're tailing us!
Guys, the briefcases. Check the owners office. Then find the pit boss. And, lastly, check near the guards' locker room.

Okay, here's the plan. Locke is going to have you smuggled onto the plane. Wait until you get his signal and burst out. Resistance should be light - just the crew. The money is packed into large pallets. Get them out of the cargo doors, and we'll collect them when they hit the ground. Simple.
Quick! Grab the loot.
I can't take the snipers out! Help me, yes?
Keep the elevator under watch, guys.
It's a beautiful day for a picnic at the park. And an armed robbery.
Ah, that's it friends. A nice little Payday, though I think we could have gotten more!
It's the clowns! It's the fucking clowns from the news!
Come on, we're nearly done!
Good work. That ammo will fetch a nice price.
Any second now!
The pilot is on his way. He's going to pick up the cage from the roof. Get it ready.
They're trying to fuck with us! Take 'em down!
Stick a blocker on the keypad to stop the code cycle.
Check the back!
Taylor's computer should be nearby.
That's the Murky warehouse. All right, get at 'em!
Don't move. Or I'll slow-fucking-roast you.
California is sinking into the Pacific. And those safes don't float.
Alesso is playing at the Gensec arena. We're going to teach them that nothing can stop the Payday Gang.
Get out of there! Run!
Garrett's office is around there somewhere.
Turn on the power again!
Alright, four!
You need to eliminate those thugs.
Hey, over here!
Now wait for the cell to open.
Alesso is in town tonight. Going to use his concert as cover to hit Gensec at their arena.
There must be a generator juicing that door. Find it.
Something interrupted the charge cycle. You have to restart it.
Like... a glove.
Great! Extra loot... Love it!
I hear ya. Alright, no problem. Just try and keep us in the loop next time.
We're not going in by the main entrance. You see that fence? That's our way in.
That's it! I'm off now!
This should deal with their firewalls.
Ammunition - can you ever have too much of it?
Well, I think a 100ft statue to Lincoln is fine, but having him crapping on the southern states....I don't think so.
General admin office. A terminal here might hold the Moretta's comm frequency. Good chance of a keycard or radio $NL;too.
Looks like every helicopter in the Washington PD is on our ass!
Mount the saws on those transports!
Police chopper incoming!
Blueprints - perfect. Well done.
There's one of 'em!
Come on. Just stick the thermal paste on the grate and burn through. It's not hard.
There it is, and it seems no one is watching it. Stupid motherfuckers.
Get some more loot if you can!
Use the zipline to secure the loot.
That's all of them. Get in the car and scoot!
Too late!
And you couldn't be bothered to bring them in while my guys were protecting your neck? Alright gang, go get those nitro tanks from Mr Blonde.
30 seconds to pickup, guys!

I'll start by blowin' off the head of this piece of shit mechanic, and after that we're gonna paint this room with your clown-blood as well. And the best part is that there's jack shit you can do about it.
Now what? A bluescreen? Dwankie computers.
I bet you thought we didn't expect you guys!
Over-delivering! The boss likes that kinda shit!
Hey! These terminals likely have the comm frequency for the Moretta. We're gonna need it before long.
It's probably right under your noses, friends.
Wham - this job just got real.
I'm there in 2.
More Murky guards are on the way. Don't think we've been discovered, but be extra careful.
Let's just fix this bank and burn the Mendoza money ASAP. We can find you new identities after.
The storage room guys. Get in there and get the car keys.
Hang on to your asses!
Have a look around for a ladder, if you want to get up on that roof. And you want to get up on that roof, I assure you.
Fantastic, the alarm just triggered a security barrier. We gotta get that thing open now too.
They just finished flushing ALL the coke. God damn it, gang! We missed out big time!
Bring the laptop to the AA gun. See if you can hook it up.
This is bullshit, man.
We're gonna break up a dirty deal between a Taxman and some big corporation and make a lot of cash doing it.
You're so dead!
Plane is on the ground. Now get the loot into it.
You're in. Next step is to get inside the mansion. But watch out - all the doors and windows are tied to an alarm.
I'm going to need some time to do this, yeah?
You better enjoy your life while you got any left!
What are you waiting for? Let's leave.
There's probably a laptop at the contruction site.
SWAT's incoming from the right staircase.
Oh no, that's the alarm! Lets go to plan B.
Come on, you wankers. Get that power up again.
OK, time to burn some money.
I got access to the vault. Opening shortly...
That's the Mendozas plane, it just left. Guns should be in the hangar now.
Guys, we needed the boss alive to open the panic room quietly! Alright. We're gonna have to do this the loud way now.
Guys, get that drill on the gate. Hurry!
The park should offer a good defensive position.
That's gas! Get out of there!
I'm there in three minutes!
What are you waiting for?
Incoming call to the PEOC. Put me through and hope we haven't been discovered.
You gotta restart the saw, friends.
A good start.
You've got to hack the console! We need to get inside the display cabinet!
Where's the stuff, man!
It's filling up fast, crew. Just keep it going. When it's full, plant the charge and enjoy the show.
Grab Dentists' loot. That's what we came for.
Okay, I got this one disabled, but there's still one more to go!
C'mon friends, get to the cell blocks.
Ok, guys. Chopper is back so get to loading again!
There's one of 'em!
Look around for hose line and tank of diesel.
Get out of there. You're blocking the sun
Man, they can go fuck themselves...
Wipe 'em out!
Pumping is enough.
Hey guys - did you see the splash it made?
Alright, finally!
They should teach this little bit of political engineering for years to come. Outstanding, gang. Outstanding!
Cover me! They're tearing me to pieces!
Every second counts, gang! Get to that coke while there's still some left!
Keep the water flowing, gang. Just a little more. Then just rig it, and let hydrodynamics do its job.
I've had it with these guys.
Yeah, yeah, just prepare a good heist for us that will make us rich.
The ghosts of a thousand years of heisters are watching you, and wishing they were here. Keep it flowing.
Great! Cutter's done! Here comes the sweet loot!
When a door or window opens, the alarm timer will start. You'll have a limited time to disable it before it goes off.
Three more.
...have a look in the dumpers at the construction site outside, yeah?
You're fucking dead!
Come on now...
All right, give me some time to hack the system.
You want a loan to.....invade Jamaica...and rule it as Great Emperor. *long sigh* I don't think so.
That's it! Now plant the C4 in the underground garage. Our Inside Man has marked the ceiling beneath the vault. That's where the C4 goes.
Ach, it's one of those. Liquid nitrogen would take care of it, but unless you brought some without telling me we'll have to make other arrangements.
Ok, you'll have to open that safe now!
Alarm on that door guys. We need to take care of that first.
What's taking so long?
Dozer? Hmmm....
I'm coming in - don't know what dock though!
I can't get in. You gotta get me through the firewall using another computer.
Good. That ate right through. Now get inside!
They got a new IT guy on the books. If you can find his name and hack his pc, I should be able to open that door for you.
The countdown started. Disable the alarm before the timer runs out!
Every second counts friends.
Fuck me, there's a reference to a "classified informant" here. I fucking knew it. I'll keep digging.
Can't stand around all day. Get to it.
Admire the decor later. Get inside the Oval Office and find that keycard.
Do you see the shaft? Yes, just send the bags of loot up here.
Someone called the police!
The wheel stopped on the dozer again. Watch out guys!
This has to be the most persistent fucking cops I've ever seen!
You guys got a keycard, right?
Put the stuff in the car...
There is no time to waste, get the code and open the vault.
You guys did a great job up there. You wanna join the road crew?
We need more.
I'm coming in four!
We are going to need to find a way inside the lumber mill. Maybe we can blow a hole through the wall using the AA gun we hacked?
Heads up, the cops are deploying on a nearby rooftop!
Eight
Those poes fucked the detonator, mans. Fix it!
Fight your way back to the van, clowns.
Keycards are a simple yet brilliant solution when you encounter locked doors.
Go through with the trade, as we agreed on!
... put all the wares in the car!
That's the alarm, time to do some heavy lifting.
The prisoner is your prize my friends. Keep him locked up and safe. He probably has information that someone doesn't want you to have, see if you can extract some of it...
Only 30 seconds and I'm on you!
Found it but I need a keycard.
Yeah, tell him his ass is on the line if he isn't available for the regular time-lock check in.
Almost there, guys. Keep going.
First thing to do is get inside. Front door is the most obvious way, but maybe you can figure out something less conspicuous.
Quickly now, to the skylight.
Halfway there.
Aw, fuck me. The air in this place...
Stupid bastard hid the coke in a toy box!
Credit applications. Accepted! No codes though. Next one.
What're you still doing there? Get on the helicopter.
Keep them the hell away from the circuit breaker, you hear me?
That's the door, but don't open it yet. We need to disable the alarm, hold on a second...
SHIELD! Get around him and take him out!
Few plans survive first contact with the enemy. You adapted well, and showcased an impressive capacity for violence. Enjoy your payday. I will contact you again once things cool down.
Twitch is coming to the side alley.
The deal's off!
Scanning target's location... got it, there he is!
What? You don't want to get away scot-free? Well, I do, so please hurry up and take all of those pardons!
You like bread. We got bread. Uh... yeah. Assloads of bread... Sir.
How much did you win? Can we all retire?
OK, this is a fight - they will destroy the intel!
There you go! Almost home free.
The bastards brought in a sniper! He's in the building across the street. Find some cover then take him out!
One moment please.
No one is going to miss this message. The FBI's going to search high and low for you but don't worry... I'll take care of it. Great work.
Hey, I'm at the gates. Get over here.
Guy, ya gotta do better. Timing means shit if you're firing off the wrong ammo, capische!
Friends, you need to restart the saw.
We have driven nails into Mendoza's organization. Crucified them the way they would have done to us. No salaries no organization. The FBI grip is faltering and the Mendozs are losing ground.
Oh, my! Seems like the good senator did the deal and partied at the same time - looks like a arms-gold-coke deal.
Start cracking those boxes. We need one bag, but let's try and take them for everything!
You can't have Commissar!
You know the drill. Make this work.
Disable those AA guns, friends!
GUYS, wait the vault it's electrified!
C'mon, you gotta get in there. Use that torch.
The ship by the docks belongs to the Butcher! Locke sold her out too. Give them a hand and maybe they'll give you a ride.
Four
Drag the garden hose all the way down to the shelter
Get two more!
Thy Lord Locke giveth one commandment... find the right combination, yeah?
Oh you just made a bad fucking mistake...
Too much action here. I'll have the guys build the cage at the bridge.
That's all four pieces of the Shogun's armor. This is an outstanding night's work.
I got it. I didn't fuck up! I didn't fuck up.
It's the Hondurans! They fucking followed us! Shit!
Friends, how about helping me with a weapons deal, yeah?
My sensors are picking up another panel on the top floor - get to it if you've had enough and want to leave.
It's in position. Let it go!
You got the briefcase? Excellent! Time to go then!
Shit!
Doors are open for you, we are leaving!
Run! Run!
Hurry the fuck up!
I'll meet you at the docks.
You got to unscrew all the screws, friends.
Turn on the water again!
You may have gotten the better of us this time creeps, but we will apprehend you eventually!
Hello, First World Bank. Of course! The current stock value is why don't you call back in an hour?
You did it. Got a couple of Russian oil playboys that'll pay over the odds for these wheels. Nicely done!
They're on our tail - and they're closing in!
More enemies! I'd appreciate some help...
Good afternoon. Roberts Bank. This is Randolph speaking.
Make sure we get the paintings.
The bridge looks good. Dropping the cage there.
We still need more explosives on the fourth and fifth floor. Let's go.
That thermite you picked up before should work.
Getting closer!
Wait, you didn't get ALL of the goats. Is my asshole your plaything? I want ALL the goats.
Sweet! That's the one. Fusion power in full swing. Thanks guys. Now get out of there.
OK, we're into the railcar. Use the camera to see what's inside.
OK, to the roof now!
Put holes in 'em!
Now use the security cameras and try to locate Bain's cell.
Circuit box is likely outside. Hacking it will stop the fan.
You managed to unlock the outer panic room door, so the lance shouldn't take as long!
What do you think guys? It looks pretty good in there. Grab what you can handle!
I got to go in ten!
Murkys are still patrolling, so keep a lookout.
Looks like those patrolmen have been missed. We got responders coming in force. Get ready!
What kind of animal would do a thing like this? And now we need to chop off his hand...
A great haul, gang. Another top job.
Get inside, lads! Got work to do.
Gang, get to the computer. Get those coordinates to the ship.
Whew, I'm done. I got what I needed. Take me back to the truck.
Dammit they're pulling your truck over! FBI... Don't let em take what's Hector's!
That's the address! We've got what we need. Get back to the van and we can get out of here.
Friends! Beautiful friends! How is the flight? We are getting close to the drop location. So, please, open the hatch and...
No, loitering friends. Take them all!
Use their own toys against them - I love it. Now get inside the lumber mill.
Find Valentine's desk and computer.
If you throw the loot bags into the sea, you can pick them up when it's time to leave.
Ha! Now you're just showing off!
Into the shelter! Move it!
Alright, I'm at the spot!
Look for numbers in connection with Crimenet.
As you wish.
Got it. Room...
Wait for Bile to come back and pick you up along with the loot.
Gonna send you to the lake!
Ok, here comes the ninth wave!
Did that hurt? I will ask for money back if not.
The voting will begin tomorrow. We need to act now to make a difference. New voting machines have arrived in the harbor.
Time to go guys!
Our product needs to reach the harbor. Guards are needed. This is where you come in...
That was the wrong sequence, now the system is locked unless you find the master code!
Swats are spreading all over the roof. Look up guys.
Saw those transports open!
Sure. Please hold.
Boring conversation anyway. Gang, we're going to have company!
Copy that. Returning for another drop. I need half a minute!
It's a big bank, but still a bank. You know the drill. Check the place out, and decide whether to keep things quiet or bring the noise.
Using this will distract any nearby guards.
There's no such thing as a master code.
Bad fucking news, guys!
Hey don't worry about that one. I got it
Great, Set off the flare so the chopper can land!
Plug in some batteries, yeah?
Hey, Twitch. What do you need?
The saw stopped, restart it, yeah?
Oh, ese, you're over-delivering! Very nice!
Go down to the basement door in the back alley!
Wonder what's in the case. Could be The Butcher's explosives. Have a look.
He's heavier than I thought! Now, let's go!
Why? Why are you doing this? I'll kill you a hundred different ways!
Get ready for the vault. I'll have the code for you soon.
For a while, making the money wasn't the problem - spending it was!
The alarm disabled the time lock. It's a setback but not a fail. There's a maintenance room on the roof. Get there. We should be able to reboot it.
Good job friends, that was some quick and easy money for us. Going to buy a lot of nice things we can use to pull off more jobs in the future, yeah?
You need to reconnect the juice!
Put the stuff in the car...
Fewer security guards should increase your chances.
If you want to get out you gotta get to that pillar!
Listen here:
Well, you partially opened the panic room anyway. That means the thermal lance will be quicker!
Alright, two more.
Good thinking. We're using that to get the money out of here.
Ach, kerels have stopped the drill! Get it up again.
There's a time lock on the door because of the alarm. You have to wait a bit.
A jewelry store downtown has just stocked up with jewelery. That jewelery could be ours. You up for it?
Cops on the way! Let's go!
OK yeah, we definitely have a problem.
Right button! The right!
Infirmary accessed.
Okay, guys. Bile dropped the EMP just outside the lumber mill.Go get it!
Tear gas incoming! Stay clear and wait for it to die down.
Alarm's tripped, go get your hands dirty.
You have to reboot the device...
Hello, friends. You're almost at the drop point I have selected, so, if you would emerge and, as you say, get the party started.
An active ECM jammer will probably make it hard to open the server room security door. Keep that in mind.
You need to find Taylor's computer.
...Now you get to chew on our new LMG Dozers...
How did you get that so quick? Maybe I can just go have a coffee and let you sort things alone, yeah?
That's gonna be useful, for sure. Now get back and burn it open.
Check for Alex ammo drop... Panic room all over again...
That was one messed up job.
Keycard to somewhere in on the next location. Sweet.
... we'll settle for this right here.
... I'll be back in a minute!
Step it up, you've got two minutes to get out of there!
Who the fuck said you could come here!
Make sure noone else is there.
Plan B guys! Just get that server.
Keep preparing the right chemicals.
Guys, I'm waiting for bags!
Sniper, rooftop!
The pick-up guy is close by, look for the yellow crane.
The cops are inside the house. Silent kills, people!
OK, time for the hit. You might see some Garnet things in there too - I like seeing they're still in business after all we've done to them. I need at least two bags to make this worth our while.
You poes need to find a fucking ladder. Fuck me. Come on!
We're not going in by the main entrance. You see that fence? That's our way in. Put on your mask and cut it open.
Ah, that's what we came for. Nice and shiny. Take it and and keep it safe!
Nice. Now get it back to the loot drop.
Keep those dwankies away!
Just the guys we've been waiting for!
What, are you mind readers? Yes, I do want that briefcase. How did you know?
Hey! what are you doing in here!?
Fuck these guys!
It's another grate, but that's fine. Use another batch of thermal paste.
These are the back offices. Not much loot, but where you'll find any local terminals.
All right! Bridge is back! Now, into the car and get the hell out of there!
That's one bag!
Don't shoot down the big helicopter that's coming in for the money, okay? That's me. Yeah, for sure.
See if you can find a way up to the next level. There should be a hatch or something nearby. Murky chops may not be expecting us, but be ready for anything.
The vault needs two cards, entered almost simultaneously. You can bet there's something particularly tasty in there.
See any numbers connected to us?
Only little more diesel.
Put these suckers in the ground!
Give him a good punch! Wake him up, teach him a lesson!

Pack your bags, gang. This one is south of the Mason-Dixie. We're going after Mitchell and Wilson - couple of counterfeiters down in Pensacola. Running a printing operation out of his basement. It's a discreet operation, and this guy's work is solid, so he's making serious bank. Let's grab a piece!
Deal's off! So fuck off!
How's it going, Alex? Get a grip!
Let it burn. Start opening up those deposit boxes if you want a little extra. I mean when in Rome...
Set up the buzzsaws. Two on the sides of the panic room and two on the floor below.
There's what we're after. Keep it safe and secure.
Dear hearts! You see me? Yes, I am here. For sure. I hate to be a bother, but would you mind strapping that lovely money to my helicopter?
Student loan erased! But no codes. Try another.
Hurry, friends. Get into the chopper!
Middle and right.
Ok, I'm coming back soon!
Maybe they'll have aliens.
Don't forget to grab C4 from the armory.
I don't believe in fate, for if I did, none of what I achieved ever would have come to me.
Come on, we're almost done. Get the money!
Destroy the weapons or get them up to the van. Getting them to the van will get us more cash.
Thorough planning can turn a speculative venture into a guaranteed result.
Guys, you need to get the hell out of there, and you need to do it fast. SWATS are gonna swarm the place and this is your only chance to get out!
Be careful going in...
Get the elves working on the product. Just holler at them.
What the fuck did you guys steal!?
Oh, shit!
You guys are killing it in there.
We've got the engine, I'll have my guy here inspect it.
Senator Borrico is advancing in politics and business. I have learned he has made a lucrative arms deal on a national scale. This nation has paid him in pure gold.
Hey, I ain't got nothing to do with this!
That's one hell of a shooter! He got 'em good! Now, let's do our part. Let's get our loot!
No time to load the chopper. It's just going to grab the truck, so you need to be inside!
I'm in place!
Ach! That's a Franz JÃ¤ger Mark II.
Ah! Yes, I see it. I'm coming in. Be ready to attach the pallets to the helicopter. And do it quickly, if that is possible. Things are hot.
The deal went through. You can make the trade now.
There we go - green lights. Let the time lock do it's thing. I'd love to see the managers face when those doors swing wide open.
Are you in the library yet?
OK, that's the clubhouse. Bikers' got the address we need. Sneak in.
... we'll take what you have.
OK, we need the minimum cash amount - once you have that, I'll send the car for you. Now if you wanna stick around and get more be my guest.
Snipers are inbound!
Cover the doors! Coppers are there!
Look for storage closets, they might have stuff in them.
Man, this music is fucking beautiful. It should be played in church.
Excellent. Just the fifth floor and the roof left. Get going, guys.
You tricked him. Excellent. Now kill him.
Left and middle!
Keep yer knickers on, lads. Need to find all the files for ya to sign off.
They turned the power off! The lights are down.
Nice work boys.
Why do laanie dwankies always host secret parties in old mansions, when it's raining outside?
So far so good...
I told you guys to be ready!
Thermite is effective at forcing a breach, silently.
Come on, crew. Get in there, grab that loot.
OK crew. You know how it goes, it's a bank hit. Ditch your phones, get your mind condition one and snap on the gloves. We're going to hit this branch bank. They're all over this town.
We need to track down the guest with the keycard. Probably pumping nickels into the slots.
Pretty sure there will be a goat inside the store. Get a drill on the door!
Now go and short out the pad by Garrett's door.
OK, I'm in his system. Lab will open shortly.
Okay, that should do! What's next?
Alright, I'm on my way back now.
Time to bounce, gang!
Yep. You heard him right. Vlad is serious. We go into the mall, we destroy as much as we can.
Cars... okay, can do. What's your position?
OK, there's a boat on the way to pick up the bags, people. Go secure them first for the transport.
30 seconds, guys!
We're not going to be stopped by a gate now. Get it open!
It's a pleasure to talk to the Financial Times in London. Oh, London, Kentucky.
If you get enough... Maybe we can upgrade this place, huh?
It's time to breach the bank! The explosion will take care of the voting machines.
Boom! The wall is history. Should have taken a few machines down with it too.

Hello. My name is Locke. I lead a cyber task force organised by Murkywater. Due to your many attacks on our interests, we've been mandated to infiltrate your Crime.Net, and destroy you. As you can no doubt ascertain, the infiltration part has been achieved. However, rather than bringing you down, which I could do with the press of this button, I come with a proposal. How would you like to work with me? I can supply you with intelligence, opportunities and materiel regarding Murkywater. Further, I can keep you hidden from the attentions of my co-workers. So...what do you say?
Now you can take that code and enter it into the keypad on the safe.
They have no clue you are there. Now keep looking for those keycard.
Head for the roof right away!
Manager office can be accessed via roof. Good place for keycards. Computer could be important.
Bring the shit!
The coppers have taken the winch offline!
I can see the plume from here, what is that? Is it snow?!
The vault will be packed for transport, so check those Murky shipping containers.
I'm not sure. I'm dispatching an officer just to be safe.
Find that weapons lab yet?
Don't forget to wipe out any Russian mobsters you find.
Oh shit! This wasn't the deal! We are outta here!
Here's the deal:
Old world guy... Doesn't trust banks.
There are millions of crates in there. Yes, millions. you just gotta find the right one. Use a terminal in the IT lab.
The code should have a four at the beginning.
I'm already waiting for you at dock nine!
Pick up the phone, quickly!
Chopper is heading back- sorry it took so long.
Okay, you can only zipline up two at a time. And there's no going back down, friends.
It's like a needle in a thousand stacks of hay, but you need to find the crate! Get to the tech lab.
OK, I'm coming in, get the server ready!
Aight check it, this is waht the deal is:
All right, snatch up those winch parts.
The Sosas were sending more men in to reinforce security, and it seems they're about to arrive now! Make sure you haven't left any bodies lying around in plain view, or they'll find out you're here.
There might be more c4 outside in the stash, friends.
Hilary at Gensec here. Routine check in. Can I have the time lock codes?
The display cases are full...
Second digit for the vault. Just the last to find.
Blerrie, you triggered the metal detectors!
Such a waste of good money... Cartel idiots.
The cops got roadblocks everywhere! It's like someone tipped them off! I'll pick you guys up a bit further ahead!
Come on, what are you waiting for?
Try and get by him unnoticed. Take your time.
I got to dash out in two minutes!
Believe it, man. Be-fuckin-lieve it.
Over here!
Let me give your memories a jog, yeah? Open the cargo bay door. Please.
Understood, Sensei. I can do this. I can do this!
Cops in the back!
I need all of you in the boat, as soon as possible, thank you very fucking much.
Quiet now, friends.
Find the bags for the cage, and get them to the parking lot.
Gang, are you looking for the EMP parts?
Fuuuuuuuuuck!
Second number. Just one more.
Get back to the mainframe and search for the second artifact.
We're gonna need to burn or cut through those bars. See if you can find something around there to do it with.
... just hang on!
Go ahead and light it up, Twitch. Hold your ears, friends.
Did I speak in Afrikaans? My apologies! I meant to say "please" "plant" "the" "charges" "on the locks"... you kaks.
The chopper's ready. Watch out! Those snipers dont want you to leave.
Goddamn it Locke, I'm gonna smack you for this.
Get ready for the sixth wave!
What an idiot! Find the shoes!
Hook me up guys, c'mon.
Clear the path. Clear the trees!
There's a zip-line set up there. It's for getting loot out, nice and quiet and unseen. Lot of valuable stuff in there that you can tie on it.
Can you hear me? The gates require a keycode. Can't use mine or I'm dead, so you need to find a 4-digit code.
What are you doing? That's not how you do crowd control!
I heard you guys up in the booth were good. Don't let me down, y'hear?
Bain will make the call.
Another camera here.
Alright, connect me again.
Additional medical supplies will increase your chances of survival.
Use those offices as your advantage!
I know a single large deposit of cash was just made to the Harvest & Trustee bank from a Swedish furniture warehouse close by. We're going to go in and take that place down.
You still got a long way to go!
What! Just leave me alone!
Okay. Here I am. Now, if you could just affix the straps to the pallet and I can evacuate this beautiful mountain of money.
Hey people, this isn't a parking lot, I can't stay here!
Very strange, this. One of the boxes is in the bio-lab? That's where you go next then, friends.
Guys, it feels like something's in the air... Money!
Grab that C4, guys.
Well, if you had to go loud, best to do it properly, and that was some outstanding action. You got the whole database. Sifting through the info now...
He should still be alive, right?
Alright, it's time to get into the auctioneer's office so you can find the code.
Yeah-yeah-yeah... Run the plan!
You're all dead men!
Kill 'em!
I need access to their systems. I've marked out a computer for you.

We've got a sniper ready to force the Gensec trucks off the road at the corner of McCarty and James. Sure to have those Time Out hipsters crapping into their latte macchiatos. We're going to need to get into the trucks, and then break open the strongboxes inside. Whatever they're carrying, get it, and get out.
See if you can get him out of the van.
Brace for impact!
Brilliant.
They don't suspect a thing. This is great.
Remember, we need six bags!
Fuck'em up!
Ten seconds now!
Gonna buy you a one-way ticket to Deadville!
If you ever wanted to bail... well, too late now.
C'mon friends, hack the mainframe.
A meth factory! Burn that place up. Or, if you can find a formula, get cooking. Can always move a little extra product.
Slow day... should be good for us.
There's gotta be explosives in one of the wagons. Search for them!
Time to get in character, the others are waiting for you.
Check out all of Commissar's blood money. Ah well, someone has to enjoy it. Get it to the chopper, if you can.
That's everything, nice doing business with you gentlemen!
Shit, those fucking shit-eating kerels shut down the unlocking. Get it going again!
Great, lets take a peek under the hood. Hmmm, nice. Good security, but nothing I can't handle.
I can't stay any longer!
You're close to the FBI boss. Keep your finger off the trigger, we may need him alive.
The wheel stopped on sniper. I'm not sure what that means...
Very good work, folks.
Step away from the goat, asshole!
We need those saws running non-stop, that means keeping an eye open if one of them jams.
These guys are fucking jokes.
Sniper? It... landed on sniper.
That's five bags!
... Just sit tight.
Ok guys, Get after that gold!
Ah hell. Heat is on the way. Guess the cops were watching the place.
Once you've got your fill, throw the bags through that vent by the elevators. Don't worry. You'll see 'em again soon.
Grab that paste and burn through the gate. Fucking hell.
The call came from Foggy Bottom. Find something that will pinpoint the Commissar. Remember - Foggy Bottom.
Good, now take hose to fuel pump.
Guys, look for a way to shut off the gas!
Thirty seconds, gang! You're pushing it!
The mechanic's done. If you want more loot you get it now, otherwise you ride out of there.
I believe you can do this.
Shit! These bastards have anti-air defenses set up! Bile, turn the plane around immediately! Guys, use the parachutes and get out! We'll figure something out!
Follow the truck. Come on!
Get those bags with the cage pieces, and get them on the roof of the bank.
That's the first.
Good work! Get back to the cooking. Use the time between waves to find more ingredients.
What's... Hey! Don't fuck with me!
I'm off in one minute.
You think I don't know what's going on?
I would really appreciate some help with those snipers!
Drill stopped - the cops disabled it!
We can scratch the Captain moving his ship for us now. Nevermind. We can move the ship without him. Hack into the ship control terminal. And don't let the cops interfere with it.
He said something about "not trusting banks" or whatever.
All right, listen up. Here's the getaway. Get past the bridge up ahead, and you'll see a truck in a tunnel. That's Twitch. Just park straight up into the truck, and we can close the book on this one.
Today's code is 559732. Sorry it took so long.
Almost got it... Almost got it.
The police have been alerted and are closing in. They'll be there any second.
Under fire! UNDER FIRE!
Okay, first drill is through.
Remember to look for the laptop!
A gas tank and exhaust pipes, gang. That's what the mechanic said he needed, and you'll find them in the workshop.
Thermite's done. Water's on its way. When the chopper arrives, you need to connect it to the vault.
I think we might need to spin another wheel. Find it.
Remember, stay low, stay dark. And stay quiet. Here we go.
Where's the shit?
... put the product in the car!
Open sesame. Now let's see what we have there.
Hey! They're trying to fuck with us!
Ok, I'm inside - but it seems the elevator isn't working. Listen - I need to get something important that they took from me. It's in a metal briefcase. Can you get it for me?
Hey! Put the groupie down, and get on the Intercom!.
That's nine bags!
All you'll have to say is Open Sesame.
Crane's over here. Can be positioned over the main hall skylight.
Truck's moving. Stay with it!
That's all of them! Nice!
Hold on for dear life!
Ready to go? Light a flare!
Look for the standard reinforced door. That should access the security room.
What the hell! It's the cops!
Now let's finish this. Into the manhole, guys! Time for a sewer escape.
My old protection business must start up. It is taken, and customers need change of mind.
Bad news, guys!
You are like great American comedians. Yes, again! More!
Put the delivery in the car...
Open the vault with the code on the screen.
You got it? The briefcase? Good! Now let's get out of there.
You heard Vlad. Get those bags into the chimney.
OK, I got you a new plan but you need to be quick. Mr Blonde, did you bring the freezer juice?
OK, now look around. We need to tag the truck headed for Washington. Look around for clues. Containers, terminals, any records. Find the right one, and tag it.
Don't think about running again, or it's the stewpot for you!
Six
Yes! Yes! Now it's time to see helmets flying!
It's getting dangerous here!
Nice job, Dallas. Now, get the cocaine and head back to the van. Our work here is done.
Once you have something to break them open, get searching the crates.

The Golden Grin Casino has dominated the Strip since its founding. It was built on mobster money. Time to take some of that back. You will need a plan: Study the environment. Assess the variables. Consider your options, and then execute - without hesitati
Prepare to get fucked up!
Come on guys! You can do it!
I'm here now!
Employing this will reduce the security on duty.
Get away from the explosives now.
That's the one, bring it back to the mechanic!
Eight bags. Out-fucking-standing.
Hook me up to that phone, yeah?
Both tanks need to go on the door.
They're not letting us go!
I have an odd feeling about this one. Like it's... somehow personal.
Front is secure. Check around the sides and back.
25 thousand, halfway guys.
When I find out who did this, they will pay!
That's the head of security. He seems to be in the garden.
There you go friends, now hurry back in!
Whose shooting?! Someone must've heard that.
I'll be back shortly!
Godammit! Cops halted the bridge. One of you - get in there, restart it!
Hey! Hey, shithead! Three words. Answer. The. Fucking. Intercom.
The power has been cut! You have to get the juice flowing again, then restart the crane.
Nice work! The fifth wave was beaten back!
An inventor named Rossy - residing somewhere in DC - may have found a cheap way to produce energy from water.
... I'm back in a little while!
Put the stuff in the car...
Alright, Bile dropped the lance! Grab it so we can keep this show going.
Get to the pillar!
Guys, I need you in the construction yard. It's the only way out.
I'll make you suffer, pendejos!
You are looking for evidence related to the Hoxton's case. Take a look around. It will be stored throughout the room. Could be marked out.
Daddy needs a new pair of shoes.
Who is this? Who the fuck are you?
Okay, I got what I came for! Get me back to the truck so I can put the shit together.
All right, I got it. Are you happy now?
Blerrie chop Murky soldiers... hope they don't follow.
Good job, now we need some more on the fourth floor and the roof.
Vault is opening. Get ready to move!
Yeah, that's it. Ah fuck! This is beautiful!
I'll tell you what. We were never gonna deal with you guys! We'll take it all!
Yes, yes.
Our driver has pulled the ambulance over and ran for it. And here comes the target, right on schedule...
Cover me! They're tearing me to pieces!
Make sure you get Charon out of here alive!
I'm coming in three minutes!
Head upstairs to the office corridors!
Let the Inside Man know when you're ready to de-mask. He'll move the loot, so be sure you secured what you want inside the vent.
This spot is getting deadly!
Get the power back up friends.
You'll be needing that torch later for sure!
... Flying as fast as I can.
Brown's computer should be nearby.
Get into the house.
Feels like old times, huh?
Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
Bring more, this is not all of it.
The one in the white shirt, that's him, our Taxman.
Ah! My friends! Welcome to Black Ridge. It's used for, well, for now is holding loot of a significent value. Let's steal it!
That asshole?
Great. Now bring that footage back here, and we can wrap this up.
Should be two access points around there somewhere.
Now we need to know who's in this room, steal their keycard. I'll need a guest list. Download that from a terminal in reception. Grab a USB.
You gotta restart the hack!
OK, I count 5 paintings.
Hello, friends!
Access the computer I have marked out for you. Use it to drop the magnetic seal.
It's fine, we'll settle for this.
Exterior lounge. Nice for a cool drink..
There. Now just give me a minute.
... I'll come back in no-time!
The bus blew up! Be careful and stay out of that fire!
Hope you're not getting sick. Nasty cold going around. Yeah, you probably just have cold.
No need to stay there longer. Take the box and make for extraction.
Ok friends, this one has been a long time in the pot. Time for some payback, yeah?
These fuckers are going down!
I have to leave!
The code should have a six at the beginning.
Wait. What? Really? Our schedule says... God damn it, y'know, someone screwed up this schedule. Anyway, yeah, everything is fine here. Thanks for being so diligent.
All right, the thermite should be halfway done by now. Keep keepin' on, gentlemen.
And... got it! Now, use the code on the panic room door!
It's a beautiful painting. Last seen on the walls of a well known South American dictator. See how the artist captured the light and all that shit? Beautiful.
Shoot at the wires to make em snap!
... drop 'em!
Bain, old time river here has been talking so I didn't quite catch that, but let's go.
OK, chopper is coming in to pick up that Fusion Engine.
Generally the rule of thumb is, they'll only believe you for a little while once the pager goes off.
You made a bad mistake!
It's always in the last place you look, right guys?
The winch seems to have jammed. Get it up and running again!
I'm leaving in half a minute!
I like the sweet sound of that! Now, leave it be for a few seconds and we should be in the clear.
I have to leave!
That's another bag of coke. And another one... And... Should I keep going? It's heartbreaking.
Ey, what's going on here...
The hacking has been stopped. Get it up and running again!
I think I just heard another package. It's mine! Look for it!
Chloe's computer should be nearby.
Give 'em a whirl.
Get over here!
I've got a driver who can help you. Eddie, get there now! You need to pick the Payday Gang up!
What are you trying to pull!?
What the hell, guys! You weren't supposed to kill them now! Wick wanted them alive so he could teach them a lesson... Let's hope he will be content with the thought of them dead.
Hit their soldiers first, destroy their weapons, then find their secret bank. The FBI knows all about it.
What the hell, I'll do you guys a favor.
It's somewhere on the ground floor!
Time to see what the prison has in store for us.
Alex made the drop, I knew I was right in giving him a third chance.
You better enjoy your life while you got any left!
Don't mess around, this isn't all of it!
Gang, get into the construction yard! Hurry!
Good, OK, you can open the vault now. I have turned on the vault's camera feed as well.
OK, gang. We're here.
Those doors. You gotta get them open for sure, because the vault's behind them.
Yeah-yeah-yeah... Run the plan!
You should probably stash that extra loot somewhere safe, so you can take it with you when you leave, yeah?
Achhh! The paw-paw courier forgot the winch! I'll have to get one to you by train. Keep looking up, yeah?
Look for a code that starts with two.
Okay, good. Now, keep going.
Great. Answer the pager first, then get rid of the body. That dumpster should do the job.
Sorry, is the floor wet? You piss in your panties, little baby?
Pull over here. Alright gang. Let's do this.
You can finish this when you want, but grab as much as you can.
I've got Twitch waiting for you in the basement. Take the elevator, and don't forget the box!
No time to waste, shoot the wires and let it drop.
No deal, assholes!
Everybody, get down into the sewers!
Alex... The idiot dropped the ammo... Elsewhere.
Right wankers, you ready for this one?
For the thousandth time, we're not interested.
You don't wanna go back to prison, right?
That's the driver, throw the loot into the back of his truck.
They might be onto us, so don't take too long.

We've a facility in the desert called Black Ridge. There is a some significant loot secured in its vaults. As an initial test of our new working relationship, we'll combine our talents and turn this Murkywater money into our money. Sounds good, yeah? For sure.
Hey, these bags look pretty shitty man... You've been doing something to them?
Cops are here! Brace yourselves!
The blueprint you found was for a new Type of Turret. It looks like the government is transporting it soon. If we act fast, we can catch them off guard and steal it without anyone noticing.
I see the flare. Bravo! On approach. When I am there, would you please attach the pallet to the helicopter. With all haste, I might add,
Return to the security gate and melt those bars. It should work.
Who let them in? What the fuck?
You're not going to let a little thing like a wall stand in your way, are you?
Could never go wrong with that, I guess. Might be somewhere it can be useful later.
Right!
It is a moderate ambition, I admit, but one that I find pleasing.
I sure would be pissed off if that was my ride.
This is the one. Biggest bank job yet. Everything has been training for this moment. You know what to do.

OK folks, my inside man stashed the thermal drill you're gonna need for the vault around the back. recon the spot to find it. Make your move on the vault when you're ready. This job, It's gonna be golden.
Get a shufty on, lads. Chop fucking chop!
Aight, four!
Alright, she's berthed! Get up on deck and start searching the containers.
Alex, get a grip!
Get the people on the floor. Keep 'em down.
OK, forget the window cleaning platform, you're going to have to use ziplines to move the bags out!
Let's get to the docks!
You swept that bus clean of Mendozas. A true Viking funeral in flames with their possessions and all.
Crew! Don't lose focus. We're here for cash, and it's there for you.
This is weird guys. The boards are lighting up like crazy. Something's wrong... I think we have major trouble coming. Damn it, I knew this was shady.
That's the head of security. He seems to be by the driveway.
Grab the keychain friends.
Remember, you're looking for keycards. Check the buildings.
I'm feeling like the God damn Dalai Lama right now.
There's a lot of pricey stuff around here. But check the cases for alarms - they'll be the ones with the genuine stuff.
Who let them in? What the fuck!?
You've got a security door blocking you though.
Winch isn't working, crew. Fix it!
Make sure the cooks gets finished. Give them nothing.
You are too kind, Bain. Really.
What a great way to start the year. With a mountain of fucking coke to move! Congratulations, dear friends.
Our helicopter will be at the train yard any second.
He only had a week left on his contract.
These fuckers are going down!
Hey, we're not done yet.
Chopper is on its way. Stay put.
35 thousand dollars.
Connect hose to ship, now.
Uh... well that's going to make this job tough. Buckle up.
This place is for staff only. Offices can be accessed here.
Come on, guys - time to grab the cash.
Your money has been sent. We will meet again as this conflict is now about obliterating the others. Keep your phones on.
Good this should help us get the lab door open.
Well, in the annals of criminal cock-ups, that ranks high. I can hear the cops laughing from here. Better luck next time.
You'll find the vault down in The Grin's Security Center. Head there.
Get ready for the fourth wave!
You see that fence? Cut it open and get inside.
The fuck do you think you're doing!?
I'm out of here, two minutes!
Imagine whatever you gotta imagine to hold these pricks off!
...you need to move all parts of the winch into the bank.
Okay, this baby is gonna need a throne and I know where to get one. See that backyard over there? They have a shitload of stuff stored in the bunker there. So go and bring me a fancy seat.
Hey! The cops are gonna stop the train further down the tracks, so you need to get the BCI tech and get the hell out of there!
That's enough...
All right. Now you can keep cooking, or signal the chopper and end this caper.
I confess I was a little worried there. Thank you.
All right, first things first: set up the saws.
Good. Your ride is coming down now.
Don't you just love science? Great team effort. We've retired the engine until... Well until we decide to liberate it ourselves. Enjoy the payday.
You need to go and activate the crane, yeah?
Door to the ICU is open, get in there and find that patient.
Second transport is open - check inside!
Time to escape, guys!
And don't drop it...
That is all, good.
Hey! That's priceless art!
I can't believe this shit!

Excellent. The increased drag will slow the plane and force the pilot to fly lower. As expected. Now, get to the cargo controls. You see them above you? So close, yet so far. The only way to get up there is by the stairs at the front of the plane.
Is that... a nuclear warhead!? I... don't... look, just grab it. Carefully!
The cannon can't fire until you get fresh batteries.
These sons of bitches get nothing...
OK, that's a start, we need three more just like it. Get 'em! Take them to the van in the parking lot next to the gallery and we're in business.
This is the penthouse level. Commissar has to be here.
Let's talk numbers. Thirteen managers over two hundred years, with millions of customers, moving trillions of dollars. And one heist by four badass gangsters.
Either secure the bags in the motorboat, or chuck them in the sea. We can pick them up as we leave.
So I'm going to send this feed live to all the media outlets as you're uploading. They're gonna eat this up.
The front door. Easiest way in, hardest way out.
Ok, we got that done. That was a lucrative asset, yeah?
Damn, it crashed again. Restart the data scrambling!
Hello, to you, my new friends!
Wow. That was a helluva thing. You all right? No missing limbs?
OK, you have your chance to surrender. We are now forced to apply maximum pressure.
That's it! Downloading. Give it a moment.
Left a bit.. there we go... ACH, bekakin' civvie! Whoa, almost got that one too. A little faster.
Not exactly incon-fucking-spicuous over here. Hurry!
Ah, just imagine putting a slug right in the middle of old Garrett's gob. But not tonight, friends. Long game and all that, yeah?
We might have a very valuable object in this bank. I have insurance papers backing that up.
We're after the vault, so please get me a closer look at it!
Let's see how you handle our new Cuff Cloakers...
It's starting to smell like fried pig now.
The arms deal guys... We got to get that deal exposed in the media and fast. It will create a framing effect for sure.
Are they cops? Are they fucking COPS!?
And that's the last of it!
I'm still hoping there's going to be a spaceship buried down there.
Who the hell are you!
Go down the elevator shaft and meet up with Charon!
OK, what's next?
Fucking move it guys, come on!
... Hang in there!
Pilot is on the scene with the lance. Go get it.
One part collected. Get it to the mechanic.
That's keycard two. Good job, guys!
Arriving in one minute!
A nice rubber dinghy. All aboard!
I got another idea: Finders keepers, assholes!
... Put the delivery in the car...
Vault's cracked, let's see what we got!
You're going into the hornet's nest. So don't kick the damn thing, huh.
I will collect you on the edge of town but get there are quickly and without the cops in tow. Get down to the sewers!
There's a ladder leading to the roof. Over the garage.
Every 10 minutes, the vault gets a new code. Stick a blocker unit on the keypad to stop it.
That will not be difficult to arrange.
Hey, I said we need more!
Can you guys help me get the goats in here.
I do believe we can put that ladder to good use. Yeah, for sure!
Top side is full of cops, make the escape now!
Alright, time for us go. Go!
Vault's not here. OK, keep searching.
It's SWAT choppers, they're on us!
Bad news friends. I just picked up some chatter and they're closing off the air space. You need to leave. Now!
Damnit, that's the alarm. Stay frosty and get ready!
How lucky are you feeling? There's still that money in the bus...
Truck's burning. If you haven't already, you can clean out the other trucks and then make your escape. Hurry it up.
Big ones and Benjamins. Beautiful!
This is a ten thousand dollar carpet man! Fix it!
Guys!... Guys! You still there?! Get... -out!
This area has several vaults, which can be opened from a control room. We want what's in the vaults so necessity demands we get to the control room.
They recently hired a new IT guy. If we can get into his computer, I should be able to get that door open. Look for some clue to who this guy is, and find his PC.
There's just a little problem... I don't actually know where the vault is, physically.
And done, nice.
What are you doing here!?
Remember that movie where one person in the lift goes bossies and just eviscerates everyone?
It's a quiet neighborhood. You'll be fine. I'll be right back.
Damn, place is wrecked. Still looking. Hang in there.
Find the Commissioner's office, guys.
Don't let the neighbors see you.
Watch out gang! BFD overheats if you don't give her enough water. Get it from the bathroom.

Our client needs a blood sample from a patient being kept in the isolation ward of Mercy Hostpital. You gotta go in there, take out the surveillance, subdue the civillians and get me into the patient database so I can ID the guy. With the low security in this place, it should be a nice, clean job. I'll get you out via the roof when you're done. This job is a little shady, brokered through a third party- got some serious shadow-company military industrial vibes, but worth the risk. The payday is something we're gonna need in the future, plus a nice cash bonus.
If you guys manage to pull this off without anyone noticing...
These are the trucks. When you're done searching for clues, get the that GPS on the truck you think is carrying the voting machines to Washington.
Fuck! Thought I had it. Didn't have it. Coming about again.
Just saw another civilian stroll into the street. Deal with them.
You trying to pull a fast one on us, huh?
Fucking piece of shit car! Need a hand out here guys!
Wow, you stink of BO, gringo. Been working hard recently?
Beautiful bikes are all about the details, and I know Rust wants the best for his baby. They have a special made chrome skull inside the clubhouse. Go fetch.
... Shoot these fools and do it now!
Seems like the deal was a gold arms transaction. Made here in DC.
There he is!
Oh shiiiiiit!
Kill all those pieces of shit!
The scab-faced meth zombies will rue this day.
How is it going?
Maybe we'll bring home a couple as pets for you, Locke.
Good job, friends. One less secret occult mystery box for Murky. Take it and get cracking on the next, yeah?
No! Stop that!
This is Bronson, your getaway driver! What do you need?
Last chemical now... Add it and we should be done...
Keep your crowd controlled!
Stand by, gang. Moretta's almost berthed.
I've got the root on the IRS server. We are in the jar.
The C4 is right in there. Why does The Grin need C4? God knows.
I'm sorry guys, the pilot says he needs to refuel... And it's gonna take a while. Just hang in there for a while, OK?
We are done, my good friends! Everyone into the helicopter!
Everyone on the ground, sound as a pound? Great. Now look around for the first money pallet. When you find 'it, pop a flare and I'll be right over.
The pick-up truck is gonna be here in a few seconds.
Gang, ignite the tires. Give that chopper a nice thick smokescreen to worry about!
30 seconds now!
Receiving the data now. It should be enough for me to find where the right truck is headed. Just keep it coming.
Uh....that's great. Yeah, I might do a bit like that too.
Hmm... I don't know if that really was the server...
Good. Fifth floor is done.
This is an FBI auxiliary office. The hornet's nest. For the love of God stay quiet. First thing, get inside.
The hack was interrupted. Get it going again.
Remember the other trucks are ours! But we still want our loot back, use them to disctract the cops away from the ballot machines.
OK next step.
Make sure no one else is there.
You're not leaving here with the goats, assholes!
Bastards called in a SHIELD! Try and flank him!
That's two.
I'll be there in three minutes!
What is that I hear? Rats, in the cellar?
Now, there will be time for longer hellos later, but we should really make our escape now, yes?
We almost had it!
Connect the devices to the station on the roof.
Shit! Shit! Shit! Shit!
Shit!
Looks like they have cameras... Watch the alarms.
OK, you go to the harbor like we planned. Offload the coke from the pick-up. You'll need to signal Hector's boat in the warehouse to get him to come in.
Alright! The van should be coming in soon!
Friends, you should pile all your loot somewhere close, so that you can move it later, yeah?
Get the power to the server back on!
Bingo. That's the server room door.
Ok, friends. Get the loot onto the helicopter.
Last gate! Get your tools on it and get it open!
Control the crowd, guys. Keep the people down.
Alright, the data scrambling is done. It'll just look like a simple hard drive failure.
All this waiting is fucking killing me!
That was easy. Okay, deploy your drill and get that safe open.
He was my chomma. Shit happens though, right?
The asset has been accepted and payment is underway. Nice going.
Alright friends, just give me some time to connect.
No need to sneak around any longer. New plan incoming.
Make sure no one notices the hacking...
Damn it! We were so close!
That was one good heist. I owe you all a round at the Tasteful club. See you this evening guys.
Fuck!
Sure there's gotta be loot in the wagons. Search 'em. And any C4 you can scrounge too.
I'm there in three minutes...
What are you guys doing down there? Look for the light.
Now remember - we're here to rob a bank. But if, by some accident, you shoot up a ballot machine or three, well... That's just tough titty. Understand?
Yeah.. I ... I don't know .. It could have been a big gun.
Searching the cases is pointless. You got the bomb, remember?
This will be a lesson to all: Don't fuck with The Butcher. Thank you for your help, my friends.
Chopper is almost there.
Find the pink schnapps bottle and spike it.
Great. Now the second card in the other panel, and the Moretta will be free.
Carry the coke down to the vault and plant it outside in the pre vault room.
Aight cehck it, here's what I want you to do:
You guys are lucky, I'm feeling generous...
Here it is! Take the bomb parts to the drop-off point!
Bang on target, gang!
Give up and we will negotiate.
Bile can't land until you get those guns down.
The evidence will be here somewhere. Search for it.
Damn, no need to be quiet any longer. Time for a new plan.
Gadgets. You can try out whatever you brought over here.

They've really opened the valve. The van can't wait forever. You need to book it, now!
No-no-no-no-no!
Get the hell out dammit! Get to the manhole and into the sewers!

60 seconds to police action. Ready up!
You don't know who you're dealing with!
Bakgat! Now, onwards, my friends. The airlock awaits you!
I will make sure a reliable associate is there to assist you.
"Abashed the devil stood and felt how awful goodness is, and saw Virtue in her shape how lovely: and pined his loss."
Just sneak through. Head downstairs to the garage.
We will make you pay for this!
I'm heading off to unload these - but I'm coming back, hold on.
Guys, get the truck down! Shoot away those wires.

Every Christmas I set up a little operation - gifts for the children, and "gifts" for the parents, yes? Thing is, supplies are low this year. But! I have found an alternative. A clutch of assholes have an operation near here. Consider it a little toyshop, yes. I need you to get down there, take out the muscle and get the "elves" back to work.
Excellent, the server is secured. Now, let's get out of here.
You guys are goddamn ghosts. Considerably wealthier ghosts! Well done!
Do not damage the asset! We are willing to negotiate and raise our offer!
Ten left!
I'm going to make you bleed!
Fuck yeah. We ain't done yet.
Find the server room.
15 bags!
Don't shoot that cop! It's three against one. Intimidate him to work for us instead.
Snipers just got activated. Stay sharp.
Package on the ground. Good luck out there!
Oh man, the vault is already open. Thank you, Mr Manager, for being so accommodating.
Hot damn! You guys did great! Enjoy your payday - you deserve it.
One more minute, then I gotta scram!
You guys are lucky that I'm feeling generous. We'll take what you have.
Really? Ok, we'll be here.
Aha! Ship database, including comm frequencies. Great! That's what we need. Now get on the horn to the Captain.
Your mother knows less than a Murmansk whore. Let them hear. Let them come!
Stay completely still and keep your hands in the air.
We got a fucking police caravan on our ass!
Operate the crane, guys. Get that piggy into position.
Alright! He'll bring it over here so we can inspect it.
Good work people. This could have gone poorly but you managed to keep us in the black. Arms trading, anyone?

Well I've been through the intel and this is gonna be interesting. Check out the assets. Get to know them inside out, upside down. We need to sneak in to find the guy's lab, and in the lab, his fusion engine.
Don't' forget to blow up that floor, yeah?
Gonna send you to the lake!
Maybe it's right there in plain sight.
Ah, they've gone and messed up your cocktail. You gotta mix up a new one, friends.
OK guys I want this to be a homerun. First get the thermal drill from the parking lot. Then head in to hit the vault. Watch for guards and cameras.
We're ambushing a convoy down by the docks. The cargo is gold. The convoy is Murkywater. Questions?
As usual, Vlad went light on the information. Cameras and guards... Shit.
The boat is coming in at dock 7.
That was the wrong code, friends! You need to wait for the system to clear.
All right! Find the garden hose!
Enemy helicopter inbound!
Good. The computer is working again without interruption.
I'm putting you through to our CEO. Please hold.
Someone should take out that trash.
No! I can't take any more, not now!
Enter the code, friends. Have you forgotten it or something?
Very well, Broadsword. Over and out.
... Put these gringos in the ground!
The police is on our back like a fucking pony tail!
Wipe 'em out!
We need a keycard to get into the prison. But where can we get one?
Just like St Nazaire!
...Here's the plan.
Police are incoming - keep your guns up.
How am I supposed to work like this?!
Thank you. That was getting a little... uncomfortable.
Chopper is back and waiting for more bags!
We got a lot of heat for a small take, but worth it to get Vlad happy. It'll probably pay off long term.
When you have been around... a while... you learn to let things go. See the bigger picture. If you can get Bain out of here, he's yours. It is the moral choice, after all.
Ok, release the balloon!
Don't just stand around! Get the gate open and secure the BCI tech.
Hey, we don't have all day!
The box, friends.
What the fuck do you think you are doing?
Haul that beautiful gold out to container 61. Hurry!
Looks... Hmm... Checking a few things... Hang tight...
Here we go. Doors open! Let's see how rich we are.
I'm moving out.
With all of these crates, there has to be a crowbar around here somewhere.
Good thinking.
Uh... Not exactly Wonderland, is it.
Guys, patch into the radio. Let me speak to the Moretta.
I hope they're insured...
Got it. Making contrails in your direction.
OK, this is the server room. Get in and let's get access to the computer.
That's the place, but you gotta get into the control room.
They don't know you're there.
You would have thought someone like the Dentist could afford a better kept prison to torture people in...
No broken legs? Good. Head into the forest and find that plane. My guess is the pilot will be nearby. Get him someplace safe and we'll evac him by air. Move out!
You're in. Now, the target is the voting machines. They're likely in shipping crates, so look around for those.
Shit! Oh, shit!
Then find that money, torch it, and for god's sake record it with the camera I gave you.
... then, we'll trade.
OK folks, so here's what I did: I got you an escape chopper - thank me later - he's on his way!
The vault, guys. ASAP.
I understand the term finesse is ironic given what just went down here, but try to have a little more next time, i.e., a truck not on fire.
You're on the clock guys!
Guys this bank just seems right. Don't know the load but it should be big.
That's a Royal Flush, gang. Every God damn truck is ready for the picking. Get to work!
Yes, I do believe the new security system has been tested thoroughly.
Ahhh, listen. The coke is being smuggled in goats. Yes, goats. G. O. T's. And they've escaped. Find them all.
His blood must be 80% proof. Stay with him, help him.
Somebody, grab the phone and let me handle it.
Have a look around for something you can use to force that crate open.
Not much cover up here, but opportunities for spotting and getting inside.
Don't let anyone call the cops. Keep them down.
Get into the office, friends.
Driving as fast as I can.
Let's get to the docks!
I managed to get one of the employees onto our side. They willing to open the gates leading to the vault. Let me put them through.
Guys, six bags, that's what we need.
If they're going by the book they'll have snipers set up ahead. These cocks always go by the book.
Why'd they shut down the party?
Keep it steady. I'm connected.
Look outside the Jade Room, looks like a laptop.
Caustic chloride. Says it is some solid form... Wait a... Should be that hydrogen, right?
Wish we had a better idea of exactly what we're looking for.
You see that marked door? That's one of our closets.
That Control-Guy doesn't seem to be the brightest tool in the shed, but next time even he will understand something's wrong.
Alright, one more minute til the time lock opens the vault.
You might not want to know the answer to that.
Moretta is moored at Dock 2B. Can't access it there.
Did you hear that loud bang? Guys?
It is cosy in here. How is it out there, monkey-fuckers?
If you want, grab some sapphires on the way out.
Don't move. One of our agents will now detain you.
My name is Hector Moralez. I am a businessman. I would be uncomfortable being called anything else, to be quite honest.
Street's clear for now!
I can't get the door open if you don't cover me!
Just one to go.
Easy enough. I got the next one too.
...bring all the winch parts into the vault room.
That's the alarm dealt with. Great. Don't worry about doors or windows now.
Move the gold onto the truck! The crane can do it.
Hurry up guys, you need to move to the other building.
...screw the bolts into the floor, yeah.
...I'm 57% sure.
Time to deliver the bags!
Ouch! I hope that's not a sign of the luck you'll enjoy tonight.
Running the barcode now. Shouldn't take long to get an address.
OK, time for a new plan!
...this isn't my specialty, really.
Have you found the power yet?
You need to take care of those Murkys!
Alright, the files are all uploaded, it should do the trick.
I think it's time we leave, don't you?
We got four!
Are you going to fight!?
We have information about the Mendoza cashflow. Over $100 million from their American operations. We want to send a message - their money and their weapons are null and void.
Thank you for the safe delivery gentlemen. The device will now be tested for a long time... A very long time. In the meantime enjoy the payday!
Looks like they hired a new IT specialist. See if you can find any clues in the manager's office about him, then hack his computer. Once in, I'll get the lock open for you.
God damnit!
Keep quiet while you bug out of there, and this is a perfect piece of shadow work.
The mechanic said he needed a gas tank and exhaust pipes from the workshop.
Friends. You got more Murkys coming in, so be careful.
I appreciate that times are difficult. First World Bank truly does. But, with regret, we cannot sanction the loan of $10,000 on a promise to pay it back when "Fat Pat's" insurance comes through.
Okay, what's next...
Recon the bank. My guy dropped a thermal lance somewhere on the premises... Around the back of the bank, find it.
I told you guys to be ready!
Okay, scanning is under way. Now make sure it gets to finish without getting interrupted.
You'll PAY for this!
We almost tasted that cigar!
They got Eddie! You'll have to continue on foot.
Is that an elf slacking off there? Go tell him the only union law here is the union of my flamethrower with their chestnuts!
You made it, but not burning the truck would have been a better option for us, next time, try to have a bit more finesse.
There should be a laptop with information about where the cash is hidden. We got the password from Charon so all you gotta do is find the thing.
Outside!
Stop this madness and lay down your weapons!
Gonna give you a motherfucking faceful of lead!
The heat's rising!
You got that USB yet? Surely IT will have one.
The code should have a three at the beginning.
Mr. big-shot CFO had to go bye-bye. At least he had the priviledge of seeing my face before he went!
Yeah! Thats the sweet sound of success. Get yourselves in the basement and check what's in there.
You came for the ones in cases, but everything else is a bonus.
Two minutes until you can get the hell out of there.
Now use those keycards to open the gate. Doesn't matter which does which.
Public office. Wow, we are in the wrong line of work gentlemen.
I'll miss the slags I left behind. Mickey the Squib. Dirty Alan. Fish Fingers. Good lads.
Check other wagons for extra loot. And C4. Look for that too.
Bad news, guys!
Don't wait too long friends, just get that mix onto the door, yeah?
Keep 'em away from the truck we're hacking to be safe.
Friends, get a saw going through one of the doors on this floor, yeah?
Shame you guys couldn't keep it stealthy. Not a day for achievements.
Ey, yo!
Where's the stuff, man!?
