Your dicks ain't for holding. They're for fucking. And there's a lot of Murkies up there waiting for it. Apologies to any ladies in the crew.
Alright guys, get the bags to the van!
You don't think our time's important!?
Yes sir, we'll help you with that right away.
Go find Ralph Garnet and take that keycard from his priviledged-ass-self.
Gonna feed you to the pigs!
'Once more unto the breach...'
There's a bit of charm in those old vaults, eh? Back then you didn't need loads of dingeses to get in, just craftsmanship.
Whoever it was, they better not cross me. This old dog can still bite!
They're firing at the tires!
No need to stay any longer, friends. If you're ready, go for extraction.
You got to find Garrett's safe.

OK. If we're going to do this quietly, we need to disable some of these alarm systems. Look around. Search the museum. Find the circuit boxes that power security. If we can hack them, we can shut the place down without setting off the alarms.
Hey, I'm not gonna be able to break out of here without some help.
Shoot these fuckers!
They've got some nasty security in place, but they didn't count on old Locke, yeah? Put a blocker on that keypad to stop the code from cycling.
Keep 'em off the drill!
Well done, friends. Only thing left is to zip it out of there.
... On my way!
Halloween treat, guys. Headed back to the cabin in the woods.
BFD's done. Now, down into the vault!
Mark the landing - use the flare and the chopper will come in.
Ah, good. Fuel is moving.
What noise does a goat make?
The garbage truck is waiting for the money bags, come on!
This shit really what we want to be talking about?
Found anything yet?
Find those valves. We need the sprinklers working.
You're doing great. Keep everything nice and quiet.
Gonna cut you into pieces!
So where are they?!
Almost there... aaaand....
You got all of 'em? Ha!
Arriving in two...
Zero
Garrett's going to have a fun time explaining that one for sure. Now get that box secured and get out before the kerels arrive.
Careful now. Another guard is patrolling the area. He's most likely looking for his partners. We can't afford to kill this guy. I repeat: do not kill him.
I got something to show you, boss. You'll want to see it for yourself.
I bet one of the guards has left a keycard somewhere. Look around.
What the fuck!? Police!
That's wonderful! I'm thinking of sharing it with friends and family.
Now, torch the money...
...If you find a keycard, opening one up would be pretty easy
See that boat? That's your way out right there. Yeah, for sure. Get in.
Guys, it feels like something's in the air... Money!
Who the hell do you think you are!
Great. We got a full tank, lots of green lights and we're fat with stolen loot. Hop aboard, my friends. Let's conclude this.
That's the alarm. OK, gang. Plan B. Force our way through.
Get going or you're gonna be be left for dead!
It's a security keycard for the railcars. That should speed things up.
Okay, ping our Inside Guy when you're ready to de-mask and get out of there. He'll move the loot, so be sure you secure in the vent what you want to take.
Come on! Get the time lock going again!
Wait, don't shoot! Make him give up instead by intimidating him. He can be useful to us.
I'm gonna kill you!
Security here is tight. We might be able to do this heist silently. But if things go loud, don't worry. I've always got a Plan B.
Good. Now use the other keycard on the panel in the other control room.
Not like this, not like this...
I will arrange for my associate to be there.
Tick-tock, said the detonator. Keep the kerels away.
Ach, bunch of keks! They shut down the hack so you need to get it started again.
This one's a wash-out. Another one. Quick!
Cover me while I open the door!
OK, our pardons are locked in the vault. Have a closer look.
Mall is no more. Smoke is everywhere. I like your war. Business will be good now and fear is great of Vlad. Thank you.
What are you waiting for? Take all of them!
Saw through that roof and drag him out!
You can tell a lot about a man by how he takes care of his teeth. This makes me a formidable judge of character.
Cops ain't gonna let my bird hover for long. Get your asses moving!
You wanna know how I make my money? Hard work. Right through the night.
Ah, blerrie. They've got those new ultra-fine detectors installed. Got to take a different approach.
That's the last mistake you're ever going to make...
Great, now you just need to find the second one.
Got a lot of cops on my payroll. They'll fuck you, and I will walk out a hero.
Close, but no cigar, assholes!
Hang on guys. Coming in. ETA 3 minutes
Ready whenever you are. I'm at the gates.
CFO to the roof, ASAP!
Yeah. He was the King, but I was the fucking Ceasar, you know.
C4 is in the bins, crew. Blast the door with it.
Hurry up man.
Our guest loves Ocean's Ten vodka. Find another blue bottle and spike it.
That was good work. And good... Sasha! Take those keys off him! Yes, good work. You deserve the bonus.
All right, I got steaks on the barby, chicks in the pool - no action. Come see me when you guys are done, alright?
We need to keep this place secret. Don't talk around town about where you are staying.
You made a mighty big mistake coming here!
Thanks to that manifest you found, we know where to drill.
A bit OVERKILL but I guess all is fair in love and war. Mostly war, on Vlad's part.
Oh damn I missed the spot by 20 meters, sorry comrads.
Just throw the bags into one of the containers on the floor. I'll send...someone to pick it up later.
You're messing with the wrong man. Mr Garnet will make you regret this.
Looks like we have an opportunity to crack some deposit boxes.
Get some cross fire going!
You're not supposed to get captured, you chops! We gotta give this one up.
Damn! Alright, I'm sending the drill.
Excellent. That's enough for the roof.
Give 'em our warmest welcome!
Always exit a social gathering with a bit of flair, friends. Now, secure that box and go.
Half the fucking police force is on our ass!
Cameras will set of the mines, guys! Stay away!
My old acquaintance in the FBI that owed me a favor has doctored a laptop for you to use. She said she would mark which one on a whiteboard. See if you can find it, yeah?
You still have to stop the code from changing.
...you'll find it in a trash container by the parking lot, friends.
OK, time to take your masks off and make your way casually out the door.
Bueno. Hasta la vista we're leaving.
You get into that computer yet?
That reads correct. Thanks for your assistance.
OK, the database is split into two. I'm getting the first one now.
Let's barbecue him. Make sure he's well done!
The weapons will need fresh batteries.
Watch out, snipers are setting up in the area!
Can't do anything until you hook me up.
Well, what do have we here? Military blueprints! Let me investigate this.
The boss keeps all the earnings in a safe.
Nine to go.
Let's burn his paintings. Gather them in a pile first.
This will be at the specified location.
You made a mighty big mistake coming here!
Need a refill. Be back shortly.
Man, the EMP took out the whole factory it seems... Use your flashlights and find the X-ray device.
It's Matt Roscoe! Don't let him get away! Maybe you should just kill him!
Ey, I don't have all day...
A sniper is about to set up a position on the opposite side of the highway. Be ready...
You know what to do!
Murkywater are trying to sneak a shipment of gold out of their warehouse. You guys up for an ambush?
That's the first machine hacked. Make sure you close up that crate. Don't want anyone getting suspicious.

Nice work, friends. Those brandy-snifting poshies got what they deserved, yeah? Now let's see what we can do with that artifact. Duke will get to looking at it as soon as you get back to the safehouse. It's probably going to answer a lot of questions.
Thirty seconds, gang.
Watch out for those bags now!
Ten seconds now!
Stay focused friends, you've set off the alarm!
Remember to stash that loot in the vents. I got them marked for you.
Five bags.
And when that is done, we want you to find their cash reserve here and burn it. Leave them nothing but ash.
The code should have a nine at the beginning.
Fuck it, you're here ain't you?

Hey, you guys see the news?! Big quake just hit the West Coast! LA is completely messed up. And that's where you're headed.Seems Vlad has set up some big deal to move some freight from Seattle to DC. The shippers he contracted were in LA when the quake hit - I guess they were going to ship out of Long Beach. Vlad wants his freight secured safely. No time for planning on this one. LA is wrecked, and the roads are messed up so we're going to drop you in by chopper.
That's all the cash secured. Now for the server with the bank passwords - get back to that laptop and hook me up so I can open the server room's security lock.
Third one found.
Here's the cops. Get ready, crew!
Coppers got to the drill!
He bombed a school. Good riddance.
I heard rumours. Bunch of clowns hit the motel. My poor Yuri.
Don't forget about those safe deposit boxes folks, can be good stuff in there.
Are the saws still running?
Just go over to the switch and pick the difficulty.
That's it, gang, just the roof left now.
You're so dead!
Put some gas on those tires. We need to block that eye in the sky.
One of the routers is probably real close.
Ok, here comes the third wave!
Hang tight boys.
SWAT are rolling in from the east. Get ready, gang!
I can see the fire and smoke from here. Grab an extinguisher and get it out!
You need to set up the drill at the gate.
The code should have a two at the beginning.
The trucks are somewhere near. Keep an eye out for Vlad's couriers too. Don't drop them!
Safeties off!
I'll get to work. Cover me!
OK people, the pick-up drive is here! He's on the street behind you!
Yeah-yeah-yeah... Run the plan!
BFD needs power - lots of it! Hook her up to a couple of sockets. They're located inside the casino. Don't let them get disconnected.
Right you are old chum, but we do donuts too.
Ach, that's one of the Mark II safe models. We can't simply can't blast through it without destroying the contents.
Nicely done. Next, we need a detonator on those charges. Rig it up, won't you?
They're shootin' me up over here!
Shame to see such fine wheels go up in smoke. But if it gets the Commissar's attention...
Damn damn damn!

Hector!? What the hell!? I always though the Firestarter job felt a bit weird. The Mendoza's, maybe they weren't the bad guys after all. I mean, sure, they were rotten apples, but this fucking rat was far worse.
Assault wave is incoming, yeah?
All these dead locos, this is messy!
Good find. But you'll need more C4. Keep searching.
That computer station should have a laptop laying around. See if you can find one.
Ok, the concert is finished. Get those masks off, and blend in with the crowd. You should be able to walk right back out the front door. The van will be waiting for you.
I can't get the gate open if you don't cover me!
Get rid of the cops!
Remember, we need eight bags!
The Church of Scientology, how I can help you?
Shoot these fuckers!
Who is this? Who the fuck are you!?
Coming in at the back, my masked friends. I'll only stay a short while so bring me anything you want to secure, and do it fast.
Dunno what that is, but we got it. Now, back to the car!
The bank is up. Get in, get the loot and stay frosty.
... anything more than this is just bonus!
The comm frequency ain't here. Check the computer's in the control room across the dockyard.
The place is booby trapped!
Now just get that last piece connected to the safe.

All safely down? Great. Locate the crash site, and see if the pilot's still alive. If he is, you need to get him to a safe place. I'll get a chopper out to pick him up ASAP. A plane doesn't crash out here without causing attention, so you can expect company. Work fast.
That vault needs to be cracked open for us to get the artifact. Stick a drill on it, friends.
The EMP is charging again.
It will come in handy, I'm sure of it.
These bags look pretty fucked up... You got to treat our stuff with respect!
The case might have the explosives. Check it!
Glad to be out of that shithole. Fucking Hazelton. No place for a proper English gentleman, ya know?
Keep it moving in there.
Hurry up gang! Get to the limo!
Can I remind you that this chopper is grounded until it is refueled?
The heat's rising!
Hahahhaha! Stay like this. Gonna take a screenshot over the camera!
Keep looking for that safe, yeah?
You're messing with ME? Show me the money!
Ah, the door opens! Now, let us proceed into the inner complex with speed and violence.
Keep them away from the drill!
Two more, keep on searching.
You made a mighty big mistake coming here!
Bull's-eye. Point Break-down: get inside the house, find the lab, get the engine, get back to this airfield, escape. Good luck.
Alright, you leave us no choice but to come in and get you. We'll do this the hard way.
I've got a bad feeling about this.
Now you get paid!
Kill 'em!
This man can drive like no one else. You'll appreciate it when the pressure is on.
Our inventor's summer place. I guess big oil doesn't like this much.
Movement in the control tower, keep watching those windows.
Hey! Who the..?
Flare is lit. Alright, he sees it. Chopper is in-bound.
Nice. Now start her up.
Drill the door, you chops!
The piece of shit just crashed again. Reboot the scrambler!
Downstairs, brother. Go get a loan.
God damn it! They locked the containers! Must've been the alarms. Alright, we break through.
And... got it! Storage room is open. Get the keys.
Guys remember why you're there, we're looking for a tiara.
You see that bridge? I'm dropping the cage over there.
Die! DIE!
Ok, I'll circle around for a bit. I'll be ready when I'm needed.
Cover me while I open the gate!
Let me see, one, two. Yes, all here! Now, please use the cables to join me up here.
Excellent, you found a keycard. Now, head back to the train and open that sucker.
Guys, you got guards coming. Take them out before they find anything.
Guess the vault is gonna be in a Murky shipping container. Get opening them.
You gotta go back and search the mainframe again.
Well, it still hasn't exploded, so you can prep the last ingredient.
That's the last one! Perfect!
Hey, we're not done yet.
There's one!
They got me. But it's ok, just a minor flesh wound.
Okay, cop switchboard lit up. Think someone must've caught sight of you. Get ready!
We just did something people would have said was impossible. There's nothing we can't do, gang. Best of the best.
They are are climbing up the balcony from the front.
My associate is ready for you. Just go to the apartment to make the deal.
Shit! Bikers are on your case.
You are skilled and silent infiltrators. We should work together more often.
Get the timer going again.
Hey Asswipe! The Intercom!
aquÃ­!
Another vault?
I think we need to get into the prison.
Three gents eh? Come right in!
Kaboom, good work! Keep it up!
Everything's quiet. Nice. Track down the comm frequency.
Here it is. The Golden Grin Casino.
So that's 6 paintings.
Find the control box!
It's by the warehouse across the street. Gonna need a saw to open it though 'cause I lost the key in the commotion. There's one in the back.
Damn, another guard... and he's watching the server room. We don't have time for this. Just take him out.
That was the wrong tile!
Keep the cops off the circuit box. Don't let them shut it down.
Law is here, look out.
People, dock eight!
Damn! The time locks are locked down. Keycard's aren't worth crap now. Time to brute force the security panels!
Two
OK, no time to waste. The cops are right behind you, get the bags secured.
Like... a glooove...
You got to take me out! They're killing me!
I'm gonna kill you twice gringo!
How are those drills coming?
I gotta dodge.
All right! Thermite's done. Now get down there.
Looks like we've got a jewelry store that could use a little lightening. Call me.
OK we can't screw around anymore. Just get me access to the computer in the surveillance room, I'll deal with it remotely.
Ride or die - that was their motto. Well done. This intel will help us greatly. Study it closely before we hit the scientists house. Let's go get this fusion engine.
I guess that's the server room. Make note of it - you should find the cash first.
A saw? Good, that's gonna come in handy.
Great! Now keep the cops away from there.
Great. Now let's get her that GPS data. Find the computer to upload.
I've told you too much already.
Building schematics show a high-voltage box on the upper floor. If you can shut it down, the vault will be safe.
Two minutes. Hey, fuckface!
There he is!
Good, it's continuing. Keep an eye out, and keep defending...
Dmitri, motherless son of whore who framed me, is getting married. His bride preparing for wedding. Oh! Big perfectionist! Hoh!
... take these sons of bitches out!
The routine has been interrupted, get it restarted, yeah?
You've got tear gas incoming! Stay away from it!
Alright, the chopper is on its way.
Alright, that's enough...
Aw no, you aint trying to fool me, are ya?
All right. Now let's shift that loot before they realise what's happened.
It would give me a lot of pleasure to assist you.
You have to reconnect the power to the crane system!
Stay sharp, friends! They've activated a defence turret!
40 thousand dollars destroyed so far.
Man, these mercenaries have set up for war. There should be some explosives laying around that we could use.
You'll probably find a PC in the PR office.
Helicopters landing. Load up the engine and hope it is the one.
Bronson here. Tell me what you need.
Do it, people!
You got all of them? Shit. Fuck! Hector won't believe it.
Get up on the roofs, friends. Maybe you will see things clearer up there, yeah? You'll probably need a ladder to get up.
Secure the boxes on the helicopter.
The safe's open. Let's see what's in it!
That electric box controls the gate. Sure you could have it open in seconds.
This is not ideal. The FBI seems to have gotten wind of Vlad's... Weapon deal at the private airport. I know. We need to go there, retrieve the cases from them. Prepare for a real firefight, folks.
No other way out. Get into that container, gang. And hope the cable holds.
Alright, you find me. Great fun, my friends. Now, how about losing me again?
It's getting dangerous here!
Get up there and stop them, for crying out loud! This is a tragedy!
There you go, now do the last one.
Use whatever you got to open that sucker up!
What's... Hey! Don't fuck with me!
Ach, piece of kek dinges!
We've breached the fortress! Get inside!
There should be two of them.
Right, friends. Nice and quiet, yeah? First thing you gotta do is get past security. Go to the gate and have a look at the barriers.
Yo, we're outta here.
Three left.
If you don't want to steal more stuff, get onto the helicopter!
Alright, time for me to dash!
Hey, everyone! Don't forget the bags!
Boat's in transit, he'll be at dock 8 by the warehouse.
They're inside!
He bought it. The time has come to kill Mr. Sosa. Give him my regards.
It might be a good idea to look around before you go loud, maybe you'll find a better approach.
You just headbutted the motherfucking hornets' nest!
This won't end well for you, suckers!
The vault is protected by a laser gate, but no matter. You know what to do. Watch its sequence and time your run through.
A little hot in there, but you did good.
You have to keep tabs on Garrett in case he comes back.
Alarm's tripped, plan B!
Like an oiled machine, gentlemen - onwards.
Find some cover, warehouse looks defensible.
Well fuck me sideways - it's the motherfucking Payday Gang!
Get those batteries changed.
What the hell! Get down!
SWAT, SWAT on the balcony!
Vials break when they hit the floor, you know...
Keycards can disable the lasers. Keep an eye out for any.
OK, ready when you are.
Bravo! Now, why don't we get a detonator on there too.
Give him a whack over the head!
I gotta rush outta here!
Guys! You need to clear the roof!
You do the shooting, my friends, I'll just blend in a bit with my Murky Uniform. Don't get me mixed up, okay?
You guys are kicking ass and taking names!
Remember guys, this is for all the marbles. And the can, too.
Okay, here we are. It's show time.
Friends, I'm still trying to sort this. Hang in there.
Aw shit!
Now there's only one more door between you and the server.
That's it. Get up to the roof and light a flare to signal pickup.
Old Locke's not gonna do it for you. Get in there!
And now we wait for the vault timelock to run down. This is a secured site, you know.

Our next point in today's' agenda is that new door hinges will be installed in the men's lavatory. Please refrain from inflicting undue stress on them in the future. Agent Johnson's petition to have the doors lengthened to floor level is being considered for our next budgetary cycle.
Who's that ugly kakspul?... What the blerrie... is that...!? Ach! No time to deal with that now! Get out of there! Hurry!
Ok, that should do it. Now start the computer again.
Looks like the local Trustee bank had someone renting a whole lot of safe deposit boxes. Now I don't know what's in them, and don't ask how I know, but I think this is a bank job we can't miss.
What are you doing here!?
There he is. Locke.
Alesso has promised a legendary gig. I'm promising we'll deliver a legendary heist.
Hell no, don't try no games, amigo!
Nice catch! You are ready for this!
In case you don't have time to drill, use a shape charge if you have one.
That's gonna be useful, for sure. Now get back and burn it open.
There it goes. Let it do its thing.
Now get inside that vault, yeah?
You took care of both guards. Don't have to worry about the cameras anymore.
Hold on for dear life!
Conrol your civilians guys.
This is not the plan...
Boom! Great job, gang.
Looks like keys to an airplane or something.
Great, we got it!
Look out the window - Taxman is the guy in the white shirt.
Perfect!
There are so many stupid criminals in the world that to be smart is a relatively easy thing. It only takes deliberation where most would choose action.
Fuck these guys!
Nice, yeah. That torch is going to be useful later.
More snipers incoming!
Just keep yer lid on. Let me find all the files you need to sign off on.
Now make your way back to the car, friends.
I'm there in 3 minutes.
... put the delivery in the car!
All right, drop those thugs before they can steal Christmas. Then into the workshop.
The second box, friends. Find it in the mainframe.
OK done. Let's see what the crazy Russian got in store for us next.
Okay, here it is.
Now, see those lights? That's your path across. Stay on the path! Step on the wrong tile, and this gets messy fast.
Three more minutes, guys.
Looks like we got the shitty end of the stick. The vault's empty! Get out of there, now!
The fucking Hondurans found us! How did they follow us?!
Signal the blimp with the fireworks. Let's give the good folks of Vegas a show to remember.
Ach, I've got some bad news. They're shutting down the air space! You gotta get out of there ASAP!
There is a keycard, an arc cutter and a small number of breaching charges, that you must collect. Blasting in is crude, but it will help deflect suspicion from me.
Get the fuck outta here!
Well done, friends!
Making money ain't that hard.
That's it! Scan has been completed.Good job, guys.
There are more of them down in the street! Take 'em out!
I've got a helicopter coming in to pick you up. I believe you are acquainted with the pilot.
Looks like Hector's cooks are dead. We have to make the meth ourselves!
30 secs, guys!
He's coming in at dock 8, in front of the warehouse.
You are not going to get whatever it is you're after.
There's the boat. Hop in, my good friends! Let us take her for gentle cruise.
All right, the cops are inside. Quiet takedowns!
Okay. I'm at the gates. Meet me there.
See those lights? I'm sure they connect to something.
Just food for the rats now.
Hey, hurry up will you!
No time to waste, civvies could find you soon. Hurry!
Tiara is in that building, I'm sure.
Great work, crew! It got a little messy, but you finished it like pros!
Very good.
Commissar is throwing everything he has left! Even his damned gunship! Keep your distance!
All You Can Eat, remember. Just 18 bucks.
You got the second stash. Keep looking, two more!
They locked down the building!
Accessing now...
Wish we had a better idea of exactly what we're looking for.
Second keycard can't be far. Gotta be nearby. Keep looking.
I'm hit. But it just grazed me, I'm fine.
There's the entrance. Don't pussyfoot around, knock that front door down!
This will work as a frame - won't be fantastic, but we will get paid. Let's get you out!
Swipe Ralph's card before entering the code.
Good job! Now drop off the loot into the vent leading into the basement area.
Still gotta get your hands on the card.
Get the power to the server back on!
What the hell!? It's the cops!
The code we got works on the armory. Get in there!
This vault is loaded with cash! You can grab it all if you can handle it!
Can't do anything without power!
... we can forget about drilling our way through this. It would cause too much noise. Maybe we can find a way to hack it?
This won't take long. Don't let anyone borrow the keys to the truck.
Nothing stopping us from getting our hands on the EMP. Get back to the trains.
What the hell! Keep 'em off of me!
Catch!
You get that open.
Someone's having a bad joke, yeah?
Alright,18 more needed, come on!
Some pretty sweet snatch and grab back there. I bet they're going to invest in better security measures, or close. Not our problem.
Cops are through the front gate. Get ready.
Clear the area from cops so Bile can come in and pick you up!
Drop 'em!
The code will be stored on the auctioneer's PC, so get hacking.
Kill all those pieces of shit!
Attach the frame to the tree!
Come on! Fuck 'em up!
How'd you guys like to stay overnight in the Lincoln bedroom?
Yo, There's one!
Come on! Fuck 'em up!
There's one of 'em!
Gang, the computer station there could be useful. See if you can find me a laptop or something.
Maybe we can't swing the votes - but we can stop them from being cast. We hit the ballot machines at the mall.
Ooh, friends. Looks like rain is coming. Don't want to ruin those nice Murky uniforms, so get inside.
You might wanna look through some of the deposit boxes, could be something valuable.
OK, I can't stay here forever!
Holy shit, it's like a god damn warzone out here! I'm gonna stay here while you go around and do whatever you do. Find the parts and bring them back here.
Perfect! Get there and let's work our magic.
OK, get the bags into the truck! He is close to that yellow crane.
Hack the computer and see if you can find the code.
When that bail-out money comes through, I'm plating my desk in goooooooooold.
All right. There's one of the marked closets.
That is all, good.
He's here, throw in the stuff!
You made your last mistake!
The cannon is ready to fire, hit the button.
You should now be able to see the code. Get it, and go open the vault.
You do all the killing, yeah? I'm cyberwarfare, not a fucking commando. My uniform should keep me out of the fray.
Some twat sold me to the Feds, fellas. I'm sure of it.
Gonna send you to the lake!
SWAT moving in from Keel Street, to the north!
Fucking move it, guys!
See if you can find weak spot on the second floor, yeah? Use the scaffolding.
Just send the balloon when you're ready, buddies.

Well done, friends. Well done! We got our man back. Bain... is home. But the Murkys have done something to him. I've got some professionals looking at him right now and they say it's some kind of virus, maybe manufactured. If he dies... oh, blerrie Locke is going to be mad and make those Kataru pay...
Wait... we can't get into the lobby or Sosa's office. It must run on a separate system.
Keep an eye on the civilians.
I'm almost there, get ready!
Can't get the code without the keycard. Find the auctioneer!
That's close enough! I'll get it!
We're leaving!
Ship is being attacked. Defend and remove gangways!
R.G. here.
These code breakers can fall over sometimes. Stay with 'em till they do their thing.
Up there!
They just got your escape driver - your driver's dead! I need a plan B - hang on!
Bile is on the way with the chopper.
So me and the guys took the Longfellow up the coast. Hit a hundred on the i-95. Hit a schoolbus too. Screw those kids!
Barbarians are what you are! Barbarians!
Take'em out.
Damn! I forgot about the briefcase. Gang, listen up. There is a briefcase somewhere in the laboratory.
Keep looking for those winch parts, friends.
Great! I think I'll just keep mine in the bank.
I see the computer, and no guards. Lucky day.
Put the wares in the car...
Aw, these are your dedicated types.
We still need to find a blowtorch, gang.
Excellent, you got the explosives. Now, plant them on the radar.
Alright, now that you're in, let's go after the machines. Chances are they are sealed in crates, so keep an eye open for them.
You have to open up that ark-dinges.
Remember friends, we're doing this for Bain. Even if it's fun making Garrett go bossies, we've got to take down his plans.
Fuck!
Will those steaks ever be ready?
Ok, now for the server room... That laptop you found earlier should enable me to give you access. Go back there and hook me up.
Fuck 'em up!
Two more.
Your attention to detail is astounding.
Sons of bitches!
Police coming in hot. 30 seconds.
Kiff! Now, get into that vault room!
I heard he's working for the clowns.
OK, time to steal some cars.
The drill has stopped. Damn kerels!
You got the third stash. One more now!
Watch out, the bags are getting hot!
Haul ass to the pyro booth, guys. Top floor.
More will be coming soon.
Now, let's see what kind of damage we can do.
The stick should be compatible with any laptop around there.
Those wagons are bound for military decommissioning. One of 'em's gotta have C4.
That was a bulleye, yes! Now we can fly away and worry not a jot about being followed!
Three minutes. Cyclists! I'll cut your throat!
Okay, the convoy is close. Get in position.
She's all done! Quickly, down into the vault!
That chute there can transport the loot to the back rooms of...
Police signal's going nuts. They must've been deployed near the arena already.
Okay. Well, you know where it is, but I don't fucking know. Light a flare, yeah?
They're flushing that coke away. Gang, get up there before it's all gone!
This Payday Gang Cabot brought in... we sure this isn't their mess?
Kill these guys and bury 'em!
Look for a code that starts with nine.
So much value in such a small space.
Guys! Get to the boat!
That's great. Now protect them.
Damn it. Cops alerted. They are loading up.
Okay, time for the next step in our plan - the C4 from Bile. Wait, let me patch him in. "Bile, you there? We need the C4. How long?"
Run! RUN!
Hector was the one working with the feds!? That son of a bitch thought he could play us for fools. In the end, he's the one who was crushed, that dirty Colombian rat.
Just a minute more till I get there!
This will be a high-profile catch if the cops drop us. Don't let it happen.
Will you hurry up! All this coke going to waste, it's breaking my heart!
Doors are open for you, we are leaving!
Uh... Gang... Elevators are on the move. Expect company.
Any second...
No deal, assholes!
Gringo over here!
Vlad wants us to destroy a minimum amount of goods.
More snipers are moving in.
So, here's some good news and bad news. Bad news is my car died. Good news is that I had time to grab some diamonds from the trunk. They're in a storage unit nearby.
They don't know anything yet.
It's high time to find those three laptops.
Screw the alarms, guys. Just grab The Dentists' loot and we can be done.

You've really put the shits up Murkywater, man. They're moving a large portion of their cash reserves away from the East Coast. Heavily guarded cargo plane, yeah. For sure. It's gonna be most vulnerable when its in flight so I'm smuggling you onto that plane. Deal with the guards, open the cargo doors and let that money spill down. Hardly sounds like work at all, huh?
Are they cops? Are they fucking cops!?
They saw the broken window!
You just keep it up.
The daily code for the time lock on the vault. Should I send someone over?
Sure thing, boss. On my way.
Birthday boy Ralph is probably hiding somewhere pathetic.
Almost done hacking.
The coke is shipped out. Well done sailors! Go get you payday!
Seems the paintings are not enough. We must hit him harder.
Why do they think I give a fuck about their money? Why do they?
Turn the valve and unleash the cash. Banks up.
Hmm, that computer had a partial code to the vault. There must be more parts of it around there.
All right. Damn. Look, just pick up the phone. Let's wing this.
Gang, we need that firetrap by our escape. Use the crane controls.
Ah kak, they know we're trying to fuck off. They're going all in! Hold steady, friends!
I'll kill you!
Get to hacking that laptop, yeah?
Ok guys, time to leave the tower and get out of here. Move along the bridge!
Three more, at least!
The stones in cases are top priority, but grab whatever else you can.
Finders keepers, gang. Finders keepers.
Get me some tanning lotion will you?
Listen! That vault contains the prototype. It's in one of the crates. The others are decoys..
Use the keycard to enter the server room on the second floor.
...I... think.
I gotta bust out of here in one minute!
Take the coke to the harbor... Signal the boat with the floodlights and he'll come get it.
I've got a driver standing by. Eddie, that's your cue, get in there!
You need to prepare the next ingredient.
Saw those trucks open and find him!
So I said to him, you know, "it's Mitchell... it's not Michelle. Ain't no fucking Canadian!". You know?
What? That must've been the wrong tile!
Shit! Bollards are up?! Fix it!
The ladder and thermite are right there. Don't forget them.
Good work. That cage is how we move the money out. Start loading it.
We need his phone, his tablet, his laptop and two external hard drives.
The wheel stopped on drills. Do you guys know what that means?
I have an extraction plan. Go to the parking lot.
I think I see a PC in one of the meeting rooms through the secruty camera.
Outstanding! Now, get in the limo and end this. Or grab more loot. Your choice.
Two
I feel like I know you from somewhere. Post office? Come in.
He's headed up. Look for the stairways up.
OK, I gotta bail!
A civilian called 911.
SWATS are driving in from the west, on Pacific Drive.
That cannon's not going to fire without some juice.
Eey, que pasa?
Couldn't be helped my friends. Just business, you understand yeah?
Maybe I should start importing wine too! Vlad's Wines! I like the sound of it.
Authorities are trying to boost my bird. But injured civs don't pay so well. I'll be with you in 2.
Ach, you gotta get into that thing somehow. Wasn't really prepared for that.
Guys, I'm on my way back in!
Well, we didn't make him any promises about letting him live after seeing me.
State-of-the-art systems in here friends. Take a closer look at the vault!
Once you're out of there we can talk some more about what's going on. It's gonna get rough I suspect.
The roadblock worked and two transports have stopped. Get to work, and get 'em open!
Construction site - cops coming in.
Looks like we got the raw end of the deal here, the vault's empty! Get out of there, now!
Guys, hurry up! He's gonna sound the alarm in thirty seconds.
Things are looking very good for now.
What a house! You can tell the Sosas are making money. Let's hit this place - quiet or loud, the Butcher doesn't care how as long as you kill the guy.
You've disabled all cameras in the vault area. They're blind back there now.
Okay, now you can meet with the Insider. Get to the gates.
Okay, hacking the system now...
What the hell! Don't run away from me!
Get the bags to the van!
Guys, switchboards just lit up. Guess that's the alarm.
I'll fuck you up!
I know there's lots of fun stuff in here friends, but you need to aim that cannon!
Start moving the cash bags to the cage. That's how we get it out.
The roof of that diner can be accessed by a service ladder, but you're going to need a keycard to get to it. Surely there's one around somewhere.
Like a glove!
Deploy ECM Jammer and then lockpick the door.
Fucking shit!
The market for these cars demands they are in perfect condition. Keep it quiet, and you'll keep the cops away. Which means no bullet holes.
Make sure those straps are nicely fastened. Don't want Locke dropping the loot too early now.
Looks like we are doing this loud, gents! The panic room's locked down so we do this the hard way. Bile will get us a thermal lance. Hang on.
Oh...damn!
Yeah. So we have our work cut out for us...
OK, I'm in. Give me a little time.
Wait.. what... they've got additional security blocks. You gotta disable them. Find a security switchboard and rewire the system.
Right, while we wait, and if you want to get ahead of things, you can get yourselves to the roof. Got a zip-line to set up there.
... put all the wares in the car!
Get the power back on.
We're gonna make some fireworks on Green Bridge today.
The code begins with a six, according to my source.
You've come to the wrong neighbourhood, motherfuckers!
Ah, yeah, that. The Manager was just showing the system off to his new PA. Gonna guess the time lock isn't the only thing going to get an unscheduled activation.
Come on, get to the boat.
OK, good!
Alright, that's the jewelery store. Get me the required amount and be ready for anything!
You gotta get me into that computer system!
I'll be goddamned fucked. That pyro display was some sorry sack of shit.
We got 16!
Always be prepared.
Well, the front door's closed. No surprise. Look for another way in.
The truck isn't moving til you deal with that van.
I'll count down the time.

Ok, it's time to break this guy Kazuo out of prison so we can get the information he has on Kento. I engineered some ah... trouble... to get him transferred to another facility by convoy. We'll ambush that convoy and break the prisoner out. This isn't gonna be a quiet one, guys, we'll need to take extreme measures to stop the prison trucks. And, yeah, Kazuo doesn't know we're breaking him out, so boy is he in for a surprise!
Great, that should do it. Now try starting the computer again.
If you patch me into the security boxes to the storage room, I can unlock the doors to it.
What's taking so long!?
Nicely done. Now we gotta find out where Bain is being held. Make your way to the cell block.

There'll be a couple of keycards out there, maybe in the trunks of cars. They'll help you get silent access to the vault. Or you can forget that Mission Impossible crap and unleash Ragnarok. Up to you.
Open that second vault and you'll get a juicy bonus.
...Hack into a mainframe computer terminal and try to find some clue where to begin searching, yeah?
Just one more override.
The Brooklyn Bank has got something we need, and for once it isn't just cash!
OK, you heard the Captain. Find the computer. Enter the GPS coordinates. Let's get her moving.
I wonder how much trouble the Commissioner will get into for losing the box.
Dust is thick. Hard to see shit. I'm one minute out.
An access card. Great! That will help you get silent access to a railcar.
Now we need to get through the vault door. Two keycard terminals need to be activated, within a small window. Find two keycards.
Here's the dropzone. Stand by!
Boom! I caught it!
You need three colored digits to enter the armory. Or guess.
...Get those civvies under control, cop cars are about one minute out, friends.

OK, the airport is just down the hill. Cut through the fence and find the hangar where the truck holding the cases is. The Mendozas will probably be there. Go get those weapons or make sure they don't.
I'm there in four!
Get in the truck, all of you. There's cookies and candy inside, I promise.
It saddens me to see such beautiful hardware reduced to ruins, but it is a necessary evil. Now, our clean escape is assured!
We've got cops on the way, so don't dawdle. Find the C4! Check the guard room.
Quickly now, get the crane moving.
I'm here!
Thermite burns through enything - not as quickly as explosives, but much more silently.
Hurry!
There's ten seconds to get to the van so get to the van now.
You're looking for four bags of jewels minimum from this place. Easy.
Find the guest. Remember, he's a slot machine addict.
Ok, it's time to go!
Chopper's almost ready to pull out. If you want to cash out now, better haul ass, or stay and track down more coke.
Gonna buy you a one-way ticket to Deadville!
That should get the process going.
That door needs two keycards to open AND has a retinal scanner. Should be easy.
One down. One to go.
Eh, screw it. It doesn't look like you'll be able to pass him undetected. Take him out.
Low profile... You're doing well.
Don't forget - we need four bags!
Two minutes. Over.
Damn cops stalled the engine. Better get the pick-up moving again - quick!
It's free money, brother.
Sweet that is some good old loot...
Now enter the code in the safe.
Forget the alarms, gang, we're nearly done. Grab The Dentist's loot, and get it out of there.
Ok guys, you're in.
Get in there folks, bag that cash.
The BCI tech is supposed to be in a car in the front of the train, so that's your destination.
That drill isn't going to move itself, friends.
Well that's just 14 left.
Had myself a new Falcogini. Scratched it up driving out of a Time Out. Left it by the road, walked away. Ain't no-one got time for a scratched up ride!
Look for a code that starts with three.
Light up those tires, gang. Get some gas on them.
They're shooting at me!
The artifact, friends. Get it and go!
Make it count guys!
... I hope you're ready!
Look for clues connected to the Commissioner's wife.
This will throw a monkey wrench in the security works.
Put down the cocaine and deploy a doctor bag and heal up.
Second digit for the code. Now, just get the last number and we're set.
Find his server room and get in there.
Ahhhh, look at all that cash. Okay, fill your bags, gang!
Crash a pool party. Get paid. Not bad at all.
It's procedure. Who am I talking to again?
Fucking boxes everywhere. It's like that video game...
Stop those bastards from shutting down the cannon!
That's all we need. Up to you if you want to go for more.
Alright! The helicopter should be coming in soon!
Bekakin' kerels messed it up for you! You're going to have to start over.
Our rivals, the Mendozas, are fleeing like rats off a ship. They are still dangerous as any cornered animal. Protect our meth lab at all costs.
Congratulations on now having friends in high up places! Thank you for supporting your senator in such a direct way. I will not disappoint you!
URGH.
Guard is down. That's the cameras out of action.
When you're ready, raise the balloon and the pilot will swing by and collect.
Fusion reaction is confirmed - all good and green. You guys skip out of there !
Folks, the escape driver's coming in hot - he's gonna need some protection.
That's the alarm, but we got enough out of there.
Be serious, Dallas. Now, get inside and get that door open
Last chance to secure any loot in the tree!
... after this it's all extra!
We'll send you to the lake
You need to get that cage set up.
Can I come out yet? Are they gone?
Left gate activated. Now find another keycard, and let's get the other gate open.
The card? Take it! I don't give a fuck about the damn thing!
Do what you have to get the server. Just make it quick.
The owner likely keeps his in his office. The pit boss will be near the main hall. Security head probably keeps his somewhere near the locker room.
We can't use the lab anymore, it's gone. Take what you have and let's leave.
Thermite's done its job. Now hook that water pump up to the vault.
You got a SWAT Van coming!
Dont' let the cops near the routers.
Thats your way out of here! To the right and down the stairs, guys!
Maybe he'll get lost walking those 2 meters to the tree.
Yes, I assure your readers that the First World Bank is here to stay. We have strong investments the in Colombian submarine industry.
Ahhh! There's a valuable prototype in that vault. It's in one of the crates, and not in the others. Open them to find it.
Ey, over here!
Don't keep the chopper waiting, yeah?
Alright, throw me the bags and you'll get your money!
Ah, the elevator is broken! How inconvenient! Listen - since I can't get up, I need you to search for something important that they took from me. It's a metal briefcase. I must have it back!
Grab those bags, guys.

Superb. The cash is loaded on pallets, which are secured to the deck. Only the logistics officer can release them, and his controls are up above you - you see? To access them, you must get to the stairs at the front of the aircraft, and then return this way.
Hey! They're trying to fuck with us!
Just one more to go.
Man fuck these guys!
Nice job, friends, but you're only halfway there. Follow Boris. He'll lead you to a farm outside the city, where he can..you know...extract the coke. Protect him.
Expect me in 3 mikes.
30 more seconds more, then I'm out!
Have you gone through all the laptops yet?
Okay, I'm through. But it was really hard. I'm glad we're doing this. Truly.
Jesus, Bain. Like I would have forgotten how to get past a fucking fence? Anyhow, I'm through now.
OK, it's an early night. The bouncer looks unusually bright for a bouncer - see if you can get past him or if he needs convincing.
Found that lever yet? Should be pretty big.
Oh! That is more, that is good!
Guys they are fucking up more intel!
Got my file. Let's see what they have on me.
Chopper's got to leave soon. Hustle if you want to be on it, but it'll be back soon!
Blerrie, there's probably rats in the walls...
We blew the money.
Work your way up to street level, I have a van ready to get you guys out of there!
Pour it in.
The emp will give us a way in but it's primary function is to take care of the test subjects for us. If the stories are true, we don't want to take these guys on.
Tell the elves to work harder, or the only thing they'll get in their stocking is my fist in their ass!
Are you fuckin' havin' a laugh? There's a server missing. The log says it was taken to IT for maintenance. We need that server.
That's it, gang. Fourth floor complete.
This is it, gang. They're throwing everything they have in to this. Get out of there!
We got the address - problem is we did not get any intel. This means we are coming in hard and with no info on what to expect. Time is ticking - let's get up the mountains and steal this engine.
Move to the parking lot for extraction.
There's one of 'em!
Start collecting extra loot if you want to friends, it's time to get you out of there, yeah?
OK, that was some serious crawling around you guys did. Money secured though. I'll send a team to clean up. You stay low.
This is not going to end well if you don't let me go.
Boat here, I got the signal - coming in.
Speed up!
Great. Now get back to the terminal and restart that download!
What the FUCK!?
Got those sentry guns set up yet?
Okay. Now help your friend Locke. Light a flare. Show me where the money is.
Hurry friends, you need to get into that computer.
Next, set a fire trap in container 12.
That's the armor of Oda Nabunaga. Bag the pieces. If that's genuine...
This is the boat. I see the lights, I'm on my way.
Best of luck with your boss and all guys.
Wait for Santa to get into the tree!
Nice! All right, great.
How the fuck did they know we were gonna be here!?
That's one card entered, but the vault needs two. Keep looking.
Chopper is here. Stow any bags. You can ride out now, or you can stay and find more coke. Your decision.

Alright, now, this is your safe house, this is where you spend your time off duty. It's not much at the moment, but give it some time. I'm working on it. I'll let you do some decorating yourself soon.

Friends! It's Locke. I know you got little incentive to trust me after Alaska, but sending you there was the only credible ruse we had time for, to get you out of DC. People Bain used to think could be trusted... were listening. And now he's gone... we knew something was going to happen but not when or what. Keeping you in the dark was my call, not Bain's. Never thought they would actually be able to go after him. Look I realise it's a kakspul to hear, but you got out with the guns I left, yeah? I'm sorry about Bain... we'll deal with it... but first we have to get you out of there. Please trust me guys, I'm not bekakin ya. I promise I'll prove it.
You have been warned. Surrender or we will shoot to kill.
Cops coming up on your west side. Construction site.
Maybe do some shopping while you wait?
Blast a hole in the floor of the Gambling Hall. That'll give us access to the vault.
Yeah it's chloride, hydrogen chloride.

I've traced the truck to a warehouse out by Goose Island. It's a distribution depot, contracted to ship the voting machines to their final destination. With a little technical wizardry, we're going to make those machines a bit more sympathetic to The Elephant's mayoral candidate - that slimy ballbag McKendrick. Get in there, get them hacked, get out - simple. Once again, The Elephant is extending his stealth bonus if you can keep it quiet.
Check the files, whiteboards,walls... everything...
There's no juice in the office, friends. You gotta hook it up again!
Make sure you don't raise the alarm though.
That's another attack helicopter guys! Stay sharp!
I can arrange for this keycard to be left where you indicate.
Get those doors open! The switch is right there!
We can get to know each other over whiskey and cigars later, because I feel that now would be the perfect time for a getaway, yes?
Keep it up and we're going to pull it off.
God damn!
...Situation looks this way.
Shit!
The train's ready for the cargo. Check the wagons. Probably loaded. Might find something worthwhile.
Shit!
Oh, that safe looks like it could hold some etra loot for us. Get it open!
The process is done! Bag it up, and let's do another round.
Yes! Good, there are the safes. My babies. My 400lb babies. They'll break your backs if you try to carry them away. Look for a transport.
If you don't get me up and running, we're in serious trouble, yeah?
Make sure the cops don't do that again. Keep it running!
Proper planning prevents piss poor performance.
Well, it's a keycard, and pretty damn useless now. Maybe if you'd found it earlier...
More units, more guns coming your way gang!
Cool, that's half of it!
Get back in there and find the laptop we need.
We have SWAT on the adjacent roofs. Dig them out.
Re-wiring the surveillance systems will afford you greater protection.
Aw, fuck me sideways!
The boss just called and he's pissed. Got a guy comin' to get us but you should probably bail. I'll make sure you get your cut.
You took too long. Gotta go back and hack it again.
Harvest & Trustee. My contacts says it's juicy as hell. In and out. You with me?
Jesus, that bastard wasn't playing around, was she? Take the keycard she dropped.
Dallas, sneak past it and look for the security room. Life will be easier if we disable all cameras in the building.
That's all of the cash!
OK, place the C4 on the gate.
Can't do anything until you hook me up guys.
Now do the other one.
Keep moving - get down to the garage.
...I... Yeah, OK it's a goddamn ambush, strap on your guns folks!
See if Garrett is chop enough to have the code in plain sight.
In this case it can be wise to "spot" your target to keep track of its movements.
Don't let them take your money bags!
... Are you having second thoughts or what?
Ok, let's see how he reacts to this.
What are you waiting for, you chops? Get to the Oval Office!
What's the hold-up?! Get that hose re-attached already!
Paydirt! That's what we came for, gang. The drill is on its way.
We know he is in West End somewhere. Look around for anything related to it. Files, maps. Remember: West End.
Here's what I want you to do:
One down!
Damn. We don't have enough product to trade, which means we're in a tough spot. Let's keep it quiet and go to Hector. We'll see how it goes.
Great! Now you need two more - at least two more bags to make Hector happy.
Ship's there. Get on it!
Get back to the control box and shut it down.
Come on, keep looking. Have you checked every roof? I know it's in the area.
Cops all over the street!
Ah crap, cops stopped turning the bridge. It needs to be restarted. One of you, get on that!
O'boy, here they come!
See if you can find the keycards to get in there, otherwise we have to drill the doors.
Ok friends, you're going to like this! A little smash and grab in the dead of winter, yeah?
That's one. Get the next!
...You gotta find the security boxes that control the doors and run a bypass on them.
Three down, just one to go!
Well done.
Armory accessed.
Sweet sweet cash! Now bag it!
PEOC maintenance, we are currently unable to assist. Please try again later.
Quit messing around and get out of there.
C'mon friends, get onboard!
Thanks, here's the cash!
We're taking a lot of risks!
Just a little longer.
Quickly guys, find him and take him out!
There will be a computer in one of the staff rooms that we can hack. Find it.
Should be OK to enter the vault now.
You're spotted! Fix this.
Something happened, seems Matt crashed his car. Keep going and you'll catch up with him!
Restart the drill, friends.
Great job! Head over to the escape area and drop off the EMP bomb.
No need to catspaw about now. Get inside!
They used a bus to smash right through there!
That's it! Great job, gang.
Now wait for the winches to work. And make sure they're not interfered with.
C'mon man, either get me or send a cab.
Could be the cartel...
I hate to bother you,I really do, but finding the crates is our primary objective.
Those cameras won't be a problem anymore!
I thought we lost that damn helicopter in the tunnel!
Adios muchachos.
Away from the gate! Hustle it!
I found the keycard.
Alright, you found him! Now get him to the top of that tower!
One minute.
Excellent, guys. It actually feels nice knowing we did something good. But don't get any ideas, we're robbing a bank or something next.
Flip the switch, we need to signal the boat!
Light the fireworks, and stand back.
You must have shit for brains, coming here!
Make the tree come alive, with snow!
Do it, shoot the wires!
Hehe, ho-wow! You party like a real Russian. Mhm! Haha. Now spend money and come back to me when ready to take on bigger things. Yeah... Vlad is growing.
That traitorous dog!
When did you guys go losing those?
You're missing out on a golden opportunity.
Reset the power lever, quickly!
Good work people. Sneaky, message received. The loot's gone, and Vlad will definitely be climbing the guys to fear list.
I can't fucking shake 'em!
Great, all cameras are dead.
The Dentist just clued me in - the Commissar likes to keep his best loot in the basement. Look around the ground floor rooms for something that might be an entrance.
Should be a higher security type of door, look for a Gensec logo.
What the hell, I'll do you guys a favor.
You need to check the rooms, friends!
OK. Go in, find the right truck and then the ballot machines. Once you do, reprogram them to swing votes and head back with the Gensec loot. This is two heists in one. Enjoy.
Now the fun part - steal a car! I'll blast the road - take cover!
Getting some unusual interference on the network, but I'm almost there.
Hope you guys are holding up in there. Three trucks have pulled over. When the doors open, get at them!
Russian's got a bit of loot stashed around the place. Not going to make us rich, but every little helps.
This will distract the guards in a way I'm sure you will find very useful.
Come on, move, they're locking you down!
I admit I thought it would go this well.
We gotta clear the bollards. I mean you. And by you I mean hey assholes.
The evidence that Hoxton spoke of will be in that lock-up. Look for it. It should be marked out.
OK, the data is scrambled! It'll seem like just a normal data failure.
This algorithm will wreak havoc on their servers.
Drop 'em!
Oh fuck me sideways!
Thats four, we're good to go now. If you want to get the rest of the paintings thats up to you.
That was the last components, now mix it all together.... carefully
OK, it's in!
Clever.
I gotta admit it's been awhile since I broke into a place this loudly. It's gonna be jol!
This leads all the way to the beach, crew!
Ok got the callback, everything is clear. Last step. When the timer is done - it's time to cash in.
Jump down into the hole that the thermite melted through!
Can you take the snipers out?!
What the fuck! Don't leave me here!
Thanks, here's your cash.
Not a cop in the world saw this one coming. Russians will be furious and Vlad will OD on vodka. Let's get paid.
Feds or no feds, we need that intel! You'll have to search the apartments! Look for safes!
I'll have the system down in a bit.
We know the Commissar called us from Georgetown. Look for something related to that place. Georgetown.
You still gotta hack into those access points.
Chopper's here, guys. Start hauling the loot.
Move it, guys. Find the locker room, and we find the armory.
OK, now you need that keycard. Find our birthday boy Ralph, he's probably still hiding somewhere!
Now check the screen for the code, then go and open the vault.
For fucks' sake! Lads! The power!
There's sleeping gas too. Grab it. You'll need it later.
You need to find keycards. My guess is that the buildings are your best chance.
Where is it!
Check the stores if you want some extra money.
You need to get the computer running again!
I'm putting you down here. Get ready to clear!
Good job, gang. With the snipers gone, Bile will be able to make the drop.
What the fuck!? Cops!
Do I need to remind you? Cocaine, worth a fortune, is being destroyed as we speak!
You people are wasting your time.
One more and you're done.
I'll be there, one minute!
We got twelve. Twelve bags!
You need to get Santa up the tree so he can fly out with it!
Fight like I know you know how to fight!
One minute, gang! One minute.
You're still golden.
This is fine, we'll take it.
OK, chopper's pulling out. Hope you stowed some loot. It'll be back though. Try and find more of Vlad's coke.
Stop destroying my things!
More C4. Not quite enough. Keep searching.
Good job, the rat is dead, escape helicopter is waiting, unless you want to try to go for the money in that bus, get to the chopper and weÂ´ll get you the hell out of there.
You'll see the truck any second. Just drive up into it, and we're done!
The escape driver is coming in by boat to pick you up. Make sure you are over by the small water access near the river.
Dallas, your little brother should give my name back and call himself Houston.
I trust you have had a vacation worthy of real heisters. You worked hard, you needed it, but you are needed once again.
Looks like someone called the cops! Guys, protect Charon!
Don't be scared. Just jump!
Police should be here in 20.
OK, keep hidden from the neighbours view people. Let's not have anyone call the boys in blue.
Blerrie! The kerels got to the winch!
You got the first stash. Keep looking!
They're upping the ante with snipers!
Chopper's right on top of you. Can you see it?
There's an offer on the table. Not enough in Locke's humble opinion. Let's hold out for more, yeah?
Ey, don't mess around...
Don't take your eyes off that cannon.
Nice! Comm frequencies for the Moretta. This will be useful later on, but stay focused.
No one fucks with me and lives!
Then back to the escape van and bang, we're rich! Go with grace.
A good move.
I can't stay for long!
You can't stay there!
You gotta restart the drill!
This isn't a war folks, in and out.
OK good. Let's find that server room.
That crate is sealed tight. Maybe there's something you can use nearby to crack it open, yeah?
Look, Mother Superior, you either pay the $300, or we're breaking your legs!
Gentlemen...
One of BFD's coolant tanks is empty. She needs that water, guys. Grab a refill from the bathrooms!
You see the button there? All you need to do is press it.
I like what I'm seeing in there.
Gang, the EMP needs to charge up before we can use it. It will take some time.
Walls and router boxes. They go together like trouble and badges.
Good thinking, boards will slow them down.
We're gonna make your rest of your life real short!
You heard the man! You can either steal more things or you get on that bike and ride! Ride like the wind!
You already found the bomb. You can leave the containers alone!
All projects run here are temporary, so a lot has changed.
Can't do anything until you help me through.
Keep them off the routers.
Sorry, that wasn't right.
Fall back!
You bet on the right spot! There's the vault!
Raising security door.
... Put the product in the car!
Nice, that's a quarter!
Gentlemen, the C4 is on the roof.
Blerrie, they took the hostage out from under your noses! We've messed this one up good!
That's one. Remember the number AND the color.
There's got to be lot's of good stuff we can use or sell around here, so keep your eyes peeled for anything that might be good to take along.
The deal's off!
No cops on the drill, guys!
Alright creeps, that's it. Dead or alive, your coming with us.
He's back and already cleaning out my drinks cabinet. Korva. Anyway, you boys did good. You earned this.
Good job, everyone. That chop gave us an OK bundle of money to take home, but next time maybe we'll do better.
Zero!
Alright you chops, time to act nice and casual. Take off your masks and walk calmly out of there.
Laptops... can be very useful but you got to... find them.
Patching in Vlad...
Just hold them off a little longer, gang. I'm finding you a way out.
Deal's off!
If you don't have a door, you make one. Time to use the blowtorch.
That radar is controlling the anti-air gun. Need to blow it up.
Yeah, I'm there in just a minute.
C4 is on the ground. Grab it!
Hello? I can open the gates, but we can't go using my code on the keypad. You need to find another.
Guys, the turret - take it apart.
Now I need to install some software to scramble the system.
Kill 'em!
Head in the game, guys. Look for the closets marked with the X.
I need to open this door. Give me a minute!
Have you found the control panel yet?
Dwankie politicians... hiding the doors to important places. Tear the place apart if you need to.
That memory stick has gotta be somewhere in the West Wing.
You're in civilian mode. No guns, no masks - invisible to security. When you're ready, find your gear. Micho the janitor left it in a guitar case somewhere.
Hey, I think that gas station is on our friend's books. There's C4 in the DeLorean. Fetch it. Time to go big.
There is a lot of construction in this area. Check it out and see if you can find something to help us tackle that steel gate.
Okay, the blimp is on the way. Just give it time.
Get to the archaeology room.
Fantastic! No time to lose, though. Fire it up and get felling those trees.
Just a few more steps, gang. The ladder is right ahead.
Guys!
You need to find the materials.
More than we agreed on, huh? How nice of you.
Found a laptop for you guys.
VR? What the fuck is that?
OK, the Moretta is free to move but we gotta convince the Captain. Find the comm frequencies. I'm betting one of the computers there has it. I'll convince the good Captain to fire up the engines.
Our Insider can show you the way out. Find her.
Ach, you've gone and set of the detectors!
Ah, you got it wrong. Maybe bringing hazmat suits would have been a good idea. Wait until it stops reacting, then try again.
Your reputation for being punctilious is well deserved.
You gotta get the lights back on quickly.
Your mall visit paid off. Fire and glass - like music for Vlad! I now protect again, and money... Money will be good. You have done favor. Spasiba.
Nice! Get it to the van.
Now get to the safe and open it up.
Get into the store, you know what to do! Let's get those jewels.
Gonna spill your blood everywhere!
I gotta go in a minute!
You just headbutted the motherfucking hornets' nest!
Mask on and move! Hustle!
Was banking on you saying yes. I'll try again later.
That's the balloon up. Great job.
You need to get that bypass going again.
Out! Out of the bus now!
Ok, I'm in. Give me a second.
Find some gasoline so you can set the vehicle on fire.
I'll be here tomorrow as well. Come by and we'll talk.
They're inside, take them out quietly
Now we need those passwords.
Over there. The First World Bank. Okay, get out and get to work.
The chopper can't land until you take out those turrets. Find the control boxes and disconnect them.
That's 5.
We're good, escape's clear!
Payday Gang, we have received the hostage and have authorized release of the payment.
There we go, I'm connected. Just... a... feeeeew....
Then we can go ahead and get you guys access to the back office, where the vault is.
Damn kerels have cut the power to the terminals. Find the power box and get it back up!
What the fuck do you think you are doing?
Hurry!
Perfect, now grab those stones.
Is the pickup coming? This is getting pretty hot!
This isn't a request. Get your ass into position for a roof pick-up, or I'll see whole squadrons of F-16's scrambled in your direction!
Perp is in custody, over.
Thanks a bunch fellas! See you at the warehouse!
OK, listen up, a contact will get you out through a nearby subway station.
Wrong code, friends. Wait until it resets, then have another go.
What the fuck's happening!?
Could be those safe deposit boxes have some extra valuables we can use, yeah? Maybe you can get into them while you wait for the vault to open?
Cloakers on the way, sneaky bastards!
That's the stuff. Get it to the van.
Who are these fuckers?
With all the ruckus going on, I reckon the White House aids will have gotten sloppy. Maybe have a look in their computers to see if you can find something.
Almost open!
Yeah, it's ten thousand dollars a day.
Those lights... gotta mean something.
The rat! Kill him!
You still got your old reflexes, old friend. Quickly, get these bodies out of sight.
I will meet you on the edge of town, but I don't want you bringing the whole fucking cop army. Get in the sewers. I've organised transport.
The door required has a keycard lock, and a retinal scanner. Jeez.
Stop screwing around, guys! Now you gotta grind through metal doors for ages.
Damn, they interrupted the scan! Restart it!
I saw a conveyor chute over there. Throw the loot in, and it'll shift it to the lobby.
Alright, fuck it...
Come on, Dentists' loot is right there.
I know that was a lot of money to send up in smoke and I apologize, I know it goes against your nature, but hopefully you find the compensation competitive.
Get the lance working on the door. Burn through to that snitch!
The mercenaries are gonna come at you hard! Protect the EMP, gang!
You know the drill!
Get to Twitch, he's in the parking lot!
Let's keep this one under the radar.
The archives will hold the blueprints. Check the staff areas.
So, next step iiis...
Dear friends, we're going to New York for a quick bank job.
Left? Right? Where to go? I dont know! Hahahah!
He spends more time in the dirt than his momma. That nickel whore!
Can't shoot that cannon without more juice, replace the batteries.
He put it inside his shirt.
Remember guys, we need at least one bag to escape.
One down!
There's valves that control the sprinklers, turn them on!
When that fat bail-out comes through, I'll maybe buy a boat. Always wanted to sail the Spanish Main.
... help! HELP!
Right friends, get ready. And don't forget- Murky has their top men in this place, so don't dally.
Ok, it's like I thought... blerrie amateurs. See if you can find that USB stick.
Oh, guys... I hope it's free service.
Watch your step down here.
Hey, what happened? Ah, shit - cops interrupted the vault. Get it going again. And kill the fucking cops.
Excellent choice.
Oh, and you should probably get us some weed too.
Did you forget about the alarm I mentioned earlier?! You needed to disable it!
And... we go!
And... Got it! Well, looks like our Russian friend is somewhere in, hold on...
Power's down. Get BFD reconnected, gang!
C4 that wall, gang! We're making our own escape route.
Here!
Who sent you? Wait, don't tell me. I will enjoy extracting it from you. As I will enjoy extracting your fingernails.
The game is on, motherfuckers!
Don't throw anymore, it's full. Wait for me to unload these first.
Two minutes to pickup. Hold on guys.
Definitely setting up a sniper team on the roof. Careful.
The convoy's stopped, move toward the bus.
Guys, you still need to secure the EMP at the escape area.
This is the Storage Room. Check for a keycard. Might be a radio here too.
It's on the fourth floor.
You guys are made now, go to plan B!
Jackpot! I've got a plan to pry that baby open. I'll contact Bile right away. He's going to drop something sweet.
Boom! That's how it's done. I hope the CIA were taking notes. Now book it.
I see one!
Kill everyone!
The hole in that floor isn't going to get bigger, by itself friends!
It's the keycard, for all the good it will do you now. Might have helped us avoid the alarm, but stay focused!
It should be hydrogen chloride!
Keycards will swiftly get you through doors that would otherwise require brute force.
Empty the safe!
You fellas hit harder than my first wife.
Two blocks away!
Ok it's the toy store - Tin Boy!
That's 18!
All right, nice work! Now get to the container. Drop the gas can there.
Our pilot has ditched his plane. That asshole! Time to adapt, gang!
Ok guys, if all goes to plan, we should be able to leave unnoticed. Just slip away with the crowd.
The keycard grants us access. Use it to open the door.
Bang, that's another explosion!
Boat's standing by to get you out, guys.
Bunch of kakspul! I lost power. You gotta get me back up again!
Money and Mendozas up in flames. You made a statement and Hector's going to like it. Payday coming up.
They stole the bags!
Tight in here...
OK, we need that key. Look for someone important, like an FBI boss. Get the key from him!
What the hell! That crazy chopper is back.
Get inside the mansion, move!
You need to find the right storage unit!
You need to cover me while open the gate!
You need to get to the toy store and find the Tin Boy toy box with the coke.
I... don't know where we are...
Keep going damnit!
Check roofs, buildings, car parks - all those kinds of places. That pallet is around there somewhere.
Gang, there's a construction yard across the river! Got a truck parked up. Reckon it's our best way out. Sending you C4 now. Protect the safes!
The clock on the wall's running down fast. Grab the loot and toss it into the vent!
Van driver has bailed. Never mind him. OK, I'm getting you a chopper. Stay alive.
Got to move!
Get the cocaine from the van!
Good job, friends!
That console panel should control all the cameras in the building. Use it and see if you can locate the computer that way.
OK, onto the next thing.
Good job. Now go to the fifth floor and finish the job.
You know what, I can't stay here forever!
It might be worth to check the maintenance tunnels.
Time to leave the PEOC.
Those C4 bombs, use the code on them!
Go to the corridor outside the server room!
Gang, don't forget to crack those containers. Drill 'em!
Time for a short breather. Wouldn't do us good if I collapsed with Bain.
What are you waiting for? The vault is open.
Where's the stuff?
Your drill is there. Get it started on that vault.
All right, now start stashing that money in the vent!
Every year around christmas I get a little nostalgic you know. Old times, old enemies.
Hey! I think I see it. Yeah, that should be the computer we're after. And I think it's close by.
Chavez won't have any use for that coke anymore, so take it if you want.
They're not letting us go!
Those guns are gone! Keep that fire burning.
Find a tool, then open the crate.
What the fuck do you think you are doing?
I'm getting nervous, guys!
Another cop car have arrived to help out. You know how to deal with them.
Okay, both holes are drilled.
Get that back to the drop.
The Velvet Room. Search it for a PC ASAP.
That shitty network will transfer the databases faster if you can keep the cops from pulling the plug on it.
Come on now...
At least seven more.
Use that keycard on the manager's office.
Damn! The containers got locked when the alarm was triggered. Gonna have to drill them.
The fuck do you think you're doing!?
... and then we'll give you what you're after.
On second thought - we'll take everything you have!
Get that gold up to the roof, put it in the bag on the zip line, we are bringing it home!
Ok, now you gotta get inside the office and get the code. Move over there fast, yeah?
Damn it, gang! You have less than a minute now!
There's one of 'em!
Ok, you're at the top now, right? Have him buckle up in the chair, then release the balloon. The plane will be there any minute now.
Got it! That was some outstanding flying, if I say so myself.
There you go friends.
This is it. Get the safe open.
Remember guys, we need at least two bags to escape.
I'm sure Vlad wanted some more blood but this was clean and mean. The Russians will know they got hit by pros. See you back at the safe house.
Good work! The metal detector is off.
OK great, onto the next thing.
Gang, don't forget - you need to light a flare before Locke will come in.
Free every sailor you can.
... when it's done, we'll give you what you want.
Roger that, Broadsword. If I don't make, tell my wife she's-
...I'm 86% sure.
Yep, this is it. Get it open.
FBI is still sleeping. Keep this up boys. Carry that loot out of there...

Robbery time. Get the thermal drill stashed in the parking lot. Then it's up to you. I don't know what we're gonna get here but remember: keep the civilians in check, don't let 'em use alarms or phones. See you at the safe house.
OK, I'm waiting for you!
You'll never carry those out. Gonna need a transport, and a way out. Give me a minute, I'll find something.
Almost there.
The Commissar is dead, and subsequently the District Attorney is mine. You are one step closer to the release of your friend. I will be in touch.
Don't get distracted by the beautiful little town. You're looking for a fuck-ton of money, friends.
Alright, I'd say it's time to get blastin'. Put your masks on!
Secure as much loot as you can. The escape vehicle is leaving in three minutes.
... I'm back in a little while!
Bile's on his way with the chopper!
Yeah, I want a lift-off, people. Haul ass!
The streets are crawling with cops! Not getting out that way. Light a flare and I'll bring in a chopper.
There's the way out, gang. Fresh air awaits.
You let them take the hostage, you chops! It's over, we gotta get you out of there.
Bombs away! Oh man, that hit hard! Yeah!
Heads down, they're rolling out a sniper team!
Here!
Damn! The cops have blocked the tracks up ahead, which means you need to be gone before you reach that point. Get the BCI tech and run back to the chopper!
Houston, come here. Shh, keep quiet.
That's 40 thousand, only ten more to go!
Guys! Every time the mercenaries mess with the EMP, the charging process decreases! Don't let them touch it!
I can't open the gate while they are firing at me!
Let me check my records. Yes, I mentioned that the charges must be dropped near the door.

This Harvest & Trustee branch bank has its weaknesses. Case it so you can find out where. You're going to need to get into the vault using a thermal drill, get whatever's in there bagged up and moved back to the escape car. Use your judgment and don't be greedy. Remember bank cameras usually have security rooms, but I guess you know that. Good luck, folks!
What the fuck is this!?
... put all the stuff in the car!
That's the first pallet. All right, good. Now, onto the second.
Keep an eye on that hose. Let it fill the vault.
You've seen this vault type before, not too long ago. Some nitriogen would crack it, but we'll have to get in some other way.
Leave the damn goats alone, clowns!
You'll have to move fast when the chopper arrives. It can't stay long with this amount of heat.
Sorry.
Okay guys, keep it together. Get him.
Yep, that's the inventors address. Beautiful.
Do the thing. This isn't your first rodeo, people. Be smart in there.
I have to leave in two minutes!
All right, I'm here. Now get the goats in!
Ladder's electrified. Disable it at the power box!
That's how I would have done it too.
Right, now let's see if he took the bait.
Pigs are all over the powerboxes, gang. Keep the power on!
Hey, hold your horses. Take this blowtorch. You're gonna need it to get inside.
Find the truck leaving for the mall. Slap the GPS on it and slip away. We'll ambush the truck later, I promise.
Haha, it worked! The guards in security are sleeping like babies. Don't worry about cameras now.
When you have enough bags, let the balloon go, and stand back.
Don't think that rug should be there. Likely hiding a hatch. Remember the room - we'll come back here.
A good driver is the backbone of any extraction plan. Be sure to invest accordingly.
Find those batteries, friends.
We have to hurry! The cop's radio is buzzing like crazy. They're already on their way!
Don't run away again, little goat.
Man, aren't we feisty today?
Hurry up! It's just one minute until take off!
There could still be office personnel working, so keep your eyes open, yeah?
Bile, you ready to come pick up the cargo?
What the fuck do you think you are doing?
What now? A bluescreen? Ach!
Two wall-mounted router boxes control the vault security system and each one needs to be hacked separately. Once you're in, I can do the rest and shut down the system from here.
Hold them in position.
... make sure you're ready!
The cops are on our tail!
I don't like this, and I like my money back. You go there and take it! And show them what goes for disloyal countrymen!
Hi. I just saw a show, and the bank got robbed, and I want to move my money to a bank that doesn't get robbed.
It was loud and got attention. Excellent work. Tough for Gensec though. Their new design is a joke.
That's it! Now get it out and we can close this caper!
Damn, BFD is bust. You need tools to fix her up.
Your back's against the goddamn wall!
He knows who butters his asshole. The boss will bring him back.
That's one of the machines. Get the hack started, and make sure the cops don't interefere with our little political sabotage.
These chicks, you know, you know how much that is? Each day? But hey, you know, it's worth it.
And another one bites the dust! Nice!
You're all dead men!
The bastard bought it. Get in there and kill him.
Now get that key to the door. Go do work.
You couldn't stop yourself, could you? Well, the world's a better place without that bastard, but Wick will be disappointed he wasn't part of it, so you better leave the other one for him.
Almost there....
Excellent, gang. With the anti-air defenses gone, Bile can now drop the EMP close to the lumber mill.
Alright, looks like we have... 11...12 prototypes. See if you can find some clues around here that could indicate which is the working one. Then pick it up and get it to me.
Starting to feel like a nagging nanny here... so find that laptop.
In some situations, an extra medical kit may be the difference between life and death.
Bank robbers win!
Come on, guys, hustle it. You need to move fast to pull this off.
This place will have cameras. Be careful.
Get over here!
I'll be there in two...
Tank's dry. Going to refill.
Thats one keycard, we need two - keep looking.
You have a small army on the - no, wait, you have the Army on its way. The van can't wait. Hustle!
I got one!
Make your way to the boat.
Our C4 has been stashed in supply closets marked with a red X. Find them.
