No cash and no info. I'd call this one a miss. Hector's going to be very unhappy unless you guys pull my ass out of the fire. I know it's a lot to ask.
This will be over fast if you don't get out of there!
That's the vault, fo' sho'.
They're on us like fucking flies on a turd!
Alright, the parking lot behind the bank is where the pilot is expecting to pick up the cage. Have it ready.
Loud or quiet - your call. But if we can stealth this, we'll be able to blend in and escape with the crowd. Nice and easy.
Good, now plug it into one of the laptops.
The wagons would have had a ladder. Look for it.
You gotta get those posh dwankies under control!
OK. So listen - our client is a little jumpy. He doesn't do things involving, you know, lawbreaking otherwise. So we need to have all of you in the train.
Encryption keys downloaded.
You need to get back to the entrance so that I can pull you out of there.
We got twelve!
OK let's do this one.
Twitch here.
You need to move to the skylight.
I see one of 'em!
You need to complete the formula, prepare the next ingredient.
Secure the loot bags in the motorboat you arrived in.
Careful!

The lunch-time crowd at Sherping Memorial Park usually don't see anything more exciting than a pigeon taking a crap, so put a good show on for them, gentlemen. You got Gensec trucks and the strongboxes inside to deal with.
OK, make your way inside. Keep it quiet.
I see one of 'em!
I'll be following you through the head cameras as usual. Watch your step.
You opened the last truck. Check inside!
Say your prayers and say 'em fast!
My good friends, Vlad needs a bit of help with domestic issue, if you understand, a little robbery.
Alright sit tight, I'll be there in two!
Remember: you need to find some gas and get it on the tires!
Aluminum and iron oxide... Beautiful.
C4 those truck doors, gang. Hurry!
Help the citizens of DC to vote right. We need to find the ballot machines in the harbor and intercept them before they get deployed. The machines must swing votes to me!
Now, the keycard I left for you. That large door has two security stages, and an airlock beyond. The first is using the keycard. So...
Guys, I think this is a fucking tow-away zone!
You're keeping it quiet. Great. Now, the radio.
There we go! Now go grab that artifact and move!
Throw it into the truck, we'll deal with it later!
The chopper's coming to the lumber yard - be ready!
Something's wrong with the drill. Start it again!
Those pictures might help us later.
Get me the bags!
I hear ya.....shit.
I promise you will pay for this!
Start hauling those bags to the vault, gang. Time to crack this place.
... be back in a moment!

When building a custom bike, it's all about the details, baby. And what's more bad-ass than a chrome fucking skull? Am I right or am I right? I saw a special made one inside the clubhouse. Get it for me.
You need a couple of keycards. Look around.
I don't know who you are. But I will find out. You fuck with me, and you find you fuck with the wrong Russian, friend.
Remember we need both the Taxman and the server, people. Scare him and make him go into the limo once we've confirmed that he has the server on him.
Job's nearly done, guys. Just one more thing. Get the camera footage from the security room. I wanna make sure they didnt film anything we don't want them to.
Remember to grab the C4. That is your way through the door.
Okay, got eyes on the cage. Here I come!
I can't do any more until you find that keycard.
There they are, just like Bain said. Take them!
I can't believe this place is so messy.
All's quiet still. Good work. Stay hidden while the Moretta docks.
Hey you guys really are the PAYDAY gang! Jesus!
...Plan's gonna go like this.
Grab the raw materials and get them in the house.
Get to the roof now, and wait for the helicopter!
...There's 2 Gensec security boxes we need to disable.
We're hitting a convoy loaded with gold.
What the hell are you doin'? Don't leave me!
Drills done! Vault's opening! Go for the cash!
Ride through the gate and you'll be safe!
Wrong terminal. Try another.
Carry the box back to the skylight where you entered, yeah?
I hear they make a lot of meth here. I don't want to put ideas in your head, but if you want to make a little extra money...
Lowering the winch now.
The main entrance would be suicide. We're sneaking in from the side instead. Put on your mask and cut open that fence.
Great. Now get that gas on those tires
You will never get away with this!
Great job, crew. Locke's already wired our cut. Still not sure about this guy, but maybe we can trust him.
...bolts need to go into the floor.
We're outta here.
Bring the shit!
"Screaming"
Keep the cops busy and the drill will be through in no time.
You heard Locke, crew - into the cargo hold!
A loan....for a documentary exposing crooked banking practices? Riiiiight.
Right, you're going to need the manager's keycard. Find him.
Ship's in position! Going to hit it like Blackbeard!
Hey! What the fuck! Get these fucking cops off my ass!
You know the drill!
Get that gate open.
So. Business plan to observe myself eating lobster and drinking champagne for sixty years? It's a no. Not even for science?!
See if there's anything there that looks like it might work.
That crash probably woke the dead, yeah? Hurry up and get inside that bank.
Ah, kak. He's in his office again. We've got to get him out of there.
Good choice, gang. It's all about the payday when it comes down to it. You know the drill, keep scanning them bodies for more data.
Someone saw the broken window!
Careful guys! The wheel stopped on the question marks.
Keep those civvies stable, yeah?
Fuck yes, my friends. Okay, the vault is opening again. Good!
Not pretty job but necessary to show strength. We destroy Mr Stone's mall like Soviet Russia tanks on war road. You take all money you can find and leave nothing standing up.
You guys waiting for a pizza? Come on, get a move on.
Crack that door.
Garrett is back in his office. We need to keep him out of there!
OK, good. Now... wait a sec... guys... they're talking about sending in air support! You gotta hurry...!
Someone remind me to send some fags back to the slags in Hazelton. And a cake of shit for the guards. Wankers.
Placed, as per your request.
Forget the code? It's...
Get hacking into one of those terminals, yeah?
That looks useful.
That'll surely bring the feds. Gotta think of a way to get the goats out of here.
That was a bang! Most satisfying!
We're going to need to fund some upgrades soon, so feel free to grab some more loot.
The chopper is ready to leave!
Gotta speed it up guys.
The employee only areas.
Still waiting on that phone hookup.
You need to prepare the next part of the formula.

This is a big job. I'll talk you through it as we go, but the skinny is this: the Golden Grin has a big vault. Big. I mean Benevolent Bank big. Whether you sneak in, or go full assault, you're in for a tough time.
Go by the fitness center, you should find a computer there.
You don't want us to leave, do you?
Ok, the pilot just confirmed that he's landed his passenger safely! You can go home, guys!
Watch out, sniper's set up inside that building nearby.
You're getting whacked!
And when I cashed out, every other asshole did the same thing. But I was smart. First outta the gate, you know. Made a million bucks in a flash.
The cartel requests your assistance again. Now we are going on offense, as you say in football. Las Mendozas and the FBI will regret not eliminating me when I was weak. For I am strong now.
That's as much as we can do here. I saved all the intel on this server. Grab it and let's get out and see if we can make sense of this.
OK, that's around 5000 dollars.
The PC is showing where the trucks are headed. Keep an eye out for those bound for Washington.
Get a drill up, yeah?
Nicely done. Now how about we plug it into a laptop?
Quickly now, get the power back on.
Can't do much until you get inside.
Mr Sturr get out of the car.
They must have tailed us from the scene!
Guys, you need to attach the magnet on top of the panic room.
This is one tail I can't lose!
Here you go, motherfucker.
Inspect the walls, too!
Shite. Need a few files not on the servers. Witness testimonies, kept in the Archives. Get down there.
Okay. So. Let me see if I understand you, you aren't interested in funding my idea for a tv show - Pig Brother?
We gotta get outta here!
That's one of the voting machines. Great job! Alright, when the coast is clear, get the hack started.
You still gotta hack into those access points.
Got it. Doors should be open.
This is one tail I can't lose!
Gentlemen - oil is the blood of our world; without it we die. Time to make sure it keeps flowing.
Hold them off until we get that footage.
I got real bad news!
Now stow those bags in the container on the floor. I'm sure I can find someone to collect it.
Halfway now, just two more overrides to go.
Guys, there's a goat stuck in the streetlight! Saw it down.
No point casing. Just make it happen.
OK, the pick-up driver is on his way.
Get that C4 planted in the Gambling Hall, gang.
... Put all the stuff in the car!
I sent along a new drill for you. It's based on an older model but this one will not jam.
Patch me in. I can do some mischief from here.
That's how the pros do it! Chalk it up. Payday Gang one, Armadillo corp zero.
Right!
Guys, three bags should be enough to do the trade.
Get ready!
OK, 3 more then we can get out of here.
Ah crap. The plane's got to ditch. Alright, we're switching plans.
The second pallet! Good. But good things come in threes. Like that week all my wives died. Find the third pallet.
Come on, don't leave the prisoner behind!
Security chief's code. His ass is in trouble for leaving this around.
OK, gentlemen! Another bag and Hector's end is covered and we can get into the real moneymaking.
Find Brown's desk and computer.
You ready for it? I'm dropping the hose.
Politics can be a bastard but the beauty of it is you always get a second chance. Get in there and do your thing.
Aw fuck, they shot Brown in the face!
Who let them in? What the fuck?
Shoot these fuckers!
Looks like the first one is getting ready to leave. If you think that's the right truck you better hurry up and tag it.
Getting access...
Damn, that cheap piece of shitty Russian crap scrambler crashed. Get it going again.
They've got some nasty security in place, but they didn't count on old Locke, yeah? Put a blocker on that keypad to stop the code from cycling.
Alright, time for me to dash!
There you go. Now take a look inside the vault room, yeah?
We can try to get him out with an email. Find a compromised computer nearby.
Hey, get out of there... emergency....!
Get the prisoner, don't leave him behind!
Don't stay there, get to the skylight.
Good job! Throw the coke in the van and get out of there!
That's the first stash. Three to go!
Who let them in? What the fuck!?
OK, here come the bluechip hired henchmen.
Ah crap! There's the time lock. Forget the keycards. Force through those panels.
I need eleven more, at least.
Hey you know what? I'm afraid the cops are going to find me here!
This was a difficulty transaction. But my supplier is fine... And Kalashnikovs are fine. All is fine. (Thank you)
Get to the ship control terminal and hack it!
Crazy to think this stuff came from the time of the Caesar's.
Get a drill onto the safe, gang.
There's a load of equipment waiting for you, friends.
Hey, assholes. I'm enjoying a Martini in here! How you like that?
That's a good amount of bling. But if you want to grab some more, you can.
The timer is standing still. Get it going again!
Let's get to the docks!
Woops. That one's on me I assume.
They've cut the power on you, friends. Find the circuit box and get it running again!
Get inside.
So they took me into HR up at head office again. Turns out you can't tell a grandmother to suck a bag of...shit, they might be listening.
You not going to have a look behind the doors?
Ach, and they're sending in Cuff Cloakers now.
This job is important. The safes in those trucks, you need to get them out...uh, safely. You hear?
Son of a bitch!
Great - now log me into the system.
Thought you New York guys were all about the bagels, yeah?
Stand by, crew. I got a batch of ingredients on their way.
And... great! There's the top of the vault!
You gotta use the cameras to find Bain!
Use the ECM Jammer to disable the camera, that way you can lockpick the door undetected.
Quick guys, the van's gonna leave soon!
Alright, I've got your pick-up driver on the line, patching him through now.
Okay, gang, cops are here - as expected. It's easier to take them out on street level before they actually storm the building.
This is private property, get out of here!
Nicely done! The gate should be open.
Why does this bloody feel like the end of the world?
Fantastic, friends. Now you need to get back to the entrance so that I can pull you out of there.
Find the lever friends.
You found it! Time to bring some trees down!
Find more gas and pour it on the fire. Keep it burning! Fry him!
*hit by a bullet*
He obviously didn't care enough about those paintings. You need to find something else.
That's strange... merc units are pulling out.
Now, hack into a workstation terminal.
Bueno. we leave.
The panic room is somewhere inside the mansion; keep looking. It should be a reinforced door.
... the deal's off!
Yes, that's the stuff! There we go.
Ah shite. These interview files are locked. Can only be unlocked with approval from the Director himself. Fuck me, this goes to the top. Any of you guys fancy being king for a day?
Copy that, Broadsword. En route now. Over.
Next step is authentication. It will take a while so keep an eye on the timer.
Got it! I'm in the system. While I finish this, get out to the van and grab the C4. Plant it in the street.
You can play it safe and call this a day...
The EMP is heavy and my fuel is limited. I need to drop it soon!
OK, Plan B time!
Woah, we just lost of whole bucket of lights. Fix the hardware up there.
Those containers have cargo. That might help you eliminate the wrong trucks.
There you go. That's gonna get you through.
Get away from there! The C4's gonna blow!
You have to swap out those batteries.
Blind here til you get that terminal back on, guys.
OK, he is filling up that chopper now. Hold on guys!
If you get the chance, maybe grab some loot that might be useful to sell. It's not every day you got free reign in the the FBI's evidence lockup!
What's taking you clowns so long? Check the Murkywater containers for the vault.
Keep an eye out for Murkys while I'm doing this.

Hello, my friends. I hope you can overlook the fact that we haven't had time to properly tidy up the place. It's rather hard to get a cleaning crew out here, you understand. And believe me when I say, that I don't take this visit personally in any way.
That's five. Five bags!
That's the stuff. Keep going!
We might be able to get in by hacking the mainframe and working some of Locke's old magic.
It's it's all in base.. man come on help yourself.
Move up through the garage, a van is ready to get you out of there!
... don't let me wait now!
Last fan disabled. Temperature is off the hook. The contents must be scorching!
You need to find Valentine's computer.
Come on, we don't have much time, extend the walkway.
Cops are en route. Move faster!
Hey, good work on that report!
This is one of the vault codes. Remember it. We're going to be needing it before we close this caper.
The saw is finished, get through that door!
I told you to fucking protect me! I'm getting fired at here!
There you go, now just wait for it to open.
Gringo over there!
OK... Nearest place... Checking...
Not going up this way. Look around. Has to be another path.
Moretta's at the berth. Time for a hostile boarding. The zip-line could speed things up.
Hey, what the hell is going on? Locke, what are you doing?
The cocaine is in the hands of the distributors now, and all is well. Enjoy the fruits of your labor.
You don't know me, but I see what you're up to, and I want in. Throw some money over the yellow wall by Jimbo's. And none of you guys better try and cross the road, or I'll call the cops. Ya hear me?
This heist may turn violent. If so, extra ammunition will allow you to prosecute that violence effectively.
See that nice big hole? Drive through it, and hit the gas!
Gentlemen? Please?
That was intense, gang. Locke already sent over our share. Still uneasy about him, but let's see where things go with this guy.
If you don't find the Murkywater trains, we're not getting the EMP bomb.
Some fucks are trying to develop a coke operation in DC. Get their product. Break it up. Just one small detail...
We are back on.
Goddamn roadworks! Find a way to bridge it.
Firewalls are tripped. We're going to need a local port - one of the staff terminals. Check them out.
Don't forget that Garrett will be back soon.
Ah, fuck!
You can bet they're important if Vlad sent us to this hellhole for them.
Hey, can I get a hell yeah for the booth team.
I'm moving out.
Well, in the annals of criminal cock-ups, that ranks high. I can hear the cops laughing from here. Better luck next time.
It's too damned heavy here. The guys will set up at the bridge.
Okay, great! Now stash that loot in the vent by the elevators!
Enter the wrong code and the alarm goes off, so be careful!
Fucking phones are fucked. Ah, my friends!
This is Captain Rogers again, Look, the officers I dispatched are not responding. Is there a problem?
There's a finder's fee for all the evidence you pull out of the safe house. I have to safe guard crime.net and it's contacts.
You got the code wrong guys! System is locked for 30 seconds.
Grab the oh-shit handles!
Come on friends, you really must get that door open.
If you need more c4, take a look in the stash outside again, yeah?
Damn! The Alarm timer ran out. It's not rocket science, people!
OK, OK. The code is likely in some email. Find an FBI computer and gain access to it.
Three minutes out. You should see things from up here.
Personel contracts and expenses. Useless. Keep checking.
Hurry and open the gate!
Everybody knows the secret's in the glaze?
Now if you want to keep breaking stuff, Vlad's handing out a bonus for additional damages.
Cops coming into mall, ground floor!
We gotta open this dock gate to get the Moretta to Dock 3B.
Son, I'm giving you three minutes to get them to this phone, or I'm booking you for wasting police time.
Woah, that must be full of valuables! I can understand why Vlad want's these business' money...
Just two minutes.
... but get more if you can!
You still gotta have a look at the security gate.
We can get the ammo out, but only when the turret pieces are safely gathered in. Hide that ammo for now.
Keep an eye out for Garrett. He won't be gone forever.
See if you can find something related to Garrett's wife.
I'm inside. Keep them fuckers off me while I work.
You have to search the mainframe again to locate the second box. Quickly, now
I'd appreciate some protection while I work on the door!
Hey, great. You found the keycard ahead of schedule.
Are you still trying to find a way in?
You need to find the computer and upload the GPS coordinates to the ship.
Turns out, we're really good at making bombs...
Can't get a response from the terminal? It's that damn good-for-nothing Murkywater OS. See if another terminal works better, yeah?
Keep burning those cars, gang. The Commissar will be pissed.
Loot bags in place and money ready to get divided. You guys never disappoint. Love it!
... Put the stuff in the car...
Head for the vault and open that baby up with the keycard and code.
I'll meet you at the docks.
I've got someone waiting for you ouside in the sewers. You'll need some thermite to get through.
Forget what you just saw and concentrate on counting your reward! The Big Eight send their regards.
Not my car! Fuck you! Fuck you pendejos!!
That's that sneaky bastard dealt with. Let's finish up fast. He may want more.
No!
Get BFD fixed up, gang. Come on, stop wasting time.
Dammit. Go to plan B.
Keep it quiet til you get the cars. We can't afford to have cops shooting them up. I'll tell you when to plant the C4.
Today could've been better, guys. But we'll have to deal with Locke eventually. He'll be running from more people than us.
One of you clowns take that ticket. Easy!
Good job! You proved you still got what it takes, Dallas.
Shouldn't be too much longer.
Great. Now turn her back on.
Get the fuck outta here!
Hack those machines, guys. Each corrupt machine will pile more pressure on Schwartz.
I see one!
I gotta leave in a minute!
Next step - open the vault. Find some crowbars inside the warehouse and jam them into the cooling fans at the back. That'll raise the temperature within, and engage the failsafe.
Well you heard Hector. No time to piss around. We go into the meth lab and secure the goods.
Alright, do you see the house? Get inside. Look out for guards and cameras.
Very nice, bringing more than we expected!
I have root. There's two Gensec alarm boxes we need to disable, get to them and cut the wire.
What are you waiting for? Run back to the helicopter and secure the loot!
You got it!
Alright, the alarm is dead. Good job. You can come and go as you like.
Shoot 'em dead!
OK, I gotta bail!
Draw fire from the truck, gang.
You know how much that stone is worth?
Come on, please, join the party inside!
You're inside? Good job.
They're onto us! Damn close too!
Son of a bitch!
OK gang, time to find that keycard. Birthday Boy is probably still around, so go find him!
Ok gang, now we're gonna loot Ernesto's floor safe. I bet it's full of wonderful things. There are some winches stashed near the place where you entered the property - go get them and hook them up.
OK. Any... Second...
Use that blowtorch you got a while back, yeah?
Tempting. But no.
How long did that report take? An hour? Bill them for ten.
What! Some shopper asshole is walking around with my cocaine! Find it!
C'mon friends, the drill has been stopped!
Alright we got enough now, let's go!
There's still a goat in the apartment building there.
What the hell was that? Did they just blow up another entrance?
They pulled the power, get it back on!
That's a great place to burn some priceless art.
That's the head of security. Hmm... looks like he's at the back of the house.
Thermite takes longer than eplosives, but it doesn't create as much commotion either.
Come on now...
Okay, same as before: secure as many bags as you can or leave this place. Make up your mind!
Put a call through to Fed Central. And let me do the talking.
Careful! The roof is about to collapse!
...Kerels will be there any second.
Now go deal with obstruction to the yard over there. You're getting out that way.
Keep it under control.
OK, listen. I can't stay here forever!
Bastards! Bitches! Fucking... Asshats! I will kill you for this!
Now hurry into the office! Watch for kerels!!
That should'a been caustic soda!
... just chill!
Get into the closet when you're ready.
OK, position looks good. Drop it!
Do as you're told, goddamn it! I can shut down every airport for a thousand miles and have you ditched in the ocean, you spineless turd. Over.
Five thousand dollars, guys.
Okay. So. Ephedrine will start the alchemy. Get some tablets in the mixer.
Get the keycard from the auctioneer.
Find keycards, gang. Check the buildings.
Into the hole, petrolhead!
OK, so this is an easy job to get accustomed to DC.
Tac units on location.
All the extra loot goes into all the pockets. The more, the better!
They are stealing our bags!
Alright people, this is a pretty sweet opportunity, All sorts of mid-ranged diamonds and the like in the display cases. Do your worst, make your bones, get on out. A classic knockover.
The Beast is at work.
Chestnuts roasting on an open fire, Jack Frost snorting up his nose...
Alright, good. That should do it for a while. Try starting her up again.
Get to the West Wing, the gate should be open.
Stop messing around and get on board.
That's two!
4 paintings, not much, but we'll take it.
SWAT's are in the building, coming from the right staircase.
Arriving in three minutes!
OK, the escape vehicle's ready for you in the garage.
That's one.
Connect me to a telephone, friends
You know how this goes. Eyes peeled for security. Civvies need to be controlled. And keycards are always useful.
Keep going - this is great!
He knew he was going to die tonight. Just knew it.
There's the "toyshop" right ahead.
These sons of bitches get nothing!...
I choose only reliable associates. One of them will be waiting for you.
Under fire! UNDER FIRE!
We got a tail - and they're getting closer!
Maybe our new Medic Dozers will make you reconsider...
Put the delivery in the car!
C'mon, you gotta have a good look around.
Wow, that was one hell of an explosion! Cops are on their way now, so drive fast!
You need to find Chloe's computer.
OK that was severe OVERKILL. Vlad will eat this up. This will really work for him.
The keycard will probably be in a safe.
There will likely be wiring boxes there somewhere.
You're gonna need the thermite to pop the wagon open. Get back and grab it.
Great, now get into that Falcogini. I'll clear the road. Heads down!
The van will be there in 30 seconds - get ready!
I will send in the necessary ingredients for you. Hold tight.
Deliver the bags!
The metal detectors should be down now.
What the hell, I'll do you guys a favor.
Use a glass-cutter. Don't break the glass!
Protect the timer, the swats will interrupt it if you don't!
I'm losin' it! I'm losin' control!
... then, we'll trade.
An Armory! It's locked down, but a keycard should get you inside. Should be plenty of ammo in there.
I know it's not Hollywood glamour, but someone better gets those safes outta there.
A jewelry store downtown could use a visit. Something for you guys?
But look... the keycard.
Maybe killing the lights will do it. Have a look around for a circuit box.
Five!
I prefer the company of dogs to people. Because dogs don't talk back, and they can't shoot for shit.
It will be in position. Look for it.
The garage is the tradesman's entrance. It's close to the ladder, which leads to the roof.
Up the stairs!
Another twelve and we're done.
We're stealing stranger and stranger things, yeah? Take the dinges, quickly!
Can any of you see the time lock codes. I can't stall them for long.
Good job. Look around and see if you can find the EMP parts.
This whole scenario is just too familiar.
The cops are going to be all over me here!
Get back to the trains and get the EMP.
You dont let me down. Hector will be proud of this work. We are in business for real.
Ummm, just...yeah, something fucked up. Fix it, you guys.
This is the Security Center.
You gotta crack that door open, friends.
Don't forget to get the cutter onto the vault, heisters. Slice it open from beneath.
There, now time to get inside the auctioneer's office to grab the code.
It's open! Let's see what we got!
The cartel wants these transport trucks to reach the harbor safely for delivery...
Whoa, looks like some kind of energy weapon. We can use it to blast the door. Just turn it to point the right way, friends.
They're coming from the west, by the construction site.
Technical issues? Sounds like a load of crap.
Moxie's Milkshakes!
OK, get to the controls. I've got something planned.
Opportunity is a haughty goddess who wastes no time with those who are unprepared.
OK, lets blow this place. C4's in the limo. Take it!
Remember! Don't actually shoot the Taxman, just force him to take cover in the limo. Suppressive fire.
Where is it?
...I think.
You can finish this now, or you can finish this in style, and empty the place.
There, good. It's back up.
You just gotta turn everything upside-down, friends!
Okay, so we're gonna need a heart for this baby. An engine. That's what I mean. I think they store them inside the clubhouse.
Let's get out of here, man.
House is beyond those trees, see? Sneak right up.
You need to restart the winch, friends!
A smart decision.
I'm patching in the driver!
Great, we got it!
Shit! What was the code for the safe, man? We need to burn those files!
So destroying his art collection didn't hurt enough. Let's try something else then.
Crap. You got merc units surrounding the building. Don't recognise the logo... looks like a... shark?
I'm guessing these terminals contain the Moretta's comm frequency. Might be worth a look.
It worked. All the records have been deleted.
Connect that cable to hatch and the pick-up. Then start the engine. 400 horsepower and one industrial cable should be enough to tear that hatch right off.
The storage room is blocked off with sturdy metal doors, yeah? If you find and tap me into the security boxes, I can unlock them from here.
The leak willl be in the basement. See Mitchell about it.
You won't find a better New York steak anywhere, including New York.
...grab some of that gold if you can friends, but remember that money is secondary, yeah?
Got it! I'll do a background check on this guy. Hang on.
So, I just heard from the boss. He's on his way here to get us but he's pretty pissed, so you guys might wanna bail before he gets here.
All right, that's it! Throw it up onto BFD.
That's one bag!
Screw down the winch so that it'll be stable. Trust me, for what's coming, you need it secure.
He's getting something from the trunk.
Don't let me wait now!
Put these sons of bitches down!
Arriving in one minute!
... Put the idiots out of their misery man!
If you can patch me into the mainframe, maybe I can get us in.
Hose looks secure. Start the pump.
They are coming from the railway bridge! Watch out!
Lucky that you found the manifest. Now we know which containers to drill!
OK, the chopper's coming over the convoy now, we're on a bridge - well done Alex... For once... Hit 'em and finish it. The money's ours no matter what. Get it done.
Bingo. Pick it up.
No killing hostages, guys! You'll attract too much attention.
Pilot's gone down. Don't let him pass out. Get him moving!
Take the boxes from the conveyor, friends.
Thanks guys. Hope you've got a good extraction plan.
Ok... attach the magnet please.
Good. Now use the keycard on the panel in the other control room.
We just gave the six o'clock news some great footage! Get the loot in the van.
That laptop had one part of the vault code. There are two more around there somewhere.
Good, now get it back to Hoxton!
Perfect, now get back to the car and get out of there.
Great. Now, ready to bail? Just meet our Insider man. She'll show you the way out.
Guys, three bags, that's what we need.
We're going to steal a prototype turret from the Government. Get to the train outside the city, crack it open and get it.
Take the sniper out, guys!
An old buddy out in Hollywood is calling in a favor. We're gonna help him lift some rocks.
Find the manager. We still need his keycard!
Listen another two minutes and I'm out!
Great, now unless you wanna stay for more loot, get to the car.
Now make your way to the West Wing and find the Oval Office!
Have you got the ark open, yet?
That's great, pile them up there.
The cage is how we get the money out, gang. Get it built.
Throw him down there. It should be safe enough.
Put all the wares in the car!
That's all of them, let's get out of here.
What's... Hey! Don't fuck with me!
Everyone knows it's on the ground floor, even the tourists!
We got 16!
Christ... Is it buffering? Go faster! Why don't they have Google fiber... Goddam American broadband.
Can you believe this tragic sack of crap was a hero? On your feet!
That's enough...
That's one bag!
Holy shit! Looks like they've electrified the vault! Get to the generator on the roof and shut it off.
Keep looking for something strong- you need to get through that barrier!
Alright! We stopped the convoy, now get it open and secure the loot!
Ey! Hurry up, will ya!?
Done! Get me the next piece!
I'm back in. *whispers* There is no spoon.
Guys, they're throwing everything they have at you. Better make it out, fast!
OK, that's it, I got to bail!
Four.
He was always on the vuvuzela, so my thanks.
LIKE A GLOVE!
You're all dead men!
This way, my friends, with all haste.
Damn! That's it for stealth - time for action. Get ready for company!
See, never doubt my plans.
So the safes can be drilled, even picked - if you have the skill.
Get ready!
Great, you fixed it. Now guard them.
Get up across that walkway - he is on the other side.
Damn, the EMP crashed right through the roof of the lumber mill.
You gotta restart the hack!
Nice, that's a quarter!
The thermite's done. Now jump in and get that cash.
Ok, you have to get back to the mainframe and look for the second box.

All right, Dallas. It's time to use those access codes we stole last night. Find a way inside the building - access the Police database and delete all the intel they have on Crime.Net. This won't be a walk in the park, so show me you still got what it takes.
Make sure you defend the circuit box that the security room is wired to. Keep the cops from interrupting!
This is not all of what we agreed on.
Alright, I'm in, hold on...
Fuck, fuck, fuck! There's more of 'em!

Ok guys, you know what's at stake here. McKendrick needs that cash to win the elections, and if you can steal it you're pulling the rug out from under his feet. Let's spoil his party, rain on his parade - get even for what that ungrateful bastard did. So get that cash. And there's another thing I found in the file that Charon gave us - somewhere on the yacht there's a server which contains passwords for illicit foreign bank accounts, some of which are also used by McKendrick. Steal that server, and we can cash in nicely on it. (pause) Uh, yeah... I almost forgot... there's a fundraising party for McKendrick on the yacht tonight. With TV and everything. But the party's mostly on the upper deck, so if you sneak in quietly you should be able to get in and out without anyone noticing.
Not exactly textbook perfection, but who cares when it all works out!
The apartment has a sprinkler system, so there's got to be a valve somewhere.

Ok, now we don't know exactly where in the prison Bain is being held or what condition he is in, and there are Murky keks everywhere. This one is going to go loud pretty fast, yeah? You're going in through the sewer system that empties into the ocean.
Remember. Don't kill this guy. If you answer the pager the Control-Guy won't fall for it again.
Pick up the phone and let me do the talking.
Dont' leave the boxes on the conveyor.
Your time is almost up, creeps. We're coming in to stop you by any means necessary.
Our guy has a taste for Jaegerheister. Find the green bottle, spike it and serve it.
The customer is getting close, standby.
I know things are hectic and you are very busy, but would you mind getting the detonator onto the charges?
What are you waiting for!?
The cocaine is in the manager's office, but keep your eyes open for hired muscle.
Hey, you see the state of the guys from the motel?
Okay, there's a marked closet. Get working on the lock.
The bouncer will get suspicious if you don't walk in.
Every 10 minutes, the vault gets a new code. Stick a blocker unit on the keypad to stop it.
I want you to infiltrate his penthouse apartment and place politically questionable items there. You will proceed to remove the gold he received for the arms deal.
Great job - it's got all the info on where the money's hidden.
... then you get what you came here for.
No time to waste. Get in there!
Good. Temperature is climbing faster. Must be something hot in there.
Dentistry is a job that requires a lot of precision and attention to detail - just like my alternative line of work.
I got you an escape van, just outside the main entrance!
There's a lot of money in the shops, there.
Ha! You better enjoy your life while you got any left!
Here! Here!
They're shooting at me!
Really close!
Don't worry about all the bodies. We have... a facility.
I'm fed up waiting for that meat.
What's taking so long?
I cashed out. Made a fuckin' million. Two million! More!
He really crashed it good!

I got word one of the Harvest & Trustee banks just had a big run on safe deposit rentals from a teller I used to uh, speak to, socially. I think we should get into the vault and strip those boxes bare... You with me?
Think you're going to do this if you keep it up.
Prepare for a rough landing, guys!
Who the fuck are those people?
Your help is needed guys, get over there ASAP.
This guy's something else! Looks like he broke free on his own! But you gotta help him!
You've got to keep at least 9 bags!
Drop 'em!
What the fuck do you think you are doing!?
Hostage has been retrieved. The clowns will have to give this one up, and go home with their tales between their legs, over.
Ready to get out of there? Make your way back to the entrance so I can arrange your extraction.
That's a strange looking dinges, yeah? Put in on a zipline, chop chop!
No standing around, yeah? Kerels are on the way.
Bring those trees down!
Drill the door to the storage room.
Good. Now keep the cops off of it.
Now, rise, my friends!
I'll be happy to help you. One moment, please.
Crap, they're driving away! Sorry guys, looks like it's plan B. Let's get out of here and deal with it elsewhere.
These machines are for nickel-and-dime suckers. Don't waste your time.
Cover me so I can get the gate open!
The Mendoza cartel just got knocked on its ass. Nothing hurts like taking a financial beating and they just took a big one. Hector will rise and that's good fortune for us down the line.
Watch the balcony from the front - they're climbing up.
Damn, it's stuck. Try shooting at the wires.
Keep looking around the place, gang. Somewhere there's something that can help nail the Commissars exact location.
I guess a neighbour saw something. We got cops on the way to check things out.
Ach! They've cut the power at the emergency shutdown point. Find the lever and pull it back to continue charging
Please go outside and smoke, you can't smoke in here sir... Bunch of crap!
Check to control, check to loot, good job people, good goddamn job.
Good spot. Now we wait.
The storage room is your target. That's where we'll find the keys.
The coke's shipped out. Well done, sailors. Go get your payday.
They're shooting us full of holes!
Don't get the code wrong or the alarm will go off.
It's open! Bag the gold!
Putting those radars out of action is our next job, gang. Do it.
Nothing yet? Keep looking.
... put all the stuff in the car!
Awesome, it's printing away nice and steady again.
You need to use the saws for our plan to work. Two on the second floor and two on the fourth floor. Get going.
The case files here say that there's some forensic evidence linked to the traitor. Head to the labs and get a closer look.
Go through with the trade, as we agreed on!
Go on in, the ballot machines are near the bank. Hit the bank, open the vault, and raise hell. Shoot the joint up. Destroy the ballot machines as unfortunate collateral damage.

OK folks, my guy stashed the thermal drill for the bank vault in the parking lot, so get that first. Watch for guards, keep an eye out for cameras - where there's cameras there's usually a security room... Money time.
Find that shelf yet, friends? Get to the computer lab.
Ach, you chops put in the wrong code!
You doin' over there!?
Good. Now search the coke bags.
OK, you've got enough... Or you can stay for more.
Cos it was like that, from the moment we woke. All day, every day - hookers and blow.
Right guys, if you make your way out by the Jack Rabbit Slim's, the cops will hopefully follow you so that Blonde can get the car out of there.
Yesterday, people. Yesterday!
Bag the loot!
Chopper is inbound. Stand by!
Capping that dwankie would feel right good, but we need him alive, so hands off the triggers, yeah?
Welcome. Put the money on the table.
You know I prefer to be involved in jobs where preparation is taken seriously. Don't disappoint me.
That train is some distance away. I don't want you handling those nukes for long. See if you can find a car.
Almost there. Target in sight. Over.
Are the goats safe? Please, God, someone think of the goats!
Three!
I'm gonna KILL you!
Reinforcements are incoming.
The train is rapidly approaching the cop barricade. I give you a maximum of two minutes to secure the loot and get out.
Gonna keep a low profile in here.
Time to go! Help remove moorings from dock!
I'm in, this might take a few...

All right, time to be careful. There's another guard patrolling the area. I'm betting he's looking for his missing buddies. Whatever happens, do not kill this man. You understand? Don't kill him or we're screwed.
My intel indicates that they have piled up some dangerous compounds there somewhere. See what you can find to use on that barrier, yeah?
You need to secure all the loot with the zipline.
Cops are on us like white on rice!
It's about to get hot down there, gang. They're dropping grenades.
OK, the cameras are installed in the paintings. We're ready. The senator's men are jumpy but ready to deal with us. So let's deal. Money for art.
I got to leave in a minute!
Get the bags to me!
Over there!
Guys, they're throwing everything they have at you. Better make it out, fast!
Dammit, the cops disabled the hacking device! You need to reboot it!
Watch for cameras. Don't let them see you.
Great, it appears the Feds aren't as stupid as we thought, the alarm triggers a server security barrier. Now we gotta get that open too.

The Moretta is sitting in a sealed dock, awaiting customs clearance. This is where you come in. Once you're in the dockyard, you're going to get it moved to a berth from where you can get aboard. From 2B to 3B. Open the dock gates, and let the Captain know he can move. Once the Moretta is berthed in 3B, you can get aboard and boost the explosives. Simple?$NL;$NL;Well, maybe not so simple. Security's too tight for a ship loaded with Balkan farm produce. Starting to guess a lot of shady stuff comes through that route. So be careful.
Good. Now lead him to the panic room and see his looks into the retinal scanner.
Not sure they're the same as the others.
OK guys, search the place. I know the address is there somewhere.
You'll have to force your way through the bars. Is there anything around there you can use?
Ya gotta be a player, but ya gotta rig the game, man!
Holy shit, what is the delay. Burn the grate away with the thermal paste!
Guys, Fedor is waiting over at the lake. It's time to leave.
Three more, at least.
Surveillance shows metal detectors all around the entrance, so you gotta find a way past them.
If there's one thing you don't want to find yourself in shortage of, it's medical supplies.
OK! Just one more.
We arrived in this piece of junk, but we're gonna leave in style.
Chopper's is in-bound for the crash site. Stand by, gang!
Guys, you need to find a blowtorch otherwise we're screwed.
There are the pardons! Go get them!
That vault is tough. The drill bit broke. Get a spare part, quick!
That goat has live current running through it! Disable the power!
Please, head to the Black Ridge facility in Nevada. It has Murkywater loot for you to steal.
It's fine, we'll settle for this.
You should be able to get past the code lock by disabling a few security boxes around there.
Shit! They got the driver! They got the driver! I need another option - hold on!
I'm going in.
Go! Go! You gotta meet up with the driver!
You're dead!
Maybe get rid of that tarp, yeah?
Not our smoothest ride together, but we got what we came for. And with the gold you took, it should fetch us a good payout. More than enough to get back on your feet.
You will go there take all money you can find and leave them hurt! Show them Vlad pays back what is done to Vlad!
The beard is green but not long.
Check the vents!
They took out the wall with C4!
I'm going with hydrogen chloride.
We had agreed on more than this!
You've defeated the eighth wave of cops!
Get to the van!
The wheel stopped on smoke!
This place is dry, get back to the van.
Still need the keycard off the manager, gang. Find him, deal with him!
Standby gang, the customer should be there in two minutes.
Great. Now just wait for that time lock to run down. So far this is textbook stuff. Be ready to bag the cash when it opens.
Ha! I bet he didn't expect that, for sure!
My clients are ready to enter the vault. You're not needed here right now. Go for a walk or something.
Hand me the reactor, quickly now!
They're on me! I'm naked as a jaybird!
Damn it!
I was born in Colombia but have become quite successful building a small import/export business here in Washington DC. I feel my calling is to help others secure things of value at cost.
That vault is a thing of beauty, yeah?
The water isn't pumping, gang!
I'll be there in two!
Damn it! We almost did it! Just get it to the van.
Keep checking the shipping crates for machines. Once you find them, start the hacking.
Looks like a last desperate attempt to clip our wings, hey? Stand firm, brave warriors.
What are you doing, get inside!
These are some determined fucking law enforcers!
Oh, shit!
Did you catch that, gang? Bile will drop off the C4 on the roof in a couple of minutes.
The code is likely in the auctioneer's office, but you gotta get in there first. The auctioneer probably has a keycard to open the door.
You're as meticulous as they told me you'd be.
Bile will drop off the C4 on the roof of the building. Make sure to pick it up immediately.
Now that's a beautiful hole right there!
Still waiting on that network hook up guys.
Damn! They're right on top of us!
Cops are about to open the door. Give them a Payday welcome!
You've just etched your names into history, gang. Heisters will tell this story for generations.
Right, now my intel doesn't say exactly where the entrance is, so you'll have to rummage around a bit.
That's probably worth a small fortune.
You come here to disrespect us?
Fuck!
Holy!.....they crashed right through Wilson's wall!
That sure showed them not to mess with you. Now, grab the coke and return to the van. Time to get out of here.
That's the time lock done. Try and keep the sneak going. Now, the vault has a three step clearance control. The first I've already taken care of. Just head there and use the fingerprint scanner.
Looks like the scrambler software just crashed. You'll have to restart it!

The arena has a huge security floor run by Gensec. Part exhibition for corporate VIP's, but still a working vault. Tonight, we hit it. We got an Inside Man on this one. He stashed some C4 around the Arena. Gather it, blow the vault from beneath and get that sweet dirty money out. We're going to have some unexpected help on this one. You guys hear of a DJ called Alesso? Tonight's the last night of his East Coast tour, and he's promised to lift the roof. What better cover could you want?
Reckon that thermite is half-done. Just keep the pigs away.
Operations is our first stop. From there, we should be able to find what we need.
I'm hearing over the comms that they've set up a sniper ambush ahead. Watch your heads!
The cops have sent in a chopper carrying heavy SWATs. You better be ready when it arrives.
Hey, we don't have all day!
Getting closer!
Domkops! Get indoors!
And now we prosecute this plan.
Hey gang, you got trouble comin' by helicopter.
Too much flak. I'll move to a safer spot, follow me.
Before we begin, I've arranged for a few small articles to be left for you. Find the crates with the red strobe.
Are they cops? Are they fucking COPS!?
Cops in the store!
The times they are a-ragin, you know.
The chopper is fully loaded. Wait for it to come back.

The Commissar is apparently all "if I can't have it, neither can anyone else". He's cornered, so he has his men flush a mountain of coke down the toilets! Hurry up and stop them, and the coke is yours!
Shame about all these banks we're hitting, but we all have expenses. Wolf's lifestyle isn't cheap. Go time.
They're shooting at me!
Time to go guys!
The blueprints indicate the vault is behind those doors.
OVERKILL - enough said. See you at the safe house.
Guys, I've secured a chopper to get you out. Stay put!
Hello, what's this...?
Keep moving the crane. Can't drop it there.
Find the vent, and start pumping the gas. We'll make their security center fuzzy and warm and... *yawns*
It's always lovely watching thermite work! Now get inside.
Making money ain't really about hard work. It's about knowing when to call your banker and say "sell".
There you go, one more should do it.
Argh this damn lobby, you gotta get out of there!

Bain left me instructions just in case something went wrong. I've double-checked and the warehouse meeting spot still looks quiet, for the time being. Hole up there while I try to find out what's going on.
There he is!
The tower! Come on, get him up there!
What's taking so long!?
I see one!
Remember that the EMP bomb is two parts and I don't have to remind you we need both.
Woah, that's a whammy.
Get the safes loaded onto that truck!
You need to find a way around the metal detectors at the entrance.
Die! Die!
I guess the man really wanted a soda...
The Golden Grin Casino: High stakes. High security. Large payday.
All right, the BCI tech is in safe hands now. You still have the opportunity to go back to the wagon and get more loot. It's all worth good cash.
Okay, we need to charge the EMP before can we use it.Patience is a virtue.
Let's get the hell out of here, friends! We've already overstayed our welcome.
Kerels are trying to take back the asset.
OK, find a way inside, stay low, and keep an eye out for guards and cameras.
That can't be... a goddamn nuke!? Vlad!
Another civvie on the scene. Make sure they don't call the cops.
Yes! Hack's done, everything should be unlocked now.
Grab those bags, gang, come on!
Alright fuck it, that's it! I can't stay any longer!
Let's settle for this right here.
There you are, you bastard!
Get ready for the first wave!
This is one of the ship Control Rooms. Computers can be used for entering GPS targets. There could also be a keycard or radio here.
Broadsword calling Danny Boy. Time to drop that skyhook cage. Over.
You are lucky I am a kind man...
Got an idea. I got his phone number. I'll call him and distract him. You be ready to top up his glass.
Oh, I didn't know we were in a Sci-Fi movie. Well, okay then. You're gonna need to find the lead scientist for some kind of hand print authorization.See where he's hiding.
...Remember to take the boxes from the conveyor on the loading dock, yeah?
OK that's it. Let's sneak out of here and see what's what.
Switch the power back on.
Search around for the caustic soda.
Hey, I just thought of something. Should we maybe have brought hazmat suits?
Uhhh, yeah. You know, fuck it. I'll do that too!
Boat driver here.
This is like candy for Duke, yeah? But we just need what's inside. Those symbols are probably the key to opening it. Look around for clues.
You must have shit for brain, coming here!
Come on guys - the briefcase!
Alright, fuck it...
That's both crates found, yeah? Good! Time to get the hell out if there. Make your way back to the entrance so I can arrange your extraction.
I could give two shits about your college tuition. Well, if you paid me $50k per shit.
We gotta go, people!
That seems to be a keycard, we can probably use that later.
That's not optimal... but it happened. Go to the balcony!
Did you really think you could capture me?
This next part is noisy. Noisy, and dirty and smelly. I can't wait. Let's do this, huh?
A fighting retreat back to the van, guys. Let's get out of here.
I'm a bit worried our intel on the Murkys is bad.
Can't wait around out here - get into that building as fast as you can. Try the roof.
I'm a sitting duck here with those snipers. Can you do something?
Just get the server clear of its housing and take it to the van...
Christmas presents are still falling out of the sky! Pick up as many as you can!
A very good evening to you, sir.
Quickly now, get the compound onto the door.
... what are you trying to pull?
Where is it!
Haha, the Commissar outsmarts you again, assholes.
Not much time. F35s deployed to patrol D.C. airspace. We're gonners for sure if you don't hurry!
You made a mighty big mistake coming here!
Alright, buddy, I'm sending a team over right now.
Look for something to crack those crates open.
Good thinking! Use that fire to destroy the weapons.
Down stairs!
That's the exit, guys - to the right and down the stairs. Go! Go!
Gonna feed you to the pigs!
Hope for the best, prepare for the worst.
Hi, this is Jen, I'm calling from Gensec. We registered an unscheduled activation of the time lock. I'm just calling to make sure everything is alright.
What's up guys? Find those routers!
Alright, it should be in the storage. Drill the fucking door.
You should get in easier with this.
Remember to strike a flare to summon the evac.
That alarm is bringing in more porky reinforcements. Shut it down, yeah?
This is private property!
Got the code for you...
Pick up the thermite. That's our way into the vault.
Make sure no cop or SWAT sees the hacking device, don't let them near the ballot machine truck!
Haha! I know you were men of steel. Thank you for setting the balance! Russians are now aware of Vlad again! Argh-hahaha! Like very angry bear, argh!
See if you can find a way to destroy the weapons or bring them to the van.
That's ten!
This is the place, people... This bank here holds all the Mendoza capital north of the border.
Maybe we'll find out what happened to Jimmy Hoffa.
I hope he doesn't pass out again at the last moment.
OK, chopper's here. Secure any loot you found. You can bail when you feel like it, but I'm sure there's always more loot out there. Your call.
Ok, now you need to aim the weapon at the second lock.
Great, nicely done. Now keep moving.
That's some fine loot they stashed in there, but it's ours now. How do we get it out?
Alright. Fine work, clowns. Bring the footage back and we can close out.
Fuck me, we needed those damn cooks. I'm going with caustic soda.
Great, now get out of there while you can.
Set up a zipline to speed things up.
Check the manager's office. Look for the IT guys name. Come on, come on!
The future of the Mendoza cartel in the USA is ended. All thanks to you. You are a hot topic down here. I thank you.
Place the missiles next to the radar and activate them. Easy peasy.
What the fuck is this!?
They're breaching in!
There he is!
You've got to get those screws off as well, friends.
Just heard that Murkywater are going to try and shift some cash by plane. Gives me an idea.
Shit! Po po is here!
Take a look in the Jade Room for one of the PCs.
Anyway let's help the man settle the score. We go for the tiara - back room from what I understand.
Can't do it, guys. Too much heat. Clear the roof and I'll come back.
Bain will make the call with the pass phrase.
Eyes on the rooftops! I've got a feeling this is going to get worse.
Are those anti-airs disabled yet comrads?
C'mon now, get in there.
Get to the top of the overpass so Bile can pick you up.
Ok, let's find this guy. He should be around here somewhere.
Nothing left to do but make like tree...
The door can only be opened with a code and a retinal scanner.
Get the vault open with the thermal drill, then get the safe deposit boxes open - you might want a saw - and then carry your loot to the escape van.
I heard something...
Heat is coming in. I'm moving the escape car.
You have 30 seconds!
You could hide the bodies by throwing them into the sea at the back of the boat.
Well here come the damn cops!
You can try finding vault keycards, two of them, if you want to sneak this place. Maybe in the trunks. Or go loud - it's your choice.
No need to let it all end here...
Once you're in, find the crates and destroy them or bring them back. You want to do more, be my guest.
You still have 16 left.
Blerrie, wrong code! Now you gotta wait until it resets!
I get back to ship alone. Will contact you with instructions.
Keep looking for the USB stick, friends.
Holy... Have you ever seen anything like it? Get those doors open. Bag it all.
They've deployed snipers. Stay low.
You're gonna pull this off.
Second. Keep going.
Jimmy will love it if we get all the data we can, really sticking it to Akan.
Damn, I'm sure some nosy curtain twitcher heard that!
What are you waiting for? Get inside.
Great, that's the guy. Start getting blood samples. We gotta validate them before you leave.
Looks like Charon freed himself! Now help him get out of here alive!
Excellent, gang. Now, just plant some more on the fourth floor and the roof.
Friends, we need to do a bit of an unusual bank robbery, yeah?
Protect the X-ray device! Don't let the mercenaries get to it!
That's it. Now get the hell out of there!
... be ready!
You gotta stop those anti-air batteries!
Both boxes need to be secured on the heli before boarding.
On the second floor!
This is not the plan...
Hey, come pick me up? Yeah, it's over. Guy was being an asshole.
Your adventure is over, you goat-fuck.
I applaud your skills. Punishment came to Ernesto Sosa silently, but with deadly certainty. They will learn to fear The Butcher.
I can't get supplies to you- they would just get suspicious and shoot me down, so have a look around while I think of something.
Come on friends, get to the archaeology wing.
The saws are done. Good job.
Nice work! The ninth wave was beaten back!
The parking lot is the pilots target for the pick-up. Get there, get everything ready.
Enter the password and access the files.
Hey, we don't have all day!
20 thousand.
Not much further now. Get him up the tower on the right!
Trash the entire mall. Either destroy each store individually, or look for something to torch them all.
Alright, we got spotted by the cameras. We got to go to plan B.
Come on guys! Go!
She's moving. But not fast. This will take some time. Stay hidden, guys. Lie low. Or, if you want, look around for extra loot.
Connected.
Either get on the chopper or find some more loot!
Back to the platform where you came in.
Check the backrooms.
Chopper's on the scene! Bile, get that hose down to the gang.
Make the Commissioner's mood darker than it already is. Ha, Locke is no joker, eh?
Fucking Hector. What makes a man spread his asshole for the feds like that. Ah, fuck it. Great work lads.
Control, control, control!
It'd be rather boring if it was right behind the front door, wouldn't it?
Anti-air defenses?! Are you shitting me?! I can't fly any further! Take the parachutes and jump out!
Sons of bitches!
I'm on the line to my accountant. We need to uh, do some laundry. Nice work.
Look right outside the Glitter Room for one of the PCs.
Great, the pilot's safe! Place a flare on the table outside the yard. Ignite it to signal the helicopter.
Put these suckers in the ground!
That's why the government doesn't work, friends. A bunch of domkops. Look around for that USB stick, yeah?
Be on your toes.
What that car do to you, eh?!
That computer is showing which truck is going where. Could be valuable to know that.
I think best thing about America is laziness. People don't work hard here. There is no, how you say, work ethic.
Uh, guys, I think that Hoxton is a bit disoriented after that explosion earlier.
Jesus Christ, what the fuck is going on here? All this shit just because Rust wants his bike back? Well, fuck it. You go and get the parts and bring them here.
It's located in his office.
OK, now you gotta get into the control room.
Ah crap! More lasers. Must be an independent system. Watch the pattern. Don't want to trigger any alarms now.
Get the hell out!
OK this is your standard job only it's gold-plated, if you take my meaning.
Ah, here we are. Right in front of me. 674523.
Wagon's not gonna crack itself open. Dip that C4 in!
All doors have keys. If you want to do this quietly, find the keys.
Almost had it, but...nevermind. I gotta bail. I still get my cut, right?
Connected... Let's see what we have.
Now swipe the card on the panel in the other control room. Get that gate open.
Damn damn damn!
All right, I'm gonna need my special tools to put the bike together. They should be in their usual place in the workshop inside one of the toolboxes.
Find your way inside and locate the Murkywater trains. The EMP parts will most likely be in different wagons.
Time to prepare the next component.
Hurry friends! Stop it from running a firmware update or we'll be back at the start!
Guys! You need to get that briefcase!
Ah, its stuck. Cant get to it. Shoot the wires!
OK, it's done. Release the hostage now to trade back our friend.
Center. And right!
It must be where they keep the pardons we are after.
Get the USB stick from the head of security.
You better hurry guys, clocks tickin', over.
What's... Hey! Don't fuck with me!
I'm sure you'll find this very useful.
Are you going to let them win?
OK, it's time to get the vault open!
Cops are gonna be swarming through here any second! Move fast! Check the wagons for the vault.
Snipers are being brought in, people.
You can either look for more loot or get out of there now.
Oh, sorry man, must have called the wrong number.
First thing to do is open that hatch to get inside. Once you're in, expect trouble right away.
Can't do anything until those drills are working.
They got their Top. Men.
Hurry!
... real close now!
There are centrifuges all around there. Use them to start validating blood samples.
Friends, Twitch will be there shortly with the van!
They shot me, but it's only a minor one. Barely hurts.
Use the blowtorch to create a way through that car.
Right, follow me and we'll get you out. Hope you got what you wanted.
Hey, two minutes, we have two more minutes until the pick-up car! Not much longer!
Ah! Cops have turned the bridge! All right, one of you get into that control room and turn it back. We need to get on the other side!
Damn kerels have stopped the charge process. Get it going again!
Get your masks on whenever you want to start it up.
Here we go!
And... Great. Their grid is weakening. Do another.
You gotta find a way in.
Turn these piggies into bacon!
Get the code and open the vault, yeah?
Four
You're in. Now hunt down keycards - two of 'em. I'd guess offices are your best bet.
You've got to keep at least 10 bags!
Alright, we will probably need every little bit of cash after this and my stash of emergency krugerrand was confiscated by Interpol, so go find that saw, yeah?
15 bags!
I hear the cop radio, law enforcers are on the way, they arrive in 30 seconds.
The neighbourhood watch surely heard that!
Good job. You sealed off one of the entrances. That should make it easier to defend.

Hey, assholes. You want me to keep my fingers off 911? Then throw a moneybag over the yellow wall by the auto-repair shop. Do it, now! An' I see one of you motherfuckers try and get a bag across the street, I'm onto the cops.
The system is running an auto-update. Go to the mainframe and stop it!
Get the loot back to the escape car and we're home free. Good luck!
This can only help your plan. You're making the right decision.
Look at you motherfuckers just walking in here with your stupid ass-masks. I can't fucking believe Rust wants to be one of you freaks. Regardless, two things are gonna go down now.
You won't have much time to escape, so be ready to move towards the subway station.
Okay, Taxman goes for the server - I think...
Ey, waste 'em!
I'm in place!
He's dropping the pieces of the skyhook. Assemble them, and send up the balloon. The pilot will do the rest.
You saved the mechanic just in time. Now help him off the chair and make him assemble the bike.
You gotta find the laptop if you want to get the money.
Three minutes...downtown traffic!
I need covering fire to get the gate open!
You still got a lotta Murkys walking about, so hurry and get that code entered!
Look out - they're putting tactical units in position nearby.
See if you can cut the lights in his office through a nearby circuit breaker.
Get the bags to the van to secure them. Don't let the cops run away with your hard earned meth!
They're inside!
Train is almost there. 30 seconds.
Hey guys, remember to find the crates Locke has left. They got a strobe on.
There you go, friends. Metal detectors are down.
What are you waiting for, use the thermite!
What were you guys doing up there?! Nevermind. The less I know. Just get down here.
This will make the guards preoccupied - and much less likely to notice your presense.
Hey! Dock eight, guys!
Under fire! UNDER FIRE!
Let's get right to it, shall we?
Yeah, he got drunk again. What'd you think he was gonna do? That guy? one shot and he was groping people...
Okay, the bridge is turning back. Damn, it's slow! Just hold off the cops!
What the hell took you guys so long?
Get that bag to the vault. Get the drill assembled.
Bag it, snag it!
That's enough coke, not all, but enough. Hector's people are at the harbor - you need to meet them and get this stuff onto their boat. Then call it a day... OK, a payday.
There goes the alarm!
We will make you pay for this!
OK, I'm in, now to hack this thing so we can get the lab door security barrier open.
Mitchell get that pool fixed, okay?
The asset is in danger.
Alright, locate the server room, and get inside, there's no point in disabling the alarms now.
I'm in, might take a few to get the lab door open.
You realize how many dollars I sunk into that place? Enough to pay for your ass ten times over, bastard!
This is Hawkeye, OK I can see you, what a fuckin' mess, here I come.
Put them down!
Hack the computer and see if you can find the code.
... This is fine, we'll take it.
These sons of bitches get nothin'!
You keep killing civilians and we're going to have a situation.
You cutting though yet?
Cops are still on the boat!
How... eh... gotta think of something... how to get inside...
You need to open that gate to get the briefcase. See if you can find some thermite.
OK, I can't stay here forever!
Anything more than this is just bonus!
There's The Dentist's whatever. Haul it out of there and we are done with him.
Those backstabbing... Well you showed them turnaround's generally very bad for whoever we turn around on.
Use the flash drive we stole last night and get going.
Come on, clowns. Get those bags up to the balcony and into the container. The chopper's waiting.
Gang, what's the hold up? Get inside the building.
All right. Now let's just wait for him to try that drink. He's going to run for the John any second. Follow him. Get his keycard.
Get the water running!
What the hell! A little help!?
Blerrie, you've got to restart the hack.
Everything you've taken needs to go out on the zip.
The fuck took so long, man?
Empty? Blerrie, Garrett must not have gotten it from Evidence yet.
Don't forget the box, friends.
Get to the computer lab, find the shelf, then go and use the crane.
One last obstacle before the vault. Lasers. Need to shut them down.
... everything else is gravy.
Forget about the alarm, just get us in there ASAP, the cops are going to hammer us.
Hi. I just saw a show, and the bank got robbed, and I want to move my money to a bank that doesn't get robbed.
Hey, Ralph is still there. Be ready to grab him.
Guys, I'm getting very nervous...
Another four and we're done!
Blerrie! Murkywater operatives are trying to block off the area, keep away from them, yeah?
There's a zip-line to the crane here. Hope you're not scared of heights.
The courier had to throw out the parts, so you will have to go round and find them, yeah?
Please, everyone into the airlock. The doors are designed so that the inner cannot open until the outer is closed.
More laser defences. Forget disabling them. Just watch the pattern and be ready to run through.
Confirmed! I'm coming in at dock nine!
Dompkops! You weren't supposed to kill him!
Go to the apartment and get what we came here for.
I'm waiting for you. Keep driving that boat to me.
Not far to the Oval Office now. Get in there and find the keycard to the PEOC.
The door to Garrett's office is locked, but see if you can bypass it through nearby security boxes.
Now, an eyeball with a pulse is needed for the scanner. Look out for the FBI boss. Make sure he keeps his pulse.
There we go, friends. Now get inside and see if you can find the dinges we can here for. It's probably in a safe.
Fuck!
You found it. Now get it open and get that address.
They're going to keep sending harder kerels, friends.
We can't go lifting the container while you're inside there. Follow the plan!
OK people, there's the bank, I don't know what's in there but it's gonna be good...
You should be looking for recipes friends!
... closing in!
OK, the Commissar's holed up on a run-down apartment block downtown. No idea what we'll be facing, but got a way to get you in quiet. Let's head out.
Is the Commissar up to something? Get those fires out!
You almost got that winch ready?
Guys, the first batch is unloaded - I'm coming back for more!
Check your options boys. Going full frontal might sting badly.
They sounded convinced. We're in the clear for now.
I got Vlad on the line.
Hah, he had it coming.
That was a superb display of stealth. You guys are made of shadows. The machines are hacked, the votes are flooding in and it is a landslide for The Elephant's man. God bless democracy!
... over-delivering! Way to go! Hector likes that shit!
The pick-up is on its way. Not much margin for error here. Get to the roof.
Now fire up the winch! Keep the cops off it.
... put the wares in the car...
That looks about right. Open it up.
Guys, you better stay inside the house if you can. FBI Snipers are setting up some really nasty sightlines.
Find those electrical boxes yet?
Pop the flare so we can bring the chopper in.
Well now, it's probably worth a hell of a lot.

I don't know who tipped the cops off, but I have good information confirming that they don't know who's on the premises. They'll be expecting a routine raid on a possible drugs operation. Give them a warm welcome, teach them to get their intel right.
Stow the loot in the ceiling vent marked by the Inside Man.
You gotta fight your way past the cops and meet up with Eddie. Move!
I see one!
Leave it with me. I can certainly help you with that.
There's the escape! RUN!
Oh, you have even more than we agreed on!
Good, now get to a workstation and override it.
Now, the vault is located down in the Security Center. You have to get down and through there to reach it.
Now we're gonna fill the vault door with liquid nitrogen! Mr Blonde?
Alright, fuck it...
Good the truck is open, get in and put the hacking machine onto the ballot machines.
... Deal's off! FUCK off man!
That's all we need but feel free to stick around for more.
Uh, guys...what's that noise?
You're in civvie mode. Your guns and masks are stashed somewhere. Until you get them, you're invisible to security.
Great. Now get the keys to Hox. Decrypting the servers will help pinpoint the traitor.
You need to add the caustic soda to keep the process going!
Cops have this locked down. We're going to assemble at the silo.
It's not over yet, Dallas! We picked up more heat than I expected and the cops are on your tail. Try to shake them before they close you off and things get hairy!
Still searching for the USB? Check back in IT.
I'll tell you what. We were never gonna deal with you guys! We'll take it all!
Ok, behind that door is the loot.
It's on the roof!
Find the computer. Send Moretta the GPS data.
OK folks, we're going in and looking for the vault. Cartel or not - it's still a bank, right?
It's simplicity itself, friends. Just press the button of the vault you want to open. Just be sure it actually contains something.
Alright, I see the boat - it's almost there. Get ready with those bags.
Great, you found some thermite. Now we can melt our way through that steel gate.
Pretty sweet line on a bank - after a while they all start to look the same I bet. Let's do it.
That explosion will have it raining crystals for weeks.
What the fuck did you guys steal!?
What the fuck's happening!?
Payday crew. Vlad. There's a marked pig in that warehouse. It's very important to me. It's for... er... present for mamma. Yes, that's it. Don't let the Feds get it. Grab it for me.
Ok gang, let's give Mr Blonde some help with a distraction. Lure away the cops by getting out through the bazaar by the Jack Rabbit Slim's.
Damn, the cops arrived faster than I expected! Take 'em down!
Remember: blood poisoning and abnormal heart rate. Listen to Schneider.
You need to mount both tanks.
Hahaha, motherfuckers! What you gonna dooo?!
Hey, stay cool, brother.
Let's see. There! "Classified informant"! I knew I smelled a rat.
Halfway there. Some weird traffic coming across the network.
Nice of them to leave the place wide open for us.
You're almost there, everyone get your guns ready.
Drill is almost done.
Don't mind that one, I'll get that!
Both drills done. Excellent.
Look for a code that starts with one.
Let's do this faster, guys!
Gang, Gensec truck. Hey, it might be carrying a keycard. You know what to do. Get at them.

Your target will be the Benevolent Bank. Security is high, so preparation must be thorough. A patient of mine heads a nearby construction site. They have been kind enough to erect a crane next to the bank. Use it. I'd wish you luck, but luck has nothing to do with it.
OK, gang we can still get away. Van - when you are ready.
Alright gentlemen! It's time to get the hell out of there!
Help me!
Make shure no SWATs get in to the lab. Keep them away at all costs!
We know that Russian rat is somewhere Downtown. Search for a clue - remember, Downtown.
You hear me? We need more fuel for ship to make international waters.
That should do it, you can place the drill now.
What you got there? You know what, I really don't care. Just throw it in the truck and I'll take it with me as I drive off.
Okay, searching...
You know your roles. Walk inside.
There's the pilot. Christ, that old soak can barely stand, let alone fly a plane. Escort him somewhere safe. I'll get the chopper on the way.
Okay, gang. Elephant gave you the briefing, so you know what we're after. We need to find the BCI headset and the computer software. You manage this, we'll make a lot of money.
OK, time to open the vault...
Keep looking...
Great work, now let's see that glittering carbon.
Everyone, you know how it's done. My guy dropped the thermal drill in the parking lot, so grab that before you make your move inside. Some surveillance would be smart.
Uh, this is, Francoise. I am calling from the Customer Satisfaction desk.
OK, I got to bail!
This is your stand, people!
Thank you, my friends. I will not forget this day.
Really... Really impressive.
Use your loot bags and fill them to the brim. As we are in DC expect to get heat pretty quickly if you go in guns blazing.
Get to the weapons lab. It connects to a storage room where they're keeping one of the boxes.
That's one, find the next!
Hey! Make sure you're ready!
Jesus Christ... that was a little too close...
Movement in the control tower, keep an eye on it.
Where's he off to? The laundry room? Follow him, you chops!
Ok, here comes the tenth wave!
Just one more keycard. Gotta be around here somewhere.
It's open, get the server!
You're falling fast!
Aim the weapon, friends.
I should not have hired you, Alex....
Just two minutes!
Move the target to the tower!
Alright. The cage is put together. But it's empty. Get it filled!
Alright, now let's get out of here. Go back through the airlock!
Great! You found a machine. Alright, get the hack started, and let it finish.
You gotta get the bags to the van.
Oh. You're sure? 'Cos I kind of spent the money already.
That's plenty...
OK, guys. Time to get in character.
The cops are using the ladders. Watch them!
OK, pull over here, and get your masks on.
Ropes still connected.
You're gonna go in through the fence, find the guns and bring 'em back here. They're not going down without a fight. If it hits the fan out there - destroy the guns.
The manufacturers call it a heavy-duty industrial drilling apparatus, but heisters know it as The Beast. Gentlemen, start it up.
Swats are coming in from the north, on Keel Street.
Hey! Protect me!
C'mon friends, you need to get mixing.
The frequency ain't here. The control room is across the dock - maybe check there.
Good. Get as much loot as you can, but at least a few bags.
I need 17 more!
Nooo!
Who shuts down a party this early?!
Deal's off so FUCK YOU!

Okay gang, pack your things and head for Washington D.C. We're going after a gentleman by the name of Sturr. Mr Sturr is a sneaky IRS employee looking to make a lot of money by striking a deal with some dirty big-ass corporation, but I say we could put that money to better use. Let's do it.
Okay, there it is. Kick the door down!
That's it for that rat fucking shite Hector. How could he turn like that? Cowardly twat. Well done lads.
Whoa, there goes the system. You need to restart the power so I can resume.
You can access the hidden cameras in the paintings with the laptop on the roof.
Fucking suits...
Perhaps there was interference on the radio, so let me repeat. Plant the fucking charges on the locks. Please.
I heard ya. We're moving!
'Course I brought it. Cabots don't hire morons.
We do NOT have a deal!
Expect me back in a little while.
One minute...almost there.
I'm gonna give you a faceful of lead!
My brother-in-law crashed his plane in the woods. Get him back here.
Once these pool fixers are gone, when can get this party started for real
Half the job is having the right tools.
There it goes. The plane is on its way now.
That's it... whatever it is! All right, the drop off is a storage room. Take that there and secure it.
Get those bags here!
...my courier hid it in a dumpster on the parking lot outside.
Alright, there he is - move it!
Nice, that should do it for the roof.
Hurry esse!
OK, I have access...
Hey, too bad you couldn't come. Was fun while it lasted anyway...
Just maritime regulations and shipping forecasts. Keep looking.
Don't be afraid to pick it up...
You're through. But I saw nothing, right?
That boss would have been useful alive. Always a back-up though. A *loud* back up.
Good night snipers! Good job, guys. Now, time to get that C4.
Nice! 20!
Ten seconds.
The hose has come loose. Reconnect it!
There's only one place I can sell that. Marrakech.
It's fine, we'll settle for this.
Did you press the right floor? Press the right floor!
OK, three!
You need to cover me while open the door !
That's two!
That's it! Now get the Jewels with the cocaine!
You can go get more C4 outside if you need it, yeah?
Whose bright idea was it to set up a methlab in an unventilated tin box?
Bag of cash, great. But let's pay off that asshole first. Yellow wall by the auto-repair shop. Don't worry, we'll find and deal with him later.
Now we're breaking even. Very good!
You will regret your actions when you meet our Zeal Marksmen...
Look like you are heavily loaded - that was all the guns right? I'll have to make it harder next time. Maybe wear a blindfold or something. Well done.
Let's go!
Consider the punishment, and prepare accordingly - so that you can escape that punishment.
The Gensec trucks just turned into our guy's sight. Wait for it... Wait for it...
Now you gotta blow a nice little hole to get into the vault room, yeah?
Looks like Matt's vehicle has crashed. Go check if he's alive!
Time to move! The escape vehicle is parked near the main entrance!
Not sure exactly how many cameras there are.
They've mined the place! Watch your step!
There are Heavy FBI units all over the place, be careful.
Well, at least it isn't nukes this time.
Okay, I see a guard up ahead. Not much room to sneak by him if I'm being honest.
Gang, I can't stress how important electricity is to computers!
Okay, the Fed's won't be long, so time to hit it hard and fast. Find the C4 in the guard room.
They fucked with the wrong people now...
You're dead!
