It's cooking. What music it makes!
Get to West Wing. We need to get you into the Oval Office.
OK, I'm in position!
Nine
Guys the timer stopped!
Yeah, how much money do I got in there? How much?
They got the asset! We're going home empty-handed. Not a good day, friends!
Get two more!
You got in and out without attracting notice to yourselves. Gensec won't be able to discreetly sweep this under the rug. Great work, gang.
Halfway done, gang.
I've spent a long time away in jail you wankers, I got business that needs taking care of.
Trust me, this will be a vital part of your plan.
Damn, they stopped it. Get it going again!
Great job! I'm sending the van, keep looting!

That truck you assholes tagged wasn't the right one, so we can forget about intercepting those voting machines. We're going to try something else to keep the Elephant sweet. We can trigger a re-election by scrambling the server at the polling place. To avoid suspicion on our sponsor, we'll make it look like collateral damage by robbing the bank next door.
You made a big mistake coming here!
The hacking device needs to be rebooted to continue.
Ahhh, if any sound is sweeter than that of an opening vault it is that of bagging loot. You are producing a symphony for my ears!
Let's get into that vault and get our gold out.
OK, gotta find a way to make sure none of the hostages does anything stupid. Set up the fake sentry guns.
That's the cash. Remember, unless you want the cops there, get a bag over the yellow wall. Don't worry - that blackmailing asswipe will get what's coming to him.
I got snipers incoming. Stay indoors guys!
Have you located the security gate yet?
Ok last step, let's open her up.
Oh jackpot! Nice thinking, he's not gonna survive that explosion!
Do you know which one it is yet? When you do go to the truck and put the tracker on its underside.
Very smart to use the tunnels like that - very professional.
Dallas, I thought we were pals. Does a pal leave his BFF in jail? Wanker.
Well they're coming now. No two ways about it. Ready up!
Just sit tight.
Pass by the Amber Room when you get a chance and have a look at the computer there.
I know you had things under control. Not like that other time. You handled it in style. Hector owes us big.
Ok! Just protect the winches now while they're working.
Someone answer the phone!
You need to hurry guys.
More mobsters on the way! Watch out for the vans.
... time to get ready!
Bain, we don't have all day here. If the snake hides in its hole, we must goad it into sticking its head out. Maybe you should try to destroy some of his precious things.
No one steals from me!
There's a second can of thermite there. Perhaps you can come back once the first is burning?
Four bags - Hector's happy now, everything else is gravy.
I think that is the armor of Oda Nabunaga. This is serious loot, gang. Load up!
There goes the chopper, but don't worry - it'll be back. In the meantime, let's see if you can track down some more of those presents.
Now jump into the car. Oh, and keep your head down - it's time to *blow* the joint.
Huh... everyone must be at the beach.

Okay, Dallas. It's been two years since we worked together, and I need to see that you still got what it takes. We'll start with something simple, all right? An acquaintance of mine recently got robbed on a cocaine deal by some low-life mobster. I need to you to break into his night club and see if you can find the stolen cocaine and get it back. Easy, right?
Where are those blueprints, gang? Scan 'em, send 'em. You can do it in IT.
Hit the roof, gang!
Fill it up, and I'll come back for more later!
Ach, you got the code wrong, you chops! It's gonna take some time before it resets.
Outstanding work! All four trucks are stopped and ready. Make it rain, guys!
Gonna have to get through there. I'm sending you C4.
Damn it, no comm frequency here. Alright, there's an office across the dock. Check there.
Was afraid of that. We didn't get in clean. The place is going into lockdown.
The panic room will be visible as a reinforced door. Keep looking.
Excellent. Time to put it to the test.
Cocaine and VR - what an interesting mix.
It would be beautiful if we could do this with you hiding in the airlock, but... alas...
These fuckers are going down!
That the safe's open. See what we got!
Hey Mitchell I said medium rare, not well done. How long can it take..?
What is it?
Hook me up to a phone somewhere and I'll see about getting the dear Commissioner out of his office.
Hey! Don't let them get away! Keep them by the van!
Cover me so I can get the door open!
That should get it on.
OK listen up. You will do the cook for Hector. He will be grateful, trust me.
Be there in a few minutes. Stand by.
Make shure no SWATs get in to the lab. Keep them away at all costs!
You sleeping?...
Remember guys, we need six bags to escape.
We've got some company, folks!
You gotta get me into that mainframe.
Those are some beautiful fireworks. We're coming.
Cameras? And guards? Vlad didn't say anything about this!
You got enough. I'll get our man on the way.
If you would be so kind as to collect the articles I have left for you.
Get ready to drop Floyd. Yeah, I named him Floyd.
That's a big safe, see if you can get that thing open!
Go home you bastards! You can't get in here!
Look at all this timber. There's got to be a saw somewhere - keep looking.
They sure like messing with the power. Keep an eye on those breakers. Prevent them from interrupting the download.
Pilot just touched down with the cash. Well done guys and nice work on the cage. See you at the safe house.
Now we're talking, ladies and gentlemen. Making the drop.
Every successful venture requires a plan.
Try to get that second vault open if you can.
Ernesto Sosa never saw it coming. With him dead, the Sosa's Miami operations lie in ruins. My point has been made.
And so, another player enters the board. Kento! Bain is getting away. Stop him, would you please?
Alright, this is it! I'm out of here, Bain will contact you when you get inside.
We cannot use the main entrance. Too much heat.
Aha! That's it! Cold fusion, right here. I'll just cozy up to this and you folks head for the hills.
We managed to get a zip-line set up here. It'll carry you right to the crane.
The Commissar sent his little chickens. Give 'em a warm welcome.
You come here to disrespect us!?
Hook me up. I should be able to get into their system from here.
Get the hell out!
You gotta use a drill on the door.
Welcome team. Your brand new skull masks are waiting and Bain is ready to talk inside.
Shit, here they come!
OK friends, get into the vault room by cutting open that teller door with a saw.
Take these sons of bitches out!
... fuck 'em up!
Now would be a good time to break out that torch you found before, friends!
Could be linked to his wife... a date or something?
Since you took care of the outer panic room door, the lance won't need as long. At least there's that!
Put the delivery in the car...
Put the product in the car...
The prototypes should be in the lab. To gain access to it we need to hack the main server. Find the server room.
That's the head of security. He seems to be at the back of the house.
Use the crane to get the artifact, friends.
They're attacking me! I'm a sitting duck here!
Gang, we're going nowhere until that drill is working.
Nice, friends. Thank you.
Hey, how did you do that so quickly, friends? Old Locke almost feels unnecessary...
Clear the gate!
Hah... thought for sure you were going to blow up the room with that one, but no worries. Just one more compound to add.
The copy machine over there has a stash of equipment *if* this caper goes loud.
Second closet. Good. Get it open.
Vlad would like us to do a little refurbishment here and there.
We're going to need an X-ray device to get the data the Elephant needs.
Leaving in ten!
Gonna keep it slow so you guys with the guns can stay with me.
Ok, you've cleared the place out! Time to get out of here.
I would have hid it in the safe too. But I'm a cynical man.
Keep a low profile near the workers to be safe.
Perhaps the thing I am most sorry for in my life is that I showed mercy to Carlito Mendoza when we were young. And I have been repaid in blood... I will never make such a mistake again.
Two
Ah shit, I've got to move the car!
Some thermite on that vault will weaken the hinges, yeah?
Then we just need to go in to get the gold.
You'll find this exactly where you requested it be.
My eyes aren't what they were. Help an old man out and light a flare, yeah?
Got to be a saw here somewhere. Check the timber logs.
Ahhh, do my ears deceive me or is that the sound of a titanium vault opening. Maintain your efforts, friends!
Arriving in three minutes!
You'll have to help the Captain if you want to get out of there.
That's what we are after. Get it to the van.
I got another idea: Finders keepers, assholes!
Well, looks like we have some crafty litte thieves, trying to steal our money. Put them down.
Hey, uh, my buddy has the blow. Wants 10k for it.
Check the camera and see what's in the vault.
Still no alarm. Outstanding. Now open the gate.
OK guys I want this to be a homerun. In and out in 10 minutes should not be a problem for this crew. Let's step on it.
You gotta listen to the diagnosis of each patient so you can find out target.
Gage sorted a dumpster to stash a bit of loot in. His people will collect it in the morning.
Still trying to follow up all the threads. Try to keep focus.
Think we're about to be outgunned!
These are the guest rooms.
Get going to the bio-lab.
Find a good formula yet, friends?
It takes special skills to ninja through a secure warehouse in broad daylight. Great work. Now, let's see if it was worth it.
These bags look pretty roughed up. What have you been doing with them?
Ilija! I spit on that fucking korva shitface!
You heard the Cap'n. Get the GPS data to the Moretta. Find the computer to upload.
Wipe 'em out!
Ach, I'm being stopped by a firewall. Get to one of the other computers and see if you can help me through.
Terrific. Let's get that lab door open and see what progress looks like.
I hate blackmailers. Do as he says. We'll find that asshole soon enough.
So good to talk to you, sir.
Remember guys, we need ten bags to escape.
Damn! Alright, I'm sending the drill. You'll have to open each vault til you find the turret.
Nicely done. Now get into that office, friends.
We're moving the escape car. Don't blow the horn yet - this place is crawling with cops.
They can go fuck themselves...

This is Roberts bank. It's a small DC company, almost as old as the city itself. And while I have a lot of respect for the fine institutions of this nation, I have greater respect for what they hold in their vault. My intel says this branch has the lowest hit-rate in the country. Time to change that.
That's one taken care of. Time to do the next.
Nice work, team - the metal detectors are disabled.
OK we beat on this sorry mall enough for one day. Well done. Vlad has proven his point and I think we need to lay low for a bit after this.
Got it. Doors should be open.
These sons of bitches get nothing!
Everyone's here, good. The villa's on the other side of the airstrip. Sneak in there, find the lab. when you've found the engine, hustle it back to this airfield and wait for pick-up.
Crack open the back door with a saw and go through there, yeah?
Keep your eyes peeled for an assault.
The Commissars' guys've got some hot wheels. How about we make them a little hotter? Look around the gas station, there's gotta be something to burn.
They're not getting in that way!
No dossing about, yeah? Get inside the mansion.
The trains belonging to Murkywater should be easy to spot. Find them.
Great, you've disabled all cameras in the front and upstairs. Just a few in the vault area.
Come on! Open the gate already and get the stuff we came for.
I gotta leave in a minute!
Hey, some more bags would be nice - but it's not necessary...
I don't know much about fine art, but I know some poe will pay through the arse for that.
Aw, there's a metal detector, wasn't in the plan.
You gotta hurry up!
There's a little coke left! Step on it and you might just earn a little extra! Just might!
You have done phenomenally well.
Hurry! Answer his pager before they raise the alarm. Try and improvise or something.
Let's hope that's what we're looking for.
We need more.
Vaya con Dios, dickhead.
Great. Now get that other keycard working on the opposite gate. Hurry!
Three bags!
Why did I offer to fix the bike...
This is where you're going to be dropped off.
Fuck her! And fuck them! Let them come, I say. They are just easy money for me.
First digit for the vault code. Keep searching. We need all three.
There she is. The Moretta. No access here, though. Get it to dock 3B.
To get that tree out, you need to blow the glass roof off the mall. Just light a flare and then wait for Bile, he'll be bringing in some C4.
Good. That's the first. Now find the second.
It's on fire! The whole damn roof!
That sounds great. I am going to pay off my credit cards, put a little into a savings account.
... Hang in there!
Take the C4, crew. That will deal with the construction yard wall.
Our Russian friend is somewhere in Shaw, so find a clue for that. Remember, he's in Shaw.
What is up?
Good! But it will be a long minute!
Good job, but we need some more on the fourth floor.
Load the artifacts, friends.
I hear cops' sirens everywhere. You're gonna get a lot of heat, guys!
That's it! I'm off now!
We shouldn't have spent so much money so quickly
Thank you for your call. We look forward to hearing from you again.
Half of them loaded.
I'll tell you what. We were never gonna deal with you guys! We'll take it all!
Turn on the power again to get the code!
Half the fucking police force is on our ass!
Perfect. Now blow the wall and let's get the hell out of here.
All right, I'm gonna need two things: a gas tank and some exhaust pipes. Go into the workshop and find a ceiling lift. That's where they store them. Get it down and bring both to me.
Politicians like me do what is necessary, not what is expedient... And necessary can be dirty.
SWAT are blasting down from the parking lot. Watch it!
Heisters will be studying your technique for this job for years to come. Great work!
The briefcase! Don't leave it behind!
One of the items we are here for is being kept in the warehouse archive. You can use the crane in the central hub to get it, once you find the right shelf.
Two more!
A bus took out that wall!
You're getting whacked!
Almost done. All you gotta do now is get hold of the keycard from Ralph Garnet. Find him and get it.
What are you waiting for? Go into the Oval Office!
Alright, do you see the house? Get inside and find the server room. We need to hack into the security system to get to the lab.
Keep sharp, gentleman. The warehouse will be tougher, but the rewards worth it.
How are you coming along with that winch, friends?
It's getting dangerous out here!
Time for us to go!
You won't get a word outta me!
This is the boat.
God damn!
That hole is HUGE! Perfect!
What the..?
Alright, that'll keep Gage sweet. You guys can cash this out now, or stay for more.
Hey, hurry up will you!
... and we'll give you what you're after.
God dammit, people! Cover me!
The vault is just beyond here. You got that code?
Come on, let me see what you got...
Heh, it's almost exactly the same as the other. Well, it's what we came for so take it and keep going.
We got the armor from here when we did it quiet, you recall?
That's about halfway done.
Uh, yeah. Everything is fine and dandy here. Just... routine checkups.
Scanner tells me 60 seconds until the police are there. Load up.
Come on now...
The chopper is en-route. Hold on, guys.
I'm there in one minute...
OK, you'll need the FBI boss alive. Keep an eye out and don't kill him.
OK, I can't stay here forever!
Would you like a zipbag for that, sir? Only a dollar fifty.
Sounds like the SWAT killed the engine. Get her moving again.
Good job, that drone won't be here to witness the robot revolution. But make sure you hide the pile of junk. We can't have one of the guards finding it.
I'm in place!
It's close by, but I wanna see the funds.
Are you moving the loot?
The cops are pissed that you just bagged their snipers. They're getting ready to send in the cavalry!
That's six!
Let's see, what else. You can test any of the objects out in here - just pick up the equipment and find something it fits on.
Well, well, well, so who's the fourth musketeer? This wanker's your little brother, Dallas?
Hey, we don't have all day aight?
Gang, the Commissar - that grudging bastard - is dumping a fortune in cocaine just in spite! Get up there and save it. The faster you move, the more you can save!
Ok, it's time to loot Ernesto's place. He's got a floor safe in his office. Hook those winches up to the floor and let's lift it.
Don't loose that keycard, you're gonna need it later.
Excellent! Now, let it run for a few seconds.
Watch yourself.
What are you trying to pull?
I'm flying in. Don't shoot if you see a big fucking helicopter flying at you, right?
First thing I did when that bail-out came through was buy a Longfellow. Hey, I'm supporting the auto-industry!
We need three administrator passwords.
You have ten seconds to get to the van.
I'm going to make you bleed!
Perfect, I can do this. Beginning hacking.
Vault's open! Bag the cash!
Yihaaaa! Here we are! I'll circle around until you get whatever you came for. Just give me the signal and I'll be back to pick the loot up. Good luck!
Shit!
Look at all these nice things. Must have done a lot of public service in his career.
Vault's breached! Now, let's see what Benevolent has.
Hooked into the terminal yet?
Ey yo waddup.
Depend on it being there.
Head inside the room and go through with the drug deal.
They've got the wagons circled out here. Ready up for a war!
Put the explosives on the door.
Time to go! Come on!
It's a masterpiece. Thought lost for decades. I'd hang it in my crapper, but it's worth a shitload of cash.
Ok, here comes the sixth wave!
Make sure you're ready!
Well, no need to be quiet now. They know something is going on!
I'm here now. I'm here! Get the bags into the boat.
Yeah-yeah-yeah... Run the plan!
Damn, that's an original Gustoff!
There's a computer by the reception. Use it to open me an access point so I can locate the patient.
Good, now do your little magic on that baby. Get the pick-up running!
Might be a good to at least get some extra funding out of this, so go find that saw, yeah?
Hey fuckers, I got cops on my ass. I'm hit. What the fuck was that back there?
The laundry is a good front. And good for washing things, like clothes, armor and money.
You guys are really something. No one knows a thing.
Forget Locke for now, we'll take care of that scumbag later.
19 bags!
The guards are gone. Get to the gates.
This cache of C4 should deal with the radars, yes?
I have an idea how we can get the code. Head to the telephone pole connected to the house. Time to make a call.

Come on, get that vault open.
Pick that bag up, it's some cash to start you off, get it to the living room.
Ok, guys. Cabot's people will be waiting for you outside the store. From what he tells me, this should be quick and easy. Show these professional LA gangsters what the Payday Gang can do.
What's the delay, see a movie star or somethin'?
C'mon, you'll get discovered. Go through the computers.
Come on, no need to be nervous. Out of the airlock, friends!
Don't let the swats interrupt that timer!
Ah, good. That's the entrance to the PEOC.
Girl in the window, get out of sight!
An active ECM jammer will make it harder to access the server room. So use them with caution.
There's gotta be something volatile around there you can use!
Get that C4 on the pumps at the station. Then stand back. Way back.
Sure there must be loot all over this place. Search the rooms if you fancy a few extra Benjamins.
But that keycard could be useful.
Keep the civs down, look out for cameras. Scout the place and find the best way to do it without raising the alarm.
Closing in!
... I'm coming back real quick!
I've recorded all of the information, access it by pressing that button.
Hit the button, yeah?
The gas station is a nice little earner in this economy. So blast it. C4 on the pumps.
Fuck these guys!
A helicopter is coming to pick you up, but it's going to take a while.
Okay, now get those bags into the truck and we can call this one.
The police are here. They'll storm the building if they get the chance, so maybe stop them before they can.
What? Oh, come on! I'm out of here!
OK, now head back to the library. There's a way into the PEOC there, and the keycard will likely come in handy.
Senator Borrico just closed a lucrative arms deal on a national scale - with a somewhat questionable nation. Find a way to get into his penthouse apartment.
There, that might be what you're looking for.
That was, you know, kind of a big explosion.
We might be made, so let's hurry up.
The code should be on the screen. Get it, and go open the vault.
The safe's gotta be there somewhere, these clowns aren't smart enough to put it in storage.
Looks like that box is heavy yeah? There's a conveyor belt in the main hub area that leads back to the loading dock, through the mountain. Throw it on there and let it do the carrying for you.
You look like rats in a maze. No cheese at the end for you though. Only assfuck.
Keep moving, guys. You gotta go to the next building.
Hold them back, I'm looking for an escape driver as we speak!
It will happen. Trust me.
Put the container with the gold on that truck. Use the crane!
What the hell...
Have you got both boxes onto the helicopter?
Gamble if you got the hand, people.

We're using crates to get you into the Commissar's place. Trojan horse style. His apartment is a cruddy dump in a crappy part of town. Security ain't great, but I'm sure he and his muscle have something in their back pocket. Objective is simple: find the Commissar and kill him. This is going to get loud, so dress to impress.
They bought it. Keep working.
This is an FBI auxiliary office... The hornet's nest. For the love of god stay quiet.
Help! HELP!
Hold the cops off until the time lock runs down.
The escape vehicle is leaving in eight minutes.
Starting my approach. ETA four minutes. Over.
Seven.
Bain, I know you're sick but that was the worst joke, for sure!
All right, all right. I got what we needed. Take me back to the truck so I can finish this up.
I'm sending the van, keep bagging the stuff!
If I lose this coke it's gonna fuck up my Christmas budget. Find it for me!
There's your ride out of here.
Looks like we marked the right truck! Good job, lets go open her up.
...Could maybe open them up with a computer, yeah?
Good, you got your hands on a blowtorch. Nothing stopping us from getting through that door now.
Well, look... I'm going to send some guys over there to check on things.
This is where you're going to start this caper.
Break the glass and bag those jewels. Remember all the extra stuff around the store.
Feeding the fish, eh?
Oh fuck!
This is the Right Control Room for the Dock Gate. Use the Keycard here.
That's 13 bags!
OK, friends. I've got Twitch standing by to come get you. Let me give him the go-ahead. Hang on for a bit, yeah?
Alright, fuck it...
Like an arm stretching out from the heavens, I'm picking that limo up.
Looks like Hector's cooks are dead. We have to make the meth ourselves!
Are you having problems?
Nice. That should help. And speaking of help, so would lighting a flare. You get my hint, friends?
Almost there.
Charon? Are you ok?
Don't linger if you don't have a plan folks.
Yeah, a loan for heating! So I said, "can't the orphans just huddle closer together?"
We have a fine selection of rare meats from Africa. You ever sampled elephant?
You guys are lucky, I'm feeling generous.
Goddamn kerels are helping Murky! Garrett must have gone deep with these bastards after our little visit.
You still need to bring the drill inside, yeah?
Look for the cases, break them and bag the jewels.
Find the gear Micho planted somewhere. Look for a guitar case.
Stay cool, my friends. Vlad has an idea. You like Vlad's ideas, yeah?
Who the hell do you think you are!
The Murkys have got AA defenses set up and I can't get through to pick you up while they are active!
It's the police! They're tailing us!
Good spot. Now we wait.
There's an access hatch to the sewers over by the gas station. Go there, and get down.
Cops have messed with the time lock. Restart it.
Hurry now, get to the canteen!
We gotta do this the loud way!
The van is back. Get the bags to it!
We only have a short window of opportunity guys.
That looks heavy, friends. Use the conveyor in the main hub to move it back to the extraction point.
The cops have this place surrounded. So you're going to be going out with the loot. Get in there!
Let's skip the formalities.
I'm feeling like goddamn Dalai Lama right now.
Dammit. Now we go the painful way.
That's a start.
Reception. Okay, we may need it later - note where it is.
Great work! The vault should be exposed now. You know the drill.
Blerrie! The auctioneer has run off so you gotta use a drill instead. Get one on the door right away.
We got a fucking police caravan on our ass!
My man is going to leave the thermal drill you need for the job out back. Good luck.
Police about 40 seconds out.
Get over here!
The wheel stopped on flames, I don't think that is a good thing.
Remember, the ladder will let you get up onto the wagons.
Have you checked between the actual trains?
Power's back. Now let's try this once more.
Come on, crew. Get the safes out. Put your back into it.
C4's gonna explode now! Get out of the way!
This has to be the most persistent fucking cops I've ever seen!
I see one!
Damnit! Gas! Gas!
That's 17 bags!
Oh...yeah. That sounds like a good idea. I guess.
Look out, wall breach!
Another vault opens. Bravo!
That's it, yeah. Now go find that laptop and hack into it.
And who do we have here? I don't know you. I don't know who sent you. Is this really how you wanna play?
Great. Hector just "informed me" he thinks they may have wired up the cash with C4 in case something like this happened.
You've found the bomb. No need to keep checking the bomb cases!
You're attracting an awful lot of attention...
Nice work, folks. Now what you're looking for are paintings with red stickers. Those are the ones the democrat wants. Get at least four.
Alright! The boat should be coming in soon!
They cut the power to the house! Lights are down.
Look at me daddy, I did it. Am I a good boy now?
You got it wrong, now we have to find the master code somehow.
OK, we've got what we need. Time to get out of there.
Still silent. Nice. Find the radio.
Not even a block away!
When you're ready, get to the roof and we'll get you clear with the zipline.
Plan A is out the window, we're gonna have to gamble that the server is there!
Still in whisper mode. Good, good. Now find the computer.
Hey! Fuck you!
Got connection. Keep working.
He'll be coming in at dock 9.
Yeah. For sure.
Now, if I understand. As it pertains to my business idea for free bar for my friends, your answer is no?
Delaware Popcorn!
Don't be shy now. Into the complex!
Great job. Now get in the car and let's end this. Or hang around and really clean the joint.
Now move into that airlock. The PEOC should be beyond it.
Connect the winch to BFD with the hook.
There's one of 'em!
Alright clowns, you kept up your end. The hostage is safe and we have transfered the ransom.
Stop, intruders!
I'm sorry you feel that way, ma'am.
The blimp could be all the way across Nevada and would see those.
Oh....Uh, yeah. Well, I guess that would be...prudent.
I'll never tell you!
Blerrie! Go back and redo the hack.
What gave us away?
That barn must have something lying around you can nail across the windows.

Almost there. Blerrie, what a job this one is going to be! I managed to dig up a little more intel with help from Joy. To get into the PEOC, you will need one of the special keycards they use. The most likely place to find one will be in the Oval Office.
You gotta grab the parts of the winch, crew!
Cops just pulled up!
Hook the code breakers up, gang. Two locks - get 'em both.
Excellent! With the BCI tech in safe possession, you have time to get more of the loot if you want to make some good money.
These fuckers are on us like white on rice!
...the object in the floor is our main priority, but it's a shame to leave all that pretty gold here. Bring some with you if you can, yeah?
Gang, you need to find Chavez to get the key. Believe me, you'll know who he is when you see him.
C'mon, get in the vault.
Thank you for preserving our way of life. Money is coming your way like a ten million gallon oil spill.
Reckon the best place for the guys to build the cage is on the road.
Bring the keycard back to the door.
Have you found the safe yet? The address is probably in there.
It's a God damn police ambush!
Bastards cut the power. You gotta get it back.
I got the manager's file here. Looks like the guy was born to wear this black suit.
Come on, guys. Get the plans scanned and faxed. Do it in IT.
Follow Bile! Remember to bring the prisoner with you! And keep him alive!
You have to open up that ark-dinges.
And now Mendoza and his goons are down a lot of firepower. Hector's people will face a lot less resistance thanks to you. He might even appreciate us. Well done.
Those crates should work as a hiding place. Drop both bodies there. Get a body bag for the other guy.
Get the safes out, gang. Yeah, I know it's over a hundred degrees, but get to it.
Two ways to go about this, gentlemen. Go loud - you know how to do that. But if you're hoping to raise your game, look for two keycards and unlock the vault. Car trunks are a good place to look.
He dropped a keycard. Probably for his office. Maybe something there will help.

The Elephant briefed you about the Brain-Computer Interface, right? We're after a high-tech headset and a software that allows you to control a drone using your brain. Trust me, I can barely believe it myself. Anyhow, according to Rust, both things are currently being transported on this train.
Kill 'em!
I will personally offer you a reward for all the evidence you bring out. This is about the safety of crime.net.
Get over here!
Now get inside that building!
All right! Streetlight is history. Grab the goat!

OK, You're gonna need a thermal drill for this gig. My guy stashed it around the back of the bank. Get it and get to work on the vault. Keep in mind there's security cameras and lots of civilians. Go win the gold, folks.
... put all the stuff in the car!
Your talent for planning is as impressive as your talent for execution. Enjoy your well deserved payday. I will be in touch.
How can you fuck up pressin' a goddamn button?!
Change of plan! You have to use ziplines instead to secure the bags!
The window cleaning platform is a no-go. Use ziplines to get the bags out instead.
Outstanding marksmanship. Three trucks got it. They're ready, gang - get out there.
The cannon is ready. Fire it!
Guys! The power! Keep it on!
Time to leave this clusterfuck behind us! Get out of there, NOW!
Thank you!
That's one box down, one to go.
The level of security at a casino typically reflects the degree of wealth within. The Golden Grin Casino is the most secure casino on the Strip.
The fuck you think you're doing!?
Someone pressed the alarm button.
At least 15 more!
Come on, my little Igors - get the tablets in the mixer.
Just one to go!
Light a flare to signal Bile. We need a big damn drill to get down there, which first needs a winch. He'll bring the parts for it.
All right now, careful with this. You press the wrong buttons and there's no telling what you might turn into.
Next, the vault door. It's accessed by two keycard terminals. Swipe them both ASAP. Got it? Now find two keycards.
Good. Use the keycard to enter the server room on the second floor.
Garrett likes history, so maybe something... historical?
All rigth! That's all of 'em! Nice!
Am I in this business for power? Of course - it would be dishonest to say otherwise. But I seek the power because I want to do the right thing.
Where's the shit!?
Ok, we got it. Can't wait to extract those passwords!
Come one friends, throw the cocktail on the door.
... I'll be back in a little while!
A little while longer.
Ha, they still suspect nothing. Just stay careful while the ship is moving.
I need you to take those snipers out!
This is how you succeed, just keep it going.
Great - that's the last of 'em!
T minus 40 seconds. Cops soon to be there!
The ballot machines arrive at the harbor today by truck. Now we don't know which truck but we know the destination is the Shield Mall.
You are looking for muriatic acid, caustic soda and hydrogen chloride.
Hurry now... find those walkway controls.
What a fucking waste of quality coke!

As you know, intelligence and information is my business. And I recently came across something important that concerns you. the Payday Gang. Someone is out to destroy you, possibly kill all of you. This morning I intercepted a message indicating that an agent of these people is meeting someone at a certain location downtown. I don't know yet who these people are, but as you know, I find you a valued asset, and so I want to help you apprehend this agent so you can squeeze information out of him. I'll give you the location and then keep an eye on you while you conduct the operation.
Violence is always an option. Prosecute it longer with this.
There have to be clues around the wharf that'll help you figure out which truck is carrying the machines to Washington. Keep your eyes peeled.
Motherfuckers!
Tiaras, nuclear warheads, and safes. Just another job for Vlad.
The medic bag is in the bathroom.
Look for a circuit breaker to get the power back up.
No deal, assholes!
Intel guys, intel! Get it!
Nice. That's the keycard for the railcars.
No more! There's no more room!
That damn barrier is preventing the drill from coming down. Get to security and open it.
We will make actioning that our top priority. Thank you.
Well, look... I'm going to send some guys over there to check things out.
There we go. Get that thing to the van!
Maybe the code has to do with Crimenet?
Time to put the water hose to use, turn it on!
Any... second...
Look for a code that starts with six.
All right, drop it!
Alright, I'm in. I'll pop that lock for you in a sec. Right now I need you to get back out front, grab the C4 and get it on the street.
First, hit the switch to open the cargo doors!
Move quickly, friends. No time to waste.
Now get those bags in the containers down on the floor. We'll return and collect them.
That's both of the keycards. Alright, get to the vault and get them to work.
That's it. We got the turret. Now all we need is some ammo.
The scrambler just crashed again. Fix it!
Their computer systems will be vulnerable to this.
Just hold on to your horses, friends. The vault will be open any second.
Where the hell is that pilot?
Zero.
Keep moving into the prison.
There's a chopper searching... That's not good.
Awesome! With all those bags, the trade should be smooth.
God no!
Now, search the toyshop for the elves. Convince them they're making toys for me now. And when I say toys, I mean fuckloads of coke!
Chopper is on the way.
No need to be quiet now.
That's the last one for Hector, well done. Up to you boys if you want to get more or pull out.
This is it. I'll guide you through the whole thing.
I'm going to raise suspicion here!
By the book gentlemen. You turned the valve, tapped that source and nobody saw you ever. Payday Gang win!
Get to the weapons lab, friends.
And that's the whole delivery, nice!
Don't break his jaw.
It was loud, but it was succesful. Outstanding people.
That worked better than I anticipated. You didn't do anything to it, by any chance?
And done, nice.
Let the drill get through that gate lock. Protect it!
Moretta. This is Port Washington radio. One zero one E. Over.
All right, system has been hacked.
Jen over at Gensec here. So we detected an unscheduled activation of the time lock there. Everything OK?
Gonna punch your ticket for ya!
Alarm is active. They know you're there now.
The time for action is now.
That's the vault, for sure.
Hey! Don't do that! That's like asking them to send more guards to investigate.
Chopper's back in the area. Watch for it.
My bad. It's caustic soda.
Ok, that's it! You fucking did it!
If you can't figure out which one just bring one up and hopefully we get lucky... Otherwise... This is gonna be a long goddamn day.
It's a trap! They were just waiting for us.
All mooring ropes must be taken off.
Now pop the manhole! We're getting out through the sewers!
Oh, fuck me sideways!
Come on! Fill the barrels!
One down!
There goes the alarm. Guess we gotta do this the hard way.
Gentlemen - today we vote. They say: one man, one vote. I say: four men and lots of votes. I need you to rig the voting machines in my district.
A crude, yet effective tool. If used correctly.
Cops in the building.
Go quiet and keep your eyes open.
Doors are open, quickly now, get inside and find what we came for.

The Benevolent Bank stands at 1500 Pennsylvania. You're going to rob it. Preparation is vital. Lay out your plan - and then execute it. Through a patient of mine, who works in construction, I have arranged a crane to be erected near the bank. I suggest you utilize it.
Kiff, now you just gotta make that hole bigger to get into the vault room.
We are making progress!
That's it! I can't stay any longer!
That keycard is one less thing we need to find.
No time to stop for coffee.
There's a conveyor chute over there. It can carry the loot to the lobby.
Splendid, friends. Now maybe I can brute-force it.
Time to eject! The escape van is parked near the main entrance!
Where's the stuff, man!
Vlad wants a word...
Holy . . .! SWAT-team incoming! Take 'em out!
Good work people. That was a hell of a thing to move, but it's the right engine and it's locked up tight. Maybe one day we'll go freelancing and take it back, huh?
The pallet fell on the roof, huh? All right, so get on the roof. Look for a ladder.
Ok! Here's what I want you to do...
Almost there, gang. Any second now.
Ah hell. Wrong pc. Alarms are tripped. Cops are en-route. Not much time now.
Damn! The alarm! You need to get out of there fast!
Hmm, the entrance looks secured. I suggest you try to find another way in.
Come on now...
So he's a car freak. Well... soon he will be a dead car freak.
I'm leaving in half a minute!
Robbery time. Keep the civilians in check, don't let 'em use phones, watch for cameras. See you at the van.
Ey, you sleeping?
Get hacking those skylight controls and keep the damn cops off.
Aha! The Moretta comm frequencies. We can use these later, but stay focused.
That's his keycard. Grab it.
There must be a keycard somewhere.
Keep the civilians down!
Great! Now set up the connection again.
Blerrie! Those guns will make short work of Bile if he tries to land now. You need to take them out by hacking he control boxes.
Over here!
It stopped on the question marks again.
The headless man rides to Santa Cruz for tomatoes.
I can't lose 'em!
Get those arcane dingeses onto the helicopter!
... I'm coming back in no-time!
What's... Hey! Don't fuck with me!
Just hang on
Hang in there, Bain old friend. Not going to lose you now.
The facility changes very often, so what little I saw when I was there can't be relied on.
OK, good. Let's find that server room.
Excellent work. With these paintings in place in the senator's apartment, we'll have plenty of coverage. Like a Trojan Horse, but lots of them.
A new account. We can get that sorted right away.
That's the managers digit. Serves him right for leaving it lying around.
OK. you're headed to the docks now - this isn't over!
That's it. Now haul those parts out of there.
Damn! They locked out the code. Need a backup plan.
You're on the clock guys!

We're robbing this bank for cash, pure and simple. You need to get into the bank vault using a thermal drill - there are tons of cameras and I heard a guy mention a security room at an establishment I frequent... But not sure.
The trucks are right over the other side of the wharf. Find the right one, get the tracker on and get out.
Don't forget to turn the power back on. Blind here.
You cleaned it out. Time to leave.
Cut through there with that nice blowtorch you found!
Still waiting for that drill.
Hurry! They're flushing down bag after bag of coke and it looks like they're enjoying it!
They're repossessing the bags!
Nice job, gang. Now start getting the goats in.
That's one hell-of-a explosion team! Grab the goods!
Here we go. Hands steady. Just keep it straight. Almost there....
We are made. Action, guys!
All right, the C4's on the ground. Grab it!
Quickly now, get inside the airlock!
The door needs approval, remember. Hurry. Stop playing with your dicks.
The alarm. But no matter. We got enough cash.
Listen - I have a request. We need a cleanup operation - some officers ran into unexpected resistance on a routine raid. There were no survivors.
Fuel receipts, insurance claims. Nothing useful here. Keep checking the terminals.
Clock's tickin', asshole.
Second control room. Controls the gate here. Other one is over the way, see?
Ah! The first bag! You will find a vertical conveyance near the vaults that will relay the loot up to me. It will be perfectly safe!
The boat's waiting for you at the lake. You can zip-line aboard.
That's a spot as good as any. Pile 'em up.
It's supposed to be hydrogen chloride!
Damn, are those drones? We're really living in the future, aren't we? They seem to have a camera so stay out of sight.
Wait! I forgot about the briefcase... There should be a briefcase somewhere in the laboratory. You need to get it before you leave. Don't mind what's in it, just do it.
Left!
Gang. Use the radio. Let me speak to our ship.
I hope these fucking cops go home and reconsider their actions. They didn't treat Santa very well, so there will be no presents this year.
Find the server room. From there we should be able to open the lab door.
Finish this job - crime is for closers.
Drill baby, drill!
Up top, move people, let's secure alpha one!
All right, down here.
What the hell! Come back here!
Where the fuck are you?
Damn, they rigged the boxes with C4! Defuse them!
Go down to the basement door in the back alley!
The trace indicates West End. So look for a clue for that - West End.
No luck! No DNA match found on the evidence. Keep looking and scanning!
They heard the drill! The alarm's been triggered!
... stay frosty!
Good friends, now just add one more ingredient, yeah?
I hope you're ready!
Swell, these will make Cabot happy after all this is done.
Don't forget to get the bags out!
Everything else is gravy.
I can also see that he's balding. You copy that? Look for the old, balding guy.
Get to the control room - the black heart of the facility. From there, you can open the vaults and grab all that, as you say, 'good shit'.
If you're low on gear, go back and check the drop point outside, yeah?
Yoohoooooo! Send the bags up here, my friends!
Not to worry friends, I've gotten in touch with Twitch. He's not too far out and will come get you.
Get her down from there, guys.
I've got bad fucking news, guys!
OK, throw me the bags and you get the delivery!
Payday is upon us soon. Masks on, guns up - and follow the plan. Hit it!
Not sure, but it's probably the right one.
I paid the DJ to play some crappy songs he found online, so you'll risk less civilians getting in the line of fire.
Hector's worried. We're too far away from the coke in this chopper. Once you're on the ground, get the coke, signal the courier and load it onto the pick-up boat.
We got those little pastry balls with the chocolate and cream.
There's one!
Alright! Anything more than this is just bonus!
That's all of them.
Hoxton's rottin' in a cell, and you're scratching your ass in there. Out of the crate!
The vault's open, time to see what's inside!
Abraham Lincoln once said: Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe. He knew the importance of preparation.
Double-crossing bastards! I'll fuck you up!
Pump's finished. That wagon is bloated and ready! Nicely done.
That's 14!
You can move out of the PEOC now.
Load the boxes, friends.
OK, this is getting too hot. The van is leaving. I'll get you a chopper. Stay cool.
Why not one of those video game things?
You've got to keep at least 7 bags!
That was close. Good job.
I'll be there in 2 minutes. Get ready!
There you go, now find the other one.
Mr. Sturr, this is the FBI. You are under arrest for tax fraud and for affiliating with known criminals.
You'll need the FBI boss to get past the retinal scanner. Find him. Lead him there.
Break the big windows if you want the chopper to pick you up!
Looks like more guards are on the way, so stick some toothpicks in your eyes, yeah?
The cops took one of the bags!
Chance for redemption. Do it!
Get over here!
You need to look faster gang. Time is running out.
Ok, coast is clear. Coming in.
Only way to get the doors open is by hacking the panel. Find it.
Thats one, seven left.
Tracker placed. Signal coming through. Now haul ass, and let's hope we're chasing Elephant's machines.
That's the pole. Shinny up there.
Man, the city's a ruin. Roads, buildings...everything's screwed.
I have yet to be involved in a heist where luck was involved. Well-prepared enterprisers take down scores.
Now it's just a matter of time.

Dallas, old friend, I'm glad to have you back after two years. Now you already know I'm a thorough man, so it should come as no surprise that I want to get rid of any ring rust that might exist. Follow my instructions just like old times and this will be a walk in the park. We're after some access codes that we will be needing later, but we need to make it look like nothing but a simple robbery. You're doing this in the quiet, so dress appropriately.
Welcome back! See, you didn't even have to answer the phone, I'm keeping my eyes on you as usual!
No time friends, you gotta secure the artifact!
Someone always wants to fuck my Christmas! Here come the cops. Don't let them screw the elves, yes?
Okay. Banking for another drop. 30 seconds!
All right, you need to get into that slaughterhouse. There's C4 stashed nearby. That should make a way in.
You need to intercept someone downtown. This is for your own protection.
... Drop 'em!
Find those security boxes, friends.
That's what we're here for, friends. Huh.. same kind of writing that Lindenhurst decrypted...
That did it, friends!
The whole god damn airborne WPD is behind us.
They're mining the goddamn parking lot, guys! Be careful out there.
Each vault door has a security system, and that drive will hack it open. Should be useful.
... I'll come back in no-time!
Hector's the rat! That's why the FBI knew all about Mendoza's secret bank, because this damn hardliner was feeding them information!
How's he going to get you out of this?
Take a loot in the Glitter Room, there's a computer in there.
Seeing a lot of SWAT vans rolling in. Those kaks can bring this chopper down. I can't pick you up here. But I have a plan...
Get into the house.
Where's my god damn protection?!
That's another vault open and ready.
The cops pulled the hack. Get there and reboot it.
I can't do it for you people. Keycard and code, in that order.
Okay, the code will open these gates. The vault is on the other side.
OK, bustin' outta here!

One downtown skyway, five pounds of strategically placed C-4 and impeccable timing should give us a stranded convoy of Gensec trucks. Hit them hard while they're still disoriented. Break into the trucks and the strongboxes, and return the goodies to the escape driver.
OK, standard bank hit, only we're going for the gold drop off day. Gotta remain liquid, right?
Let's get to the dock!
Fucking hell!
Nope, wrong one. Try another.
Cage is right where I put it. Like fucking 633 Squadron!
Wait... another vault?
Maybe it will unlock the evidence room. Take it and go find it.
Ha! Going to feed you to the pigs!
Alright... OK, we need at least four paintings, remember, the ones with red stickers.
Time to move!
And still no-one knows you're there. Keep it that way. Find those explosives.
I'm gonna fucking kill you!
Come on guys! I can't stay here forever!
Find the manhole out in the parking lot. You're going subterranean.
Loot the stores in this little strip mall.
Tonight, we go down in rock and roll history, gang.
This should keep the guards busy.
Shit! Crap! Damn!
All yours for the price of... say... 18 bucks.
On my way, boss!
Use the keycard to get inside the server room. It's on the second floor.
Follow Bain to the roof!
That's the warehouse where the voting machines are kept. Time for a little political engineering.
I gotta go in two minutes.
Quit wasting our time, this is less than we agreed on!
ARGH! They got me! I'm shot, I'm shot!
That is the first of some fucking sweet loot! Excellent! Now, you will find a large vertical shaft nearby. Send loot up it by cable. I will look after it.
OK... Outputs... No.. Goddammit... Just a second...
It's made of metal and plastic, but this server has secrets that makes Pandora's Box look like a fucking kiddies toy-chest.
Some Judas fuck sold me. I know they did. But who?
We're contracted for two samples, so get another one in there!
Grab the box, friends.
Four minutes left, guys.
These assholes need to fucking die!
Ready or not, here I come!
Okay, good. Now, bag that body and get it out of sight before someone comes looking.
You could be discovered any minute if you don't leave. Grab the box and make your way out, friends.
Great job, I'm connected.
You'll find it on the bottom floor.
I can't believe this shit!
You gotta take the sniper out!
This won't end well for you, suckers!
Stop dossing, yeah? Into the office!
Get ready for another bulldozer!
Shit! Po-po's here!
Gang, the money's there, just waiting for you. Get at it!
Signal the chopper on the roof whenever you're ready.
Who the - damn cops messed with the hack. Restart it!
Restore the power, friends.
That was easy. Nice work. Unfortunately Hector just told me the FBI has nabbed the remaining Mendoza and are escorting them to the airport in a convoy. Which means we don't have much time.
They've no clue you're there. Now get to that radio.
Ship's in position! Going to hit it like Blackbeard! Zip-line could be a shortcut.
SWAT van on the way.
This is just one of the properties, of course, I mean... its a small thing I picked up on my way here once. You know, two or three years ago.
Bain - can you make the call?
The lobby's too hot! Get upstairs!
Ey man, the deal ain't here. Turn around, this place is ours.
Look out for snipers!
Take care of the snipers, please!
One, two, buckle my shoe. Yes, it would seem all of the bags are present. Now, please, attach your good selves to the cables and join me.
Just head through here and pass through the office on the other side. Make your way down to the basement. Hurry!
Who let them in? What the fuck?
There's the bag, get it to Mr Blonde, yeah?
Jesus fucking Christ... That was too close.
Pretty much uncrackable without making noise. You gotta find a code to open it.
A superb execution. Quiet and discreet. But Gensec won't be able to hide what happened here. Nice work!
Bag those gems.
All right, get those fireworks onto the terrace.
Over here, please.
You got a blowtorch, don't you? Use it on that gate.
OK, first you gotta get to the Oval Office in the West Wing.
It's gotta be worth a lot.
There you go, now make your way further into the facility. And be careful, yeah?
Oh, now I recognize them, it's the Payday clowns!
Branch bank job with a twist, and the twist is golden. Bars, that is. Let's do our thing.
Lasers in front of the vault. Let's shut them down.
While I'm hacking the system, you should go ahead and find those code parts. Remember, one per laptop.
Stop and give up, your escape is blocked.
The van will be there in about two minutes.
ETA is three minutes.
OK, we need to get through that door. Maybe we can use that big dinges in the room to blast through. See if you can point it right, yeah?
Look around for a ladder. I'm sure that with energy properly applied to a search you will profit. For sure.
You need to let the chem work on the door.
We're gonna take it easy on you to start. Vlad just wants you to make a statement.
That's it. Good! I'm waiting for you.
We cannot use the main entrance. Too much heat.
It's easy. Just choose a vault, and press the button. That will start the timelock, and the vault will open. Abracadabra!
In 40 seconds or less - you've got police on the scene.
No grand plan here. Just dash in, grab as many goods as you can, and get them out. And if there are any special ways to stick it to the Murkies, well, I wouldn't blame you.
Just get out of there!
Nice work! Now it's time to get out of there before the place falls over. Let's go!
Huh. That wasn't too hard. Suppose it's true- any old dwankie can get in there!
Fokenwil, that saw's gotta be around there somewhere.
I guess they know we're not selling Girl Scout cookies. Grab the C4 and blast your way in.
Rust really wants a chrome skull for his bike, and we have no time to argue. Use the blowtorch the mechanic gave you when you reach the clubhouse.
Smash it all up. TV's. Lamps. Anything that'll break!
Boat's waiting for you. Get there!
Government employees never work late but security will be there.
They have me pinned down - I can't get the door open!
Take that tarp off there, yeah?
Kill 'em!
Move! Move!
Nice work! The sixth wave was beaten back!
I miss the old Soviet shoes. Not so many stupid models to choose from!
Be my guest!
Port of Washington Radio one zero one E. This is Moretta. Over.
Woah, some of the loot got caught in that explosion. Lucky for us, there is more in there.
Hello, First World Bank. No sir, I appreciate the offer but I think you'll find, in the small print, that we screw you. Hard!
Crap!
Find Bain's cell with the cameras.
OK good, now there is a van waiting for you on the other side of that building. Go through, load up the car, and we're done for the day.
What the fuck... police!
That keycard opens the dock gate. Use it in the control room.
Got word that a certain local entrepreneur has been filling safe deposit boxes. I vote we look into it.
There's a lot of stuff coming home. Weapons, ammo and anything that murkier elements can liberate. Check Murkywater's containers.
Public Relations would be a good place to search for computers.
We got hostiles scaling the wall by the gas station.
Who are these fuckers?
Alright, I'm here. Get the bags over here!
Or what?! Are you two gonna make an old man wait for the next one?
Guys, the EMP will most likely take out our communication when it goes off. But you know what to do, enter the laboratory via the hatch and look for the test subjects.
Light another flare to bring the chopper back, gang.
You gotta restart the override on that box.
That's the pump done. Great work!.
That's the end of McKendrick's re-election dreams - you're true kingmakers, guys! The Payday Gang giveth and it taketh away.
That's no police chopper.
Go on and find... What...
Go lay down the water hose, move it!
Um... John... Smith. Keep an eye out, gang. Company is coming.
Check the arena for closets marked with the red X. That's where the Inside Man has stashed the C4
Lost it! Get the power back, quick!
That's the wall gone. Looks like a few voting machines ate it too. Now move!
Your escape helicopter is here, try and secure the rest, but if you can't I suggest you get the hell out of there!
If you don't bring one, you have to find one. A tool, that is.
It's like talking to a fucking Frenchman. Listen. If you want to use the service ladder in the diner, you need the keycard. Mon dieu!
Look at the that view...
Is this a kidnapping? Why are we here?
Holy shit, what's going on outside? Oh, it's hot in here.
Needed diesel is now at half.
You know what to do. Set the C4 up and let it take care of the rest.
Thanks and good bye, my friends.
Put the delivery in the car...
Stay still and put your hands in the air.
Time lock has started. Should be about four minutes.
Damn. The panic room has more reinforcment than I expected. State Department didnt cut corners. We're gonna need a thermal lance. I'll call in Bile.
Okay. The controls. Hack 'em, and keep the cops off.
The items, friends. Collecting them is a bother, I know, but necessary to this operation.
Security clearance requested.
You still need to find the safe, friends.
There we go, just like in the movies.
Now, the keypanel outside the vault! Hurry!
Right. Yeah. OK, here it is. 8394. Don't share it, alright?
Gonna give you a faceful of lead!
Friends, this was one job we couldn't afford to fail. Not good. Not good.
Tell me if you are feeling sick. Or if hair fall out. Or balls fall off.
I understand we offered you those terms under the Veteran program, but we no longer recognise the Vietnam "incident" as a real conflict!
Hurry up with the coke!
Keep cool.
It's all gone, gang. No point in hanging around!
Thermite should be half-way through by now. You're doing great.
Get back to the security door and get it open using the blowtorch.
Kerels are sending in Medic Dozers with this round.
Police!
Good luck is a residue of preparation.
One more time. Fingers crossed.
See that statue - Lady Justice. Hand her some money.
Hey! They're trying to fuck with us!
Someone isn't too worried about thieves...
Strike! Gonna need to rob more banks if this is your luck.
What do you see? This place is bone dry. Nevermind, we did what we came for, so just get out of there.
This is the police. We are ready to trade for the asset and are prepared to raise our offer.
Aha, the cargo manifest. A little intel on the containers is always useful. It's still general, but it narrows the field. Nice job!
Might want to look in the fitness center. I saw something glowing there.
I'm losing control!
The code has three numbers, each color coded. You'll find them in computer briefcases.
Fucking hell!
Gang, we still need to get the EMP.
Nah, we'll keep everything!
Cash is out of town and you are in the clear. Reminds me of the bridge job way back when.
Mr Blonde can't escape unless you create that diversion guys!
Put the product in the car!
Friends, let the timelock go tick-tock, yeah? Your patience will be rewarded.
Metal detectors are now disabled.
You have delivered as promised. You proposed a plan, and you executed it. Enjoy your payday. You will hear from me again.
What are you doing to my paintings?!
Don't touch the ladder! Disable the powerboxes!
Let's get the goats in here.
We're doing this nice and quiet. The computer we're looking for should be located on the second floor.
Nope, no vault. Move on, keep looking!
That's right. Keep going. Almost here, my friends!
He was a bakvissie anyway.
You! Get a move on!
Find that whiteboard, guys.
That's half of 'em.
I'm coming in one minute!
The boat won't escape the cops' attention forever. Get there, now!
Diamonds are forever, but good coke disappears fast. Go get it!
I've had it with these guys man!
Find the prison transports.
Hey, these vents should be perfect if you need hide a body or transfer loot through.
Hey gang, how about we take on the big one?
Power is back! Get back to scanning the test-subjects.
OK, Vlad's part of the deal is done. You can either settle for that or push on and get more bags.
OK, great. Rember both the number and color.
OK, he's off.
It's the WPD! They've been following us!
I've left you a keycard, an arc cutter and some breaching charges, my friends. I could press a button and open a door, but we must hide my involvement, yes.
Great. Now get it across the yard. Look for the crane controls.
Gentlemen - I have a golden opportunity for you. Politics and art at its best.
OK folks, the trucks are about to go. Find out which one has the ballot machines and get the GPS on it. Gotta be a clue around there.
Keep an eye out for the chopper.
And here they are!
Okay, now you gotta use the first card in the security room, and then you gotta be quick to swipe the second on the panel by the vault door.
Press the symbols in the correct order.
What are you waiting for? Get on the ship!
Guys, we're running out of time. Get to the drills.
Boat's moving, he'll be at dock 8 by the warehouse.
Under pressure here to turn the chopper over to medical evac. But they pay shit. I'll be there in 2.
The convoy's stopped, move toward the bus.
Holy shit... I just wanna get this crap over with...
Up! Up! Up, up, up!
Something wrong with hose.
That's the last stash! You got'em all!
Shit, I guess I had it coming!
Luck is a matter of preparation meeting opportunity.
Keep the crowd controlled.
That's the address! We've got what we need. Get back to the van and we can get out of here.
That's 18!
Great job, gang. Bile is on his way with the EMP now and will drop it close to the lumber mill.
Out by the parking lot. Won't crack open without a saw though, but there's one of those around here somewhere.
Access granted.
Well, I'll be damned, you found a blowtorch. Now we can burn our way through the door.
What are you trying to pull?
Sending the van your way. Twitch will come from the upper bridge side.
Taking damage! Keep the cops off of me!
I'll be there in four!
This is Jen at Gensec. Our systems picked up an unscheduled activation of your time lock. I'm just calling to confirm everything is fine.
Capitol Hill Candy!
... put the stuff in the car...
Hey clowns, the safe - drill it!
That's it, gang!
Get drilling those containers!
Portable computers... three of them.
Got it! The casino manager's code.
Clear a path for the truck, clowns.
Good the machines are hacked, take the stuff you want from the other trucks and let's get out of here.
You need to find Garrett's office.
I'll eavesdrop, relaying...
All right, bridge is turning back. Gonna take a few minutes though. Hold off the cops, gang!
I'm waiting at the gates. Hurry up.
This feels like something out from a cowboy movie and Bile likes it, gentlemen! Anyhow, here's where I drop you off. I'll be on standby until you give me the signal to come back and pick up the loot.
Not much time. Hope this is the right one.
Is this the fastest you can be!?
Uh, hold on...no flight plans submitted. Who are these guys?
Put on your masks when you're ready to get this rolling!
Let's go! Let's go! We can all fit in the elevator.
He's en route now with C4. Just hang in there, gang.
Man, that was beautiful. Just beautiful. Like my dear old momma. (sniffs)
Deal's off!
Once here I will have it verified. Stay put.
15 grand guys.
That should be a quick fix! Get a drill on that gate, gang.
There are only a few ingredients left. You want more, just use a flare to signal the helicopter. He's got what you need for cooking more. Or you can bug out now. Up to you.
Great. Now crack those trucks open. Let's see what Vlad was shipping.
Yeah, they just put snipers into play.
We don't need BFD breaking down on us, crew. Make sure she has plenty of coolant. Get water from the bathroom.
That should do it. Now start the time lock again. I hope that it worked.
Hmm, Bile is right. You should get to the top of the overpass so he can pick you up.
Find a laptop and plug the USB in. It should be nearby.
Hot shit, there's a fire up there. You in the booth! Deal with it!
Guys... Guys... Guys. We were supposed to get info... Not just cash. Hector's going to skin me alive.
You're right under their nose...
That was superbly done. Quiet and effective. Excellent work.
These Harvest & Trustee branch banks are easy pickings for guys like you. Case the bank so you can find out its weakness.
Don't mess up or get seen now. Almost there...
We need to see the server before we go.
OK, I can't stay here forever!
The main lobby.

Great work! The hacked machines have made it look like the Mayor's people were behind this. Even if an enquiry exonerates her, the papers are hurling so many buckets of shit at the Mayor that she's finished. And The Elephant? Well, his man is picking out new furniture for City Hall. Great work, gang!
That's a keycard alright. Take it!
Still got a box on the conveyor.
That's it! That's what we're looking for.
Nothing can now stop Vlad - nothing! I will be the king of this city and my men will be my army to use for good profit. Perhaps you see us on news. You will smile, and I will also, also smile...
Kerels have cut power to the office. You gotta get it back!
You need that keycard, friends.
OK I'm at the pick-up!
There's our prize. Bain will be happy. Take them and go!

Gensec have a brand new vault - the Investment Safe. Unbreakable, they say, and they're showcasing it at the arena. The door is made of their new compound - Vivinite. But everything has a soft spot. With a bit of C4 and a new circular cutter, we can steal their cash out right from beneath them.
I mean, hey. We was royalty, you know.
Have you taken care of the food yet?
This is the only entrance to the bank. At least until the SWAT's start making their own ways in.
Now if that won't get people talking, I don't know what will. That was amazing, gang, and we're getting a juicy payday out of it.
This device should be found and delivered to my client for... "Evaluation". Also, the know-how should be erased so it does not end up in the wrong hands.
Good work, crew. Now if Hector knew we just hit the FBI for the info he might worry a bit. But what Hector doesn't know won't hurt him. Let's go banking, shall we?
OK the escape driver's coming in hot as hell! I think he's going to get shot up if you don't cover him.
We are prepared to renegotiate the hostage release and have been authorized to make a higher offer!
... shoot these fuckers!
The chopper's here! Watch out for snipers when you're moving the loot!
That's the last mistake you're ever going to make...
The mainframe, gang. Get to it.
Looks like we're out of luck. This one's no good. Go get me another. Look harder. Guess better. Don't care. Just get it.
Gotcha! Our guy is somewhere in, hang on...
An FBI boss is your best bet for the key. Get it!
Might be a little something in the safes...
BFD's tanks are drained. You can refill them in the bathroom. She's not fussy.
The computer got interrupted. You have to defend it better!
Alright, just sit tight.
A very unorthodox way of solving it - a heist in the heist. I appreciate your cleverness. Votes will be cast correctly now!
I'm there in two!
Here they come, get ready.
I'm gonna make you bleed!
Go to the roof and wait for the "choppa"!
Now subdue the auctioneer so you can get his keycard.
Vlad, you crazy...okay, guys. That's the deal. Sometimes it's nukes, sometimes it's goats. Get looking.
Hack the console to open the display cabinet.
You gotta help me get through! Get to a terminal.
Activate the sprinklers. You got to put out the fires.
Come on. Climb aboard! Well fucking done, my friends!
Looks like you beat that wave! Keep it up!
Fix up BFD and let's finish this. Come on, crew, we're so close.
Another wave of attack incoming!
OK, hook up the server and let's go.
We're gonna make the rest of your life real short!
Get up to the second floor and look for a weakness in the floor or something, yeah?
We've got your money right here. The info is in the safe. I'll open it. No funny shit or you die.
Finally, the chopper pilot is heading back to get you guys. Sorry for the hold up.
Do not harm the hostage! We are willing to renegotiate for a larger sum!
The lead scientist is dead? Shit. Without him we aren't getting past security... Well, I guess technically we don't need HIM, but rather HIS hand...
McKendrick sure has a lot of influential supporters up there. They're expecting to cash in if he wins, I'm sure.
Benevolent Bank. A Neoclassical beauty. But business calls. We're going to need some codes, so get to their servers.
So what do you really know about these Payday guys? Can't imagine this shit is our fault.
... are you having second thoughts or what?
Woah! Wherever Commissar is, he heard that!
All right, let's see what we got.
Control yourselves! You'll end up chewing through metal until next week!
You got an assault incoming.
There's your chopper. Get the bags in it. Then you can bug out, or stay and find more loot. It's up to you.
They're firing at the tires!
One perp apprehended, over.
You gotta get that thing out of there.
You are exceptionally gifted. I am not disappointed.
Gonna cut you into pieces!
They are taking the bags!
Great, that's the part he needed.
Bain, you chop... don't you dare die...
No time to waste - get through that door!
The workstation, friends.
Probably people working here. Keep an eye out.
Vlad wants us to to uh, redecorate a little.
Shoot that cannon, friends.
Put him down in the chair and get the codes out of him.
Get the money and clear out ASAP!
Damn, they interrupted the hacking.Get it started again!
Think it's almost there... Hang on... Wait... fuck! It crashed again. Get it rebooted.
Here goes the next one. Hope that wasn't the one.
I've had it with these guys!
This is Bronson, I'll be there in four!
What the fuck!? Police!
OK. I'm here and ready to drop your delivery.
Oh shiiiiiit!
Come on friends, saw those units open!
This crate needs to be opened with a tool as well.
Get searching the wagons. You can expect a fast response from the cops. Remember, you're looking for the wagon with the vault!
Keep looking for Ralph.
Right. I'll take the first, but you can keep the glory.
I gotta bust outta here in one minute!
I'm glad you showed up! As you can see, I need some help here.
I am sure that they are very safe. But, regardless, make sure you enjoy every day of what life remains to you.
Keep the cops off the circuit breakers if you want to make it!
We need to open up the rest of the house. There must be a switch somewhere.
The code has been blocked, so forget about it. Going to need another solution.
Charon gave us a password for a laptop that contains data on where the money is. Find it!
Yeah, listen. We can't have any screwups. The boss is nervous about security.
And what would you like as a side? Uh... sausage patties? We got 'em!
Got it! Now get back to the vault and enter the code.
Good afternoon. This is the Benevolent Bank. You're speaking to Martin.
The crash site is just after the underpass - Hurry!
The garage is right below that Investment vault. It's where you need to plant the explosives.
Nothing yet.
The code should have a five at the beginning.
Guys, this is the boat.
Get him out of the car fast, then get to the transfer room on floor three.
Stick a blocker on the keypad to stop the code cycle.
There's a power box nearby, see if you can't take out those detectors.
Run! RUN!
People, I'm turning back now.
I admire your attitude. Your dedication will pay off.
They shot me, but it's only a minor one. Barely hurts.
They're sending in Zeal Marksmen with this wave.
OK guys you're the best there is. Let's show DC we mean business. Money time.
There goes the block. FBI SWAT is going to be here in a minute. Get in!
We need to get inside the lumber mill. Why not see if you could use the anti-air gun we hacked earlier and redirect its position? Might be worth a shot.
You got one minute til that Captain raises the alarm.
OK, the cops, they just stepped up their efforts. Tougher units incoming!
I need to be patched into the mainframe so I can hack the system.
Sit tight, gang. The helicopter will be back to pick you guys up.
You gotta saw those trucks open to find the target!
Only way back is forward, people!
You will die for this!
You benefited from a thoughtful plan. Your discipline impresses. Enjoy your payday. I will contact you when I require your expertise once again.
King - you know King - man, that fat bastard sure loved to snort blow.
On my way!
What the hell! It's the cops!
The helicopter is coming for the tree now!
The dropzone will be long gone if you don't hurry. Jump!
Put all the stuff in the car!
Get out onto the lawn! You're almost out of time!
The fuck do you think you're doing!?
We got enough now...
That's it. Open it up and let's see what we got.
Now just hold tight and wait for Bile to drop the winch.
Well executed. Guns destroyed and Hector is informed. Let's cash in.
Damn it! They've turned of the power to the server! Get it back up!
Uh, fuck....reporting a near miss. Coming around again.
Yeah. Something about a hit on the motel. Hope Yuri survived.
Two.
OK, the owner of this mall stopped paying Vlad protection money. His mistake.
There it is. The McKendrick museum. Somewhere in there is a priceless diamond. Let's get it.
Damn, more coke flushed. Thousands of dollars swirling away with the turds. Hurry!
Twitch, you are good to go.
You guys OK in there?
How it got up there is a mystery.

OK, this is a bank job, but it's a safe deposit hit so it's a little different. You need to go in, careful to watch guards and cameras, drill the vault, crack it, then get whatever's in those safe deposit boxes.
The street is where we need to assemble the cage. Move it!
I knew you'd get out of that mess. You got all of it too! I'll let Hector's boat know. See you at the harbor.
Well, no turning back now! That was a hell of a bang! Get into that truck and do your part of the job!
Ok. Got him. Name, social security number, name of his dog... Find him. Check the screen in IT. Oh, and he's a slot machine addict, Might be a good place to start looking.
Paging Dr McCoy... Dr McCoy?
Some weird shit happening on this job.
The alarm systems are disabled. Get inside!
Ah, you got it wrong. Maybe bringing hazmat suits would have been a good idea. Wait until it stops reacting, then try again.
There we go, friends. That's a good spot to cut through.
You need to find a way into the control room, yeah?
Use that blowtorch you got a while back, yeah?
Pick up the C4 and then plant it on the floor right above the panic room.
That went as well as it could under the circumstances. I'll make some calls... find out what really happened to Locke.
Splendid, absolutely splendid! I confirmed the transaction of 25 million.
We were close, but....time to bail. Still get my cut, right?
It's hacked. Good. Find another.
The Oval Office is close. The keycard you need to enter the PEOC should be there.
Good, now just hang back a bit.
Hold them in position!
Bain is heading for the canteen, follow him!
Chopper's retreating! Wonder if Gage can get us SAM's.
Roger that, Broadsword. Approaching for a roof pick-up. Over and out.
Come with me.
Hey, what's going on here...
You done? Good. Put on your mask now.
Here come the cops!
Look for the security panel, gang. That's the only way in.
Ah, nice of the keks to leave this lying around for you.
OK we're good to go. I'll get you guys cleared to the safe house. Their arsenal is gone. Their soldiers toothless.
Chopper's on the scene. Get him there. Just pray he doesn't reach for the controls.
If you manage to do this quietly it will hurt his party and thus pay substantially more to you.
Anything could be on that server. Maybe the President's email address.
Uh, everything is fine. This is the bank. What do you want?
Russian chopper pulling out.
We hit that vault and hit it hard. Ready?
Fuuuck. Guys, come get me in the parking lot!
Run, run!
A fully functional methlab! Get cooking, if you see a formula, or scorch the place. I'm sure you've burned a few methlabs in your time.
Get back to the security gate and use the thermite.
That's the alarm guys. Watch out for the cops!
Come on. Get inside.
Keep at it.
I'll start calling him Rudolph, that red-nosed drunk fuck! Find him, and find my coke!
You dwankies! We needed Garrett alive!
This is going to be a monster!
We do not have a deal!
You need to get through that door, friends.
Counter-clockwise friends. That's how you remove a screw. Most of the time.
The Payday Gang is here to help me! You should run!
It's the cops! They've followed us!
Oh... Wow. Hope those wagons survived.
Grab the encrypted flash drive. It should be in a laptop somewhere.
The drill has been delivered. Find it and get it to those vaults.
The cannon isn't going to fire itself.
Enter the Oval Office so you can get the keycard!
Here I am, assholes! Over here! Now, over there! Ha, made you look!
Plant that C4 around the glass dome.
Ok, good. The charging has been restarted.
Go out to the van and pick up the C4. Plant it on the street.
Guys, it feels like something's in the air... Money!
Kill 'em all!
Okay. That's good. Now get more in there.
How are you coming along?
... you sure are some thorough sons of bitches!
I expected nothing less than another fucking fuck up. Fuuuuuuuuck.
Don't let the cops stop the timer!
Burning 100 million dollars is a hell of a thing. It makes me feel like a real banker. All in a day's work. See you at the safe house.
OK, Bile is on the roof. Get to him ASAP.
What are you waiting for, friends?
That's a nice, full load. Sit tight, gang - Bile will be back.
Crisp and neatly stacked. Don't be shy, gang. Go get it!
This is the workers' locker room. Check for a keycard here.
Thats the wrong direction! Or is it? Go East. Always East.
You're all down, yes? No broken ankles? Good. Now find the first money pallet. They're there somewhere. Find em, and light a flare.
Fuck!
There's an override switch in the security office. It closes the bank's shutters. That's gonna help you keep the feds out of the bank.
I want a beautiful Christmas tree with presents in it!
Well done, still calm and no alarms.
We can not leave without that briefcase!
Damn, they've upgraded to the Mark 7 detectors. Going to be a bit more difficult.
The chopper's there, guys. Stow the loot and bug out!
OK, we got three!
It should be muriatic acid!
Try splitting up. One of you might find me.
Ok, now for overriding the main panel.
Why was he there? He's the cook!
Get the coke into the truck!
You're in. Ha! His password was: iheartrainbows44. The requests are on the way. Approve them!
Helicopter inbound. Aw no, they will see Alex! Hide!
Run! Run!
Dig in somewhere good!
Great, now get into the vault.
Old Locke thinks the vault is behind those doors...
Aha! That's it! Cold Fusion, right here. You've got the keys to his airplane, remember? Get the hell out of there!
How much for parking? That's a robbery!
Well, we're not getting the van down any time soon, so blast the doors.
Keep that news feed alive and I'll start getting you a way out of there.
Well, not ideal, but we managed to steer the election a bit and make people uncertain of the legitimacy of the result. The Elephant will get what he wants, I think. Now it's time to get paid.
The cops are on our tail!
Ah, fuck you guys. We're doin' this shit.
Ah! The cage was empty. Did you let the cops snag it back? Nevermind. You guys are just gonna have to mule it out the old-fashioned way.
First router has been hacked.
That's it friends, hurry back and get through the gate, yeah?
Wait... Wait... Wait... NO. Dammit I can't take anymore of this. Try again. You're narrowing it down at least.
The code you have has been disabled, but I think the system has a master code. Let me do some digging.
Alright, I'm coming back soon.
Bile is in-bound. Be ready for him!
Getting a nice clear signal. Time to leave, guys. I hope you tagged the right truck.
Balloon is up. Are you seeing it?
Question marks again. Be ready for anything.
Put a gas can on the paintings, guys. Then shoot it.
Bile's on his way to you, but he can't land with those trees in the way. Find a saw, and clear a way for him, then mark it with flares.
Just put the ticket back in the gate and we're home free!
Get into the elevator with the box. Twitch is waiting for you in the basement.
They're coming from the east, by the forest.
