The vault's open and ready for you, gang. Just grab that loot.
18 more needed!
That's the right choice, guys. Keep scanning away. We didn't come all the way to Russia for a small payout, now did we?
Hey, great. You found the keycard ahead of schedule.
I'm pretty close. Just give me a few minutes.
You can go for the cash after you find the primary target.
You want a loan to rename the Wizards? Back to...the Bastards? I don't think that's correct.
Damn it! I lost power to the server! Get it back up!
Let's skip the formalities.
Set off the fireworks. Stand back. Stay safe.
It's a trap! Either you defuse these C4s or you get the hell outta there!
If you got any more loot, secure it in the tree now! Or it'll be left behind!
The AA gun has been disabled! Now, grab the laptop and head over to the next one!
OK guys, get inside and locate the art. We want the paintings with the red stickers on. Look out for guards and cameras.
No one even heard you. True pros!
Get Hoxton up to the street. Get him to the safe house!
Got a plane en route to pick you up, but it can't land with trees blocking it's path. Find a saw, clear the trees and mark the landing with flares. Don't worry, CIA been doing this for years.
Don't slacken off now, yes?
He's back again? Alright, let's try one more thing. Feds can't resist food. See if anyone is having a late snack and put some by his office.
There'll likely be workers here. Don't let them blow this.
Received, Broadsword. I see the marker. On approach. Over.
Check two overrides, two more to go.
That's half, we need 2 more.
Goddamn cartel! They electrified the goddamn vault. Get to the generator on the roof and shut it off.
I'm connected.
Red Squares!
Here's the deal:
The code will be stored on the auctioneer's PC, so get hacking.
This is the best spot I could find.
Evening, this is Agent Green. Today's code seems incorrect. Just need to confirm.
Fires' out. You did well, gang.
I can't believe this shit!
It'd be wise to find some cover in that warehouse.
There's a thermal drill at the gas station. Fetch it.
Bain, I'm outside now.
Ok guys. Let's go in. Quiet or loud, you can kill this guy any way you want.
There's a second can of thermite there. Someone grab it.
Show 'em, gang
Oh - my guy stashed the thermal drill around the back of the bank. Good luck out there people.
I... I can't shake 'em!
You gotta help Charon! Clear the street!
I see one!
Ok, that dinges over there is what we're after. Protect it, yeah?
If there's nothing left you want to take, hurry and get back to the car.
Keep going!
Ten seconds and I'm gone!
Fuel tank is full, well done.
I told you, people. I don't know anything about a 'master code'.
Yes, good...picking up telemetry from the money now. Right on target. Oh, why don't you grab those parachutes there.

Like I said, this is a bank job for gold. It's a small bank, but they've got a lot of security and a lot of customers. You're going to have to work hard to keep this from turning ugly. Drill the vault, the floor plans say it's around back.
Feed the Fed, friends.
OK, the traitor's identity is classified. Not a complete waste though - we got a sample of his DNA! Good work. Now, get back to Hoxton.
Throw the bags in.
Good, now hurry up and turn the lights back on or people will get suspicious and sound the alarm.
Pilot is coming in hot, guys. don't let the cops grab any goats.
And that's the second batch of C4. Almost there. Find the last batch.
You found thermite? Excellent! Head back to the steel gate and melt those bars.
R.I.P. these fools to pieces!
Now burn some rubber!
Now, ditch the bags into the vent by the elevators. They'll be fine, don't worry.
Heads up, sniper team just set up on a nearby building.
Blow a hole in the wall and run!
The Butcher's explosives are in one of these containers.
C4 is in place. Just need to press this button and...
I'm there in four!
Sold out? Fuck, someone just got a great deal on a pound of coke.
OK, three left.
Nice work! The third wave was beaten back!
*grunts, wheezes*
Be careful, Dallas. Wait for him to move first.
By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail. Benjamin Franklin was a wise man.
One of 'em contains the vault. Find it.
Get the fuck outta here!
Murkywater are moving some huge currency reserves by cargo plane. I've got an idea to get it.
Get him into the chopper. I can't hang around here forever.
What's a Gensec truck doing way out there?
Kill all the rats on that bus. Hector wants no one to step off at the next station.
Ok, find Mitchell. He's our guy.
Just a little longer...
You are one stupid asshole!
He'll be there soon!
This is funniest thing I watch since execution video. Now, that funny.
Your call how you want to do this...
You guys are Godlike. Keep it coming.
Good. Now, drop the charges at the main door over there.
Ok, connect me to the laptop, this should only take a moment.
Don't klock him in the head, just find the circuit box!
Don't! Don't mess with Vlad! They learn no messing! Thank you for making point for me, and money is for you to enjoy. I see you again!
Crap guys, the backwater radio chatter is heating up like a mother. Someone is VERY interested in what we're doing. Be ready for major trouble.
Come on, we watched the show and you know how to do it. Set the C4!
Are you having problems?
The gang that stole the Diamond. Outstanding, gang!
Don't wait around too long, yeah?
Taking to much damage, I have to get outta here, I'll be back!
Right, now you gotta find Garrett's office.
Don't let me wait now!
But we can't just do that - we need cover that up with a much bigger crime, so just take down the bank in the meantime. I know, it's a little excessive, but then again we're good at excessive.
I'm here! Bring the goats!
Aw, no! The metal detector is new!
We're taking the train - grab the zipline up to the bridge!
Vlad, are you crazy! Nukes!?
I see one!
We're gonna make your rest of your life real short!
... then you get what you came here for.
What the hell, I'll do you guys a favor...
Okay! Now go find a gas can. Shoot it to set the paintings on fire.
My bad. It's muriatic acid.
You gotta get that thing out of there.
Now check the screen for the code, then go and open the vault.
You remember when we hauled the samurai armor out of here? Ahhh, good times!
There's no doubt they have the pardons locked inside.
30 thousand dollars...
That's nine bags!
Gang, that's a heavy SWAT van that just rocked up. Be ready.
SWAT raining down from street level. Watch your heads!
Five to go.
My money would be on the buildings having the keycards. Search 'em.
The Mongol's were great warriors. Would love to see them in action.
You stink of sweat, ese. You've been running a lot lately?
Hustle it. Get to armory in the guards locker room! We need that C4!
Keep defending!
Get down there, I'll show you a secret.
Right!
Too fucking close... Too fucking close...
Ah, it's a FBI operation - no way out! They're going to take you down unless you shoot your way out of there!
Yeah, there's a charge on my credit card the wife can't see. I was in Mexico and...
Move up to the windows so you get a view of the street!
An offer is on the table, but it's hardly even enough to bribe our dear Mayor! Press them for more, friends.
Good move.. that's bound to lead to the warehouse.
The display cases are now disconnected from the alarm. If you want to grab some extra souvenirs, now is the time.
Ah, good. Butcher has send help. Untie me now please.
It might be worth coming by consistently.
Remember, we are after the rat, Head for the bus, keep your heads low and move from cover to cover.
Too much heat for me just make a break for it with the car. Gonna need some help guys.
Careful, Dallas. Patience is key. Wait for him to move.

Ernesto Sosa has a special lock system for his office, with a spoken pass phrase. But I have planned for it - I had my people sell some special cocaine to him, with a microphone recorder hidden in the package. See if you can find it.
Watch out! SWATS on the roof!
Police units just got here!
I've had it with these guys!
Goddamn cops!
Hit the roof and run over to the connecting rooftop.
Hey, it's Mitchell, over at Keel Street. The pipes, you know? The ones you "fixed"? Yeah, they're leaking again!
That's it! I'm off now!
Yes, that's right, all of you up the shaft, please.
Get that winch secure!
Is that one of GENSEC's armored cash transports? If you open it we could get some additional cash from this job.
You take it easy for now, while I make a deal with the cops.
Six left.
OK, people! One more bag - we just need one more bag to satisfy Hector.
Move up to the windows, see what's going on!
You see the control room up there?
The manager will likely be around the back. His type don't spend much time with the plebs. Black suit, balding.
Alright, we're close. Get him to the top of the tower on your right!
That's it! I can't stay any longer!
Don't' forget the door, yeah?
OK, that probably does something interesting. Try it.
Don't give that sniper time!
There's no turning back - get out of this goddamn place!
The winch is where it needs to be, but I need your help attaching the magnet.
The van had to leave. He'll be back soon at another location.
Oh, you are overdelivering! Very nice.
Make it count guys!
How did it even...?
The cops are gonna find me here!
Get back to the helicopter and secure the BCI tech!
Excellent. Now if you would be so kind as to deposit the charges near the door.
Have you found the floodlight switch yet?
You should see me coming any second!
20 and counting - cops imminent.
Let's get to the docks!
See this tattoo? Got this off the king himself. Fucking A, man.
Van's here. Head out when you're ready. He'll wait.
OK, I'm back! Get on board the chopper!
Interesting. OK, those lights have some kind of connectors around there. See if you can find them.
This better be the right one! Don't have much time now.
Good job. More cash is always welcome. Now, run back to the helicopter and get out of there.
Do the words "rig the detonator to the charges" ring a bell?
Hector is going to kill you!
They cut the power! Get it back up!
We need more, hey, I already told you.
That truck looks perfect. Now get the safes loaded on board - all of them.
Don't hurt me It's my birthday.
Damn it, so close!
Our Minigun Dozers will make roadkill out of you, clowns...
Watch the back!
Job done, guys. Now sneak back to the van and we can consider this one closed.
Great job, guys! You got the prize!
... super close!
The old drunk is on the ground again. Get him to his feet.
Closing in!
Gonna give you a faceful of lead, faceful of lead in you're head!
Made a bad bad step, amigo.
Friends, I'm waiting for you!
Bring hose and connect to ship.
Guys, we're in the middle of the city - try to do this stealthy.
Look around. There should be clues that will point you to the right truck. Perhaps matching their color to the containers.
I don't know exactly where the entrance is, so you gotta look around for it.
Gentlemen it seems our mutual friends were quite pleased. Thank you for the prompt delivery of this invention. Now the world will return to business as usual.
That's it, router boxes taken care of.
Great! We don't want to alert the crowd so we're gonna detonate the C4 in time with Alesso's pyrotechnics. Head up to the tech booth and hack in.
You need a pass phrase when you call Ernesto Sosa. The phrase should be on there.
You benefited from a thoughtful plan. Your discipline impresses. Enjoy your payday. I will contact you when I require your expertise once again.
...IF my calculations are correct.
The server with the results should be around here somewhere. Find it and make those votes unusable.
You gotta make the jump, guys!
Hurry friends, pick up the box.
Faster guys!
Muchos gracias...
OK, bustin' outta here!
I think it's time we leave, don't you?
It's finished. You should be able to get through the gate, now.
Guys we're looking for a tiara, might be in a safe, gotta be inside though.
One of the guards must have discovered the body! Hurry and take him out before he ruins everything!
We're in a train yard, there should be tools laying around somewhere. See what you can find. A blowtorch would be perfect.
Alright, I'll be there soon!
Okay, the scientists working here are using some next level shit. You're gonna need the lead scientist for handprint authorization. See where he's hiding.
That's it. Well done! The vault is opening again!
OK, I'm going to need a little bit of time.
Shit - what kinda move is that! Go in! Go guns blazing, we gotta get inside!
The chopper is in the area. Watch the skies.
I got one word for you: whooooooooooooooooooooo!
Look for something connected to that place.
I hope everyone heard that! Three minutes until the pick-up car arrives! Defend! Defend! Defend!
An assault wave is on the way, no dossing about!
Out, out, out!
You shouldn't have made me mad!
The cops are gonna find me here!
Shiiit!
Come on, gang - get the water pumping again!
The saw isn't working, you need to get it going again.
Aw, you guys are lucky - I'm feeling generous.
They spotted you! Kerels are on the way soon!
Kwaai kwaai. Now secondly there should be a security station nearby. Head there and approve the opening.
Keypads, electronic magic. Ah you can do it!
That's one of the cards for the vault. Remember, once you have used it, you'll need to find another.
Eight!
... Put the stuff in the car!
Acid, guys, acid. Get some and pour it in there.
They're dropping off guys on the roof. Get up there and deal with 'em.
OK, move to the next step.
To business! There are crates near the entrance. Got a little red strobe on. Find them. They have a few little presents within.
We weren't fast enough here, the getaway just left.
Let's put this boat in the water and find out if it leaks.
Great thinking. The voting machines are heading for the mall in region 6, see if you can find the company that ships to that region.
Heads-up friends, you got a bunch of dwankies incoming! Mr. Blonde, you look after that kÃªrel while the boys take care of the others!
Are you having second thoughts or what?
Hey, I got your escape driver coming in by boat. Head over to the small water access area near the river.
You don't destroy a man's car! You just don't do that, you hear?!
Great work! Time to dust off your tuxedos, gang - your invitations to the inaugural ball are in the post.
What a mompie. He's better dead.
To get past Garrett's code lock, you'll have to disable a few security boxes in the area.
Point of no return - this place is getting hot! Get out!
You're looking for four bags of jewels minimum from this place. Easy.
This spot is getting deadly!
Ho ho ho, bitches!
Arriving in four!
Ok, connect me and I'll have this done in a few seconds.
Put the idiots out of their misery!
Feel that bass.
Those shelves look a bit out-of-place. Make sure to search them thoroughly!
He's almost there. Watch where he drops the bags. Grab them, assemble the cage, and send up the balloon. You're going to like this.
A helicopter is approaching. Damn, they'll see Alex!
The code should have an eight at the beginning.
They're fucking firing at the tires!
The van will leave in one minute. Make sure you're in it.
Grab it, grab it now!
Now get inside the Oval Office and find the keycard.
You still need to get that key, and that means finding Chavez.
Aaaargh! You fuckers, I'm coming for you!
I'm on my way!
Are you so dumb that the third pallet - a fucking inanimated object - can hide from you? Find that cunt.
These guys, they remind me of some game I played, man.
Hmm. Looks like one of the boxes we came for is in the archive. No way to get in there on foot, but there's a crane you can use in the central hub area, but you gotta find the right shelf.
There's going to be a server nearby. The votes are on there. Find it, and wipe it out.
There could be more equipment in the drop outside, friends.
Don't stand there waiting, follow him!
Hey, this is Hilary at Gensec. Is Barney there?
You can bounce now, or you can stay and give the Golden Grin a thorough cleaning.
There he is!
Listen, you know, getting paid to do something you love...it's a dream, man.
The White House IT dwankies aren't as dumb as I thought. There is a firewall blocking me. TouchÃ©.
You need to get that Jewelry box!
Heated outdoor pool with bar.
Yeah, it's go time.
There's going to be a tabulating machine or server nearby, results are on there. Find that server.
Hey, he dropped a keycard. Not for the storage room, that'd be too easy. Head to his office.
We should've fucking switched cars!
Wrong one, maybe you need to have another look?
Come on, you kaks! Strap the money to the chopper so I can take it away!
His club will be full of people - get past them to his safe. He should keep that close to himself. If he dies he dies! If he lives - he is lucky shit.
Don't loose that keycard, you're gonna need it later.
Don't feel bad. He was a bad man, for sure.
I just saw someone escape. Get ready for trouble.
You cleaned the place out. Good job. Time to get the hell out of there.
Maybe tear down every last book from the shelves until something turns up?
It'll take some time, lots of data to up and a small pipe.
Shit! Po-po's here!
I guess we better do what the little hood rat bastard says. It's tough to be a criminal in a town as rotten as this.
That's not how we do it! Never let them take you. This job is over.
Now the vaults exposed, we're going to drill down. A big drill. Which needs a winch. Signal Bile with a flare when you're ready.
Goddamn cops knew we were gonna be there. Too many of 'em for a simple diamond job. Civvies too.
I wanted to remind you that our All You Can Eat buffet is now open.
You know, on second thought - we'll take everything you have!
How many safes is that? A quarter? Keep going.
Hit it!
Almost there. You should be able to hear it.
Come on! Get him in!
Remember we're after the voting machines. We need to hack them to turn the favor towards McKendrick. Look for them in shipping crates.
Hello? I am coming through? Boat will need more fuel to make international waters.
Reducing the number of security guards on site will even out the odds.
Transport's here. Get the bags to the van!
That gate is your escape!
One more minute, then I gotta scram!
Everyone get ready to make a little withdrawal now.
Well I didn't bring it in. I got it out here in my trunk.
Remember guys, the payoff on this one is important.
Hey! Get this gate open!
Use the C4 to send those radars tumbling, my friends!
Stay frosty.
Drill or saw... Maybe you have a more exotic way to get in here I dunno.
More bags, gentlemen.
Well, that's that. He got a look at me, so I had to... let him go.
Genghis Khan. Carved an Empire from Korea to Bulgaria. Great warrior. Would have loved him on the crew.
Go Go Go! Cops will be here any minute!
Now, you ready to call it? Find our Insider. She's going to show you a way to slip out.
Get going friends, no time to waste. Open those doors.
...I'm 68% sure.
There might be grates in the sewer, so I left you a little present - some thermal paste. Aren't I nice to you?
I'm here! Get him in!
The van is just waiting for you to stash that loot. Get busy!
Shit, what was the code for the safe? We need to burn those files!
Looks like we caught Gensec. Hopefully they're dropping off. They might have a keycard. Get at them.
Armory open.
30 more seconds, then I'm out!
Kill 'em!

Friends, the Elephant has provided me with some intel, and I've managed to locate Bain. Kataru dwankies are holding him in an abandoned prison from World War II. The facility is located on an island in international waters off the coast of northern Oregon and has been in used by the Murkies since the 70s. I have pulled in a couple favors and bought you a ticket on a small civvy submarine so that you can sneak into the place and get our man back.
Back to work, keep me covered.
Ach, it looks like they are raising the security a bit. Be ready to encounter more Murkys, for sure.
What the hell!? It's the cops!
Now, take him to panic room so he can use the retinal scanner. Should work.
Kill Garrett's lights, quickly now.
Very good, a silent kill. This is what happens to those who cross me.
... when it's done, we'll give you what you want.
It's open! Bag the money!
Shit!
The bollards will be controlled remotely. Security office or something. Find it, and get them down.
Good job assembling the cage. Can you do as good filling it?
OK. Give me a minute or so.
Let's finish this the old-fashioned way, yeah? Put a hacking connector on the boxes so I can patch in.
To get inside the Oval Office, you gotta go through the access point in the West Wing.
I hope this hunk o' metal has air bags!
Keep going guys.
Okay. Time to get to the front and act normal.
Put the delivery in the car!
Yep. Yeah. Alright, that checks out. Have a good day.
There's a boat ready for you. Head there.
With the speed this train is going, you'll have about two minutes before you reach the barricade. That means two minutes to secure everything and leave!
Crap! You were seen, and the convoy is rolling out. We need another way to find our truck.
Ok, so maybe blending in isn't our style. Sending the helicopter now!
That's it. I'm ready to lift this baby out of here.
We're here! Find The Dentist's loot, and let's get it out of here.
I was there when The Cockroaches split. Greatest fucking band ever.
There's one!
Defend against the cops! Don't let them grab any money bags!
Cold and calculated, just like we want it!
All right, guys. Here's Locke... Be careful up there.
Almost here. Hurry! You beautiful bastards!
That was one hell of a crash. The cops aren't gonna give you a break though, so get on your feet!
Amp it up guys - more!
Great, you're in. One more door between us and the server.
Clear the street!
Woah! Bulldozer in the truck! Take him out! I guess they were expecting trouble.
Defend the drill. Should be through in a couple of minutes.
Be afraid... Be very afraid.
Don't let the coppers take back the hostage.
Here we go. We should be through in a couple of minutes.
We got everything we came for. Now, head for the lake. Fedor is waiting for you.
Ey, yo.
Yeah it's acid, muriatic acid.
Waste 'em!
You still need to get the managers keycard. Find him!
What the hell are you doing here?
OK, that's probably enough stolen evidence to cover our asses but you can always get more!
I was hoping you'd say yes. The money could get my underwear back.
Charge up the cannon again.
Great. Now get it to the vault. We're doing this the old fashioned way.
The fuck do you think you're doing!?
Great. Now start loading that cage with bags.
I'm off in one minute.
Put the box on the conveyor, friends.
That takes care of the safe. Now you can open it up!
Now use the other keycard in the other control room. Let's open the gate and get the Moretta out!
The thermite's done - about time! Now enter the vault!
Come on! Get him to the tower!
Excellent, gang. That's all the bodies scanned. Now we need to get our hands on that server storing the data.
The cops will get you before you get me. And I will live!
C'mon friends, no standing around.
Caustic chloride. Says it is liquid form... Wait a minute... Should be soda, right ?
Another power loss! Switch it back on!
Yeah, this is Bile...
Keep cooking people. Tempo!
I know you want to put a bullet in his face, but you got to stay focused, yeah?
You need to hack the auctioneer's computer for the code, yeah?
Holy! Was not expecting that. See if she had something for the gate.
Alright that's it! I'm off now!
Chopper is on his way!
Put the product in the car...
OK...
Just grab that loot and let's get it out of here.
Shit on a stick, here they come!
Die you bastards!
Yes!
Attention, you leave us no other option but to apply more force. This is your last warning.
The alarm sounded but it's too late for the vault. Get it empty, as fast as you can.
Great job, I've got connection!
Remember we will need at least four bags of meth.
They're on the roof!
There's a security office on the upper floor, in case you want to get rid of the camera surveillance.
You're not gonna like it when I get angry, eh!
That crowbar will increase our chances of getting additional loot before we leave.
It's a piss poor location, but the pilot will collect the cage from the street. Be ready.
Security? Security!
Get to the platorm with the bags!
Damn it! Cops are on their way. Not much time now.
Great! That's what we came for. Once the driver drops 'em off, he'll return for the ammo.
The police have been alerted and are closing in. They'll be there any second.
To cover our escape, you gotta set a fire trap in container 12. Use gas.
OK look around - find the escape van!
There's a blocker on the system. Get to another terminal and help me break it.
It's not that we don't trust you, we just need to make sure that nothing will happen.
Yo! Help!
Someone better fucking explain this shit to me.
The Golden Grin never closes. You want to waste time nickel-and-diming the slots...?
Aw, bone me in the ear!
We're working in the lab, late tonight, letting your eyes behold an eerie sight. Get cooking on the table, bubble and boil.And keep the cops from bringin', trouble and toil.
Remember, you must apply the C4 to each of those radars.
Great! That's the server, now set up the connection.
... put the delivery in the car...
It is time for us go. Go!
Drill the van open! Get it out of the way!
The keychain! Get it!
Alright, fuck this, time for me to dash!
Soviet era machinery. Slow. So slow.
Get that body out of sight.
Sounds like a present fell outta the tree, gang. Might be more of Vlad's coke. Find it.
Close... Come on folks... Getting there.
30 seconds until the train arrives, friends.
No need to carry that artifact around, just put it on the conveyor.
You guys sure take an awfully long time.
Murky ambush! Kill the chops!
Crap! Alright, forget about using the zip-line. Our guy had to run when the cops showed up.
Classic job, gang. The First World Bank.
Maybe you can find something to get in there. Have a look in the utility closet if you can find it.
Check your six tougher SWATs are rolling in!
These guys are fucking jokes!
They interrupted the hack! Restart it!
They're throwing everything into this. Hold them off, my friends. They'll kill you, but they'll fuck me proper. For sure.
You think you can take me down eh! Think again!
Get the hell out! NOW!
The asset is secure and we have released the funds to your account. You win this one, clowns.
What... that must be my police scanner, the cops are nowhere near.
Good job! Finding extra loot always makes me happy.
Keep defending Hoxton! If things are getting hairy, use cards to override the security barriers.
The shells are tucked away. Nice work, I'm sending your getaway.
Stop those guns so that I can bring in Bile!
You can't go wrong with gold. The Harvest & Trustee bank is trying to up its liquidity with a large deposit. It's something we should take advantage of, don't you think?
The government owes us lunch money. Looks like we'll be taking their turret and a few bags of ammo as compensation.
Crap, someone got to the alarm. Alright, time for plan B.
The cops are on our tail!
There is an access door to the PEOC near the library. Get back there and find it.
Time to use the keycard you picked up. Have your gun ready and take out anyone on the other side of that door.
Dude, as soon as the government bail-out arrives, shit, I'm buying Detroit!
The game is on, motherfuckers!
... Kill 'em!
We need the mechanic's help to put together Rust's bike. Follow his lead.
I think it's looking good.
Two minutes. Get off the road, old cunt!
Things are heating up... Those are snipers!
Whatever you're doing, keep doing it.
First thing to do is get to the West Wing and find the Oval Office!
Fucking hell, you threw it in the water!?
I'm rolling so I should be with you in a little while.
Your escape helicopter is here. Try and secure the rest, but if you cant I suggest you get the hell out of there!
It's done! Open the labdoor!
Great! We are back on track!
Guys, you can't have searched the whole train yard. You must be missing something.
Ach, it's blocked. Can't use C4 either. Check that R-FID reader!
They took Eddie out! You're still on foot, guys!
For any questions pertaining to the changes in next weeks duty roster, please refer to form 47B-5A.
I gotta dash out in two minutes!
Get that gate open and search the boxes.
Theres a jewelry store downtown, fairly simple target. But be ready for the heat if the alarm goes off.
I don't know what you're talking about!
Anyway, find the paintings marked as sold and take them. We need at least four to be safe.
Watch out! Bulldozer in the transport!
That's all! OK esse, Hector will be pleased, I'll meet you at the docks.
... then, we'll trade.
No worse than being locked in a van with Wolf's ass on semi-automatic. Find the exit.
Fuck me, we needed those cooks. I'm going with chloride.
VR headset. Find it, that's where the coke is! Check the electronics store!
That's one socket, but that big beautiful girl needs another.
Okay, I need a gas tank and some exhaust pipes. There's a ceiling lift inside the workshop and that's where the bikers store them. Get the stuff down and toss them to me.
Guys, I can't read you. If you're still in there, GET OUT!
Shit!
Keep those Murkys away from us!
Cop switchboard just lit up. Expect company, gang.
This is a new tactic. I'm seeing cops placing tripmines in the parking lot. Don't let them get that shit set up.
Since this got messy, we've gotta do some clean up. Find the security room and grab the camera footage. They might have caught something we don't want them to.
Nice suits! Ha! Come on in!
Get to the overpass and then keep going up the hill.
So. All right. You're sure? You don't wanna invest in a campaign to make bananas less banana shaped?
Hey, where you going? Back in the car!
Search the other wagons for C4! It should be inside one of the crates.
Why does it always have to be hard. Try the apartment... Maybe they have the info... Somewhere safe.
Moretta is on the move. Going to take a while before she is berthed, so you can stay low and quiet, or use the time to hunt down any extra loot. Up to you.
Great job, guys! That server is worth a lot of cash right now. Don't drop it.
Uh...aborting due to...geese. Coming around again.
You know that coke is worth a lot, right? Right!? Hurry hurry hurry!
Gang what's going on? We are not leaving without the briefcase.
That should be enough. Take the recording and move out.
Ten seconds now!
Clock's ticking, people!
Great. That loot will satisfy our arrangement... however, if you wanted to carry on... I am just saying... hmmmm?
Power's back. Get to the terminal and restart the download!
Illegal untraceable weapons. This is what Gage is all about.
Get inside the evidence room and find evidence related to Hoxton's case.
Okay, now you need to look for the actual Murkywater trains.
They're blocking the road. Damn. Is there still room for the plane?
... then you get what you came here for.
Ah, the weather could have been better for sure, but nevermind. Just get inside.
You've got to steal that toy!
Blerrie, They're sending in Cuff Cloakers along with this group.
This is it. Pull over.
I'll tell you what - we were never gonna deal with you guys! We'll take it all!
That truck has our gold. Get after it!
Winston won't be happy!
Get up to the roof and light a flare to signal pickup.
Hey you bastards! You forgot to make an appointment!
The entrance to the PEOC is close to the library. Make your way there, friends.
Hurry! Cops are already on their way!
Hot damn!
See that timer over there? Hurry up if you wanna secure the loot!
OK, I'll set these off remotely. Now get back to the storage room. It's open!
That should do it. He won't be back soon. Thank the culinary spirits for bad chili, yeah?
You just headbutted the motherfucking hornets' nest!
West Wing should be open to you now.
We'll settle for this right here.
Find a way into the warehouse, we need to signal the loot boat from there with the dock floodlights.
Enemy inside!
Go pick up the drill and thermite. It's hidden inside the copy machine.
You'll need to induce a soft reboot by overheating the system. That'll get you access to the controls so you can grab the server.
Grab the C4, gang!
Ach! If the kerels are here too, Garrett must be stepping up his game in helping Murky, to go all the way out here. Or he's just very pissed with us.
Get that guy into the chopper. Come on, go!
We have a big problem, half the Washington PD is out there.
You better enjoy your life while you got any left!
You're in, but the alarm was triggered. Lock it down before it goes off, and we can keep this caper on track.
Nice find. This'll come in handy later.
Get that thermite back to the vault.
You got everything. Time to go home.
The last intel I got put it on the other side of the building, yeah?
I'm betting the keys are locked away somewhere. Find the storage.
This spot is getting deadly!
Keep them away from the device if you can.
Son, you have until I count to sixty to get them over here to this phone, or I'll send every officer I have to drag your ass to the CTF.
You executed on your plan with ruthless efficiency. I am impressed. You will hear from me when I require your services again.
The Grin's vault can only be opened with a three digit code. This is one of the numbers we'll need to open it. Make a note.
We're going for a roof pick-up. Start shifting those bags to the top of the bank and put the cage together.
Answer the phone!
Flames?
Those are all the bags we need but you guys know the drill, if you want more - stay and get more!
Head to the archaeology wing. There should be an artifact somewhere in there.
You destroying my things out of envy, huh?! Motherfuckers!
We got twelve!
That's the left panel. Now search for the other keycard. Get the other panel activated.
Alright, get ready! Get me the required amount of bags and I'll meet you at the safe house.
Alright, minds back on the job. The house is littered with evidence that could still screw us. Deal with it.
Bam, that's the doors, I'm still working on the paintings.
I'll carry Bain to the copper if you just keep those Murky chops off us!
You come here to disrespect us?
Cover is blown friends!
Boom! There's a garbage truck positioned to pick up the bags. DÃ©jÃ vu, I know.
Don't let the cops near the cage. Those sneaky bastards can walk off with your hard-earned cash.
You'll hate me for this, but only until you're dead. Nothing personal!
Hey! What the fuck!
Nice, seems the power is back.
People, I got the pick-up driver right here.
I think you're pissing up the wrong tree here.
A little heavy on the drama there, Locke.
We're looking for the agreed amount of jewels from the store... If you want more, go back and get 'em.
Nothing happened here. Can you do it? Ok, great. Let me know when it's done.
The gun needs to charge before you can fire it. Look around for a control panel in there.
Throw me the bags!
OK, we're loaded up!
Now, validate that blood sample.
All right, I gotta get back to the steaks. You know, it's like a hundred-dollar a pop up there. Come see me when you're done, right? And hurry up.
We're done, let's move and get out!
Slap some C4 on that wall, crew!
Here come the cops! Come to fuck up Christmas. Hold them off, and make sure those elf bastards don't slacken off.
Seven bags!
I'm hearing that the kerel are sending more SWAT turrets to take out my helicopter. I can't pick you up in town. But I prepared for this.
Get the Moretta out of the dock. When it's berth, get aboard, get the explosives, get out. Got it?
Alright, this is where the van will drop you off.
There should be four trucks. See if you can find them.
Grab the counterfeit and do another load or take what we have and scram.
Right guys, great job but you gotta ---. There's movement ---.
Well - those are snipers.
That's the alarm! The server room's locked down now - we can't access it!
Now you just have to find a way into his office.
Caustic basic reaction is now added. OK you got any soda around? Add it.
Gotta do it faster!
Did me first stint at Strangeways. Just did me last. I'm not going back, lads.
That's all I have room for.
The alarm locked down the server, now get that last barrier open.
Blast these fools! Do it now!
The first bag! Bellissimo! Now, close to the vaults you will find a tall vertical shaft with cables. Attach the bags to the cables, and they will be lifted to me.
There might be janitors and other civvies in the building, so take extra care.
Copy that, In holding pattern til you give clearance.
That's how it's done! Now, grab the stuff!
Over here!
Release the balloon!
Almost there now, just a few more bags and they should have enough.
Move faster!
I'll tell you what. We were never gonna deal with you guys! We'll take it all!
If anyone finds out what really happened to Elvis, let me know!
You fuck with me? I fuck you! You!
I think you just wiped out everything. All of it. The farm. Well done.
You can probably hack through one of the doors on this floor with a saw, yeah?
The Mendozas are going to be busy loading their guns in the warehouse. Go in and hit 'em fast before they go all Lord of War on you. Get those weapons or destroy 'em.
Chopper's headed for the lumber yard - be there!
Coming from floor 2, heading to the gates. See you there.
Those snipers will get me soon if you don't take them out!
Just a few... More... Seconds.
OK guys, we've got another job from Vlad. We're gonna rob a nightclub.
Oh, shit!
If you patch me into a phone, I can try to give the dear Commissioner something to do elsewhere.
That box there controls the gate. A few snips, a bit of rewiring... and open sesame!
Five to go.
The safe house. Let's put that to the test.
Blast these fools! Do it now!
You're done - get together everyone!
Search the office! Get the guys name! Not much time.
Donnerse! That's what we came for? Grab it and get out of there, yeah?
Chopper's on the way people, just hang tight!
You gotta get the keycard in the Oval Office!
OK, looks like a proper cocktail, now get that stuff on the door and let it work, yeah?
... Put the bags in the car...
Get in and look for the Murkywater trains. You should be able to spot them fairly easy.
Kill 'em all!
Over here!
Die motherfuckers!
Chop chop. The feds will be here any moment.
Hmm... Sosa's office seems to be locked up behind a separate security system.... hang on...
19 bags left.
Shit!
The info they have will be in a briefcase or something like that. Make the trade and have them hand over the info to you. These guys are scum so keep your eyes open.
Hurry up Goddamnit!
Now, we have a little jol with the Commissioner. Go find his office, yeah?
That's one of the keycards for the vault, but you need another. Keep looking.
Attach the frame!
Did you check the boxes?

OK, you go to the harbor like we planned. Offload the coke from the pick-up. You'll need to signal Hector's boat in the warehouse to get him to come in. Once he's there, get the coke on-board and the boat driver will do the rest.
Use the zipline up to the bridge! The train is the only way out!
The machine's done. Keep going. The Elephant wants to make sure his man wins big.
I fuckin' hate hospitals, man. I ever turn into a vegetable, you guys end my ass.
Okay, that's one keycard. Hunt down the other.
My guess is the code is in someone's email. Find an FBI terminal and gain access.
Hurry, friends. Murky are going to swamp you if you don't get moving.
The message has been delivered. The job is done, I thank you.
Security room's around here. Look for the door with the keycard reader.
Come one friends, that's not Bain. Open the right one.
It shares a vent with the Security Center.
I'll try another spot where it's less hot. Follow me.
Get into docks. There'll be security, so stay hidden and stay quiet.
Wow! Guys? Are you OK? I told you to be careful!
Domkop courier didn't stash the winch! He's gonna get it later. Ok friends, I'll have one coming shortly by train.
Nicely done, now get to the other one.
You have no choice!
They're going for the weapon!
Right. Fuck it. I gathered all the intel we need to one of the servers. Someone grab it and let's leg it.
Hey, I said we need more!
Good, now the next hack.
One of these trucks is the one we want. When you've finished searching for clues, get the tag on the truck you think is our target. You get one chance, so make sure you're certain.
Don't want to get stuck in there with Garrett, so make sure you don't lose him.
Thats all of them.
Adios muchachos.
You need to get the bags back to the window-washing rig.
Perfect, I knew you could be trusted, Alex.
You're gonna die, motherfuckers!
Keycards - is there any game that don't have them?
Alright, I'm here!
Plug that hard-drive into one of the train vault security systems, I should be able to hack it open.
You've got to keep at least 2 bags!
Fuck!
Yeah it's Twitch, what do you need?
Put the stuff in the car...
That looks like the cargo manifest. Good job! It narrows things down. This will make our job easier.
Nice haul! This will bring in a nice chunk of change. Good job!
Here's the deal:
I can't believe we actually got the Diamond.
The walkway controls... find them!
Damn, that vault is big. Need more water. Let the chopper refill. Hold tight!
Not pretty. Not a great achievement. But any day you walk away from is a payday.
SWAT chopper tailed us from the scene.
Ok, the first step is to find the head of security - he'll have a USB stick with access codes for the house. He always wears a green jacket.
Fucking clowns, you shouldn't be here!
Head up to the apartment, my associate has the info and the cash to pay for the extra meth.
Now would be a good time to break out that torch you found before, friends.
Damn, did the Commissar bring this piece of crap from the Motherland?
Tanks should almost be done. I've got Bile coming with a package for you.
They're going for the asset. Stop them!
Man, if we get out of this one, I never want to see the inside of another office building.
Pilot just landed the passenger. You can go home!
You trying to pull a fast one on us, huh?
Damn, those warheads are heavy. Maybe use the forklifts.
Case the place before lighting things up. Maybe there's a better way.
OK, escape plan: Go up to the server room, blow up the wall and escape through the basement of the neighboring building.
He's got turrets too! Watch it!
The next people they send will probably be more dangerous.
OK, this is the bank. I advise casing the place, then grab the thermal drill from the back parking lot somewhere. Hit the vault however you want. There's usually a security room so be cautious.
Do you see me? No! Do I see you? Yes!
Look, there's a girl in the window.
I have to leave in two minutes!
About one minute until the customer arrives.
Quickly now, friends. In and out like mousey ghosts, yeah?
You must have shit for brains, coming here!
The escape van won't be able to get through unless you move those police cars!
Locke wants us to sabotage the radars. Better get to it.
Where's the shit?
They are coming from the railway bridge! Watch out!
Find those numbers, gang! We need all three to get into the armory.
13 to go.
Hurry and turn the power back on.
All C4 in place. Get off of the gate now!
That house is going up in flames. Let's get the product to Hector and get paid. I wonder how much he pays for the blue.
These are some persistent motherfuckers!
OK, that's it. Get to the vault and open it with the keycard and code.
Go to the skylight with the box.
I'm sure a lot of nefarious shit goes down at that motel. Take a look around. See what you can find.
Looks like they're setting up snipers on nearby rooftops. Keep your eyes open!
Excellent. Now, let's just get a detonator on there too.
No no, there's no need for that.
If you need more gear, have another look at the drop site, friends.
I bet you though we didn't expect you guys!
Those guns will make smelly swiss cheese out of Bile's chopper. Take them out by hacking the control boxes.
Please don't shoot, don't shoot me please.
Don't screw around in there - get it done!
The heat's rising!
Looks like I found one for you.
More coppers are going to arrive unless you shut that alarm off.
No too long now.
Well done. Get into the chopper and lets go get our payday.
What the hell? Elephant's sources didn't mention an additional security door...
Look around. The codes must be written somewhere. I can't stall them forever!
If you plug me into the lobby computer, I can hack the door.
Ok, you're there. Now, see the RFID reader by the gate? Open it.
Remember, we need three bags!
They wanna mess with me, I'll mess with them!
SWAT helicopter incoming. Get ready to face some heavy firepower.
You need to add the hydrogen chloride to keep the process going!
FUCK YOU!
I'll be there in one minute.
Superb! Now, just drop the charges near the main door.
I can only take three at a time...
Expect me in 2 minutes.
Now head to the hatch and hook up the cable.
Alright, ten left. That's half way!
Hell yeah. Those missiles are perfect. Take them to the radar.
It was messy but you got the job done. Nice work!
Leave the mask off for now and start by "casing" the place. Walk around a bit and see what we're up against.
Gensec on the scene. You've bloodied their noses before, prepare to do it again.
Hmm... she's right, gang. Let's destroy some of his stuff and see if we can provoke him.
The keys are in the storage room. Grab 'em!
You heard the man. Let's find those trucks.
There you go, armored transport served on a silver platter, just open her up and secure the loot.
The secondary servers should overheat if you turn off the flow of coolant.
You just fucked with the wrong people, my friend...
Damn! They drove through Wilson's wall.
Don't make me come down there, eh!
Sons of bitches!
Get in.
I love a good wine with my borscht! Tasty!
Okay, new plan: sneak past that one and find the security room. That way we can disable all cameras at once.
That's the alarm. Screw the keycards - we're blowing the gate. Bile is close by. Drop a signal flare, and he'll drop the C4.
Well those look like FBI heavy units. Watch yourself.
We're in. Alright, keep the cops off it. Might take some time.
I'm done with the first box.
If he's not going to stick his head out, we'll have to draw him out. Start destroying his things and see if that makes him mad enough to come out and fight.
Good start, now get the rest!
The Crime.net station is your ticket to action. Go when you are ready.
C'mon friends. Find a way inside.
Up with the balloon! It needs to go higher!
The getaway just left without you.
Twitch here, about to return.
I'm leaving any second now!
We don't have enough paintings yet! Can someone get me access to the computer in the surveillance room, fast? I'll get it open, don't you worry about your pretty little heads.
This would be easier if the city wasn't a ruin. Just hold on.
Look for the EMP parts. That's top priority.
Now get that winch put together in the main hall.
Hey! What are you doing to my stuff?!
Watch everyone. Stay vigilant.
*Whimper*
Alright, got the package. Heading home.
Search around for the Tin Boy toy!
Can you page Miss Pizakuick? First name Ayneeda?
Fuck ME!
Hurry up and get back to the chopper so we can secure the BCI tech.
Let's skip the formalities.
This is one of the ship Control Rooms. Computers can be used for entering GPS targets, or you might find Moretta's comm frequency. There could also be a keycard or radio here.
.. or stay, if you're feeling greedy.
They're attacking me! I'm a sitting duck here!
Magnetic keycards are useful for stealthy entry.
Get ready, guys. Moretta's almost at her berth.
Just throw the bags in here!
Keep working guys.
This is your standard jewelry store knockover. If there is such a thing.
If you see anything interesting... Save it. I'll have a look at it later.
To get there, you need to get past the security door.
Hurry now, go find the artifact in the bio-lab.
I see one!
That's it, gang. Now get back to the trains and get your hands on the EMP bomb.
Bah, surveillance didn't show that. Well, you gotta get through it.
They're taking up positions in a nearby building... Keep your eyes open.
Keep looking. Pull out the books if you have to.
OK, we're here. Time to go to work.
Cover me! They're tearing my ass to pieces over here!
It has to be in there somewhere. Check the safes in the back first.
This is the wrong town for you amigo
That's all of it. We'll make some good money from all this fancy stuff. Head back to the chopper and get out of there now.
Motherfuckin' pigs got Brown!
I'm going in exactly 30 seconds!
Get the prisoner up that tower!
This is the emergency ladder. Only way up to the roof.
That looks like it might be the server room. Better save it for after you find the cash. Remember where it is.
There's gotta be boards around that barn. Use 'em to block the windows.
Snipers! On the roof.
Oh hell... I missed the roof... Guys, the C4 landed in the back alley...
See that copy machine? It has the goods should this caper go loud. But let's try and not let them happen, huh?
Incoming! From the lumber mill! Stay on your toes!
What's a Gensec truck doing way out there?
Nicely done, friends.
Hell, that's a sight! "BFD". Or "Big Funky Drill.".
Cops have messed with the time lock. Restart it.
Ok gang, no time for backslapping. Get out of there AS --- something ---.
If I will catch you, you'll never get away with that!
A nice quiet day in L.A.
Guys, the city is locked down! Cops are defending in depth, and you need to drive through. Loud is the only way. Driver's taking it easy, so stay with the truck!
The police are suspicious and are calling the house. Stay put.
That's the server room, get inside and hook me up to the computer.
Remember - the keycard on the lock there? Not fucking rocket science.
There's one!
The gates protect the vault area. You have the code, right?
You're getaway is all ready. There's a bridge just down the road, and Twitch is on the other side, with a truck. Just drive right up into the truck and we are done!
Excellent! Go there and get hacking.
Waiting on that network access gang.
OK the vault's open!
Time to go get Bain.
Get aboard! That was a fucking excellent job, my friends!
The code is on the screen.
OK, the gate is open, get to that subway entrance.
If you have more, let's do it fast!
Get to the library, guys.
Well this looks like a gold mine now,doesn' it.
The cops closed the valve, get it open!
There he is!
You're in the lair of the beast now, gang. Better loot, but bigger risk.
I fear the main entrance is not an option. They are all over it.
Get 'em off of me!
They got the 211 call... Cops are here...
Alright. I need you to do one more errand before you bug out. Get to the security room and grab the footage from the cameras. Just in case they got anything incriminating.
Ah, the donnerse isn't here, whatever it is. Garrett probably hasn't picked it up from the evidence room yet.
I'll make it happen.
I'm rolling in exactly 30 seconds!
Turn those valves off.
... put the product in the car!
Hurry up!
Blerrie! Didn't work. You must've mixed it wrong. Wait a bit and try again, yeah?
Welcome to Russia, gang! Nice welcoming party, right?
The gun is ready to go, mash the fire button and enjoy the show.

This is a hit on a small bank but it doesn't mean it'll be easy. We're going for cash: you want to get into the bank vault, get the thermal drill out, crack the vault, bag up the cash and escape at our van.
Almost there, I'm ready in 30 seconds!
That's half the required paintings, you need to get the rest before we can roll out.
Now. We need keycards - two of em. Use em on the door.
Head for the store and grab a hostage so we can negotiate our friend back from the cops.
Gonna buy you a one-way ticket to Deadville!
Here's what I want you to do:
Hacking the circuit box will stop the fan.
All right, my dear friends. That's enough loot to make this op worthwhile. You decide if you want to keep going. Every extra dollar, rand and rouble strengthens our friendship, yeah? For sure.
This is where you boosted the samurai armor. Remember?
...that gold would make a nice bonus. Bring some with you if you can friends, but remember why we're here.
That should make things easier. Say, why don't one of you guys light a flare for me too.
Cops are on our tail!
Damn! The cops have the mall locked down. So we're getting you out by air. Light a flare for the chopper.
Get the hell out!
Commissar's men will be on edge after what you did at the motel. Still, this should come as a surprise. Get your masks on, and put that rat down.
Looks ready, now all you gotta do it let it work some dissolving magic on the door, yeah?
Snipers across the alley!
I was gonna light up. You ain't gonna arrest me are you?
Looks like the Feds got a better budget this year. That's a new model K, no way to get in quietly without the code.
Look out for ways to get in. Has to be some weak point in the security. Get a close look at that fence.
There in three.
Alright...
Right, the fuel tank is full, the blades are spinning and the cargo is secure. Time to get out of here. Gentlemen, please join me aboard!
FBI files... I could stay here all night... Alright I'm on this.
Guys, I will try to get you an escape plan and find out what the bloody blazes is going on, yeah? The warehouse should still be safe for a quick breather.
The gunship is back. Keep your heads down, gang.
There it is.
You must check pump. Is not working.
OK, friends. Get to the choppa!
The Dentist tells me the Russkie's move a lot of meth out of this dump. I'm guessing they're brewing it up in one of those upper floor rooms. Wrecking that would get the Commissars attention.
Guys, the alarm countdown is ticking. You NEED to take care of it!
Who are these fuckers!?
Crack them open one at a time, and watch out for cops.
They're using C4 to take down the walls!
Who let them in? What the fuck?
That's ten!
They've stopped the crane, get it moving again.
That alarm needs to go quiet. Find the switch for it around there, yeah?
Those lights are part of the locking mechanism.
Gonna miss giving that arsehole Roscoe a sound thrashing. Maybe we could break him out too?
Gonna give you a faceful of lead!
Well, that's quite a mess all right. Now get these bodies out of sight.
Get some eyes on that vault.
Get that C4 on the door.
Two time locks... hmmm. OK, we'll need keycards to bypass them. Security here is too low-level to have those, so focus on the civilian researchers. Pretty sure a few of them are carrying keycards.
These terminals likely have info on the Moretta. You can search it if you want. Intel's always useful.
Alex, ready for the lift.
You still gotta cut the power.
*grunts, wheezes*
There's a car waiting for you, just across the road.
There are the safes. How beautiful they are. You will need transport to get them out safely. Look around.
Now, time for the real dirty work. I used to work as a customs officer in Mariupol. Snap the gloves on.
Damn it! Plan B, just find that server room!
OK, we're coming up on Vlad's old stomping grounds. Go in there and get Vlad his money. Send a message to these people that no one is safe from crazy Vlad. Roll out before the cops shut you down.
Did you just break a vial? Don't get that stuff on you!
Always wanted a helicopter. When the bail-out money arrives, I'm buying two.
The van won't be able to stay long. You gotta move fast when it arrives!
I'm under fire! Help!
We're going to be done soon - I hope.
13 to go.
Keep the cops off the drill.
Put holes in 'em!
Captain Smith, congratulations on your promotion. I'm sure you're grateful.
That should be the last door. Almost there, almost there...!
This is going to be bumpy, so brace yourselves! Only one truck to deal with. As soon as the doors open, hit it hard!
That's the door. Now grab the stuff.
It doesn't look good, guys - it doesn't look good!
And....ta-da!
C'mon gang, you gotta get to the lab, find the right shelf.
That rug looks wrong. My guess is it's covering a hatch. Well, we'll worry about that later.
Ammo bags, ECM jammers, medic bags, trip mines, sentry guns.
Time to get this party going, yeah?
Start the winch and it will move BFD into position. Don't let the cops stop it!
What was that room again?
Get inside the White House!
Another one. Good!
Cops are on the way. Time is important, so hustle!
My recommendation is you hustle those bags to the van.
Wait.. Did you just? But I told you to not use the ECM until I said you should...
There he is; the one in the white shirt is the Taxman.
Keep 'em off the drill!
Well, I'm sorry to have to do this, but here's where I clear off. It's nothing personal!
You're going to need to get into the vault using a thermal drill, get whatever's in there bagged up and moved back to the escape car. Use your judgment and don't be greedy... Good luck, folks.
You can tap the feed from the roof of the building, sorry we couldn't do better. Get into his hidden vault, take the gold, and leave a little coke there to finish the frame job.
Die! DIE!
KÃªrels are just outside! Be ready for anything, yeah?
It's... room...
OK, Bile is racing your way now!
Almost! Almost, almost...
There's the alarm. Cops are en route. Keep hacking those machines. I'll think of a new plan.
I'm smoking anywhere I want!
You see that one asking for the loan for the pasta restaurant? Sure would like to make a deposit there.
This won't end well for you, suckers!
That's it! Keep going!
OK the truck is rolling out, and the GPS is working. Good work. Time for us to change history our way.
We'll settle for this right here.
Got it. No problem. Just keep us informed.
There it is. Neatly stacked. Well, you're robbers, ain't you? Get robbing!
C'mon, get in the vault.
You're a dick for ever doubting us, but just get us a heist with good cash, and we'll forget about this.
OK you're in, good. Now you need at least four paintings, the good ones have red stickers - those are the ones our art lover intends to buy.
Oh, yeah, right, sure. Alright, well, have him check in when he can.
Guys, take cover in the dealership. You don't want to be near this bang!
You should find a pass phrase there. You'll need it when you call him.
Hurry, get the keychain.
Score! I can hear Vlad smiling from here.
And now we wait. Anyone have any good stories?
Get some sentries up.
What is it with some men and cars? Nevermind, you are in now. Kill him.
Have you found the correct shelf yet, friends? Search a terminal in the tech lab.
OK, now we need two keycards. Use both of them on the panic room door.
Stay where you are, I'm calling security!
Everything's locked down - if you want me to fix it then I need to get into the surveillance room.
Damn chops have killed the bypass, get it going again.
But yo, get some more if you can!
We got to go, people!
Oh shit!
There's no getting through that thing quietly with tools, so you'll have to find a code for it.
Screw the winch down good. Believe me, you need it stable for the next part.
Damn, the system is locked. You have to wait 30 seconds until you can try again.
Gotta go in ten!
Hey guys.. uuh... it seems we can't get into Sosa's office this way. It's on a separate system.
Something's burning y'all and it doesn't smell like no Texas bbq i've ever had. Put that fire out!
Chopper's back on the scene! Watch out.
I think there's something in the Jade Room.
Throw him down there where no one should find him.
There goes the alarm. Let's go straight for the server room door.
Follow Bile and don't forget the prisoner!
You guys can cook! Which one of you is Heisenberg, Hector wants to know.
Burn it all. Most of it is marked anyway, the feds would be all over us.
And..open the sesame! Bravo, my friends! Now, please, get in the fucking airlock.
It's hydrogen chloride.
Jeez, I missed the drop... Sorry about that, guys... You'll find the C4 in the back alley
Acquring this asset is, in my opinion, a wise decision.
Stop screwing around and get to the vault.
Don't just stand around, get in there.
Hey, we don't have all day!
We gotta get that keycard, so move into the Oval Office ASAP!
Some fortune cookie wisdom for you: Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure.
I'm losing control!
OK, the lab door is unlocked - open it.
Look for a code that starts with eight.
Okay, I think the worst is behind us. Vlad's driver got the goats to a farm outside the city, ready to perform the extraction of the packages. Stick around. Watch the perimeter. Easy work, right?
Ach, you're making me go bossies! We couldn't afford to lose anyone! Abort and return to the safehouse.
Move up to the overpass and keep going uphill.
Nah, we'll keep everything!
That's how we rolled.
Get our investment back and switch the machines.
I'll be there in one minute!
Gentlemen, I see an opening for me to come in a short period of time. If you have any loot to secure, now is the time. I'll be at the back of the train.
Fantastic! The vault should be exposed now. Time to crack 'em open.
Take the box and go, friends.
The end is upon us. And it is a good ending! Please, into the helicopter!
Sure I saw this place in a movie. Hope the walls don't spit poison darts.
Not bad, even after all the other shit that's gone down today.
The maintenance tunnels could have what you're looking for. Search it.
These fuckers are trying to rip us off!
Still no power to the crane?
See if there's a car around there. Sooner you get those shady Russian nukes to Vlad's train the better!
Get the hell out!
... then you get what you came here for.
The center one!
OK now, they probably keep it in a safe. Find it.
Dear friends! Enjoying the flight so far, yes? You're almost at the location I have selected as a drop point. So...
Police are on our ass, they're practically sitting in our fucking trunk!
Great job guys! Now someone will have to fix that bridge, but it won't be me...
You heard the man. Bile will deliver the C4 to the rooftop in a couple of minutes.
The trucks are here somewhere. Vlad's guys will be too, so watch your fire.
Bronson here, about to return.
... shoot these fools and do it now!
Hey! I'm not paying you guys to hang around here! Get down there!
Friends, it's probably best to go in through the back door with a saw, yeah?
We are hitting the Mendoza cartel hard for money, information and blood. You are of great use to us now.
Nice! That's the money you sent ahead. OVERKILL thanks you!
You can only open one vault at a time, and I should make you aware that not all vaults contain loot. How you figure out which to open is your problem.
Don't be overeager gang, store's not going anywhere.
The armory. Looks like they've a bunch of C4 stacked there. Christ knows what a casino needs plastic explosive for...
I can only take one at a time...
That's them! Now, get them back to Hoxton.
I'm starting the clock. Look for a safe. If it's not in the safe - don't panic - it's in the building.
Make sure the guards don't spot us now.
Plane's nearly there. Pop the flares and mark the strip.
Where's that laptop? Found it yet?
I am John Henry Simmons. If you want to know more... We should talk. I might have something of interest, if you don't mind a little political intrigue...
... We do NOT have a deal!
Get over here!
Keep the cops away so it doesn't stop cutting.
He's going for the laundry room. Follow him!
The reception area. Remember the location. Might come in handy.
Get two more!
FBI Ready Teams are on their way! Those bastards were on standby in the nearby houses!
No no, it ain't like that. Yeah, he's downtown. Ok, make sure he gets it.
Three minutes, tops!
I can last a year in here, you pig-fucks!
We're going over the goddamn top with this. Now, when I give the word, you hit the button. Got it?
Good, now you just have to find a way into his office.
I've got the pedal to the metal!
Time to get our Bain back, friends. Chop chop.
You need to shut down those guns for Bile to get you out. Find the control boxes and shut them down.
Probably a good idea to shut off that alarm. There's a button for it somewhere.
Head on up to the apartment, my associate has the info and the cash to pay for the extra meth.
You see that muscle car? That's Gaddafi's 1965 original Longfellow. It's your ride now.
Assemble the winch in the main hall, gang.
The shutdown has been aborted. You need to get back to the control box and restart it, friends!
The job wasn't a total bust. Still, fewer stuffed bags than under Leatherface's stairs!
Security box up head. Keep your eyes peeled.
The mall that Mr Stone owns. It must crash and burn as you say. Go there and destroy all stores, glass and things. Take what you want but make damage to show Mr Stone I mean business!

We're using a magnetic crane to drop a little present in the path of the Gensec convoy - a steel container of professional badasses. Hit the trucks, and get the loot to the getaway. These docks have a rich history of heistery, gentlemen - do it proud.

The Harvest & Trustee is a medium-size branch bank, vault in the back, a few different entries. Case the place first... You're going to want to get into the vault, drill it, get whatever's inside out of there and back to the escape car.
That's enough if you wanna leave!

Ernesto Sosa is the local boss in Miami for the Sosa Cartel, and The Butcher wants him dead. You're gonna love this: he lives in Tony Montana's old mansion in Miami Beach. Yeah that's right - Scarface, the legendary 80's drug lord. Anyway, you've got to hit the mansion, find a way in and then kill Ernesto Sosa. It won't be easy, the place is like a fortress. But you can do it. Oh yeah, I almost forgot - there should be a lot of money and other loot in that house. Steal it. Wipe them clean. But above all - kill Ernesto Sosa.
Gonna spill your blood everywhere!
Remember, we are doing this silent. If the alarm goes off we're screwed.
Turn the power on, then restart the terminal override.
Anyway get close, hit 'em hard, find the safe, and get whatever intel you can find there. Take all of it.
My contacts can ensure that medical supplies are left for your use.
Nice, bring the bags to the van.
Get those screws off that thing.
C'mon, restart the hack.
Got to go in ten!
Look, do I need to tell you everything. Use the thermal paste to burn through the grate.
OK, we're moving. Now keep the truck out of danger 'til you're clear.
Good job boys. That's enough to call this one a success.
Blowing the walling will wreck the ballot machines. Accident, right? We're just doing an honest bank heist.
Telling the pilot to return with the C4 to bust you through there. Just hang in there.
Yeah I see snipers on the roof now... Look out.
That's every single one of 'em! That's great!
Try to get him out of the van.
Umm... Okay then.
Don't forget, the C4 is stashed in closets marked with an X.
Ah! Yes. The vault is opening again! Good!
Drop the C4 into to the safe and blow it open. The water will do the trick.
Don't let yourself get pinned down! Move!
I get why the Elephant wants this. It is tons of gold in this deal!
Two more!
That's good enough for the roof.
The code begins with a four, according to my source.
He might leave if we turn off the lights. Do you see a circuit box nearby?
That's it! Doing a background check now. Hold on.
Power's down. Look for the circuit box and get it back on.
Mobster eliminated. Keep going.
Watch out! They are bringing in a sniper team by chopper!
Gonna buy you a one-way ticket to Deadville!
You know the drill. Watch for guards and cameras. Keep civilians in check. Look around for keycards, and the bank manager - anything that might help.

Dear Friends, we're going back to New York. Theres something buried in the foundation of the old Brooklyn Bank that Bain was after. Could be a way out of this current predicament we're in. While we're there, it might be a good idea to pick up some extra operating cash to keep us going. Replacing all of Bain's equipment isn't going to be cheap I can tell you, and the stuff I've got running as backup isn't going to hold up for long, yeah? At the moment, we're open targets.
More loot than I expected. Good work!
Keep spinning those wheels, find the next one.
We got a tail, and they're getting closer!
Grab the artifact, make sure that the kerels don't get their hands on it.
Drill through that vault, friends.
Leave the tree alone! I like it!
In dentistry, I have become very appreciative of people who keep things... clean.
Bags! We need more bags!
It's on the other side of the building.
I just returned to town and see Russian (thugs). Dmitri's men, in my territory. This I cannot TOLERATE!
They say always treat others like they treat you. And I've been treated very badly, many times.
... I'll be back in a minute!
I'm on my way!
Put all the loot you find somewhere close, so you can collect it later, yeah?
All right. More C4. Almost got all we need now. Keep looking.
This is R.G. here.
Not long now friends. Train will be there in half a minute.
Now we wait for the time lock to run down. Did I ever tell you about my grandpa and his heisting days?
I messed up. It should'a been soda.
Come on, let's see what you got.
We can settle for this, let's go...
Come on, you really thought I couldn't get this shit done?
Got a zip-line set up there. You can attach any loot bag to it, and get it out nice and quiet. Make the most of it.
Ice that rat bastard!
Put the idiots out of their misery!
Orientation guys; Get off point gas station, banks straight ahead, garage right, grocery store left. Go get rich.
Keep the Murkys away from the drill, yeah?
Don't lose sight of the plan... Those caches still need to get destroyed!
Shakespeare, Hox. Shakespeare.
OK people, get the phone. Let's get this trade out of the way.
Hey, over here!
DNA match: negative.
Witness me!
No way out the front. Quick! Get into the container. You're leaving with the loot. Don't think about the drop, okay?
Could be that the code is related to Garrett's crusade against us, yeah?
...I think so, at least.
Boris will get you, you'll never get away never, you hear me?!
Are you alive?!
There we go. Now you just got to send it out of there.
More coppers coming soon. Blonde needs that bag.
Just press the button. You can understand that, yeah?
Careful. That's the door. It has got an alarm. We need to disable this first.
You want the card? Just take it!
Next, we find the room whose vent connects with the security center. We can use that to knock out the guards with sleeping gas. So, we need blueprints. Check the archives.
Someone ratted me out! And I know it wasn't Matt, because I know all of his secrets by now.
OK, you know what? I'm busting out of here!
Get that C4 into the vault. And stand back!
Nice. Good! Now, Boris is going to lead you to a farm outside the city. There he can...extract the coke.
I can't fucking believe you're making me do this shit, Bain...
You might wanna scout the wagons for some extra loot. And keep your eyes open for C4. You're gonna need it later. Should be in one of the crates.
I need you to get inside an old Police storage compound and retrieve some access codes we will need later.
Blerrie! The Murkys have AA weapons outside the White House. You gotta take them offline so I can land.
Rust's gonna kill me if I miss the sexy details, so I need you to grab a beautiful chrome skull from inside the clubhouse. I don't do things half-assed, and we want the best for this baby.
Good shooting! Okay then. The coke should be in that safe so get drillin'.

Alright. You're in. Now hunt around. There's gotta be a clue about which truck is carrying the voting machines to Washington. Search containers, check computers - anything you can to figure out the right truck.
I'm sorry, but we don't provide loans without capital, and your favorite socks aren't that. No matter how long you've owned them.
Is time to leave, comrades! All aboard!
Alright, that's it for the concert. Time to de-mask and blend in with the crowd. If all goes to plan, you'll be able to stroll right out the front door. Good luck.
I'll get that one! You go get another!
Okay. Time to head back to the trains and get that EMP in the bag.
Okay, trucks are somewhere on this freeway.
Keep your eyes on the hostage!
This will forever be a Red Letter day for the criminal community. The day the Payday Gang broke the Benevolent.
The crowd is heaving tonight. Let's give them a great show.
The manager is our target. Middle-aged creep with a bald spot. Get his keycard.
Friends, that did it! You can get in there and take the pardons!
Nice. That's the first batch, but we'll need more. Get after the rest.
Open those doors, friends.
One more time
These assholes need to die!
You still gotta find that USB stick. Check around the West Wing if you haven't already.
Come on, you need to hustle it!
I guess I should be surprised to see Gensec out there, but those guys seem to be spreading.
Great. Poppa Bain will take care of these. Now, return to the key storage room.
...We got a tail! Can't shake 'em! Take it to the streets!
Damn damn damn!
Six
I've rigged the bus to... Well, just give the signal. And stand back.
Time to pull out gang.
Expect cops any second now.
This place has a formidable vault. Thankfully, I found just the tool for it. Get that bag to the vault.
Take down the alarm, friends.
The bus blew up! Be careful and stay out of that fire!
That keycard is one less thing we need to open the vault.
Check the trees - cops advancing.
So you got nine of the paintings? That's awesome.
Garrett could come back any time, so don't lose track of him.
Look around the West Wing for something strong to use on the barrier!
That's great. But if you want to grab some more, do so!
Outside the Velvet Room, I see a lit display screen. Go have a look.
Friends, get that blerrie vehicle out of the way, yeah?
Doubt any of these books have much value. To us, at least.
Chopper is down. Get the loot in, and get out!
Okay, lining up on the road. Gonna drop the cage there.
Load the bags!
Light that flare for Locke, crew.
The charging has been interrupted! Get it started again!
Code will defuse that C4!
Alright! Got the code! Start the time lock.
The enemy are at the gates, gang.
Hold up guys! The vault is wired!
Ok, have a breather while I fix this.
OK crew, you have enough to get the hell out now. If you want more then I need access to the surveillance room. I'll do the rest once you get in.
The escape helicopter is here folks. If you're feeling greedy you can go get the rest of the bags - otherwise, time to run!
You guys need to shut that alarm down. Find the button, yeah?
Are you done with that gate yet?
Get to the breaker box.
They're on to us like a fucking sticker!
I got it! Oh, wait... No, you said time lock code? For the vault? One second...
...The hook needs to go on the vault, yeah?
Explosive's in. And...
Protect him!
Everything a child of the 1980s dreams of. Including the nightmares, yeah?
The ladders are a weakpoint. Don't let the cops get up them.
This will ensure that there are fewer security on the roster.
Yeah, well fuck you too!
The cops disabled the drill, guys!
Damn kerels have cut the power. Get it back up and reactivate the crane.
You need fresh power cells.
Here it comes. Room...
Look behind things. Should be fairly obvious, yeah?
That's the C4 done. Clear the gate!
Guys, guys! The garage doors. Murkys!
Just a minute for the helicopter.
Get to the parking lot and meet up with Twitch, guys!
Get everyone into the train.
Get those bags here!
Ah, there's one too.
You heard that? The pickup will take place in a couple of minutes. Until then - hold the fort!
There they are, just like Wick said they would be. Get them to the van and tie them up for now. We'll bring them back with us when we leave. Wick wants to have a "chat", you see.
I might be in the business of taking, but don't say Vlad never gives back! It's christmas for fuck sake!
Keep your eyes on the roofs! Got a bad feeling creeping up.
Back to work. Keep 'em off it from now on.
Reactivate the terminal. Let's get this finished.

You thought this was a rescue mission or what? Nah, it's not gonna play out like that. You fools are gonna witness me kill this piece of shit mechanic first, and then you're gonna join him in the afterlife.
Motherfuckers! Stop that!
Find the blue bottle and spike it.
Oh no, another attack helicopter!
Huh, where the fuck am I?
Thanks. I hated that poes. Kept stealing my shampoo.
You up for it? Because I've got a contact who says they're just gotten a south African gold shipment that would be a shame to make go missing...
...Kerels are on route in squad cars, so don't dawdle, and keep those civvies out of your way, yeah?
I'm outside the security room but I need a keycard.
Fill me up, I'll come back for seconds if you stay around!
Ouch... let's hope the airbags did their job....
Make sure he's still breathing!
No time to brew coffee for that pissed old fart. Keep him safe. I'm sending an extraction now.
Did you bring the data, Mr. Sturr?
I'm jealous you're going to get to drive this beast.
The gear could be at the smoking area. Perhaps Micho left your gear there. Look for a guitar case.
Now you need to go in blind and just take out the Mendozas on the way to the airport, OK? I'd say please but I don't say please.
We're after the rat. He's probably in the bus. You know what to do.
Secure the EMP over by the escape area. Better to be safe than sorry.
This is a tricky job fellas, how you'll approach it is up to you.
They are coming in from the lumber mill, watch out!
C'mon, move it get into the house.
Alright, time for me to dash!
Guys, this is R.G.
Hate to see you guys cooped up like that, but we snagged four trucks. Get out there, and get at them!
It doesn't look good, guys... It doesn't look good!
Fill his glass. Once he downs that, well... he's going to lose interest in the slots. Follow him, and get his keycard.
That offshore account is your exit fund. When you skip town you'll be glad you put it right there.
These assholes need to die!
The escape vehicle is leaving in two minutes, with or without you.
The winch will be there in one minute, friends.
Oh, fuck me...
There's one of 'em!
Ok, that's the one, there he is! Let him out, yeah?
Spectacular achievement is always preceded by unspectacular preparation.
Flying in with the EMP right now.
Go get the lance, badasses!
Having reliable transport is key in our trade. This ensure just that.
I need you to find and it and bring it with you. I wouldn't ask if it wasn't important.
You'll find it at the desired location.
Get out of there, yeah?
Another day, another bank. We can liberate some cash, I'm sure.
Cage delivered!
The Sosa Cartel doesn't forgive! You're dead!
I fear the main entrance is not an option. They are all over it.
It's done. The Moretta is on the move! Might take a while, so bunker down. Try not to die.
Only one left.
What's one more drink?
It's like a never-ending number of screws, yeah? But you got to get them all off.
You can make opportunities, but you also need to know when to swing for that once in a lifetime chance. And I swung hard!
At the back you can throw any bodies over the railing into the sea.
Defend that drill, people!
There he is!
Now you get paid!
Gage has what he wants. Great work. You can bug out now, or hang around a little.
Up to the roof and away from the building to the left. Alex has the chopper coming in.
Wheelman is moving. ETA: One minute.
Don't forget. Look for the ladder, dear friends.
Get that saw off there, friends.
You guys know who Tucker is? I hope you don't. Great work back there.
Here's the deal:

You gotta get through that door. I think the artifact is on the other side. What about cooking up a fun cocktail to burn through it? Maybe there's a recipe for something suitably volatile around there? Heh... what could go wrong, eh?
