This vault is full of cash! You'll have to decide how much you can get away with.
Just a little longer.
That wasn't it. Got to give it some time to reset, then try again.
OK guys, the first batch is unloaded - I'm coming back in a bit...
Looks like the scrambler software just crashed. Some shitty code. Start it back up!
Get it to the van!
One minute. Hey, move your ass.
You fucked with the wrong Russian tonight, my masked friends.
You guys are lucky, I'm feeling generous.
Oh you should totally get us some weed as well.
Great job getting the GPS in place in the truck. We're gonna do this next job in daylight. It'll look like a takedown.
I just saw the CFO through a camera feed, he's still there, neaby.
Remember you're looking for the server room.
I was afraid of this. The containers are shut and locked. Gonna have to drill them.
They wrecked the car.
OK, the lights in the circuit box corresponds to the tiles. Use them to guide you across. No one can step on a wrong tile or this get's a whole lot messier!
The police are here! Stand 'em down.
I advise caution - this bank has a lot of traffic. Empty all those safe deposit boxes and make us all happy.
I'll never tell you!
Everybody fucking shooting at me... Bullshit...
Looks like blueprints of the inventor's house. Very tasty.
Be quick now!
Come on guys, find the whiteboard already, yeah?
The chopper is deplying to the roof. Be careful!
When we score that government bail-out, I'm moving to that island with the dinosaurs.
Bag those stones and get them to the garden. Get them out with ziplines.
I don't care if you gotta shinny up a wall like fucking Spiderman. Look everywhere for that third pallet.
This will most certainly aid you in your endeavor.
I see nine of them.
Don't mess around...
Nine to go!
Maybe I should've studied this ancient stuff more. Could the curse be true? Ah, it's just old shit worth money to me.
Ach, the dinges is trying to update the operating system. Stop it at the mainframe!
You better hurry up and fix that leakage.
Almost feel sorry for the chop. He'll be gone for a good while now, no need to worry.
Diesel tank and hose somewhere around dock.
OK, that computer had a piece of code to the vault on it, but to be able to use it, you need the other parts as well. They're probably around there somewhere.

OK, friends! We're going to be touching down near the South Portico. There are Murkys everywhere, so be ready. To get into the PEOC you're going to need a keycard and I think we should start looking for one in the West Wing.
Excellent! I just got a confirmation on a 25 million dollar transaction.
Go to that pillar! Move!
If you patch me into the security boxes for the storage room, I can unlock the doors to it.
Good job, gang, now we need the explosives from Bile. Give me a moment. "Bile, it's time. How soon can you drop off the C4?"

There's the alarm and... Damn! Everything shut down. OK, forget the keycards. We're blowing the gate. I told you I had a plan B. Bile will drop the C4 charges for you, just light a flare to signal him where you want the C4 bag to be dropped.
Hell yeah, it's open! Get down there!
What... that's what the Elephant had? Isn't that... No, not quite eh? Just take it and get out of there.
Ach, they must've picked something up. They're calling the PEOC. Patch me through. And cross your fingers.
That's the cutter done. Let the money rain down!
Head over to the phone, the phone's ringing. Make the contact there.
Thanks, it's good to have some firepower behind me.
Payback!
Park up here. Alright. There it is. Let's do this.
You're through to First World Bank. No ma'am, Troy Templeton does not really work here. That was just a commercial. I know it's upsetting.
Watch out, more snipers!
...caustic soda?
Like a glooove!
Okay, we're all set to begin the scanning.
Four
By the factory - cops incoming.
We're here. Get inside and get your hands on the access codes.
Blerrie! This whole operation just went to kak!
Power is back, great. Now don't stop.
Any whiteboards nearby?
Ah... OK guys, we got a small refuling need for the chopper. He is dry. You guys gotta stay put for about 10 - 15 minutes.
Another crate to crack open. Get to it, yeah?
Listen, the guards inside the house are likely to have pagers. Be careful.
Protect that circuit box. The cops'll try to shut it down. Don't let 'em!
No time to waste guys, it's only going to get worse.
Times like these, I always wonder; What kind of person writes elevator music, eh?
Damn. Should have told him the code was kiss your own ass. Get ready.
Oh, really? Well, you think...maybe I should too.
Vlad needs you to secure those bags in the chimney.
Guys, put a gas can on the paintings and shoot it.
Look for a code that starts with four.
This is the place. It's hardly changed.
OK, I'm in position!
Guys! Use the keycard in the dock control room. Get the dock gate open.
OK, you found it. Now, open up that safe.
Drop the goat, lawbreaker!
Now you got to find a way inside.
Now we gotta get into the mansion. Won't be easy. Expect doors and windows to be alarmed. Need to figure that out.
Don't forget the drill, friends.
One router down!
Hit the display cases.
Not getting in that way, yeah? There's scaffolding on the outside. Should be a door on the 2nd floor you can hack through with a saw.
Grab those parts, heisters.
I count four guys.
Maybe you can find something to get in there. Have a look in the utility closet if you can find it.
Got some new guns in, boss. You wanna see them?
We got it. Pretty nice flying from my guy as well. Let's use him again sometime.
No bullets with Garrett's name on them tonight, OK friends?
30 seconds more and I'm out!
Uhuh... uhuh... OK, sure. We'll have a look.
How far along are you on the vault? Use the card first, then enter the code.
Locke sold the Butcher out too. The ship by the dock is one of hers. Go help 'em out and maybe we can hitch a boat-ride.
Vlad's reputation will rise. You guys will get a nice little payday from this.
That will probably come in handy later.
Fuck yeah.
Do you all concur?
Cops are getting desperate, they're launching a final assault! Don't let them stop you.
OK, we talk. You want money? Girls? Cars? Guns?
Kill everyone!
The van should be there in a minute.
Okay, blimp is lowering her to you. BFD. Look at that beauty.
Oh, you have even MORE than we agreed on!
I don't care who it was. They fuck with me, I put them down.
Damn it, Dallas! I told you to use the ECM Jammer. Destroying it will draw unnecessary attention.
Consider these wise words: He who doesn't know where he's going should not start his journey.
That's 18!
The customer is just blocks away now, two minutes!
Out-fucking-standing.
I felt that one here! Now, inside, keep fighting.
Even if we blow up the radar, they can still control this from the laptop. We need to hack it.
Connecting...
I don't like the look of the prizes on that wheel, but I think we have to spin it anyway.
Make these guys believers.
Cops might have followed us! Let me rephrase that: Cops are fucking following us!
OK. Got a breather. Jesus. Good work.
I'm there in four...
The gold is inside the safe. No time to waste now. Set up the drill and drill it open.

It looks like someone at Murkywater might be behind our current predicament. They have closed all communication channels with me. Still got a couple friends there, but it looks like I am officially... ousted. Mr. Lindenhurst was kind enough to decrypt some notes an ancestor had printed on the back of a painting:The View of Mount Vernon. Bain owned the real thing you know; you have to wonder how he pulled that one off, yeah? Watookal, the notes detail that inside the vault of the Brooklyn Bank, there's something buried in the foundation; something that Bain needed, put there when the concrete was poured. I've no idea what it is, and how all this fits together, but whoever got to him put in a lot of resources, so it's probably not any old dinges. We're going in to get it before anyone else finds out, yeah?
Kill all those pieces of shit!
There's the escape! Ride through the gate and you'll be safe!
Don't forget. Smash the meth into smaller chunks!
Time to find a way in there.
That was an excellent piece of whisper-work. They didn't know you were there. Now let's see where that truck leads us.
Hey The pick-up car is coming here in two minutes so you just have to fight a little more!
Quickly friends, get inside the office and get what we're here for. Garrett's bound to have it in a safe.
Keep the damn Murkies away from the weapon.
We got a tail - and they're getting closer!
Get those stones to Mr. Blonde.
Grab that C4 in the limo and let's blow this place. Hurry! Cops are coming.
If you want the information again, just play the pre-recorded message using the button.
Dear friends, I need assistance unloading some weapons. I have set up a deal in Alaska, but I need an escort to keep the transaction secure, yeah?
What in the gods' names is.... I can't believe it... is that...? Ach! Bekakin' bastards! Get out of there, friends!
Hurry friends, get out of there.
Bile can't get in close unless you clear the area of cops!
You got the cops coming down on you in 40 seconds.
... then you get what you came here for.
Cop just entered the bank. Don't let him get the wrong idea.
...There's 3 Gensec security boxes we need to disable.
Don't let any of the hostages run off and trigger the alarm, got it?
The nitro tanks need to be mounted to the vault door.
Mitchell can we go shopping again?
Bastards! I'm gonna fuck you up for this!
All things considered, I'd rather be going back to Vegas.
Good job. Ernesto Sosa is dead. My point has been made.
Well, fuck and shit. Cops shut down the vault's opening. Get it going again, and kill any fucking kerel that goes near it.
Another four and we're done.
As you have requested.
Okay gamblers. Let's get gambling.
I know you're muscles are aching, but keep lifting those safes.
Should be something just by the Velvet Room. There's a monitor on.
Man, I could really use a beer.
Hurry, go go go!
Get the fuck outta here!
That's a lot of stones.
Move! Move!
...This is how it looks right now.
Drive out of there!
Metal detector! What the hell!?
Bravo, my friends! Now, to proceed, please attach the bags to the cables in the large vertical shaft. I am at the top, and will receive them safely.
Thank you for being forthright.
Here he comes!
Hit the cargo door switch, friends!
Kill all those pieces of shit!
Ok, here comes the eighth wave!
Great, you found some evidence! Analyze it in the lab. Let's see if there's any trace of the traitor's DNA on it.
OK, friends, it's time for you to leave. Take some extra loot with you if you can.
Great stuff - let's put this cash to good use.
It is done.
All right, the code is...
The boss loves detail-oriented motherfuckers!
Package is being delivered. Thank you for choosing the Sky Express!
Made a big mistake coming here!
Seven bucks! All right!
I'll set up the trade with the senator's people and get us rolling.
Time to get ready!
You got metal security doors blocking the storage room. I can unlock them remotely if you hack their control boxes.
Get to that storage unit, yeah?
Time to grab the money guys!
Seven
Three more, at least.
Standard response is to get a strong line of armor in there, so expect bulldozers up ahead. Get ready!
I have urgent need. My business has been interrupted and police is on my goods.
Now take the evidence to the lab. If we can find some DNA that belongs to the traitor, we might be able to pinpoint who he is.
Go find the bank manager. We'll need that keycard off him.
Go go go!
Assault is on the way.
Damn it! They'll know something's up, let's get out of here and go to plan B.
I'm just a few blocks away - I can hear and see the sirens, I'm there in one minute!
It was messy but you got the job done. Good job!
Ready for the next step.
Don't wait too long friends, enter that code ASAP.
We're in. Now get after that goat!
It's going to blow! Run!
Put the wares in the car...
I've managed to organise some necessary tools for this job. Find them in the crates. They got a little strobe on them.
I spent some time away on business... I need to collect money from businesses.
OK, get him outta there.
Great, that's it. Now you can open the door.
Put these suckers in the ground!
I don't know the code, I swear.
And how much will it cost you? Shall we say... 18 bucks?
Aw no, you're not trying to fuck us over, are ya?
IT are nearby. Get over there, find the server and haul it back.
Are they cops? Are they fucking cops!?
Where's the shit?
He was a boring poe. Thank you.
Time to get what we came here for, yeah?
Brace for impact!
Get him talking people. We got root and just need the locks undone.
You damn asshole bastards. I'll fucking kill you for this. You hear? Kill you!
Come on, come on - we can do better...
The bank shutters can be closed from the security office. They should help you keep the police at bay!
Bullseye! That was some flying! Now get out of there.
They're on my ass like a fucking tail!
I can't come and get you if you don't hurry, friends! They've got F35s flying CAP around the White House!
OK, hose looks secure. Now let's get that pump pumping again!
Remember: you need to find crowbars and jam them into the vault's fans. They are most likely inside the warehouse.
Fuck this shit man.
There should be a fence nearby. Cut it open and get inside.
Fuck! The cops got roadblocks everywhere! It's like they knew! I'll pick you guys up a bit further ahead!
Damn, and shit. The aircrew are sloppy as kak. Helicopter ain't got no fuel. Hey, can you hook up the fuel line?
Guys, look for a security room around there. Use the arc welder to cut through, and approve the sequence.
OK folks, I spoke to Hector. The Mendoza higher ups are fleeing the country but Hector isn't quite ready to let them leave. He wants to know where they're headed.
Money secured, the police got a taste of what we can do and Vlad will definitely be spinning that to his advantage. Nice.
She stopped! Get on deck and and search the containers!
According to what I've learned, the PEOC entrance is by the library. Make your way there.
18 more needed!
Just wait and see guys, this is gonna be great.
That's the first fan. Temperature's rising. Jam more fans to speed things up.
Everything's going to plan.
No, that's the wrong blend... now you gotta wait until the reaction dies down and start again, yeah?
Crack open that door with a saw, friends.
Wipe 'em out!
And... bam!
Stop throwing the coke into the fucking water!
Ten seconds, guys!
Damn it, Dallas! They god damn saw you!
Hope you got your seat belts on!
Remind me again why we're doing this?
These bags look pretty roughed up... What have you been doing with them?
The alarm! Stealth is out of the window, gang. But the ship is moving, and she ain't gonna stop now.
I count... two guys.
I got one!
*grunts, wheezes*
OK, they are coming down the back street.
Put them down!
We're taking some of these nice weapons with us. But how, that's the question...
Up to the roof now!
That was outstanding! Whooooooo! Outstanding.
Make sure you find the target quickly. You don't know what they'll do to him.
Ah OK... So, seems to be a bit too many of them here. Fusion Engines that is. Find the correct one.
That's fine, I'll pick that one up!
Blerrie! Looks like the Feds are here too. Commissioner Garrett must be really, really pissed, yeah?
The artifact... it's why we're here.
One minute till the van leaves.
Truck's ready?
You fuckin' see what they did to Brown?!
The crane has been stopped. You need to restart it!
But that keycard... might be just what we need.
We're blasting out the back door. Get C4 on that wall!
Quick now, let's move!
Get the cash amount we agreed on and I'll send the driver. More than that is gravy.
Good, now take the saw off.
I'm coming, in two minutes!
Three left!
You need to wake Santa up. Hit him!
Keep the cops away from the routers!
The chopper is coming at the antenna!
Going to cut you to pieces!
There's the lance. Grab it, and let's burn that rat out of his panic room.
Here's my idea: I take your shit. Then, you die...
I'm coming in one minute...
Here's what I want you to do:
Shiiit!
Put holes in 'em!
It's on fire! get him outta there!
Something there. Right outside the Glitter Room.
All right, done! The C4 has been dropped on the roof.
Control the civilians!
We're keeping this. Sorry...
Hold on...
Fucks sake. Assholes! Fucked it. Shape up, or I'm pullin' you out. By the short and curlies.
Alright now, I have access, hold on a sec...
That did the trick, good job!
35k guys.
Hey Mitchell, can I go shopping again?
OK, we got it, hang on a little longer.
Ah! So Winston called you. Can you help me out here?
There's a yellow waste chute hanging on the side of the construction tower. If you throw the loot in there I'll have someone pick it up later.
850 horse power of pure sexy badass.
Thanks, I'll have my man here inspect it and if it's the right one we're good to go. So hang tight for a second.
Go check the Velvet Room for a laptop. Just don't stick to the walls.
Waste 'em!
Damn! They must have filled the room with gas the second we entered the lab. Find out where it's dispensed from and shut it off!
Got it! I'm off!
You almost gotta feel sorry for the Commissioner after a night like this. Almost.
Get that weapon charged, friends.
Chopper's just about here!
Great. Now we need some more on the fifth floor and then some on the roof.
Hurry friends, get in there and search.
Don't destroy my things!
You heard him. Get the bags onto the ziplines in the shaft. Get them up to Locke.
OK. So you need a key and a code. Well, at least we know what you need to look for.
Don't let the coke burn!
Nice. Now go get that guest list from reception.
Careful now. I hope you didn't bring your squeaky shoes.
The chopper touches ground in 30 seconds. Get ready to move!
Thank you. I'll get out of this yet.
What did I say about civilians?
There's a thermal drill nearby. Go get it.
You heard Fedor. Get your asses to the lake.
Who doesn't love a challenge, right?
I'm going for a drink. Let me know when you've got the box, yeah?
The voting machine are moving, I can hear the trucks firing up their engines. You better get to the right one fast, trace it, and then get the hell out, sneaking if you can.
Now!
Ok, we can still do this. Mr Blonde, you brought the special sauce, right?
Go take a look at the vault.
Great shot!
Just what we needed! Plug that hard drive in and I'll take care of it. That vault should be opened in no time.
There's no time to waste. Get to the van!
Using your brain to control a drone? Jesus, I'm getting old. Anyway, this technology is worth a lot of cash, so we need to steal it from these bikers.
You already found the comm frequencies for the Moretta. No need to keep checking the computers.
Hurry now, secure the artifact on the chopper!
Now the hard part.
No waiting, be ready!
Over there. Your gear's in that guitar case.
GPS is online. Providing you tagged the right truck, this is great work. Time to go.
Get that last door open then go get the server.
There could be something behind the books, like in one of those old spy movies, yeah?
Got it! Construction yard, with a truck. Looks like the best way out of here, but you'll need C4 to bust that wall. Sending it now. Mind the safes!
Oh, yeah. We gotta go.
What!? The Mendoza cartel is still there! Take care of them!
You're looking for the panic room. Should be easy to find. Search for a reinforced door.
Nice. It's getting hotter. What the hell is in there?
Get aboard, dear friends! That was fucking beautifully done!
Ok, the computer is working nice and steady again, hacking the system.
Get the prisoner out first, then you can go for the cash.
Looks like some intel. That'll come in handy.
Pensacola PD is coming, and it looks like they've drafted in every southern ass-kicker too.
Our bird will be near the train yard any moment. Be ready!
These assholes need to die!
Wow... Just... Really good.
OK make your run! Go! Go!
You just headbutted the motherfucking hornets' nest!
Man, I swear I can smell that skel bait from here. We're at the meth lab. Go in and snag three sacks of the product before the FBI gets here. What Hector wants, Hector gets. For now, anyway.
Great days, you know.
1 remaining.
How about that security, friends?
Out of that compartment!
I'm sure there are wiring cases for the gate nearby.
Why would Murky have the artifact in a bio-lab? No matter, go and find it, yeah? And hope you don't need hazmat suits.
We need muriatic acid!
We need to get the cannon charged.
These cars are tough stuff, but the thermite will melt through easy.
It's time. Put on the masks and let's do this.
What the hell is that? An enormous toothbrush? I could really use something like that.
Add caustic soda to continue the process!
Guys, you need to get out of there so the cops will follow you.
They're opening the powerboxes. Make sure they don't cut the power!
Five to go.
Good job, gang. Get up the ladder and get out of there.
...Start the winch and let it work. Keep the kerels away, yeah?
Three.
Alex nailed it. Ammo is right there.
Things are getting too hot, I have to pull the chopper out until it calms down.
C4 in the armory. Go get it!
Don't forget Charon's briefcase!
The front is shut tight. Take a walk around. Find another way in.
The road is a perfect drop-zone. Putting your cage there.
Arriving in four!
Crap, the FBI boss has fled the scene. That retinal scanner isn't gonna get used any time soon. It's time to go Plan B.
Looks like the EMP isn't here, but there might be some other valuable loot for us. You can either check it now or come back later.
Turn off Garrett's lights, friends.
I can't lose these sons of bitches!
Look for a code that starts with five.
There's a bank vault we need to hit...
This is it! THIS IS IT!
One door left then we get the server. FBIs gonna shit themselves.
Ship is still attacked by cops onboard.
OK people, my guy says this is a good time to hit the bank. Turns out the Harvest & Trustee bank manager should have kept his mouth shut. Anything could be in here.
This town is a great place to fence jewelry. Easy to move. Diplomats and trophy wives buying it, no questions asked. This is going to be cake. Let's get going.
Good work, but these guys are clever. The doors are linked so no one can enter the shelter unless the other one is in on it. You need to override Wilson's system too.
I've never SEEN so much money go to waste! Get the last of it, come on!

OK, I've got an idea. I can change the hack so it looks like we were here doing this for McCendrick's rival, Mayor Schwartz. The blame can be passed on to her. If there's gonna be a scandal, let's make it a scandal we can use!
Bring more, this is not all of it.
I'm over here, guys.
JÃ¤ger Mark II safes are among the worst. Can't blow them up, can't use just any drill on them.
Throw him down there. No one will find him. I hope.
You gotta get inside, quickly.
Bile can't pick you up while those guns are active. Find the control boxes and shut them down, yeah?
2 remaining.
I mean they don't need it that bad... So let's hit that vault.
You got his attention. But I need longer to establish the trace. Somewhere in DC. Narrowing it down. Keep working.
It is all going to hell - get the intel!
They haven't spotted you yet. Still good.
Son of a bitch!
I love opening Christmas presents!
Is my dad there? Mr Hunt. First name (disconnects)
Have you got the ark open, yet?
Good. One down, one more left!
What the fuck!? Cops!
Ok, nice and easy. Just get those masks off, blend in with the crowd and we won't have any issues. The van will be waiting for you.
...what's the worst that could happen, right?
Who wants to do a little banking?
That was our chaplain. You guys are stone cold.
Yeah, there's a charge on my credit card the wife can't see. I was in Mexico and...
... Ey you're wasting our time!
We can now redeem the Dentists' contract. You can bounce, or treat Vegas to a Payday Gang party and loot the place.
That's all the C4 we need.
Alright, the process is on, It's cooking. I have a contact with a specialist through Hector. I will guide you guys through it.
Vault's opening. Get in there! Bag that cash!
Why the hell did some Iraqi dictactor have seventeenth century Swedish masterpieces?
I didn't team up to lose!
You have to hold them back!
30 seconds till pick-up!
Alright, look's like it's working again. Great.
I'm sending Bile your way!
You got more guards incoming, so no dozing off.
Gringo over there!
Are you lost? Jump out of window. Way out is straight down.
There you go. That's gonna get you through.
The Sosa Cartel has attacked one of my shipments in the Caribbean. They must pay, and you will collect this payment.
What the hell happened? Wrong code? You're going to need the master code now.
Come on, gentlemen! Don't be shy! Come and say hello.
Great, friends! I'm on my way!
Get ready for the second wave!
That's six!
Make sure you get the code right.
Oh, fucking Christ! Mercy!
Nice, it's full!
OK, grab the intel and move.
OK, Alex will lift it outta there. Let's not be taken by surprise. Gear up!
Stand and deliver!
Still gotta find the whiteboard.
Look for the name "Taylor" on the desk.

Yeah, yeah, don't give me that look. I'm not dumb enough to think you just came here to save my life. I know Rust too, remember? And I know he really wants his baby back. Well, you're gonna have to get me the parts if that's gonna happen.
More cops in heavy gear approaching. Show 'em who's boss!
Great. Here comes the guest list now.
The vault isn't going anywhere. It's waiting for tha keycard and code.
Kerels have pulled the emergency power cutoff lever. Find and reset it, friends!
Get a saw on that streetlight. It's the only way to bring the goat down.
Ok, we need to lift this little baby out.
What the fuck do you think you are doing?

To bypass the security system and get into the vault, patch the devices you have directly into the two control boxes, they should be around there somewhere. Then I'll hack in remotely and do the rest.
Dammit... Not sneaky enough. GPS on that truck is pointless now. They're gonna be real careful from here on, rerouting the ballot machines and everything. We need to find a way to get to them.
Murkywater motherfucker!
There you go gang, get in there and start hauling the loot to Mr. Blonde's car.
Tackle ready?
Looks like you are heavily loaded - that was all the guns right? Splendid guys. I'll see you back at the safe house.
But get more if you can!
Brilliant! Set the computer back on.
When these plumbers are gone we can get this party started for real.
Put them down!
Alright, he should be safe now. Place a flare on the table outside the yard. Set it off to bring in the chopper.
Helicopter will have to bug out for a little while. If you're ready to go now, be on it.
Great, That's the pit boss' number.
And another fuck up. At least you're consistent.
Place the goat on the floor and your hands in the air.
Oh shit, it's the cops! Let's get out of here!
I think you're near one now.
Van's here! Saying again, escape van's here!
Who the hell do you think you are!?
Any loot you want to take back needs to be secured.
Answer the Intercom. Don't make me come over there, son.
The cannon still needs batteries.
Just one to go.
How about that escape? Is your driver coming?
I can do that for you, ma'am.
Gear up and let's go drill that vault. I want us to feel like rich dwarves.
This is the Left Control Room for the Dock Gate. Use the Keycard here.
Just like I thought it would go.
Head to the armory and load up on C4.
Secure the bags on the plaform where you came in.
OK, great that saw will come in handy.
Someone bought the last Tin Boy. Go search all toy store bags you can find in the mall!
The message has been delivered. Ernesto Sosa is dead. Your work here is done.
Get to one of the other computers and help.
You guys are doing great.
Four left now!
Alright, I got it! The storage room is now unlocked. Go get the car keys.
Ok, let's get him out with an 'urgent' email. You've got another compromised computer near you we can use.
That's the key. Get it to the door!
Let's do this faster, guys, please!
Come on, get into the chopper guys.
Okay, I have ingredients on their way. Stand by.
That box controls the gate. A little creativity should get them open.
This heist will need thorough planning.
Search the Jade Room, I saw a glowing monitor there.
Surely there has to be a way to open the crates. A crowbar or something.
Vault's open. Grab whatever's inside, gang!
You gotta get into the office.
You're going to have to fight your way to the end of the plane, get up the stairs and then fight back along. Only way to reach the cargo controls.
Throw in the engine!
We got half the WPD on our ass!
Look over there. Little cop shits are stealing the money. The fuck is the world coming to! Kill them!
This vault's got an Achilles Heel. It's temperature controlled. Jam the vent fans at the back with crowbars. The temperature rises and the failsafe opens the door. Easy.
They are taking the bags!
You can only melt through that wagon with the thermite, so you better head back and fetch it.
There goes the connection. Power was cut. Please restore it, yeah?
Fuck! That's landmines. Keep off the grass and stay out of the camera view.
What a shitty dump.
Gentlemen - I need your steady hands to remove a competitor from the political scene. The reward is golden.
So what kind of shit are we going to find in this place?
Bring the shit!
We've been expecting you fuckers!
Great, now you just gotta hold out 'till it gets there.
Typical. Just what we need, yeah?
This is... Gerd. I'm calling you from The Golden Grin Customer Satisfaction Department.
There's one more can of thermite in the copy machine but someone else needs to carry that one.
Any second now!
All right, Bile is en-route. He'll ferry that counterfeit cash away.
That's the guard dealt with. No need to worry about the cameras now.
More cops on the way.
Jesus! Are you OK!
