Then we steal the server and lug that thing to Hector. Clear?
We got a fucking police caravan on our ass!
Two more minutes and I need to go!
Hurry and pick up the box, friends!
Great. Our second door!
I've had it with these guys!
There goes one of the bags!
Jump out like a jack-in-the-box. Masks on!
That was a bit of bloody business, but sometimes it gets like that. Still, job done. Great work!
There. Hmm, that's the new Yaeger model K. No way to get into in fast without the code.
Shoot these fuckers!
Come on guys, express elevator... going up as soon as you push the button.
Alright, that's enough to go now if you want, but if we want more - get me access to the surveillance room so I can see what's on their network.
30 seconds now, get ready!
Must be that drivers first day. The dumbass stopped for the ambulance! Now it's your turn, gang. Get out there and do your job!
Shit, how did they get to us?
He's lying, I'll take care of him myself. Bring him to the chopper on the roof!
We got roadblocks on the perimeter, and cops closing the net. No way out by the road. Time for a new plan.
Put holes in 'em! Swiss cheese!
OK. Whole database is recovered. No point hanging around - get back to the boat.
Too slow guys, the getaway left...
That's 17 bags!
Um, my name is, uh... Tony. Why not. I'm calling from Customer Satisfaction here at The Grin.

The Benevolent Bank is located in downtown Washington. Today, you are going to make a significant withdrawal. Preparation is everything. Set up your plan. Execute it. As a gesture of goodwill, I have prepared a crane beside the bank. Use it how you see fit. That is all.
OK, it's in!
Looks like you're going to have to go in through the back door. Use a saw to crack it open, yeah?
You know the drill, gang. Let's cook a little meth.
The weapon will not fire until you replace the empty power cells.
... no wonder you guys are getting all that press!
Find Taylor's desk and computer.
The hell do you think you're doing?
They've got guns!
More screws to unscrew.
Hey Mitchell... When will the pool be ready?
We're here. Nice night for a murder.
Got those holes drilled yet?
Still waiting on those routers.
Put the delivery in the car...
Let's go, let's go!
We've seen those symbols before
Now turn on BFD. They'll display her for years to come.

Now, we don't know exactly what we're after, beyond it being an object - it's probably one of those know-it-when-you-see-it type things, but it's likely that Garrett has already taken it from evidence and stashed it somewhere in his office. My contact inside said he's there and seems... distracted, so the meeting is definitely close. We've got to sneak in there now if we're going to have a chance of stealing the item from under him. It's important that we go in and stay quiet. And don't go killing Garrett - we're probably going to need that chop later.
That kak woulda sold his mother for a dollar.
Damn! Okay, just try again.
Guys, the wreckage is incredible. Rubble blocking everything.
Bronson here, I'm there in four!
Cops are at the arena. Stay frosty, gang.
Who is this? Who the fuck are you?
Got power again, fellas. Need a sec to reboot this.
The cops are here to check things out. Take 'em out quietly, and we can still finish this without raising southern hell.
The Murkies are headed towards you. Lock and load.
Locke wants us to blow that door. Better drop the charges off there.
I'm sure glad I ain't wading through that shit. Locate the exit point.
Through the tunnels and get to the beach, gentlemen!
That's it, gang. That should take care of the gas in the scanning room.
This is going to be a good one.
Get that power running again, yeah?
I love this room. Give your weapons a try in here.
They just activated several gun turrets. Stay frosty!
We need to add ephedrine tablets to start the cooking process. Find some and add it into the mixer.
You will never get away with this motherfucker!
Our chopper is coming in, he'll blend in with all the news choppers.
Our buyers only want cars in great condition. That means you can't alert the cops. They won't care what they shoot up. So keep this a quiet one.
Come on, guys. You have to get the cutters onto the vault floor.
Security here is tight. We might be able to do this heist silently. But if things go loud, don't worry. I've always got a Plan B.
I liked that guy. We'll send his wife a ham. Yeah, for sure.
Get those bags out, guys!
OK, we can leave now, but try and take it all if you can.
That's your laundry guys - Bain will see you inside.
You found a blowtorch, and now you need to actually use it.
C'mon, you gotta have a good look around for something to use.
You have to replace the batteries with fresh ones.
Bile is waiting for you guys! He's got the winch. Come on, light the flare!
Don't get the heat on you too early or your escape is going to be rough. Check your assets. Let's go.
Now use the keycards on the dock gates. Let the Moretta out.
What's... Hey! Don't fuck with me!
Blimp is over the city and headed for you. Give it a moment.
It is a lean plan. Is it enough?
I'm sure you've seen all the tasty loot in the vault. Stash it in the chopper if you can stay a little longer.
I'm coming in two...
No frequency here. Damn! Then the best bet is the office across the dock - check it out.
Listen to me, I have information critical to your survival.

Dear friends, this is going to be a tough one. The Kataru have stepped up their pursuit of Bain's dinges, and we've got to take away their toys, yeah? The warehouse we're going to hit is the most important Murky site there is, and they're working on some very strange projects. They only let me near the place once, and I didn't see much, so we can't know what to expect. I've pulled in every last favor with my remaining contacts at Murky, and have got us a way in, but we're going in blind. Once we do this, there will be no going back. We're essentially proclaiming open war on Murky, but we owe the bliksems for Bain. There's going to be a caliber of security we haven't seen before, so don't get NAAFI once you're in, yeah?
Clearance required.
Those are the jewels we are after. Get it to the van.
Do you have anything stronger homie?
Who sent you? I know who sent you!
Sound good? Let's go!
We're just getting started, come on!

Ok, listen up. To get inside that vault you need to get by the security system. Intel says that Garnet's son Ralph has the key card for it, but he also happens to be the birthday boy so that could be a problem. There's also a three-part security code split up onto different laptops because someone told 'em it would be safer. It'd be great if you could get your hands on both the key card and code without raising any alarms, maybe pull a silent fast one on Mr. Garnet.
You believe in fate?
Now! Hit these bastards!
Pier 39. Tag the truck carrying the voting machines to Washington, and get back here. Let me stress, we're only here for the truck.
Get over to the gates. Let's get this done.
That's his phone. Good.
Throw the bags into the barrels!
... ready up!
You can secure the loot bags in the boat you came in on.

I believe the Sosa Cartel may now be regretting their decision to try to intimidate me. Their Miami operation now lies in ruins, and I can do business in peace again. Thank you for delivering my message.
Garrett likes history, friends.
The time has come. The Benevolent Bank is ready. Make sure you are too.
That's what we're looking for! Gotta admit I'm a bit underwhelmed by how they look, but grab them, yeah?
Right now you are succeeding.
This is the hangar, bag those weapons and get ready bring them back up to Vlad's boys.
Damn cops. They're the ghost of Christmas fuck! Deal with them! Protect the elves! At all costs, protect the elves!
We've got your money right here. The info is in the safe. I'll open it. No funny shit or you die.
There you go, now find that laptop and hack it.
Have a look in the Admin Office, there's bound to be a PC there.
You can go inside now, they're expecting you.
...and kiss your lucky charms.
Damn. They locked the containers when the alarm went off. Break through!
See if you can find the X-ray device we need to get the data. Without it we can't do much.
You need to add an ingredient, make sure you don't use the wrong thing. One wrong step and the lab will torch up like a christmas tree.
Come on! Fuck 'em up!
Look for bookshelves, see if you can move them and find something.
Run! Run!
OK, cops are inbound. First step, look for C4 in the guard room.
This is going rather well so far, if old Locke says so himself!
We're using the roof as our pick-up spot. Over.
Stop the cops!
Damn! They lowered the Diamond into the floor! No time for anything fancy, so only one thing for it - get a drill on there!
So, they're studying one of the boxes in the archaeology lab. Get over there and have a look. And watch out for loose mummies.
Busting up this motel is our first step to getting Hoxton free. Head in there.
Now top up his glass. Soon as he swallows, well, let's say he's going to go loud. Follow him, and get the card for his room.
Don't get caught up, get to the coke! They're not fooling around! Oh, my poor heart...
Here we are, get in there and get me required amount. We go in quiet and go out with a boom!
People always forget computers in Meeting Rooms. Go see if you can get lucky there.
This floor should have an accessible door... if you use a saw, yeah?
This is the boat. I see the lights, I'm on my way.
Hello gentlemen. Our client is very pleased that you agreed to do this with us. But know this - the only way this is going through is if we do it our way.
Have you considered asking at Harvest and Trustee?
Let's get inside, guys!
We have a lift-off!
... I'll be back in a moment!
Three bags!
Where the fuck am I? I see... Storage units?
Okay, the briefcases. First is held by casino manager, the second one by the pit boss and the third by their head of security.
Alright, I'm back up but keep that fucking power on.
Not sure it was the server.... could have been something else.
OK, the first machine is hacked. Keep going.
Oh, shit!
That's the third stash. Only one left!
Got to get that cannon pointing right.
Serious accident near the Woodrow Bridge when a limousine caught fire. Emergency services are still at the scene so if you're in the tailback, sit back and enjoy our calypso hour.
Right friends, better go out and get Mr Pink, yeah?
Go find who bought the Tin Boy! There should be a bag from the toy store.
Fuck!
The pick-up driver is here now, go get that loot in the back of the truck!
Is the pickup coming? This is getting pretty hot!
We'll take what you have.
Hector wants to send a message in, quote en quote, blood and fire to the Mendoza cartel as they roll into their private airport. Might be tricky... But I think we can.
Nope, that's not enough. Get him talking again!
Get over here!
I'm here!
We're inside. Good. Next, gonna need a couple of keycards. Smart money would be on them being indoors.
Don't ask me where I got that thumb. Now verify identification from the security consoles. Shouldn't be a problem.
Cops tailed you... Shit! When we get out of this I'm taking care of the wheelman myself. Get ready folks...
Sure the Captain heard that, so we can rule out him cooperating. No time to turn the screw on him either, so we bypass him. Hack the ship control terminal. Keep it running.
Multiple hostiles entering by the street.
No, that's not Bain's cell. Try another one.
That plane must have dropped of the guns for Mendoza. Hurry up guys!
Right friends, that's the right place. Go out to the main hub and use the crane.
Here's your box. Come on, shake a little ass now.
Good, now get into the office!
An agent will now detain you.
Van's ready and waiting, gang. Move it!
The pay is not what it could've been now, next time, try to keep them off and hack the machines.
They just pulled up out front!
Holy crap! We knocked all three trucks off the road. Make it count!
Now just connect it to the hatch.
It's alive! Alive!
No time to stop and party, find those routers ASAP!
Cops pulled the hose. Get it back on!
Reception will have the guest list, guys. Just head there, download it.
Sorry guys, he says this ain't the one. I'll be back in a few so you can give me the working one.
Was that the cable?
OK, nearly there now, just grab the server and hustle it to the van. Put your backs into it.
Another grate, so just treat it like you did before. Burn through with the thermal paste.
Waste 'em!
Are they cops? Are those fucking cops!?
OK, time for a smash and grab.
My caaaar!!
That's it. Now wait for the pilot to signal in.
Shit oh shit!
Good work. Just need to find one more keycard.
Aw, these fuckers are trying to rip us off!
It's not our lucky day it seems... that guard is watching the server room. Get rid of him.
Okay, let me think... What do we need? Ah, the workshop. Yes. Go to the workshop, you'll find the special tools in some toolboxes.
C'mon, gang! Get the bags, and assemble the winch.
You gotta open up those storage units, friends.
First, you gotta break into the warehouse. It'd be great if you can keep the noise down.
Nine

We need you there fast, but it's really out in the sticks, so you're going in like the paras. Find the pilot - he's probably near the wreck - and then we'll send in a chopper to extract him. Stay with him til he's safely out. Also, Vlad says that plane was loaded with product. Search the forest and get as much out as you can. Can always use a little extra cash at Christmas.
I swear I was being followed for a while, and not by cops either.
Watch your heads guys. Presents from heaven.
Watch the bags!
Hurry back to the warehouse with those diamonds, friends.
That's The Dentists' loot saved. Bail now, or really show The Grin how we treat Vegas DC-style.
Two more!
I wonder if this is where they keep Amelia Earhart's plane...
Good, now quietly 'persuade' the auctioneer to give you his keycard.
Guys, don't forget to get that terminal back on.
Sweet, I'm getting this for myself.
I don't think we're seen their best yet.
Hit as many stores and glass interiors as you can. If you can snag cash and valuables, opportunistic, you understand.

Dear friends, even if you don't trust me you need to listen 'cause things are about to get real heavy. Not long ago, Bain got new information about this Holy-Grail-dinges he's after. He wouldn't tell me what... something about not believing him, but said others are now wanting it too. The whole operation, including Crimenet, will go to shit if we dont' get things fixed. Sure, I'm in it for the money, yeah, but I also owe Bain, and I intend to repay. Aldstone says the safehouse is safe again, so get back there and I'l be in touch. Must see to some things. We're going after the big one... and bringing a back lost soul too.
Right, now let me just get this sorted. Won't be a jiffy.
I see one!
Great! You defeated that wave of cops!
Vault door's open. Get in and grab the loot!
That's fine, I'll pick that one up!
What are you waiting for? Into the docks.
Gentlemen - I need you to assist me in transferring someone's wealth to benefit my party's best... Interest.
Please, step away.
Hey, stop scratching your balls and get down here.
More guns, more money. Great work. Hector is waiting for us.
Over here!
Reboot the shutdown sequence.
Five
You need to get back to the chopper. Hurry!
Of all the vaults, you had to open an empty one! Try again, friends.
Kerels have stopped the computer, you gotta restart the hack!
Ey fuck you!
This will pay off later.
Take care of those Murkys and I'll get Bain to safety!
Nice. Security chief's number. He won't be happy to lose this.
Get the stuff from the safe!
Think the Commissar got this thing from Vlad. Slow Russian junk...
You gotta get through that door.
OK, I'm in position!
Watch for Cloakers!
Alright. Now for the mansion. It's a safe house for a reason, and expect alarms on all the doors and windows.
The cops are sticking to us like a fucking booger on a forefinger!
Kill these guys and bury 'em! Do it now!
Ok, now you gotta search those bags of coke.
Over there!
Hold on for dear life!
The bank has shutters which can be closed from the security office. They should help you keep the police at bay!
Stay focused! Keep moving up! They're wasting coke like they were trained for this!
Kill everyone!
You need to turn off those valves at the bottom of the server rack.
Quickly friends, grab the box.
Get the hell out!
JACKPOT!
Let's salvage what we can. Get the big safe open.

You see all those crates? They're about to get shipped out directly to the Commissar's location. Grab the labels and check them at the reader over there. That should give us Commissar's precise location.
Put these suckers in the ground!
Keep it going in there.
You need to get the elevator going again. Restore the power.
Good luck, my friends. Vlad is appreciating you.
So long my little smiling friends!
One more minute! Pick-up's almost here!
Get to the far back and join up with Twitch!
Can't stand around there all day. Get to it.
Can't let them all away...
Stop throwing the coke into the fucking water!
It's a goddamn police ambush!
Fuck you, the deal's off!!!
The're repossessing the bags!
Every last one of you leaves here in a bag!
Dammit! SWAT ambush. I didn't see it!
They seek him here, they seek him there, they seek him every-fucking-where!
I'm like god damn mother Teresa...
Find that laptop, guys!
OK, you're inside. Find the paintings with the red stickers on them, we want at least four.
They say you should work with family because you can trust them. But this guy, I can only trust him to be an idiot and to fuck up.
We stole this from a lab not a million miles from here. Two hundred thirty eight thousand six hundred and six miles, to be precise.
Another two minutes and I'm out!
Locke, if you promise to not fucking crash this helicopter, I'll get you a new set of golf clubs, right?
All right. Head to reception, find a terminal and download the guest list.
Ingredients have arrived. Going to take more than one load though. Keep throwing them in.
Time to go! Get on board before Murky attack craft reach us!
A Murkywater convoy filled with gold. Time to hit it.
Gang, into the dealership. Take cover. I'm blasting the road.
That was very impressive. And you probably saved my life. I owe you one for this.
Guys, shoot up that burger joint and get out of there.
What are you doing here!?
That wasn't the right cell.
...Plan is as follows.
Key to cold fusion is self-sustaining process... More energy out than goes in... Outputs will tell us if this is it or not...
All right. More C4. Almost got all we need now. Keep looking.
It's open! Search through the deposit boxes!
Too many people in there. Watch the civilians or this will get ugly fast.
Over here!
The CFO thinks he's clever and that he can get away, but I see him.
Eleven bags!
What are you doing here?!
Hello, First World Bank. Of course we can arrange a loan to send your first born to college. After all, we own them.
Alright, bring it to the van, it's right across the street.

The Elephant doesn't like losing elections. He wants us to tamper with the voting machines headed to his district. We're going to the docks to put a GPS tracker on the truck carrying the machines. This will allow us to intercept the truck and deal with the machines before the election.
What are you blaming me for? This wasn't my idea!
With the anti-air defenses out of the way, Bile has free passage to drop the EMP close to the lumber mill.
Everybody, get down into the sewers!
Remember: you're looking for a clue about Downtown Washington. A file, hint - anything. See where he is at.
There were spare drill bits in the piggy bank.
Another eight and I'm out of here!
Those safes are too precious to risk on these roads, so I'm sending in a chopper. Thing is, pilot can't see a damn thing. You need to drop a flare for him.
Remember guys, we need seven bags to escape.
Right, Twitch... you're up. Might want to cover your ears, friends.
Friends! I am here and in position! Please, when the opportunity allows, take the straps and attach them to that wonderful stack of money.
Just one more.
Nearly got it. Come on, come on.
Thirty sec, guys! Hurry the hell up!
The rat was Hector!? He used to say that there were a lot of stupid criminals in the world. Apparently he was one of them for thinking he could screw us over.
I have taken a call from our cooks. The Mendoza cartel is planning a hit on our operation in the "country". Make sure they fail. Go there now.
You're looking for keycards. The buildings are your best bet.

The Dentist got Hoxton a re-trial. Uh, not you, Hox - I mean Old... Look, we'll sort out names later. The trial will be quick. With his record, he ain't gonna walk, but that's not the point. The point is he's moving, and we can hit him in transit. We're going to grab him right after the hearing. A nice little 'screw you' to the US justice system.$NL;$NL;The plan is as loud as it gets: we blast a wall in the courthouse, grab Hox and get him the hell out.$NL;$NL;Area's locked down for blocks around. They'll be expecting trouble. Have your guns ready and pack a lot of ammo.
I can only take four at a time, fill it up, and I'll come back for more!f
You better enjoy life while you got any left!
Truck's totalled. I'll find us another ride.
What are you waiting for? Pick up the box!
Now. Overlooking this area you will find the control room. From there the vaults in this part of the facility are controlled. That would be useful, yes?
You now have access to the West Wing. Get going.
Turn the water back on!
Get into the van! Get in the van!
Alright, there's the door and there's the first lock. Get the codebreakers working.
Friends, Murkywater operatives are in the area. How did they find us?
Hey boss, the guys in Mexico sent you some tequila. You want it?
You're fucking dead!
Security barrier de-activated.
Right friends, you should get over to the weapons lab. I think they're keeping one of the boxes in the adjacent room.
Three left!
The van is gonna be here soon!
Enter the store and grab a hostage so we can trade back our friend from the cops.
Get out of there! Into the cargo hold!
Police chopper en route!
Just keep it together gents... Don't lose hope.
The longer you take, the more difficult this is going to become.
Well done gentlemen! Some hard-earned cash!
You wouldn't believe such a dump could exist in the heart of our nation.
I wish I didn't have these kinds of problems. It's so hard to find good help these days.
Wolf, you've been barking up the wrong tree for years! And now you find me!
The server room is locked down. We can't get in there now!
This is the reception desk.
The testimonies Hox needs are down here somewhere. Search the records.
Great! Not gew the briefcase!
Right, the numbers for the code are...
I'm on it, lifting in ten.
Nice!
I will bury you!
Pronto people.
Shit's getting real, guys!
This is pure oil for the machinery that is your plan. It's a smart move.
I bet those wagons have loot. Check 'em out. Keep an eye open for C4 too.
Alright. That looks good. Thanks.
That's one hell of a hole! It's perfect!
Hey, what's the holdup?
I'm gonna drive a fucking spike through your eye!
Gonna cut you into fucking pieces!
Hey, we don't have all day!
Drill's done its work. Get in that basement!
I can see a laptop in one of the cameras.
Achh! That vehicle has got to be removed!
OK, no time to lose. Start the codebreaker!
Uhh.. Must be my police scanner. I'll shut it down. The police are miles away.
Good job, clowns. Keep the wheels burning.
Rip these fools to pieces!
Ok gang, looks like we're going after some diamonds.
Gang, put those fires out. Don't want to risk him escaping in the chaos.
Time to use some of Joy's new hacking routines.
Over there!
Keep your eyes on the asset!
Nicely done. Now get into that office, friends.
That can't be the right adress, try again with another one.
Clues to the right computer are in the office. Come on, hustle!
Kill the guards. Then you can kill Ernesto Sosa.
Nailed it. Keep going guys.
Party might be over. Lots of people leaving.
Clearance granted.
Be careful! They have snipers incoming!
If you overheat the system it'll do a soft reboot, giving you access to the controls. Then you can get the server.
OK folks. Going straight to the source. Inside that place is the info we need - and way more law than we want to be close to. Find their server room and get the info on the bank. I'll do the rest.
An associate of Gage's will help getting some of the loot out. Just toss it to him.
Those charges must be hooked up to the four locks. I am sure you don't need walking through the procedure.
I'm not taking any chances, gang. Search any boxes you see. Worst case scenario is you find other valuables.
Get the power back up!
Guys, the thermal drill. Go get it.
Another package hit the ground, clowns. Try and find it.
Don't forget to send me the list. Head to IT. Plug it in.
My friends - you help me with small problem, yes? I need you to cause... Domestic problem.
Wait guys, I think I'm confusing these CAS registry numbers. ...guys?
Too late friends, the auctioneer is gone. Drill the door open instead.
Bring it home fellas. So goddam close I can taste it.
We're going to water crack this vault, guys. Fill it with water, and detonate it. It'll blow the door right off without damaging the contents.
Alarm's tripped, no going back now!
Just a heads up: the type of security they use for the server room will make it harder to open if there's an active ECM jammer nearby.
Look around for a ladder. You need it to search the wagons. Maybe it's still attached to one of them.
This is more my style.
What are you waiting for? Get that keycard into the panel.
The code might be connected to us and Crimenet, in some way?
Having the right tools on site is a great step to ensure success.
OK, I'm inside. I'll get to work on these servers. Keep me covered!
I am humbled and grateful. Your good work has elevated my cartel in status and wealth. I will not forget and neither will the cartel.
Time for a little comeuppance.
That C4? Pretend it is poor lost baby. Love it, nurture it....then put it on wall and blow it up! Yes.
Couldn't hurt to pick up some more things we can sell.
Maybe have a look in some computers around there. See if anyone has been careless with their security clearance.
The two keycards will be around here somewhere.
I can't believe I hired you again, Alex...
One, two, cops are coming for you...
Find the circuit box, crew. You need to hack it to halt the fan.
Keep looking. He's around there somewhere.
Time to charge it. There should be a control panel around there, yeah?
Ach, that door's going to take a bit to crack. Maybe that cannon-dinges will do it. See if you can get it aimed.
Make sure you're ready!
Oh fuck me sideways!
Gonna spill your blood everywhere, amigo!
Maybe if I send in a screwdriver by courier?
These fuckers are trying to rip us off!
Damn, they really saved their big guns for last. And it looks like she had a keycard.
Kento, you got trouble coming...
Bring the shit!
Loot the stores in this little strip mall.
Yes. That will work well.
You must have shit for brains, comin' here!
I've seen him take a bullet before. Thought he'd last longer.
If you kill his guards, you will get to him.
Check through windows. See if you can find the alarm box. Once you go in, it's gonna go off pretty quick, so be ready.
We got it!
You'll pay for this!
Wait for BFD to crack through the vault. Even this monster will take time. Keep the cops away.
Hot damn! Commissar, you dirty old Bertie.
Put the bag on the table. I'm waiting.
It's the cops! Hold the line!
The ship by the docks belongs to the Butcher. Looks like she got sold out too. Help them out and maybe they'll give us a ride out.
I'm there in one minute!
That's it, guys. The AA gun has been disabled. But there's still one more.
Looks like the right one alright. Now get it open and we do the next bit in style.
The switch there will open the cargo doors!
Commissar has called in the big guns. The very big guns. Stay away from that chopper!
I'm sorry. We're not able to offer unguided tours of the premises, and especially not "the room where all the money's kept".
Escape is ready. Van is in place, engine running.
Jumpin' fuckin' Jesus guys, I'm gonna get creamed.
You have more, no? This is not enough.
Those crafty chops got the asset from you! We gotta bail on this one. No cake tonight, friends.
Wide open area. Lot of sightlines. Use it, but be careful. Snipers enjoy good coverage here.
That's ten!
And... yes, that is a satisfactory piece of business! All of the bags! Now, please, attach yourselves to the cables, join me up here and let us meet in person!
Use the saw and cut through the roof, then drag his ass out!
I'm sure the Commissar doesn't have fire and damage insurance on this dump. So go nuts. Trash the rooms, scorch the cars - anything you can do to rile that guy and get him on the line.
It was like the fuckin' Seventies, man. Money, blow, hookers....we got it all.
That's a sweet pile of counterfeit cash. Beautiful. Grab it. And if you fancy a little more...
Second truck opened! Check it!
Alright, anyway... Let's find the Commissar in his penthouse and kill him. That bastard's gonna pay.
No alarm on that door now. Get inside.
That disabled the metal detectors. Good job.
OK, that's the tiara!
Ship security knows nothing. Track down the explosives.
... then, we'll trade.
Okay, but how did it....?
I can only take two at a time...
Where is it!?
I'm there, one minute!
What are you doing? You should be looking for Garrett's office.
Now, you know how Santa delivers presents, yes? Into the chimney with those packages.
Three left!
Answer the Intercom!
Hydrogen... Is that a gas... Can't be a solid... Says add it. You guys got a gas tank?
Dammit! The plane missed the cable. Alright. Still time for another pass. Stand by.
Great, set off the flare so we can land!
You need to go to the archaeology room.
OK, this is the place. You might wanna case it before you go in for the tiara.
The bird is inbound with the skyhook pieces. Pick-up target is the street.

Things got messy, but you got through in the end. The hacks worked. It looks like the good lady Mayor's people was behind this. The press are already sharpening the knives for Schwartz. Needless to say, The Elephant is ecstatic. You have served your city well tonight, my friends.
The storage room is blocked off with sturdy metal doors, yeah? If you find and tap me into the security boxes, I can unlock them from here.
You need to find that saw, friends.
Those are the thugs running this little toyshop. They've been naughty boys. Drop 'em, and get inside.
That's it for the truck. I'll find more wheels.
The voting results are stored on a nearby server. Find it and scramble that data.
C'mon, get a drill going on that door.
Hurry now, get that dinges some power.
You made a bad mistake!
I need to talk to someone about my 401k.
Hector needs footage to show the world and, well, for our own safety.
Another vault. Didn't expect that.
Twitch is arriving with the van to pick you up. He'll wait by the upper bridge side.
Head to the Sunshine State, and a counterfeiting operation in the Pensacola suburbs.
All right, booth team. When I give you the nod, you hit it - you got that?
OK, I have access. There's two Gensec alarm boxes we need to disable, I'll mark them for you.
Look for a code that starts with seven.
Get the power back up!
Come on! I'm at dock seven!
Crew, you need to bail. The blue containers will mark the path to the escape.
C'mon, grab the dinges!
Woah-woah-woah-woah!
Great, money coming down.
Good! Get the rest and we will get them out of here. I hope this fucking train is a smooth ride.
A little cash goes a long way. The local Harvest & Trustee branch bank needs to be lightened of its load. Let's do this bank hit, get their vault open, and fill our pockets a little.
These guys can drive!
Sorry fellas, too slow - the getaway just left along with your freedom, look me up when you get out.
So this means you have to find it. References seem to indicate it's... Connected to a bookshelf. I know, leave it to a politician to be cliche.
Vlad wants to speak with you...
Sounds like the cops are about to bust through to Wilson's house!
Cops are going for the balloon! Stop them!
Have you searched through the whole train yard?
Screw the winch down!
You need to move to the bio-lab.
The cage is assembled. Great! Now start filling it with bags of Benjamins.
Kiff! Now go and have a look inside, yeah?
That has to be the way into the PEOC. Get into the airlock.
Don't enter the wrong code or the alarm will sound.
The office of the manager. Maybe find keycards here. His terminal might have value as well.
Shit! Was really hoping we wouldn't need to go to plan B here!
Oh, shit!
There are SWATs rappelling in to the office!
Roger. One moment please. Today's code is 8394. Please remember it next time. This is very sensitive information.
Police must have followed us...
Damn, he's heavy...
Now set up the camera and record it. Hector likes quality I guess.
Great work! A classic takedown of a classic heist. It was a pleasure to watch!
You see the chimney there? That's where Vlad needs those "presents".
The hell do you think you're doing?
Uh, sorry, this is my first day, what do you need?
You cutting though yet?
If you have the chance, you can always take your meth with you. This deal has gone sideways anyway.
This spot is getting deadly!
Wipe 'em out!
The data scrambler just crashed. Get to the server and get it running again.
Once you're in find the manager's office, find his safe, and clean it out.
A night at the museum, gang. It's just you, a crew of security guards and a priceless diamond.
Alright guys, It's time to get outta there.
You think I don't know what's goin on?...
Kerels have reset the control box. You need to restart the shutdown.
Uh... Yeah... Their radios aren't working. Sunspot activity.
Okay, so we need paper and ink. Get them going in the press.
OK, I'm receiving the second half of the database. With a complete download, we stand a solid chance of locating the truck carrying the machines.
The timer stopped! Restart it!
Shit police just called in heavy duty reinforcements!
Answer the Intercom, son!
Management would be a good place to look for a laptop.
Well look at this! I thought I was never getting out of here. You untie me please?
C'mon friends. Bile doesn't have a lot of fuel left.
Almost there guys!
Damn! The timelock has jammed. Your ECM jammers must be interfering with it! Wait for it to resume.
Don't say a word. I'm well aware you're not only here to save my ass. Rust still wants his bike back, right? Well, to do that I'm gonna need all the parts, and they're spread all over the place.
We got twelve!
Moretta is in position. Get on deck and look for the explosives. Move!
Plant the C4 and blow the roof off.
That won't do, everything is encrypted. We need more codes!
Almost there. Final protocol - the managers code. Check his computer.
We need the ship's comm frequency. Likely on one of these terminals. Search them!
That's the ordnance, but it's not the turret. Get it out if you can, but keep looking.
He's dead. Good riddance. Chopper's on the way, guys. Dentist sent a few bottles of champagne with it. Sure Hoxton will be grateful too. Good work.
Find the saw guys.
Those nicely wrapped packages of coke are still coming down! Bring as many as you can!
That's a lot of shiny. Worth a fortune, but we just have to get it open. See if you can find any clues to those symbols around there.
Domkops! What are they doing?!
That's close enough! I'll get it!
Good luck on your treasure hunt, guys. And remember, keep it quiet.
Why not go back and get some of that juicy loot? I'll make it worth your time.
You should see me coming any second!
Just heard they've got a squad of bulldozers up in the area ahead. They'll fuck us in the ass. I don't want that. Watch it!
I think the cops are calling the house, they're probably on to us.

Now, if you will turn to page one, thirty-two in your Manual of Investigative Operations and Guidelines, you will see the chapter listing has been changed from the previous version. This is quite intentional, as previous versions of the text were deemed to be inappropriately convoluted, and as such made the localization of certain passages unnecessarily difficult. As we proceed deeper into analyzing the particulars of the manual, and corresponding regulations, you will no doubt note the abundance of changes that have been made.
Damn! They have set up an additional security door...
You took that wave out! Great work!
The wheel stopped. Get ready for another bulldozer guys!
You need to use the thermite to get past that security gate.
... when it's done, we'll give you what you want.
Bags! We need more bags!
That's the last door!
Pop the flare so we can bring the chopper in.
Damn it guys, you've been left for dead by Bile. He's gonna get it later...
Vlad is really something else! He wants to steal that huge Christmas tree! Bile is coming in with the chopper now, so be ready!
Hector's worried... We're too far away from the coke in this chopper. Once you're on the ground get to the coke, signal his courier, and load it on to the pick-up boat.
The hell do you think you're doing!?
You kept them away. Good stuff! They aren't backing though, so get ready for more of them.
Find the guest so we can steal his keycard. Remember, he's likely on the slots.
Absolutely, sir, not a problem. Would you like all of that in 20's?
Once we are outside you will see our escape helicopter, as well as a large array of advanced radar equipment. State of the art. It could track us anywhere west of the Rockies.
Boat's ready for you.
I'm gonna KILL you!
There's one there.
About 60 seconds until police arrives. They are scrambling!
She...uh...wants another ten K to do...that thing.
...And don't forget to get the boxes off the conveyor!
I'm leaving in half a minute!
C'mon guys, get that juice flowing again.
You guys ready to become legends?
Okay, that's the digits for the armory code. Enter it!
Now, give me a few moments, friends.
You got to find those shoes!
Wait, what? The lead scientist is dead? Well, the only way we're getting past that door is with the help of his hand...I guess you're gonna have to do some dirty work...
Not even a block away!
Put the product in the car...
It was a bad move to ambush me!
Chop kerels have shut down power to the lab. Find the wall box and get it up again.
Sorry, friends. Looks like we didn't get you in clean. The place is on alert and locked down.
Who are these fuckers!?
Shit, can't access the interview files. Need direct approval from the FBI Director himself. Find his office. See if you can fill in for him.
Well, fuck me, that was a waste of time. The vault is empty. Find the good ones, you hear?!
I'll get that one! Go get another!
Yesterday, people!
Out-goddamn-standing, crew! Get in, fill your bags. Take as much as you can, but remember, we're here for The Dentists' loot.
Alright, get on board so we can get the hell out of here.
Looks like we're out of luck. This one's no good. Go get me another. I'm sending the chopper back to pick it up.
Don't forget the store. Drill the door. I bet my cut there's a goat inside.
Looks like the mobsters are digging in in the rooms. Get in there and wipe every crew member you see. Safeties off.
OK, I'm in. I'll get the lab door open in no time.
You need to clear the pickup zone guys! Or I won't be able to get you out.
Remember - the trap, set it off!
Get in there. Meet up with Mitchell.
What are you waiting for? The vault is open.
Hey, hold the door!
Now you have to get inside the auctioneer's office and get the code. He should be carrying the keycard to it on his person, so go get it!
I'm sending Bile in to boost that cash out of there.
Find that saw! It has to be around here somewhere. Try looking around timber logs.
Search the arena for the supply closets marked with a red X. That's where the C4 is.

Nicely done, dear friends. We're still in a lot of trouble but old Locke is going to take care of you, yeah? I know I made some promises, and I'm still working on getting answers. Calling in all my favors for this one. Gotta pay off the Butcher too- don't want her nipping at our heels after Alaska. Have a short breather, lay low for a bit, while Mr Lindenhurst tries to figure out what's so special about this medallion dinges. I got a feeling that we haven't even cut through the frosting on this cake, yeah?
Great, let's keep going.
You make me do this shit, and now you want me to thank you for some extra body bags? Suck it, Bain.
I'll meet yo at the docks.
Bain said it could happen but I didn't believe him. Good thing I got you out of Washington, eh?
You gotta go to the library!
Chopper's on its way! Get ready!
...it got dumped in the containers at the construction site. Go out and get it.
Are you having second thoughts or what?
That's the external hard drive. Nice.
Good job. Leave them there for now while we take care of the bank.
You need to find the CFO. He's got the master code. You *need* the master code.
Fuck, this is gonna be tricky... Yeah, you can't do it yourselves. Take me to the garage where I can take a bike apart to collect some special shit for this babe.
Hose has been disconnected.
You clowns just wrote the most exciting chapter in the story of Washington politics, and probably the most honest. Great work!
You wanted me here, here I am. Let's get this over with.
All right. Armory uses a three digit code. Look for it in the casino. Numbers and colors. Or you can gamble on guessing.
C'mon guys, find me those security boxes. Check the walls.
Gotta move the car!
Guys, we got cops so far up our ass they are practically sitting on my fucking lap!!
Get that back office door open!
You did good. Better than I thought you would, to be honest. We got what we came for, and I bet we can get a good payday from that gold you stole. Should be more than enough to get you started again.
Alright alright, two!
I've found the target's location. Go hunt, my friends!
Hey, you know...there's a printer there. Why don't we make a little extra spending cash while we're here.
Your escape van just left...
Let's get this thing going, guys.
Don't forget the fireworks. Vegas will go up like 1999.
I see one of 'em!
Time to go to plan B!
What a fucking waste of quality coke!
Looks like we'll be doing this the hard way. Stay low and search those apartments for the info! Look for safes!
Those gates are rigged to stay locked if someone's on them. So get off!
Gentlemen - I need your steady hands to remove a competitor from the political scene. The reward is golden.
You still need to bypass security, so find those two routers!
Alex will be seen by that helicopter!
It is war - and in war, we win!
Guys rappelling from that chopper to the roof. Get at them!
Find the nearby power box and disable it. Should kill those metal detectors.
While I'm doing this, you should go ahead and find those three laptops with the code fragments.
*Sniffles*
The thermite has melted a hole straight into the vault, just as planned. Jump down and grab the cash!
OK, we need to clean the joint out. Eight bags ought to do it. Don't go easy on them!
My friends! We are approaching the location I have selected for the drop point. So, without further ado...
Alright, fuck it...
Screws.... screws... come on, now.
Plan B is much like Plan A - keep hacking. A little bit of code at my end and it will look like we were doing this for Mayor Nancy. So keep hacking those machines!
Keep an eye on that saw until it's done.
More money for us.
Guys! The chopper!
A beautiful sight, yeah? Never thought I'd be that pleased to see a bunch of papers!
30 more seconds, then I'm out!
Holy shit! Looks like they've electrified the vault!
They're using C4 to blast those doors. Guess they don't know about all the live ammo that train is carrying.
Escape driver's comin in now. The escape driver is coming in now!
Damn it, they're burning it!
Chopper can't hang around forever, gang. Get there, get out!
They're deploying another group of snipers!
Alright, the chopper's on the way. He'll be there in a minute.
Looks like the manager is losing a bit on top. Look for the balding guy.
Protocol means they'll have snipers ready to ambush up ahead. You fellas watch yourselves, yeah?
Great, we need at least 3 more, get it to the van. It's in the parking lot next to the gallery.
Holy shit! They've got mines hooked up to the camera system!
That's what we came for. Take them and let's go!
What are you doing? As long as that camera is operational, you're not getting in unnoticed.
Look at this, I'm rich!
Get to Jake's parking and I'll get you out of there.
And there goes the escape driver. Keep going. I'll figure something out.
The heat's rising!
Come on, crew - focus! C4 the doors!
Vault with simultaneous two card reader. Probably 10 second time lock. They must be hiding something tasty.
Just pull the switch, guys
There's one of 'em!
Hey! That's mine! Leave it alone!
It's the police! They're tailing us!
The deposit boxes are a bit of a lottery, but I know there is a lot of cash here. Find it, and bag it.
And they still don't know you're there. Keep it that way while the Moretta docks.
Chopper is there, throw the bags into the chopper.
The crane isn't moving. Damn Murky has stopped it. Go and get it running again, yeah?
C'mon, you gotta get in there. Use that torch.
You're through to First World Bank. Yes sir, that's right - a free shotgun when you open an account!
Great, now get down to the garage. Our Inside Man has marked up where you need to plant the c4.
When I get that bonus, it's gonna be time to party. Cabo San fucking Lucas, baby!
10 grand.
There must be keycards around the place. They can help you get in quiet.
These fuckers went to driving school - I'll tell you that much!
Great guys! No one keeps you out!
Just make that hay.
You have demonstrated that the Sosa Cartel does not own the Caribbean. With sufficient emphasis, I believe.
Ok, I've got intel that mentions a hidden entrance to the PEOC near the library. Get over there ASAP.
They weren't expecting that! Now, time to find that Russian rat.
Get the water hose laid out all the way down to the safe.
That's it ladies and gentlemen. IT. IS. DONE. Now, I need to get the fuck outta here!
You gotta wonder how many people have snuck as far into the White House as you guys, yeah?
Getting all the pieces in place wasn't hard.
Get to the roof with the gadgets and bang, we're gold - literally.
Keycards can be a great asset. Find 'em, but use 'em carefully.
Now use the card to get inside the server room. Second floor.
Those safe deposit boxes might contain a nice bonus. Why not have a look while you're waiting? Titan doors though, so you can't just cut them open.
OK, that's the server. Get the scrambler on there.
The charge process needs to be started again.
I'll be there in four!
This will facilitate your entry.
This is Captain Rogers of the MPDC. We got a call from Gensec. Seems they got some concerns about what's happening there. I'm dispatching some uniformed officers to make sure everything's OK.
You gotta take 'em out! They're killing me!
Now, please, bring the loot bags to the helicopter.
Take a look at the vault. I'm pretty sure our pardons are kept in there.
Now, we need to set the trap. More gasoline in container 12.
OK, three!
Another guard. Stay hidden.
Hose needs to connect to ship.
This might be the one.
All right. Yeah, this is good. Going to need more, though.
Thats him! Dont let him escape!
There in 30 seconds, guys!
Hurry now, reconnect me to the grid.
We had agreed on more than this.
You need to find Brown's computer.
Run, run!
I dropped some C4 in a rush, look around for them.
Wall's gone, move!
Wait here. I'll be right back.
Have another look around. Maybe Garrett has the code written down.
Standard operating procedure. Who is this?
We're keeping this. Sorry...
Smoke?
Now!
Here we go, this should do it.
First number. Get the other two.

Ok, so we're going to Salem and steal the artifact from the fancy rich dwankie party, right before the auction starts, yeah? You're going in after dusk, and it's foggy and raining, so maybe try to do the whole thing quietly if you can. It's an old mansion, but the security systems are pretty solid, with many upgrades. Under the circumstances, the less attention we draw from the kerels, the better. But if you gotta go loud, then get it done chop chop.
So that's Locke.
Got a nice clear run at the bridge. That's where the cage'll be.
Roger that. You guys are doing a great job. Sucker fell for it.
It's on the ground floor.
Bollocks to the safe house. We're going somewhere else. Trust me.
That diner has a service ladder leading up to the roof, but you'll need a keycard to get to it. Look around for one.
Check for the safe guys. Got to be there somewhere.
Go inside.
Vlad's very keen on talking to you on this one.
Motherfuckers! Now you did it! You made me mad!
Don't forget we have enough sugary desserts to give you diabetes.
15,000 dollars worth of stuff.
Good. I'm sending a chopper to collect him. Keep him safe. He's so wasted I doubt he'd feel the bullets.
Yes. It's working. Just need more in there. Keep loading.
That's it, yeah? Pick it up and keep moving.
OK, first things first, look for the gear case.
Smooth operation team. You stole everything and the tiara. We are in town and are making a name for ourselves here. Great job.
You gotta hurry up!
The cops are coming in from the upper floors, you gotta move up and find a bottleneck to defend!
Use his computer again, be careful, they only go down for a small amount of time.
Case the place, guys. Find the bank, and find the polling place. Then get them both.
I'll get that one! Go get another!
Don't let 'em come this fucking close to me!
Mr. Blonde's boss will be able to sell those stones quicker than me, so get the bag to him, yeah?
There we go. I'll be nearby and ready when you need me.
Arriving in two!
You can play it safe and call this a day...
Die! Die!
Shit! Po po is here!
We're still running low on spending money, so if you find anything else worth taking...
We go to their little private airport, find the weapons and take them all or destroy them... But it's more profitable if we take them.
Somebody stop these fucking clowns! Don't let them come in!
Holy shit! They've boobytrapped the doors!
Perhaps you should apply at the Benevolent Bank.
Great! Now that he's safe, I'm sending a helicopter to pick him up. Stay with him.
Politics is a dirty business at best, right? Sometimes you need people to help you clean up.
They cut the power to the network. You need to get it back on.
That's it friends, good work.
Our competitors were hit hard in the crunch, but we weathered most of it, since our Chairman buried the money in his yard.
Now enter the password.
Keep your wits about you, Zeal Marksmen are on the way!
Over there!
*Cries*
Kerels have transferred payment for the asset. Nicely done.
Get me some tanning lotion, baby.
Collateral damage will screw us. So no cops. That means keep it quiet. I'll let you know when you need to plant the C4.
Hector wants proof we didn't just swipe the cash.
They're inside!
This is Captain Rogers at Precinct 8. Gensec have raised a concern, regarding some suspicious activity. I'm sending officers over, just as a precaution.
Look for something to do with history.
No-no-no-no-no!
Die! DIE!
Luckily, old Locke provided you with a modified drill that is strong enough and will not jam.
Keep the people down. Keep them quiet.
Don't forget the terminals, friends!
Got it!
Over there!
Get into the chopper!
Ahhh, he was my friend. Well, what can you do?
You have approximately two minutes before the train reaches the barricade. You hear me? Two minutes.
The canteen, friends. Get there now!
Elevators are headed to your floor. Keep an eye on that.
If we get outta this one I might just leave this fuckin' town.
I gotta leave in two minutes!
OK, friends time to get in character.
Four left now!
Bullseye! You guys OK? That was one hell of a collision! Get to work on those transports!
I would prefer it if you just left before anything goes wrong, but I understand if you wanna go back to get more of the loot.
Not like this, not like this!
Hey, you can shoot coppers later. Get that door cracked.
They're coming from the west, by the construction site.
Hold the door!
What the holy fuck! You dare! I'll fucking kill you! Kill you!
Guys, safe to come out yet? I swallowed a cockroach.
I am watching you, you fucking dickfaces. Eat my shit!
Grab your oh-shit handles!
You trying to pull a fast one on us, huh?
Ok. All vehicles stopped.
Almost there... Almost there.
I'm gonna kill you!
What are you doing? Wait for me to mark them out. We need to cut the right wire.
Quick work, friends. You got ahead of old Locke, yeah?
Now, just have a go at those logistics controls. It's a simple job. Even a retarded samango could do it. And sometimes they do, the little shits.
Don't mess around...
Get to the construction yard! Hurry!
I can't shoot Murkys and carry Bain at the same time. You gotta take them out.
The cops are deploying snipers in the area, don't walk into their sights.
You still have 16 left!
Okay, you got the stuff. That's the important thing. Time to bring it all to the helicopter. Get a move on, Bile's waiting.
Forest - cops coming through.
I'm coming in at dock eight!
Uh, gang, we have a LOT of firepower rolling your way. You need to get to the van right now!
If they have ray guns here, I'm taking some with me.
I'm sure this will come in handy.
We pull this off, and the press will go nuts. Alesso. Payday Gang... badass.
Out into the sky, friends!
I think they are all dead. Thanks to you, my friends.
Don't mess around...
That's it for the fifth floor. Excellent.
Hope they respond as poorly as they usually do...
The police is on our back like a fucking pony tail!
Blood coming out your ears fucker!
That fucking rat Hector is dead. Good. Fucking good. Well done lads.
Their big vault takes a three digit code. This is one digit. Write it down. We'll need it later.
The key to his heart was in the cars. Now go put a bullet through it.
Farewell dear friends, we'll not meet again I think!
You gotta get through those bars.
I think we will come out of this alive after all! Of course, I never doubted it!
Pretty sharp threads for pool repair guys. Uhh, guys, I've gotta show these people down the basement.
BFD works hard, but drinks a lot of water. Make sure she has coolant. You can find water in the bathroom.
We got a tail - and they're getting closer!
I'm guessing any decent IT department will have a spare USB.
I don't know how the bikers know we're coming but they do. Maybe all that meth they're doing gives them a sixth sense...
Hmm... not sure where this entrance is exactly, but if you poke around a bit, maybe you can find it.
You need to ignite a flare to signal the helicopter again.
Hang on. Don't waste your time. Everything's fine.
Our new Medic Dozers will teach you a lesson in humility...
Ach, that's what you get from dossing about, friends! They just took the hostage and we gotta go back empty-handed!
There goes the wall. A garbage truck is your drop-off. Get hauling.
Alright, finally! Jesus!
Our position is now less difficult. The cocaine supply is not under threat. We will now move against our enemies. Whoever stands in our way.
What the hell! It's the cops!
Now move into the office, but stay quiet.
Ha ha ha! No-no-no-no-no-no!
Keep the cops off the machinery, guys!
I'll get blasted if I go alone, so you need to take me to the garage. I don't know about y'all, but I want to get this shit done and over with.
You'll find the code inside the auctioneer's office but to get in, you gotta get the keycard from him.
Put these sons of bitches down!
That security system should have cable boxes around there.
Don't forget any parts of that winch, yeah?
Those oil barrels are blocking your path. Find the straps and release them. We don't have time to find another way.
OK, now get that footage back to the van. Move it!
Half the Washington PD is behind us!
Yo yo yo, wassup.
I got it. Hoisting it your way.
The only thing I like more than a successful bank hit is the cigar afterward. Burning one for you, folks.
Fuck me sideways!

Remember, we're here to make it look like a bank robbery. If some election equipment gets destroyed in the process, that's too bad. And it would be a real shame if the voting results became unusable somehow...
Ooh, nice bit of hardware, that! Going to be useful for sure!
Hey motherfuckers! You ain't got no chance!
I would do it from here if I could, dear friends, but I can't. So please open the fucking cargo doors.
There in 30 seconds!
Alright, two more.
The escape will be there in nine minutes.
You've only got a small bit of time before the kerels find you.
Out of there guys, via the platform.
Their databases are partitioned across two servers. Downloading the first one now.
Don't forget, dear friends - you need to open the cargo bay doors.
Almost... there.
Hang in there!
See if you can find something we can use to hack the vault system.
Found any power cells?
All right. Head through the opposite office, and then head down. Come on, get out of here.
... put these gringos in the ground!
Gentlemen - we are at a tipping point in the election. I need you to help tip it the right way.
You need to get all the winch parts, friends.
Grab some sapphires if you have time.
Put all the wares in the car!
How is it going?
You know what happens when you fuck with Russia? Read your history book, asshole!
Stop them following. Set off the trap!
I need a breather. Bain is very heavy, yeah?
You gotta get up to the roof!
Something wrong with that computer. It's not connecting. Damn MurkyDOS. Try another one.
Don't forget the box, yeah?
We'll take what you have.
I'm going to make you bleed!
Get after him, and wait for your chance.
I'm coming in at dock nine!
There you go, friends! Now have a look inside that vault!
We got what we came for, so you can get out whenever you are ready.
Explosives are placed. Gensec transports on approach. Almost there...
You better be bringing the box, yeah?
It's been ages since I was there last. They've changed a lot of things.
Maybe some Minigun Dozers will shut you up...

That's a strange looking dinges, yeah? Put in on a zipline chop chop!
Kerels have stopped the hack!
The vault code reshuffles every 10 minutes for extra security. Put a blocker on the keypad to lock the code in place.
You'll find the code inside the auctioneer's office but to get in, you gotta get the keycard. Find the auctioneer and get it from him.
You gotta turn the power back on to get the code!
You can't get the code without any juice. Get the power turned on again!
You gotta restart the electricity!
The alarm has put a time lock on the door. You just gotta wait it out, friends!
OK, time to get in that vault. Chop chop.
Have a look around and and see if you can find a utility closet. Maybe there will be some useful tools.
The chopper will be there soon!
What are you doing? Secure the artifact!
There you go, that's the vault.
Right there on the feed... that's the vault.
Time to have your tuxedos pressed, yeah? Let's crash an auction.
Ok, keep our little V.I.P. dwankie safe and out of trouble.
Right, friends, let's keep our hostage out of trouble and safe, yeah?
Great, we got our quarry. Make sure the chop stays secure.
There you go. That's our target. Keep it safe and out of trouble.
Vanguard is on the way. Everyone keep your eyes peeled.
There's an assault on the way.
You got snipers around there!
That crane... coppers are clearing a new route to you with it!
They must think we're a bunch of chops with an offer like that. I think we should make them give us more.
You have to keep them away from the asset.
They're going for the hostage. Stop them!
There you you go, well done. We squished those kerels for every last penny. Tonight, old Locke buys the drinks, yeah?
A bit hairy in the end but you got there. I don't think we could have gotten another penny from those chops. Nice work!
Blerrie, that didn't go the way I planned. A kakspul of trouble it was. Maybe we'll do it better next time, yeah?
OK, looks like they've upgraded not too long ago. Makes this a little bit harder.
Time is up, friends. You need to redo the hack.
Time to find Garrett's office, friends. Have a little fun with the guy.
Come on friends, we have a schedule to keep.
These Federal Kerels have got more interesting things than donuts and pie lying around- things we could get a pretty penny for to keep us going, so if you see something nice, go ahead and rop it.
Found a phone yet?
Ok, I'm dialing now. Stay low and wait.
There we go. It's ringing.
Can't believe what a domkop he is.
Garrett is old school... sticks to what he knows. Things like history.
Maybe something to do with his wife... an anniversary or something?
No, that's not it. Blerrie! Try again when it resets.
Use the one owned by "Chloe".
Find any food, yet?
You've got to get Garrett out of there again. Find some food.
With a bit of luck, that will get us into the evidence room. Quickly, take it and go.
Take the box back to the skylight where you came in, yeah?
You gotta get back to the skylight.
If you're feeling ready, go ahead and leave the facility.
The code should have a one at the beginning.
The code begins with a one, according to my source.
The code begins with a three, according to my source.
The code should have a seven at the beginning.

Dear friends. Commissioner Garrett has arrested the Elephant on trumped-up charges in order to get an item he has, that the owners of Murkywater- these Kataru people, want. He's making a deal to give it to them in exchange for what we can only guess is the body of Bain, now that they're done with him. The item obviously very important for them to risk exposing themselves and I wouldn't bet against the whole thing being about Bain's Grail-Dinges. We don't know yet what the Elephant's doing in all of this, if he's still solid with us, and we couldn't help him right now even if we wanted to, but Garrett will be in his FBI headquarters tonight preparing for the exchange, so we're going to ruin his plans.

Well done, friends. We pulled the rug from right under Commissioner Garrett and I expect his next few hours won't be very pleasant. Oh, to be there when he goes to his meeting empty-handed, yeah? Bain would be proud. As soon as you get back to the safehouse, Duke should get cracking on examining the Elephant's box. We've got to know how it connects to the one you acquired in Las Vegas, to Bain's grail-dinges and these Kataru chops. Then we plan our next move.
I'm impressed Hoxton isn't having a nervous breakdown coming back to this place.
Fuck this, why are we talking about donuts? Feds eat pie.
You will go in through the ground floor.
The Murkys are going to try and stop the drill, so don't let them!
The drill has been shut down! Get it working again!
You gotta get the drill running again!
Hurry and get the drill working again!
Ach! The Murkys have gone bossies!
With any luck, the Murkys will not follow you. This tunnel is said to be able to withstand a couple nukes.
You never know if Murkys will interrupt the system, so don't lose focus.
Ach, now we gotta wait for the dinges to finish!
Blerrie, there is a firewall blocking me on the network. Check the other computers and see if you can disable it.
Friends, find the other computer and disable the firewall.
Look out friends! They have an active weapons turret!
Look out for those turrets, friends!
Good, good. No mistakes.
Nice, now old Locke's coming in hot, so be ready!
Looks like that got it done. Nice, friends!
Maybe check the walls?
The White House aids in the current administration aren't known for their tight grasp of security. Wouldn't be surprised if we could find something on one of their laptops.
You can use pretty much any laptop to access the USB stick.
Pick up the pace, head for the library.
My intel didn't specify exactly where the entrance to the PEOC is. See if you can find something. Turn the room upside down if you have to.
There you go! That has to be important.
That corridor isn't short, is it. Built to take a couple nukes, it was.
You gotta wonder, if the nukes were dropping, would you really want to have to go this far to get to the PEOC?
You've seen that model before. Hard to break.
I've got an idea. We hack the mainframe. We can probably get into it, even if there are several layers.
Friends, hook me up to the mainframe.
The mainframe. Patch me into it.
Alright, I'm in. Give me a little time.
I'll take care of this, just keep watch for Murky chops.
C'mon, you need to disable the firewall at the other computer.
I need your help to get through. Log on to one of the other computers.
Blerrie! It wants to run an automatic firmware update. Hurry and stop it!
Hello? Yes Sir, no problems at all. We're just running some tests.
I'm going to install some security scramblers.
OK, let's see if I can open the vault now.
We're done, now get in there and find those pardons!
Alright, now let's get out of here. Leave the PEOC!
They're going to shoot me down if you don't hurry! Fighters incoming!
Chop chop! This is going to be close!
Blerrie! There goes the alarm!
Ach, the alarm is sounded!
We gotta get past that gate. Look around and see if you can find something useful.
You'll have to get into those boxes manually. Patch me in!
OK, now we gotta cut into those boxes the old fashioned way- with a hacking device!
Ok, I've got it. Just need a little while.
Don't let the enemies interrupt the hack.
They interrupted the hacking device. You need to reboot it!
Hurry up and get to the West Wing, chop chop!
The Oval Office is right there, so get inside.
Looks like they've upped the security. Gotta find a way to get the shutters open without making a mess of the oval office.
Ok, now use the thermite you found on those shutters.
Those shutters will not be able to withstand thermite. Get some on there!
You should burn through the shutters with the Thermite you found, yeah?
Bain, I know you're sick but that was the worst joke, for sure!
Son of a bitch!
These bags look fucked up, you're not treating our stuff with respect, huh?
Ey man, the deal ain't here. Turn around, this place is ours.
Don't mess around, this isn't all of it!
We gotta get outta here!
I got one!
I see one!
On second thought - we'll take everything you have...
... deal's off! So fuck off!
Where's the shit?
Ey I'm talking, where is it!?
Bring the shit!
... these fuckers are trying to rip us off!
... go through with the trade, as we agreed on!
Oh, shit!
OK, three left.
Thank you.
You stink of sweat, ese. You've been running a lot lately?
Wow, you stink of the BO, man. Been working hard recently huh?
Prepare to get fucked up!
Kill 'em all!
This won't end well for you, suckers!
Gonna spill your blood everywhere!
You fucked up big time.
Now you get paid, you get paid with this!
Adios amigo!
Shit man, what was the code for the safe? We need to burn those files!
This is not all of we had agreed on.
More bags, gentlemen.
... Take these sons of bitches out!
I see one!
Over here!
Hey, gringo.
Yo, hombre.
Ey.
Let's get out of here.
... You don't think our time's important?
... Put all the wares in the car!
Here's the deal...
Now, okay. If I hear ya right, it's a no on a loan to buy a salad bar called Boogers?
Uh...I can't change your mind? What if you...look into my eyes!
Sweet Jesus . . . Why does this happen to me? What did I ever do to upset these shitbags? I was only here to get Rust's bike...
Aw, man... I thought I was toast for sure... Can't say I expected a group of clowns to suddenly save my ass.

Eh, I'll say it for you: you didn't come here only to save me, now did ya? No, you're here for the custom built bike, am I right or am I right? I'll help you. I owe you that much, but you'll have to get me the parts I need.
Fuck! I don't wanna die today!
All right, we're gonna need an engine to get this baby going. I'm almost positive I saw them store some inside the clubhouse.
Oh, yeah. Wait. You're gonna need this blowtorch to get inside.
Okay, we're gonna need a fancy seat for Rust's fancy ass, don't we? There's an old bunker in the backyard. Get in there and you'll find what we need.
Oh! I almost forgot! I need one more... special ingredient. Yeah, that's right. The mechanic needs a coke from the vending machine. Chop chop, pretty please.
Oooh, stealing some shit, are we? I like it. Anything to make these fucking bikers' lives miserable. Put it in the trunk and I'll take it with me as I drive off. We'll deal with the details later!
How I make my money? Publishing. Yeah, publishing.
How I make my money? Just keep. Yeah.
Ah, my work is pretty dull. Repetitive. Like a machine. But it pays well.
My money comes from... well, a sort of trust fund. I'd let you in...but I don't trust you.
Man, I love the smell of a fresh hundred dollar bill. You know?
It was really just a matter of getting all my ducks in a row, you know?
And this is the sort of shit that only money brings. It's a lifestyle, y'know?
What a time to be alive...
Got one supermodel on my D, second supermodel mixing me a mighty fine G & T. King looks over and winks.
Well-dressed for repair guys. Guess you'll change before getting to work, huh?
All right see the pipes, leaking? Down the wall? Fucked!
There. See? Fuckin' pissing all down the wall.
Look at this carpet. Just fucked, man.
It's the feds man, isn't it?
Uh, come on!
Hey, I just got word. Cabot's got a guy comin' to pick us up but you guys better split before he gets here. He ain't too happy right now.
I lost the pigs guys, thanks! See you in a bit. And bring me a burger!
Yeah, about that. It's out here. In my car.
Jesus Christ guys, come get me before the cops do. I'm at the far back!
What's takin' so long, Goddamnit?
They're right on top of me people, can't fucking hold out much longer!
*grunts, wheezes*
The fuck happened back there? No way the cops knew we were there that fast.
Fuck man, I got Brown's brains all over me!
Let's fuckin' blow this pop stand.
Meet our promoted Cloakers! I'm sure you'll love their cuffs...
Say hello to our new LMG Dozers...
Attention, the hostage is being secured and we are releasing payment to you.
This is the police! Release the hostage and we will try to meet your demand!
The asset has been recovered. The heisters lose and they're aren't getting any money today, over.
The asset has been retrieved. That's a win for the boys in blue, over.
We're got the asset secure. That's game over for the perps, over.
You may have gotten all you wanted this time, clowns. But your day is coming.
That's one suspect in custody, over.
You're breaking up... Can you hear me ok?
Right!
I remember when you could smoke in the operating room. Once I put on that damn dress I tell ya...
Hey Bain, great briefing... I heard jack-shit! Let's just aah, play it by ear.
Argh... You old fart. I'll kill him first.
Right!
Hold that door!
Somethin' about this job ain't right. Just... something...
Copy that. Let me pull it up...it's 8394. Don't let it get out.
OK, throw me the paintings and you'll get your money!
Alright, let's trade!
Come on, we need more than that!
Oh shit! This wasn't the deal! We are outta here!
You better hurry up and fix that leakage
*mumbles*
That was intense! All right, head back to the vault and let's finish the job.
We got cops all over. Drop the beat, guys.
That's the last closet. Get it open. Keep it quiet.
And there is the final closet.
Oh man, sounds like a hell of a gig in there.
You gotta get down to the garage and plant that C4.
You need to be at the pyro booth. It's on the top floor - get there!
The middle one, guys!
Center button!
Okay, hit the middle and right console. Go!
Console on the right! And the left!
Cutter is done. Watch your heads - here comes the money!
Nice. Scoop that loot up quickly. Let's get out of here before they notice.
Don't forget - stow that loot up into one of the vents.
Guys. Answer that intercom when you're ready to bail. Whatever you leave behind, stays behind.
Yeah! Got our seven bucks back. Suck it, parking meter!
More C4. Almost there. Keep looking.
Gensec are showing their unbreakable vault at the arena. We're going to use the Alesso concert to prove them wrong.
Tickets for Alesso's show were swapping hands for $400! Whatever happens tonight, someone is getting rich.
Here it is - the Gensec arena. This Alesso gig is the biggest show it's seen. Let's make sure it goes down in history.
Expertly done! Collectors will pay big figures for this stuff. You did great, gang!
Let's hope we can be as successful as last time. Hit it, gang.
Jesus, it looked bad on the news, but...
Second truck can't be too far from the first. Find it.
And that's it for the safes. Now I want that truck in the yard. We're closing this one!
Great. All the safes are in. Now let's see the truck back at the yard, gang - hustle!
Guys, the pilot is circling! Drop the flare!
We don't have time to load and unload the safes. The chopper's just going to carry the truck. It can do it. You just need to get in!
Christ, LA's wrecked. Rubble everywhere.
There's no way you're hauling those out on your backs. Hold on, I'm going to find you a transport.
That will do! Start getting them out and into the truck!

We have a stolen ambulance all ready to set up a roadblock, and a Gensec convoy en-route from Dulles. It's an old trick, but a classic. Get whatever's in the trucks to your escape driver. We're deep in Indian country here, gentlemen, so expect a fast response from D.C.'s finest.

Gensec's overland armored convoys employ a lot of ex-military types, providing firepower and muscle, and they move everything from little Jimmy's favorite baseball card to the Crown Jewels. We got a line on a convoy moving into D.C. Let's see what we can get.
We got Gensec trucks moving through the suburbs. Go hit 'em.
We've got an armored transport making an unscheduled stop downtown.
I knew we could trust that sniper! He delivers. Don't waste time - get to work on that transport!
Hot damn! Three trucks are pulled over. Their crews are on the street. Hit them hard!
Haha! You did it! This jewelry should be worth a few bucks don't you think?
Outstanding work. You guys spend blow through some of that cash. I'll see what I can find on this blueprint.
That's a lot of cash! Nice job!
Sweet, sweet gold! Great job everyone!
This shouldn't take long, hold your ground.
Use those roofs to your advantage!
It's open! Let's see what we got!
The truck's open. Get in there and crack the safeboxes. We need at least two bags of loot.
We're in, but you still got to deal with the deposit boxes. You got to get three bags back to the pick-up. Hustle!
It's open! Deal with the deposit boxes, and grab the loot. Four bags is our minimum.
This is interesting. Military blueprints in a Gensec transport. I'll look into it.
OK, Gensec is approaching. Gun that engine. Move! Move!
Gensec in sight. Get those rigs moving. Go! Go! Go!
Woah, jackpot! We hit 'em good! That truck is out of action. Get to work!
They fell for it. Three transports. Crews are on the street, trying to figure out what's happening. Hit them hard!
Damn it! Looks like we need local access. Most likely one of the staff terminals. Figure out which one. Try 'em all, if you have to.
Connecting now. Better pray this is the right one.
That was the wrong computer. Try another one. Maybe there's a way to figure out which terminal we need.
That was the wrong terminal. Keep trying. Look for some clue, clock is ticking and we need to find the right one.
No code. Try another one.
Bunker down, gang. Hold the line until the time lock finishes.
Rewire those circuits. That should reset the time lock.
Come on! Get the time lock going again!
Great. Now, please, keep the cops away from the time lock.
Set the zip-line up on the roof, then haul ass to the crane.
Get the zip-line set up on the roof. Then connect it to the crane.
Uhrm... maybe we should have hired Alex after all.
Grab those bags and get them to the vault. Might be a good idea to take some spares too.
Open up the elevator shaft. The van's waiting for you in the garage.
I got the van in the garage, but you need to go through the elevator shaft.
Now climb down and get the bags to the van. Watch your step.
If those lasers are giving you a hard time you can deactivate them with keycards.
That's the first console. Now the second.
Got the code. Get back to the vault.
The silent way to open those doors would be to use the keys. If you can find them.
Now get to the vault and assemble that rig.
That's the alarm.
It took two hundred years, but the Benevolent Bank has finally been robbed. Outstanding work!
This is a historic day, gang. Haha, you finally cracked the Benevolent.
You just ensured yourselves a place in the history books, gang. Simply outstanding!
(sings) "They're the gang that broke the bank at Monte Carlo". Outstanding!
That's probably blueprints of the building.
Shit, the cops are here!
Damn it! They saw you!
Nice, bring the money to the van.
You can use the keycard you found.
Good, now set up the connection.
Alright, looks like we have... 11... 12 prototypes. See if you can find something around the house that can indicate which is the working one. Then pick it up and get it to me.
This one seems to be malfunctioning, I'll be back to pick up another one.
Nice work guys! This seems to be the right one! You guys better head out of there ASAP.
OK guys, search the place. They have a safe somewhere, it's probably in there.
That might be useful.
Seems to be keys to an airplane.
Damn it! They've spotted you!
They've electrified the fence! Find a way around it!
Ouch - that sure drew attention.
Smack daddy in the middle. Alex dropped good.
OK, doctors - bring your MIT skills. Figure out which one is the correct fusion engine. Go!
Check his papers, notes and computers. Anything for a hint on what is correct here.
OK, chopper is here - get the engine loaded up.
He delivered the engine. I'll have my man here inspect it, and if it's the right one we're good to go. So hang tight for a sec.
Nice work guys! This seems to be the right one! You guys better head out of there ASAP. Use the plane keys you found.
OK, you delivered! Now let me get you out of there.
Dentist, you asshole, I'm going to drill out those glowing eyes of yours...
Hey guys. Been waitin' for ya. How do I look?
The gold guys... the Mayan gold... you gotta use...
You're gonna need the gold... 1st world bank... the Mayan stuff...
Dentist... Elephant... Sputnik... gotta warn...
Today's our lucky day - cash delivery from the airport to this bank, all sorts of denominations... So I propose we do a little money exchange of our own.
Payday is this week which means the currency's here now. Which means we are too.
I'd feel bad about hitting another bank if they felt bad about hitting us. So I don't. Let's cash out.
Just because this is a bank job for cash doesn't mean it's gonna be easy. You need to get into the bank vault, try to control the civilians and tellers so they don't hit the alarm.
The manager might have a key too. I'd wish you luck, but you don't need it, right?

OK, the thermal drill you need for the vault is somewhere in the parking lot. Get it before you do your takedown. Then you can go hit that vault. Watch for cameras and bank employees. Do your homework before you go in and remember cash is king.
Let's get into that vault.
OK people, my contact thoughtfully stashed the thermal drill you're going to need to crack the bank vault somewhere in the parking lot. Get it, then hit the bank vault.
