People I think this job is a gold mine. Almost literally.
Drill the vault when you are ready. I don't know what's here but I like our chances.
This branch bank is ready for the taking. Let's do this.
I love banks. The smell of all that money.
Alright, bring it to the van, it's right across the street.
Get that gold wrapped up!
Guys let's keep things moving along here.
OK! you've got enough... Or you can stay for more.
Keep controlling that room people.
Keep it under control.
We're looking good... Looking good.
I like what I'm seeing in there.
Loads of cash! Bag it up boys!
Looks like we've hit the jackpot! Bag it up!
OK, great. Now get that thing to the vault door.
They had no chance at all. I don't think the National Guard could have stopped you.
Loot's ours. One thing I like about bank jobs is the instant gratification. Good work.
Safe house vault is going to be a little crowded tonight. Nicely done, folks.
If there were more crews like you I think the world would need to store its valuables elsewhere.
People...
...This is the setup.
Rust's bike isn't going to roll without an engine, and the mechanic said to check inside the clubhouse. Get a move on.
The bikers are apparently storing stuff in an old bunker. The mechanic said you would find a seat for the bike in there.
The mechanic told you to go to the bunker and get the seat for him.
Perfect, now deliver the part to the mechanic so he can work!
You got what he asked for, now you need to bring it to him.
That's the part he asked for. One step closer gang.
Ride, boys and girls, ride!
Remember, you in civvie mode. That means no guns or masks. You're invisibles. Micho, our Inside Man here, left a guitar case with your gear somewhere.
That's them. Now scan them in, and fax me a copy. I'll figure out the right vent.
Now just grab that thing and get it out of there. It's what we came for.
A three digit code will open the armory. Find it.
Good job, we already have that code. Use it on the armory.
Crap! Just plant the C4 at the other spot. It's a sure thing now.
Light that flare, gang. Bile needs to drop off the winch.
Remember to sort the fireworks. Light up the night sky.
Will one of you clowns just grab that loot, please?
Great. Now toss it up onto BFD.
Now get onto BFD and let the blimp carry you up, up and away. Or stay and grab more loot.
Two!
Nine!
Gambling is a disease. Stop while you can, sucker!
This place is legit rich. Let's make it legit poor.
These machines are small fry. We're here for a bigger prize.
This is reception. Remember where it is.
This area's employees only. All the offices are accessible from here.
This is where the staff work. Offices, IT, security and so on.
Get the blueprints in the archives. They're somewhere in the employee only areas..
Gang. You gotta scan and fax over the blueprints. Sure that can be done in IT.
I think they saw that from the ISS!
Thank you for your time, sir.
This is, uh, Craig in the, uh, Customer Satisfaction Department calling.
I wanted to ask if you were thinking of trying our All You Can Eat buffet today?
If you want your beef rare, we'll just wipe its ass and lead it to your table.
We're serving... uh... soup. Made with... uh... vegetables.
We got ice cream too. You like ice cream?
And if you want, we can even make you toast.
You're wasting time! Repair BFD, get her working and let's finish this caper.
That's the list. Now get back to IT and upload it from an online terminal.
Get the winch hooked to BFD, gang.
You need to hook BFD up with the winch.
Armory needs a three digit code. You can find the digits throughout the Grin. Get to it!
We need a code to open the armory. Three digits. Colour coded. They're somewhere in the Grin. Get searching!
Looks like he's running dry. Bring him another with a little extra flavor in it. I'm sure you can find a bottle in one of the bars and spike it.
Pour him a drink. Once he takes a sip, the little something we added should... well, he's going to run for the nearest toilet. Follow him. Get his keycard.
That's it, buddy. Drink up.
Take a nice, long drink, pal.
Now look for a vent, and get the gas pumping. Send the security to Neverland.
Three digits. Outstanding! Now head to the vault and try them out.
Okay. Mask up when you're ready.
Dentist tells me they have C4 in the armory there. Get there, and get it.
Now plant the C4 in the main hall. The vault is right below. Two possible spots to blow. Hope lady luck is with us!
Now detonate the C4 in the main hall. Place it right above the vault. Hard to say exactly where that is. Two possible spots. Pray for a bit of luck.
Put the C4 in the main hall, right above the vault. Two possible spots, so it's a bit of a lottery. If need be, we'll blow them both!
Put the winch together where I marked, crew.
All right! Signal the blimp. And do it Vegas style. Find some fireworks and light them up.
We're going to bring the drill in with a blimp. For the pilot to see your signal, you need to set off a firework display. So look for them!
Great! Now head to the terrace and place the fireworks.
You need to get BFD right above the vault. The winch will move her, so get them hooked up.
All right, now let the winch do its job.
BFD is a greedy girl. Needs a lot of power. Hook her up to two sockets. You can find them inside the casino. And keep the cops off.
Okay, she's drilling down into the vault. You keep her safe.
Damn, cops got to her! Clear the zone and reactivate BFD!
The cops shut down BFD. Deal with them, and start her up again.
Water tanks are empty. Refill them in the bathrooms. Hey, I never promised you glamour.
BFD did a great job. Down into the vault. gang.
Maybe your gear is at the pool. See if Micho left the gear there. Look for a guitar case.
Still waiting on the guest list, guys. Get to reception and download it.
Find me the list, gang. Just plug it into an online terminal in IT.
That's him. Got his name, SSN, last time he took a dump... Check the screen in IT. Find him. Says here he loves the slots, so maybe that will be where he is.
Now! Tie him down.
That did it. They're all fast asleep. No need to worry about cameras from here on.
That's the first number. Keep looking. Two to go.
Outstanding! That's the vault code. Once we're in the Security Center, we can open the vault with it.
We got the pit boss' code. Nice.
Let's rock!
Arriving in style!
Guys, we can't risk leaving those thugs around. Deal with them.
Don't forget to find the elves. Shout at them to make them work.
All right. The so-called toyshop. Just ahead.
Getting pretty unpleasant out there. You guys sure you wanna stick around?
Find that storage room, gang. The keys will be there.
Locked. Damn it! Alright, stay cool. Find the manager. Take him hostage. I'm sure he can help us get in.
I'm looking at the manager's file. Chances are he's wearing a black suit.
I've accessed the manager's file. He'll be wearing a suit.
The manager's hair is thinning. That might narrow your search.
Use the manager's keycard to open his office.
I'm in. Need some time to open that lock. Instead of sitting there scratching your ass, head out to the van and get some C4. Time to prepare your escape.
Guys, grab the C4 from the van. Get it on the street.
Gang, the C4 is in the van. Get it, and plant it.
And... storage room is open. The keys are ready for you.
Get the car keys in the storage room!
Gang, you need to grab the car keys.
All of you need to be inside the dealership so I can blow up the C4!
Nearly got it.
Hope this is the right one.
Crap, wrong computer. Cops are incoming. You don't have much time now.
Alright, just park the car in that container, and walk away!
Nice, I'll detonate these. You just be ready with the cars.
Ok, I'll set these off remotely. You focus on the cars.
Great. Poppa Bain will take care of these. Now, back to the keys.
Great job! These beauties will be tearing up the streets of Eastern Europe in no time.
You need to get to the front!
Go forward and don't stop!
We need to get our hands on the BCI tech, gang. Go forward!
This car doesn't have a door, so you'll have to use a blowtorch to make one.
Search all boxes you find. I won't risk missing the BCI tech because Rust's information was wrong.
Holy...! They rigged the boxes with C4! Defuse them!
I'm not taking any chances with these boxes. Search 'em.
There it is! Get through the gate and secure both the BCI headset and the software.
Oh yeah, there it is. Get the gate open and secure the BCI headset and the software.
What are you waiting for? Get through that gate!
I said it's time to go!
You'll need to remove those barrels, and you need to do it fast. Just release the straps or something.
Use the blowtorch to get through the gate!
The door's locked. See if you can find another way out so we can keep going forward.
The door appears to be locked from the outside. Look around and see if you can find another way to get out.
There he is! Wake him up and take him to a safe place. There's a lumber yard nearby.
There's our guy. He's shit faced! Get him away from there. There's a deserted lumber yard near your position.
Jesus, he's wasted. Stay with him. He's in no shape to defend himself.
OK, that's the chopper you can hear. Get our guy out there.
Good work! Chopper's gonna drop him off then come back for the rest of you. While you're waiting, look around the forest for any more packages.
Chopper's headed out, but stay cool - it'll be back. Look for more loot in the forest. And stay safe.
The night's not so silent. Think I heard another present hit the ground. Find it!
Do my ears deceive me, or was that the sweet sound of another of Vlad's presents hitting the floor? Look for it!
Pilot is down! Get him back on his feet.
Oh man, the pilot just went down again. Wake that old wino up!
For crying out loud, the pilot has hit the deck again. Wake him up!
Chopper's headed for the crash site. Get ready!
Chopper will be at the antenna. Wait for it!
Chopper sees the flare. He's on his way. One minute.
Into the dockyard, gang. Keep an eye out for security and cameras. Go.
A keycard for the gate. Gonna need another, though.
Left panel's activated. Now get another keycard, and let's get the second panel done.
You thought you were just going to stroll in through the main entrance? Look around for another way in.
Great. Alright. Next step is to find two keycards. Most likely indoors.
Guards are down. Don't worry about the cameras now.
Moretta will be moved to Dock 3B... Once you execute all the necessary steps.
Guys, you gotta get into the dockyard.
Dinner time, little fishies.
No one'll see that there.
Cops are at the powerboxes. Don't let them cut the juice.
Why're you still searching containers? You got the bomb!
The comm frequency ain't here. Alright, then check the terminals in the office across the dockyard.
That's our ship. The Moretta. But we can't get on it from here. You gotta move it to dock 3B.
The Moretta - That's our girl. But we can't get on board here. You have to see her moved to dock 3B.
Maybe the buildings are your best chance for finding keycards.
What's wrong with you? You have the frequencies!
Great job keeping it quiet. They don't suspect you, so the containers are unlocked. Have at it!
These frequencies will be useful later on. For now, though, stay focused on the job.
There, chopper dropped the bag. Go pick up the C4, guys.
OK, there's the C4. Help yourself!
Halfway there.
Just one more.
C4's all done. Now let's blow the gate.
Well, we're not getting the Captain's cooperation now, but we still need that ship moved. Just hack the ship control terminal and make sure it stays on.
They cut the power. Get it back on.
Good. I can get on with the work now.
Moretta is powering up. Let it move to its berth. Weapons free.
Moretta's at the berth. Time for a hostile boarding.
You can use the crowbar to open up shipping crates.
A crowbar. Good find. Always useful.
Gonna need to call the Moretta, and for that we need the comm frequencies. Search for it.
And here's the second control room for the gate.
The wagons on the train might be loaded. And might have loot. Check 'em out?
A keycard, but no damn good right now. Alarm's been sounded. Stay focused on the task.
Guys! Use the keycards in the dock control rooms. Get the dock gate open.
You can use those keycards in the control rooms. Just swipe 'em, open the dock.
Gate won't open with you standing on it, genius. Clear the area!
Alright, dock's opened. Now we gotta call the Moretta. Get her moving. Comm frequencies should be on one of the computers in the offices. Find it. I'll patch in and do the talking.
Nice! Dock is opening. Next step: get the Moretta moving to her berth. I need to talk to her directly. Find me the comm frequency - most likely on a computer in the offices there. Find it.
That's it. Dock gate's opened. Now let's get the ship moving. We have the comm frequency. Just find the radio and patch me in.
That's it for the gate. Now we just got to get the ship moving. That frequency you found earlier will do it. Find a radio and let me talk to the Moretta
I don't want to keep someone who calls herself the Butcher waiting. Get onto the ship!
Moretta is berthed and ready for you, clowns.
Come on, check those containers.
Nothing in here. Keep looking!
Empty! Move on.
Bingo! Now secure the bomb-parts.
You're keeping it quiet. Great. Remember - you need keycards.
Don't think anyone knows you're there. Now get the comm frequency.
They still don't know you're there. Get on the ship. Keep it quiet.
Now get out of there without triggering the alarm, and this is a perfect stealth job.
Place the C4 on the gate!
Get away from the gate! Fast!
Reactivate the computer, gang.
Don't let them get close to the power boxes.
Almost... Done. Just a moment now, guys.
Get your drills on those containers, clowns.
The van is your way out of there. Get to it!
Your escape driver's parked up. Get back there - now!
Get to the chopper!
Haul ass back to the chopper, clowns.
Hope there's something worthwhile in here.
Nice! We can shift that, make a little extra dollar.
See that the ship gets out of the dock and berth. Then you can board it and get the explosives. Keep it quiet.
You're gonna get that Croatian ship out of the dock and berth. Gonna try and keep the volume low.
OK, thermite's through. A chopper is bringing the water. Connect it when it arrives.
There's the hose! Connect it to the vault.
Boom!
There's the ladder and thermite. Grab 'em. You'll need them later.
Here's the ladder. You can use it to get on top of the wagons.
Great! You can use this ladder to get up on the wagons.
Use that ladder to climb onto the wagons.
There's the vault! Great! Now use the thermite on the top and burn your way through.
Find a ladder. Then you can climb the wagons.
Get that hose re-attached!
The cops have disconnected the hose. Reconnect it!
Dammit! They yanked the hose. Get there, get it back on.
OK, chopper is back. Get pumping again!
That zip-line is your way out - get there!
The plane is close. Mark the landing strip with flares.
Great! Plane on approach now..
Briefcase with high-temperature thermite paste will be waiting for you here.
Industrial, high-pressure water pump used by nearby timber mill. If we're lucky, and the right wagon lands near it, we can use it to fill the vault.
Now dip that charge in and stand back!
All that wagon is waiting for is a nice bit of C4. Get to it!
You got one of the keycards, now find the other one.
Great, two keycards. That's what we need. Get to work and open that vault.
There it goes. The vault is open. It's all yours, gang.
OK, great! Get that sack of cash to the van.
Beautiful stacks of unmarked Benjamins. Just reward for an honest heister.
Alright, that's our blackmailer dealt with. Let's hustle those other bags, before he gets greedy.
Well, easy money for him. Put it out of your mind. Keep going, gang.
Stand by, gang. Organizing an exit. Hold the line!
Keep it cool. Keep it under control, gang.
We need that vault open. Quiet with keycards, or bust it open with a drill.
The cage is ready. When you're ready for the plane, send up that balloon.
Keycard. Great. You need to use it on the vault, but that's only half of it. Swipe it, and then hunt down the second card.
Halfway there. Find the other card, and swipe it.
Job's half done. Find the second keycard and you can walk into the vault.
You need to keep an eye on that cage. The cops can lift the bags right out of there.
Remember to go grab the thermal drill.
There goes your driver. He's left a drill behind. Get it, and keep working!
Don't forget the bags.
You guys got lucky. The vault's already open!
Vault is open. New plan. Just stroll in and get to work. Easy money!
A laser gate! That was unexpected. Touching that will set off their alarm. Watch the cycle, wait for it to blink off, and then run through.
Goddammit, a laser gate. We've dealt with these before. Just wait for it to flicker off, and then dash through.
Thank you for your call. Roberts appreciates the chance to talk to you.
Thats it! Now let's get it to work on that vault.
You're through to Mortimer at Roberts Bank. I'd be happy to assist.
Roberts Bank. Everything's under control. How can I help you?
I'll get right onto that.
We're almost there. Time to patch through to my pilot.

He's going to drop off the pieces for a skyhook. You gotta bolt together an aluminum cage, load it and then send up a cable on a balloon. Plane flies right over, grabs the cable and - whoosh! - off it goes.
Damn. Alright. Expect company, gang.
The bags go into the cage. The plane gets the cage. We get rich. Easy.
The plane will collect the cage from the parking lot, so get these bags there and get building.
That's perfect. The cage is assembled.
Hustle it, gang - our pilot can't stick around forever. Get the bags to the cage.
Let's load that cage up, gang. The pilot has a tight schedule.
Great. Keep going.
OK, gang, good. Now hold on.
Dead on target! Our flyboy earned his cut today.
The glamorous life of a heister, huh? Find the exit.
You found the exit, but it's not ready yet. You need to go back and secure the cash.
Sorry, gang. You need to get more cash before leaving. Hold your breath and head back.
The pilot is on his way with the bags. Hold the line!
Plane is en route. Just hold on, gang.
Crap, that's the alarm. Alright, gang - time to go loud.
Well, so much for stealth. But the job's half done. Just get that money out of there.
Broadsword calling Danny Boy. Our boys are ready. Drop the skyhook cage. Over.
This is Mortimer. At the bank. Your money is safe. Now, how can I help you?
Uh, Barney's not available right now. Can I take a message?
No. Uh, just give me a second...
It's got to be among these papers. Let's see. This is a B7040, that's not it. A FU5000. No, let me keep looking...
Remember to keep an eye on any bags in the cage. Cops can still snatch them.
Shooters on the roof. Watch out!
They're trying to flank you at the parking lot.
Thought it would take longer for them to react, but we got cops on the scene.
The Gensec truck's a bonus. A keycard in it would be a sweeter bonus.
SWAT have sent a heavy truck. They're taking this seriously. Knuckle down.
SWAT's on the roofs, guys. Don't let them get dug in.
They say crap rolls downhill but here it's flows everywhere. This is a goddamn maze.
Those old sewers are a maze. Keep looking for the light, guys. Ignore the stench.
An access ladder, with the hatch unlocked. These sloppy assholes deserve to be robbed.
Deposit boxes! Start breaking them, gang. One bag is minimum, but take as much as you can.
Open the boxes. Our client demands one bag, but your professional honor demands you take as much as you can.
Thats three. You're going strong. Keep going.
Six bags. I'm getting buttery thinking of all that extra loot.
Nine bags! You guys are legendary.
They've got every road out of there blocked. Time to go Vietcong on them. You'll see what I mean.
See that drive thru window at the side of the bank? There's a manhole there to the sewers. Get down there.

Here it is, guys. Another bank job. The bread and butter of the heisting lifestyle. This time we're hitting a branch of Roberts Bank. My sources say they're getting, or just got, a tasty shipment. Let's pay them a visit.
Nice approach. Gensec will have a lot of explaining to do. Let's divide this and lay low.
Cash is king. We don't even need a cleaner crew after this one. Smooth!
There's the bank. Pull over. Keep it cool.
The cops just shut of the drill!
The drill is out - damn cops!
The vault has two security routers protecting it and you need to shut them both down. Easily done if you patch me into them directly. Look for them mounted on the walls.
Look on the walls for the router boxes.
OK, good. Now take care of the other router.
It's going to take me a while to shut this down.
That's one security box taken care of.
Use ziplines to get the bags out via the garden.
A zipline will get you done a lot faster!
Guys, I have to pull the chopper out until things cool down.
Stand by guys, the chopper has to do a little detour until things calm down.
One more bag, then you get leave.
.. or stay and bag a little more. Up to you!
.. or take a little more.
Helicopter is waiting.
What're you waiting for?
Chop-chop. To the chopper.
Job is over guys. Time to go.
The party seems to have stopped. People are leaving!
No more party people, they're all heading out.
Ralph just showed himself. Keep you eyes open!
You still need to find the three laptops to get the code fragments.
Get to the roof and signal the chopper if you're ready to leave!
Found those laptops yet?
Remember, find those laptops.
I think there's a PC in the fitness center.
Something in the cafeteria and it isn't Jeff Vader. It looks like a glowing LCD display.
Might want to check out the cafeteria. I can see a PC monitor there.
Right by the Jade Room, looks like a computer.
The Glitter Room might be worth checking for a laptop.
You'll probably find a computer in Administration.
Might want to check the contruction site for a computer.
Management Office, they always have portable computers.
I think there's a computer in Sales. Go take a look.
I'm thinkin' that both number and color are important.
Good going. Only one more color-number set to go.
That's the last piece of the code.
Ok, now you need a keycard. Find Ralph Garnet and take it from him. He should be around there somewhere.
Ralph Garnet has the last piece of the puzzle. Find him and take his keycard. He's around there somewhere.
It ain't gonna open itself. Use the keycard and code.
That vault is just waiting to be emptied guys. Use the keycard, then enter the code.
Don't smash the glass or the alarm will go off. Use a glass-cutter.
Watch the glass. Cut through it instead of smashing or the alarm will go.
You need to get the bags to the platform where you came in.
Get the bags to the window-washing platform.
There's a juicy bonus waiting for us if you crack that second vault.
The stones in cases are top priority, but grab whatever else you can.
Every little bit helps, but the rocks in cases are most important.
No time to relax yet.
Almost there.
OK, that's our minimum. Grab more if you want, or get out of there.
That's it. Stay and grab more of get out. Your call.
Great, that's everything, now get out of there!
OK, that's it. Time to go.
No more time to party, just get out.
It's time to leave guys.
No time for snacks. Get out, ASAP.
We need a change of plan, the code has been shut down!
Damn, looks like the only thing that will work now is the master code. Let me see if I can find out who has it.
They just disabled your code. There might be another- a master code, but I'll have to find out who has it.
Damn, they know you're there now for sure.
I've come up with a plan B, just find those routers!
You need to find those routers!
Great! I'm in.
Ok, let me see...
Cops are trying to stop us. Defend those routers while I work!
Drop any cop that gets close!
OK,I'm done here!
We're stuck without that keycard. Find Ralph garnet!
Right, time to get the master code. The CFO will have it.
Kick the shit out of the exacutive ladder. Find the CFO and get his master code!
You still need to find the master code!
He's lying through his teeth. Get him to the chopper, I'll get the code out of him.
C'mon guys, get that guy to the roof.
I'll crack this guy like an egg and have that code for you shortly.
You need to swipe Ralph's card before the code.
Listen up, the code is...
One
Three
Three
Five
Seven
Seven
Eight
You get that? The code is...
Here it is again.
Loot for the taking...
Probably worth a fortune.
Every little bit helps, but the rocks in cases are most important.
Textbook execution people.
All right, you're almost on the 22nd. Get going and don't get a nose-bleed up there.
What? We didn't lay a damn thing. How is that possible?
The truck is in the slaughterhouse. There's C4 stashed in those bins. Grab it and bust in.
All right, the truck is through there. Grab the C4 from the bin and blow that door.
Good work. Now, C4 the doors!
Plant C4 on the truck doors, gang.
Drill on the safe, just like we planned. Hurry!
Get the gold out to container 61, crew.
Ok I have an idea for that heli. Pour some gas on those tires and light it up. Should create a smokescreen.
Gang, find gas and ignite the tires. Give that chopper a nice thick smokescreen to worry about!
The smoke looks thick enough from here. All right, choppers are bugging out.
Use the control panel in the yard to move that firetrap.
Use the crane to lift the gold container onto the truck.
Gotta get the container with the gold loaded on the truck. The crane can do it.
Outstanding. We're almost done - now get to the escape. Just stay with the blue containers!
Get to the escape point, clowns! Follow the blue containers!
Close the door in their faces. Blast the gas!
Gang, ignite the trap!
We bloodied their nose AND got their gold. Great job!
That's a LOT of beautiful gold. Outstanding work, gang!
Great you got the gas. Might need more though.
Grab as much gas as you can.
You're reading my mind. We're going to need that gas later.
We got regular cops and SWATS on the scene.
Police chopper is over you. We can't let them see which container we use.
Hey! Gang, we can't lift the container while you're inside.
The van's stuck up there! Plant the C4 on the bottom, blow it open.
All right, good find. Now get that gas all over the tires.
Okay, that gas will help secure our escape. Put the can into the container.
Got word on a truck filled with gold. Only problem is, it's guarded by our old friends - Murkywater. But hey, nothing you guys can't handle right?
Smash and grab on a Murkywater convoy laden with gold.
...and also on the 45 going south, there's been a major accident that's clogging the entire freeway. It's like a war zone out there this morning so you better take a scenic route.
Okay, gang. The train yard is right in front of you. There should be several ways you can infiltrate the place, so make your choices wisely.
This is your chance to plan your course of action.
That's it, the hidden train yard. Use this opportunity to scout the area. The place is heavily guarded by Murkies and cameras, so we can't afford to make any mistakes.
They should have some kind of panels on the side.
The Murkywater trains will have a security panel on the side, so we'll have to hack them open.
Open your eyes and find the EMP. Come on.
Damn, where did this door come from? Sorry, gang. I had no information this would be here...
You need to actually use the keycard, you know?
Gang, we still need a way to get through that steel gate . You need to find something that we can use.
You still need to find something we can use to get through those bars.
Guys, find something we can use on those bars. Something that doesn't give off too much noise.
If we could get our hands on a hard drive, we might be able to hack the system to the vault.
With this hard drive I should be able to override their security and get the vault open.
Get back to the train and use the hard drive. I should be able to override the security.
Sure, why not? We might find use for it later.
Great, now we can open the crates laying around much faster. I bet you they contain some good stuff.
If you're planning on sticking around for extra loot, that crowbar will do the trick.
With the EMP secured, there is some time to kill before the escape vehicle arrives.
Listen up, gang. Twitch is coming in with the van. He will come from the upper bridge side.
This ventilation system could be used to our advantage, you know, to hide a body or transfer some of the extra through.
Nice, you took that sucker out. But hide the mess. The guards will react if they find out you destroyed one of their drones.
Guys, the maintenance tunnels could have what we're looking for.
There's several rooms in the maintenance tunnels. Have you checked all of them?
Check between the trains too, guys. Don't get sloppy.
There's space between the trains too. It's worth a look.
The area isn't too big. You should be able to move around and search all corners of the whole train yard.
There's four of you, guys. Spread out if needed and check all corners of the train yard.
Damn, looks like the EMP isn't in this train car. There could still be some valuable loot here, so either grab it now or come back for it later. Your choice.
Damn it! That's the alarm!
An old fashioned break in. Stay out of sight.

Great. Now search the docks. You're looking for something that tells you which truck has the voting machines and is headed for Washington. Search containers, computers - anything. When you've figured it out, tag the right truck.
They've seen you! The trucks are moving out. Alright, we need a Plan B. Lemme think.
The trucks are on the move. Someone saw you! OK, time for another plan.
OK, let's try this. Find something connected to the dock's network. I should be able to pull up their shipping manifests. Might have some clue about where they're headed.
Alright, I have an idea. I want you to hack into anything you can find connected down there. If I can get access to their databases, I might be able to find where our truck is headed.
OK, the first database is downloaded. Looks great but it's not complete. You can haul ass now, or stay and download the whole database. Your call.
I got the first half of the database. It may be enough, maybe not, so it's your call - get out of there now, or stay and get the second half.
That terminal is showing which truck is going where. Keep checking. It might help pinpoint our truck.
Pier 39. Find the truck that has the voting machines. It will be bound for Washington. Figure out which one it is, slap on the tracker and get the hell out. Keep it quiet.
Your next target is the voting machines. I'll bet they're stored in sealed crates. You clowns will need to improvise to open them.
That certainly looks like one of the voting machines. When you're ready to kill democracy, start the hack. Make sure no-one sees you.
The machine's done. That should make The Elephant happy. Now close up the crate and keep going.
We got that one hacked. Keep looking at it.
Here's the new plan. I'm altering the hack to make it look like this whole enterprise is for Mayor Schwartz instead. It's a dirty trick, but this is politics.
You need to hack more machines. Every hack piles more scandal on Schwartz.
Find the security room and grab that footage. Haul ass, guys.
Time to slip out of there! No reason to go loud now.
Get back to the van, clowns. Time to haul ass out of this clusterfuck.
Keep the feds off that footage, guys. We're nearly done here.
There's your bonus. Get it to the van. You guys deserve it.
It might be a good idea to look around before you go loud. Find your best approach.
I got those scramblers from Vlad. (mimicking Vlad) Very best Russian tech. That lying fuck.
Alright, the data scrambling is done. It'll just look like a regular hard drive failure.
Data's scrambled. Well done. Even if they figure it was deliberate, the results are unusable. Great job.
Now, blast that wall open! The explosion will trash the voting machines.
It's time to breach the bank! The explosion will take care of the voting machines.
There goes the wall. Now go on in.
The vault is open. This charade is almost done. Bag some money!
The vault's open. Time to see what's inside.
Open fucking sesame. Let's see what we have there.
Watch out. Snipers are setting up in the area!
Yeah, I'm reading sniper teams on the rooftops. Watch yourself.
Playing it cool. They haven't made you yet.
Close. So close.
You just keep it up. This is text book stuff.

I couldn't locate the right truck through the shipping data you uploaded, so we won't be able to intercept those voting machines. However, we can still keep the Elephant sweet. There's a bank next to the polling place. We're going to hit it. Except we're not, not really, 'cos you're real goal is hitting the server with the polling results next door. Hit the bank, open the vault, all that stuff, but remember that the real objective is fucking up that polling place.
Alright guys, the trucks might leave any second. Find out which one contains the voting machines and put the GPS tracker on it. There must be something around here that can give you a clue.
Great that's it. Let's get out of here and find out if that's the right truck.
Do NOT let them see the hacking device when we get it up and running!
Find the truck from the harbor and get inside. Reprogram the machines without anyone seeing you. Hit the Gensec van to smokescreen what happened. Cops in this town aren't the sharpest, after all.
There should be a server with the voting results nearby. Locate the server and make the data unusable.
The voting results are stored on a nearby server. Find the server and scramble the data.
Now, get that wall open! The explosion will trash the voting machines.
The vault is open, it's time to bag the money!
Oh no! The vault is damn near empty! Just get out of there!
Those cameras won't be a problem anymore!
There's an override in the security office - that closes the bank's shutters. They can help you keep the cops out of the bank.
Well I don't know who's going to win the election but I'll tell you this: you guys get my vote. Nice save. And hitting the vault for cash definitely has a lot of upside. Thanks for covering me.
By the time they get new ones out there it'll be too late - and there will be no voting in this district.
The chopper is one minute away.
The van leaves in one minute. Wrap it up!
Step it up! The escape vehicle is leaving in four minutes.
Your ride will be there in about five minutes.
Hurry up, guys! The escape vehicle is leaving in five minutes.
The escape will be there in seven minutes.
The escape vehicle is leaving in seven minutes.
The escape will be there in eight minutes.
Escape vehicle is leaving in ten minutes.
You have 30 seconds to get your ass on that chopper.
Alright the van is there. Move!
That was one hell of a crash. The cops aren't gonna give you a break though, so get on your feet!
The van should arrive on a street near the park.
Watch out, they are deploying SWATs inside a nearby building.
I'll get you out of there. Just keep the loot safe!
Remember guys, we need three bags to escape.
Remember guys, we need five bags to escape.
Remember guys, we need nine bags to escape.
The chopper's here! Watch out for snipers when you're moving the loot!
Those snipers couldn't stop you, so the cops are prapairing to move in with force. Get ready!
One of you should keep an eye out for those snipers at all times!
More snipers are coming in!
A sniper team is moving in!
A police chopper is coming in to drop of sniper on a nearby building.
Keep your heads down! They've got snipers in the area!
Heads up, SWATs are moving in to try to finish this.
OK, OK, we gotta change this up!
Great! Now hook me up!
Ah, OK! I'm getting some juicy stuff here!
Ah, we should have sneaked this. Tons of gold in this deal.
Alright, I found video of him doing the deal... It is insane. He sure is a show-off.
I'll pack this into files and get ready to stream it up to the press.
Ah, that is the vault guys. That door, we can't get through it this time. But the gold... The gold on the other side! Well, we got to leave it.
A little bird told me the Mendozas are flying in more weapons in preparation for the war with Hector. We go to their airport, find the weapons and take them all or destroy them.
That was close. Good work disposing of those guns. Hector will move in his army now and we will have a very fine payday indeed.
Alright, that's the door to the server room.
Use that terminal - I want access to their systems.
Ah, I see you already took care of the security boxes. Planning ahead, I like this.
Open up that last door and get to the server.
Awesome job gang! Last step - you need to dismantle the server and bring it to the car.
They didn't even see us coming. Great work! See you at the safe house.
And yes I know. Out of the frying pan, into the fire...
Terrific. Because of you we know where all the Mendoza cash is stashed. It's one of the Trustee branch banks. I guess you know what comes next, huh?
It's pretty hot out there. In fact I would bet you are more wanted than Mendoza now. Hector will probably think we're behind it, not being stupid.
The FBI temp office is across the street. Sneak inside, get me access to their server room and see what other Mendoza info is lying around.
OK guys, get into the bank and find the vault and drill it open. Make sure no one triggers the alarm or escapes.
Get to the generator on the roof and shut it down.
Excellent! Keep that drill going.
OK, while we wait for the money to burn you can open up some of those deposit boxes, what ever we find in there is ours.
The surveillance guard triggered the alarm.
Hector got the footage. I'm told he laughed long and hard. And now the FBI looks impossibly incompetent, which takes a lot of heat off of us. Great work.
Mendoza's not going to like that outcome. But we should. Well done. Go get paid.
Wow, this boat is expensive. This Powell guy's got money.
Heh, I wonder if this boat is worth more than what's hidden on it.
This friend of McKendrick's sure has the bling, by the looks of it.
Now search the boat, but be careful.
You find that laptop yet?
Guys, the laptop. Did you find it yet?
The laptop must be there somewhere. Find it!
Ok, that's the laptop. Good job!
This is gold. It's got all the locations of the hidden cash.
That's the second stash. Two to go!
Two down, two to go!
Throw the bags into the sea. You can pick them up when you leave.
Throw the bags over the side. You can fish them out of the water when you get out of there.
You'll have to overheat the system to cause a soft reboot and gain access to the controls. Then we should be able to get that server.
Turn off the valves at the bottom of the server rack.
Good work, now watch 'em overheat. You'll get that system reboot.
Watch the heat rise. You'll get that reboot.
There we go. Money in a box!
You can escape now, or maybe look for more valuables. Your choice.
The server room is in security lockdown. We can't access it now!
Look at that. A lot of rich people up there, enjoying themselves.
That's probably the server room. Remember where it is.
I wonder if McKendrick will ever figure out who did this. In any case, he shouldn't have messed with us.
Okay, pirates - board the ship and get the loot. And keep it quiet.
Get into the store, watch the civilians, watch the cameras and get it done.
Break the cases to get to the goods!
The van had to leave. He'll be back, keep your eyes out for the new location.
Alright, that's the van. Get the bags to it!
That's our van coming back. Get ready, he is coming in!
That's how much we need. You guys can stay and get more if you feel like you are on a roll!
Keep an eye out on the alley ways, keep those civilians down and work fast. Let's get some jewels!
The new jewelry store down town is loaded with jewels. Those could be ours. You want to pay them a visit?
Another jewelry store that needs a visit. You guys up for it?
We're here, guys. Up ahead is Chavez' place.
Let's go.
You need to act like you're there to go through with the drug deal.
These guys aren't kidding around. Don't act dumb and go in the room.
Stop walking around and go inside the room.
Go to the panic room.
Whoah, that's a big toothbrush... I want it.
We're not getting through that door without a key... It's time we find this Chavez. He's in charge and should have the key.
You got that crazy bastard. Now, get the key from him and return to the panic room.
Well, that takes care of Chavez. Pick up the key and get back to the panic room.
Good. Now open the red door.
Use the key to open the red door.
We still need the key from Chavez to get through that door. Find him.
Set up the saws around the panic room, two on the second floor and two on the fourth floor.
Make sure those saws keep running. If one of them jams, get it fixed immediately. We can't stick around forever.
Be on the lookout if one the saws jam or something. We need to get this done quick.
Finally, the saws are done.
That's it, guys, we're doing it. Give me a sec. "Hey, Bile, it's time for the C4. How fast can you be here?"
That's it for the snipers, gang. Nothing will stop Bile from dropping the C4 now.
God damn it, Ale... Bile! How could you miss the roof? Gang, we still need that C4 so you'll just need to pick it up. Remember, we want the explosives placed around the floors above the panic room.
That's it, gang. Only the fourth floor left.
That's it, just the fifth floor left.
We need more C4 on the fourth floor and the roof.
Plant the last C4 on the roof and we should be good to go.
Good. Now, plant the rest on the fourth and the fifth floor.
That's it. Now we just need some more on the fourth and fifth floor.
Fourth floor is done. Good.
Excellent! Now get back, because things are about to blow.
Good job, now get the hell away from there before it goes off.
Come on, gang, I can't detonate the explosives as long as you are close.
Whoo! That was crazy.
Okay, guys, time to hold the fort until Bile returns. Give 'em hell!
Time to defend, gang! Bile's on his way!
Bile, you're up! How long before you're here?
The building is opening up like a swiss cheese! I suggest you go up a few floors to get a better tactical position.
The magnet is in place. Time to pull it out of here.
Look at that room go! We god damn did it!
Would you look at that!? We did it, gang. We did it.
Excellent work, gang! Absolutely amazing. But now you need to get out of there before the place collapses.
A job well done! Now, get the hell out of there fast. That building won't keep standing for long.
Get down to the basement guys!
Run! Just run!
Hurry! Hurry! To the left!
Go! Go! Go! Just run!

Deep inside the projects there's a fortified building. And inside that building there's a panic room bolted to the floor. The panic room is filled with cash. Getting into the building is easy, but how are you going to get inside the panic room? If you can't get in, how are you going to leave with the money? Simple, steal the whole room. Let's do this.

Sometimes you need to take things to the extreme to earn a good payday, and that's exactly what we're doing this time. Enter the building, find the panic room, and then steal the whole god damn room by using a helicopter.
I'm fired up about this one, gang. Chavez will have no idea what hit him.
Hit the stores in here. Vlad gave us a cash target - beyond that, it's yours.
OK, we need the minimum cash amount. Once we have that, I'll send a car for you. Now if you want to stick around and get more, be my guest.
They have cameras, take 'em out.
OK that's the minimum amount we agreed on. I'll get the driver.
That's what we need. I'm making a call to the driver.
OK, a little light.
The van's here. If you're done, get to it. If not, he'll wait until you're done.
Nice guys. Sneaky and still sent a message. They lost the dough and Vlad will be sure to point out to them you are on his team.
Not a cop in sight. That was total control. I'll call Vlad now and tell him the good news.
Let's go to Vlad for the money. Good job getting your gang through that little mash up.
Go for cash registers, display cases, the occasional safe. Get enough money to satisfy Vlad and clear out. Don't hang around. It's an easy gig.
OK, here's the setup: we're looking for the paintings with red stickers on them. Security is going to be on the heavy side, cameras and guards.
Ready for the shot? OK listen: you are looking for the paintings marked with red stickers. They've got unusually tight security here. A lot of cameras, even a security room, so do your homework.
Dammit! If you want everything open again, you're going to need to get into the surveillance room.
We're locked down... if you want me to open it up you need to get the surveilance room open fast.
We don't have the time to wait around - can't you find a way in? What about the roof?
Have you checked any of the vertical options? There's got to be access to the interior up there.
Check the roof - find your route inside. Get creative, we don't have time.
Good, now we need at least 3 more just like this and you need to get them to the van. It's in the parking lot next to the gallery.
We have four now and four's what we need - now if you want to get more, your move.
There we go, off like a prom dress, I'm still working on the paintings.
Good, with that guy out of the picture, no more cameras.
Great, so much for the camera alarm.
SWAT units are moving into the building, get ready!
SWATs just breached the wall!
You need to take the marked paintings to the senator's apartment. They'll have cameras installed in them. Eyes on the inside will make your job easier, trust me.
Welcome back, crew. Now we install the cameras in the pictures, trade them to the senator's guys and get a look on whoever this arms dealer is.
Good work, team. With micro cameras installed in the paintings, we just need to trade them to the senator's people. I'll set up the meet right now.
You cleaned the joint out. Now we'll have perfect coverage in the senator's apartment. I'll ensure we get the surveillance equipment in the paintings and set up the trade.
You're almost at the gallery. Slip in, avoid cameras, guards, and motion detectors. Security's high because of a bomb threat.
This is the gallery. You're looking for the paintings marked by a red sold sticker. We need at least four to make this work. The place is closed and locked down. Find a way in. Go.
This is gonna be easy as long as you steer clear of the security systems and guards. Well maybe not so easy. Take the paintings with red sold stickers and clear out. We need four at least.
Someone pick up the phone...
Is someone going to get that? Can't start the trade until you do..
I don't like it... Let's get this over with as soon as we can, get the paintings on the table.
This seems fishy but I don't know - get the paintings on the table and keep your spider sense tingling.
OK, now let's just hope they call you fast.
Alright, they just need to call you back. Faster the better.
There it is, get the phone.
OK, that's them calling.
OK folks, everyone into the train.
Good, good. This'll make our lives easier when we hit the Democrat...
SWAT! I knew it was too easy!
I think those tunnels will get you into the warehouse folks.
Hell of a good move to use the tunnels - they'll be off-balance.
Don't let the workers see you or they might blow the whole deal.
Unless you still want the cops to show up you better be careful around those workers
Hey they might be workers but they're not dumb and blind - keep your profile low.
OK, you're in position at the trainyard. Eyes open. Watch for suits. I can't see any active vehicles nearby but that doesn't mean much. Go to the train car and wait for contact.
Lets make sure we get our gold - it's our payday too.
Now it's our turn to finish the job and take his place down. See you at the safe house.
So the senator's people are very appreciative. The boss is hanging the art. Guy has no clue we're going to clean him out. Oh well. Nice work grabbing the money by the way.
I'll keep this for the payday - that plus the gold from the senator's apartment should load your safe house vault nicely. Great work.
Great, you found the laptop.
That's the tablet PC. Perfect.
That's the second external hard drive.
One more, keep looking.
OK! We're gold. I think I got everything we need. You should be able to access his desktop computer now.
There you go. Now let's frame this guy, get up to the roof, and our guy will throw you the coke.
That's it, fine work. The escape is ready for you. Unless you want to stick around and clean out the vault. Either way the vehicle's waiting.
If you want to go for more, use his desktop PC, it should open the vault up for you.
Alright, vault is popped, but watch out for those lasers, they connect directly to the alarm
We have to shut them off.
Use the camera to see when they turn on, and then turn them off again.
That's the damn alarm! Time to shift to plan B, folks.
Now hopefully they won't notice anything. Because we're just that lucky.
They cut the power! Get it back up!
Get to the chopper to escape!
They're gonna try to kill the power! Don't let them!
Whatever you do don't let the sons of bitches cut the power!
When all that media shows up in their choppers, no one's gonna look sideways at our escape bird.
This upload isn't going fast enough, dammit!
Hustle that gold onto the roof, get it into the bag on the zipline, we're taking it.
Whenever you're ready, I want you on the roof, then we'll get you outta there with the zipline.
This is the senator's apartment. Nice neighborhood, high security though. He's already got the paintings hung, so our cameras are online and transmitting.
We can only get access to the vault with a password though, so find me some of his gadgets and I'll do the rest. Good luck.
Search well and eyes peeled for guards.
Drugs planted, senator framed. Bad guys 1, Politicians 0. Well done, very smooth operation in there. The Elephant will love this outcome.
Well, we didn't get the gold, but we'll still be compensated for the successful frame job we pulled. Well done, people.
You can always rely on the press to swarm on scandal in DC. The weapons deal is the talk of the town. The Elephant and his party are very pleased. Hell of a plan B, folks.
Damn, look at this place. This guy rides in style. You can do this quietly or with a bang, it's your choice.
Let's find the head of security. He should have what you need to get in - USB stick with security codes. He'll be wearing a green jacket.
Find Sosa's head of security - he'll have a USB stick with security codes. He's a man of habit - always wears a green jacket.
We need the USB stick from the head of security.
Find the head of security and get his USB stick.
There should be a laptop somewhere near the house. Plug the USB stick into it.
Can't find the laptop? Check around the house - the garage maybe?
Okay, I'm trying to hack the security system now...
Wait while I try to hack the security system...
What... guys, protect the computer!
Hang on... oh... they've got additional security blocks here. You gotta find a security switchboard and rewire it.
I should've know... there's another switchbox. You've got to rewire that one too.
Ok, got the switchboards fixed. You can start the computer again.
We're good and going, I'm hacking the system through the computer
That was harder than expected but we're go! You can enter the house now.
Ok, it's done! That was hard but I managed to open some of the shutters on the house.
Open sesame! I got some of the house's shutters to open.
Come on guys! Get inside now!
If we're gonna get into the boss' office, we need to open the rest of the house. Look for a switch or something.
There must be a switch or something that opens up the rest of the house. Try to find it.
Ok guys, that did it! The house is open!
Great! We're in!
I'm thinking here. I don't know how we're gonna get in...
Ok, let's see... hmm... we need a plan for this...
We gotta get in. A drill won't do it.
Hmm, explosives won't work, it's too dangerous... let me see...
Umm... ok, destroy stuff. Got it.
Ok, destroy things. What should we go for...
I can see that Ernesto Sosa likes to collect paintings. We'll burn them all, that should make him angry. Gather them in a pile.
Kepe piling 'em up. Make a nice bonfire.
Add some more paintings. A few more.
Remember, you need a gas can to set the paintings on fire. Shoot the gas can.
It's all going up in smoke. This should get his attention.
Now just wait for his reaction.
Hey Bile, you there? We got some cars that need picking up and dropping off!
Bile? I got an airlift job for you. A grab and drop, you could say.
Not just guards, but turrets too! This guy takes security seriously!
Ok, let's get some loot while we're here. Ernesto has a floor safe in his office. There are some winches near the driveway where you entered - grab them and hook them up.
Attach those winches now!
What? The winch has stopped, get it going again!
That winch has stopped working. See if you can fix it!
Don't forget to get that winch running again!
It's done. Look at all that loot! Now grab as much as you can before you escape!
Great guys! Look at that! Grab all that you can before you escape.
Sweet money, guys! Now make this worth it by grabbing as much loot as you can!
Great, guys! Now you can grab some more loot or take the escape, the choice is yours.
That's all of it, every single dime! Now it's time to go home!
You took everything they have! Time to ride off into the sunset, guys!
Guys, we got all the money. You should get out of there!
That's the head of security. He seems to be at the dock.
That's the head of security. Down by the water, at the dock.
There he is. Looks like he's at the back.
That's the head of security. He's by the pools.
That's the head of security. The pools, he's by the pools.
Hey, there he is. Looks like he's around the stairs.
That's the head of security. He's by the stairs.
That's the head of security. Hmm... he's by the driveway I think.
Find that mic recorder, guys.
Remember, you gotta find that mic recorder.
Find the mic recorder. It's gotta be there.
Maria wants to hitch-hike but has no thumbs.
Montezuma wants three oranges for breakfast.
The black cat ate its own balls.
Hey boss, I got a sealed letter for you here. Says for your eyes only.
Hey boss, got a package for you here. It's from the HQ in Bolivia.
Hey boss. There's some woman here, says she has some important information for you.
Boss, there's something strange with this coke. You gotta see it.
Come on guys, move those bags!
Guys, be careful. The guards inside will probably carry pagers.
The guards inside will probably have pagers. You should be careful.
Guys listen carefully. Once you start making the call, you can't hang up. He will most likely sound the alarm, he is a paranoid one after all.
I guarantee you, that if you hang up while making the call he will sound the alarm. So make sure the coast is clear before starting it.
Ok team, lets get a move on. The Butcher means business here... remember, you've got to kill Ernesto Sosa, and steal the loot.
You could say Ernesto Sosa is lucky to have this beautiful house in Miami Beach. But his luck is about to change...
Cut that fence and get down to the hangars. The Mendozas are in there.
The Mendozas are down there. Cut that fence and get those guns.
Judging by the amount of bodies, this is the gear we are after.
Keep and eye on that control tower guys, I thought I saw some movement up there.
Better get moving boys, the longer it takes the more cops are going to show up!
That's what we need for Hector, if you want to get the rest, that is up to you!
This place is dry, get back to the van.
Well done guys.
Nice work boys.
This is an FBI branch office so you really, really, really want to be quiet. We're in the lion's den. First step, get inside.
Can't believe we are breaking into the FBI. You guys get inside - quietly. Please.
Obvious, but the front door is probably not the best move. There's bound to be better entrances.
That entrance looks tough. Can you get around it?
Good, you are inside. Now, locate the server room.
OK, shit just got real. Run for the server guys. Rip it out of there.
Server room now! Hurry before we get all of the FBI on our asses!
That's the door, looks like the alarm is already off, get it open.
Crack that server door!
Marked a computer. Log me in and I'll deal with this.
Alright, I'm in, hold on...
I'm in... Good work. Gimme a sec here.
Alarm boxes identified. Go and disrupt them for me.
Nicely done, now cut the other one.
Bingo. The alarm is disabled. Get that door open.
Check. Alarm on that door is off. Get inside now.
Looks like the alarm is already off. Get the door open.
Alarm is off. Smooth. Open the door!
You're inside? Good job, now there is only one more door between us and the server.
Hurry ! Hurry! Get the next door!
FBI is swarming guys - get that door open!
OK, another door! FBI is on us - hurry!
OK..OK.. Just need to get the server out of its housing and walk it to the van.
Just get the server clear of its housing and take it to the van.
OK, they locked the server. Get that barrier open.
FBIs most wanted. You're going to make it. Take the god damn server now!
Don't fuck up now, you are almost there!
You guys are so close. Don't get sloppy now.
Alright, you got it, lets get out of here!
OK, OK! Plan B - find the server room. Shit!
Ah! I said take it easy! Feds woke up! Find the server room and get out!
Alarm guys. Hit the server room door right away.
Shit, Feds will be here shortly. Hit the server room door now.
Ah, damn it. Close but now we got to rush it.
FBI spotted us, guys. Hit that door hard!
Close, close, close. OK, go full force guys!
Fuckin feds and their doors. OK, let's hit that like it is hot. Go!
Am I glad to see this stuff again. Good recovery boys.
Is it all there? Nice - get what's yours.
Oh check this out. I recognize some of this. Our old loot.
Loot, loot loot. Nice find. I think this belongs to us.
Ha! Taking it back. This is our old loot, isn't it?
Shutters are down. Only way out is the entrance.
Damn it! They locked you in. Main entrance is the only option now!
OK, power's down. No more shocks. I hope.
OK, Hector wants us to record this, so first: set up the camera.
Go ahead and burn it. I know, it's sad...
OK, while we wait for the money to burn you can open up some of those deposit boxes. Whatever we find in there is ours.
OK, enough money making, take the recording and make a run for it, unless you wanna hang around for more loot.
OK, thats enough. Get the recording and lets get out of here.
The van is right around the corner.
The van is right across the street.
Go inside.
We gotta find the bank manager.
Find the bank manager, then tie him down and you'll get the keycard.
He's balding, wears a black suit. Most likely busy on his phone. Looks like he's ready to hand out pink slips.
The bank manager wears a black suit. Balding. He looks like the kind of creep who spends all day on his phone.
Look out for the manager. 40's, black suit, balding. Probably around the back offices.
You're looking for the manager. Mid 40's, balding, black suit. Soulless, heartless, greedy...you know the type.
Find the manager. Look for the creepy guy in a suit. 40's. Going bald. That'll be him.
Keep an eye open for the manager. Black suited creep, losing a bit up top, mid 40's. Get his keycard.
Great. Now use the card to get inside the server room. Second floor.
We need to deal with the metal detectors. Best way: simply kill the power. There are electricity boxes around.
The metal detectors need to be shut down. You can do that by disabling the power. Look for circuit boxes.
Crew, you need to deal with the metal detectors. They use a lot of electricity so find and shut down the circuit boxes.
There are circuit boxes around the place. Disabling them will shut down the metal detectors.
That's the metal detectors dealt with. Great.
I got an Inside Man there. They'll help us get through to the gates leading to the vault. Patching them through now.
You heard her. I've done a little homework and marked some terminals that should have the 4-digit code in 'em somewhere.
Check the marked terminals, gang. We're looking for a code.
The terminals. You see 'em? You need to check them for the code.
We need the gate code, crew. Get searching those terminals.
Now, what will we find?
Acessing now...
Fingers crossed this is the one
Give me a second to check...
Christ, a lot of office gossip, but no codes. Next.
CD interest rate, 50%! But no code. Keep looking.
Aaand here we go: The code is... 1138.
And the code is....1138!
Next, we need to gain access to the main vault. It's controlled by two keycard terminals, and each needs activating within seconds of the other. So find two keycards.
You're looking for two keycards. Look around the desks, offices.
How are you doing tracking down those two keycards?
Search the offices, desks - those keycards are around there somewhere.
Good. Now find the second keycard.
And now the vault keypanel! Hustle!
Now swipe the vault keypanel! Come on!
Too slow, try again.
Just missed it. Try again.
So when you have your fill, I need you to drop the bags into this vent here. We'll pick 'em up later.
See that vent by the elevator? That's where you gotta stash the bags.
Once you're ready to bounce, find our Insider. She's going to help you slip out of there.
Find our Insider. She'll show you out.
Meet up with the Insider. She'll get you out of there.
Stay low and quiet. Offices are never empty.
All right, there's the truck and there's our bags. Stash the loot into the truck, quick!
And that is how you do it! Text book execution, gang! Congratulations!
There's the alarm, gentlemen. Start the countdown.
Time for plan B. Start the countdown.
The manager's probably crapping his black threads somewhere. Find him. Get his keycard.
Now pick up the drill and the thermite, it's hidden inside the copy machine!
Got a drill and some thermite hidden in the copy machine in the server room. Go get it.
There's two cans of thermite there. One of you other guys grab it.
There's one more can of thermite in the copy machine. Maybe come back for it?
There's two cans of thermite there. Maybe you can come back later?
Now, let's mount the drill on the gates.
Crew, get drilling the gate. Hustle it!
The insider sure delivered. Now keep an eye on the drill - it'll surely jam every once in a while.
Now let the drill do it's thing. Keep the cops off it.
The alarm has activated a second feature on the gate - a magnetic seal. Drill can't touch that, so you need to access a terminal to release it.
OK guys - while the drill does the lock, we're going to deal with the gates' magnetic seal. Let me find a good terminal.
Okay, the alarm has kicked in a secondary lock on the gate - a magnetic seal. You need a terminal to release that. Let me find one.
Okay, see that terminal I marked. Get over there, hack in and let's kill that magnetic seal.
I've found a terminal. Get to it, hack in and we lower that magnetic seal.
That's it for the seal. Now keep an eye on the drill.
Okay, the seal is down. Protect the drill!
The drill is done - the gates are opening! Go through and head down the vault corridor. Find the counting room right above the vault and pour out the thermite.
Find the counting room right above the vault and pour out the thermite.
Enter the room right above the vault and pour out the thermite.
Okay. Now hold them off til the thermite finishes.
Did any of you grab that second can? Extra thermite means extra heat which means less time.
Who has the second thermite can? More thermite means a hotter burn. Basic chemistry.
Come on, jump down into the vault!
Put the moneybag on the floor and grab some cash!
There's the beautiful cash. Get bagging it, crew!
The cops are in control of the vault doors. They will open any second - be ready!
Damn cops are at the door. Get ready for them!
Right, here's our way out. Get back upstairs, and C4 the wall into the adjoining building.
You're not going to just stroll out the front. Get upstairs, and blast through into the office next door. That's the way out.
Get upstairs, crew! That's where you'll be blasting through!
Blow a hole in the wall and get ready to run!
Put the C4 on the wall and stay back!
Go through the hole! Head to the neighboring building!
Through the hole, gang! You're getting out of there!
There's a garbage truck waiting in the basement garage. Get down there and stash the loot there, quick!
The garbage truck is waiting in the garage for the money bags. Get down there, get it secured!
This office has a basement garage. A garbage truck is waiting for the bags. Get down there, and get them secured!
Just dash through and head downstairs to the garage!
We're almost done. Get down to the garage, secure that loot!
Outstanding, gang! I wish all trips to the bank ended so happily.
That was a great show, gang! Watching those accounts rise, and their shares topple.
The cops will go all out to stop us here. Show 'em what we do.
That's the front and the upstairs dark as far as cameras are concerned. Cameras in the vault area run on a seperate circuit though.
That's the last camera in the vault area. Good job.
You poked out their eyes in the vault area. No more cameras back there.
That's all the cameras dealt with. The whole bank is blind to us now. Great!
And... The bank is dark to us. Good work, crew.

The vault is buried deep in the back of the bank. Getting through to it will be tough, but we have some help. An Inside Man is prepped and waiting for you. They're going to help us out once you're in there. You can do this loud, or you can take it softly. Up to you.

We've been eyeing the First World Bank for a while. Now it's time to pull the trigger. Get down there and relieve them of their ill-gotten gains.$NL;$NL;Â» Locate the manager$NL;Â» Get access to the server room$NL;Â» Force your way to the vault$NL;Â» Bag all the money and escape
First World Bank was one of those bloodsuckers that got a fat, tax-payer funded bailout deal. Making healthy profits since. Let's do this for the people.
We've hit a lot of banks over the years, but First World Bank has always been close to my heart. Let's get into theirs. And tear it out.
Back to where it all began. First World Bank.
Time to hit the First World Bank, gang.
If you got shares in First World Bank, sell. 'Cos they're about to suffer a hostile takeover. Let's do it.
The First World Bank. Bunch of goddamn bloodsuckers. Go do it.
They made you!
They've spotted you!
Ah shit that's it... Plan B!
So much for the stealthy approach!
Time to get your feet wet!
No going back now, folks!
OK, don't panic, you're professionals!
This is the hard part, plan B. Good luck!
That's torn it. Good luck.
They still haven't heard a thing.
Mask up when you're ready to roll.
We're looking good. Looking good.
Promising... Very promising...
Keep it rolling people.
Kick it off when you're ready.
Stealthy as hell, impressive.
They're in the dark.
They're inside!
Units inside!
Heads up, they're deploying on a nearby roof!
In the back!
In the building!
Down there!
Coming through the window!
At the window!
Cops, stairwell!
Put it in bags and move it out!
Throw it if you have to, just move it fast!
Get the cash bagged!
Bag the cash!
Get your stuff out of here!
Get the loot out of there!
Time to grab the money guys!
Get the stuff wrapped!
One minute.
I'm sending the loot van.
Be ready to get those bags into the loot van.
Clock's ticking, people!
Let's finish this thing strong!
We're trying our luck out here...
That's four.
That's five.
That's six.
That's seven.
Halfway there!
Almost got it all!
Just two more!
One more !
Keep 'em comin'!
Keep going!
No!
You keep it up and we're golden.
OK, you're ready for the next step.
Are you ready for the next step?
OK, let's move to the next part of the plan.
Good! Next part of the plan now.
Professional work so far.
I can feel it, it's gonna work.
Everyone OK?
How are we looking?
Anything interesting?
Make hay while the sun is shining, people.
Sometimes you gotta know when to hold 'em and when to fold 'em.
You know how to win. So win.
You think robbery is easy?!
Crime is for closers, people.
There's no way back now.
Finishing is the only thing.
Good job! Carry on.
You guys are nailing it!
Keep it together, keep it up.
Keep it up people.
Plan looks good so far... Just stay the course.
We're following the plan... Good so far.
Right now you're making me look very smart.
I'm pleased, but I'm not surprised.
They're coming in force!
Cops are here, we're about to have our hands full!
Get busy, the police are here!
Deep breath, cops are all over your location.
Cops responding. Here we go!
Police on the scene!
They're bringing in armored units!
They're moving snipers into position folks.
Be careful! They have snipers incoming!
They've deployed snipers. Stay low.
Snipers are inbound!
They're shifting long range teams into position.
Get your head down, they called in snipers!
Not good - those are snipers!
They're going to hit you with snipers!
They've had enough, they're going to snipers!
The cops are deploying more snipers!
Those look like sniper teams, folks. Careful now.
Yeah chatter sounds like they're activating sniper teams. Get low.
They're putting a sniper team in play, watch out.
Looks like snipers are gonna get involved.
Snipers on the surrounding buildings.
Snipers! on the roof.
Look out! Sniper team set up on the rooftop nearby.
Sniper, rooftop!
Heads up, they're deploying tactical squads on a nearby roof top.
They're on the roof!
Yeah I see snipers on the roof now... look out!
Sniper! Interior!
They're coming!
Go!
Move, move, move!
Come on, come on!
What the hell!
What are you wating for!
Hold your ground!
Keep it together!
Hold em off!
I don't want to bail you out! fight!
You can't let this end here!
You're winners, so goddammit, WIN!
What's it gonna take! Dig deep! Fight back!
Rally goddammit! RALLY!
Don't let them win!
They're going to do everything they can to take you down!
Do what you need to do to hold back the tide!
Your job is to make them go down without a goddam fight!
Imagine this is Sparta!
They're trying to take your money!
They're trying to take your livelihood!
This is the only thing that matters!
Ok, get in there and get our man out.
Alright, get in there and find the target.
Keep going til you see the prison transports.
Find those prison transports. They should be just up ahead.
There should be four prison transports on the scene.
Get to the prison transports.
Go go, find the prison transports.
Go find those trucks.
Get to the trucks.
Look out! Secondary explosion!
Alright, we don't know which prison transport our man is in, so you'd better place a saw on each one of the four trucks!
You gotta saw the trucks open to find out which one he's in.
Saw those trucks open!
Get those transports opened up!
Saw them open!
Open the trucks! Use the saws!
Ok, first transport is open - check it!
That's the first one opened - have a look inside!
That's the second one opened - have a look inside!
Third transport is open - check inside!
Check the third transport, it's opened now!
That's the last one! Have a look inside!
What do you know! A GENSEC armored cash transport! You could loot it if you want to take some cash home from this!
Find the prisoner first and then you can worry about the cash.
That's him! Get him to the top of the tower!
Great, that's him! Get him out of there and to the top of the tower!
Get him to the tower!
Get the prisoner to the tower!
Keep him moving!
Make sure he follows you!
Don't forget about the prisoner, guys!
Ok, it's the tower on your right! Get him up there!
You can throw the loot in the yellow waste chute hanging on the side of the construction tower. I'll have someone pick it up later.
See the yellow waste chute on the side of the construction tower? You can throw the loot in there and I'll have someone pick it up later.
Ok, you're at the top? Help him buckle up and release the balloon. The plane will be there any minute.
Oh crap, is that an attack helicopter?
That's an attack helicopter incoming! Hold on to your hats!
Ok, the plane is coming in soon.
Plane is on its way in to pick the goods up.
You gotta hold the fort for two minutes until the plane makes the pickup.
Another attack helicopter! Careful guys!
Where's that plane? Report status!
30 seconds, guys!
Just 30 seconds to pickup!
Raise the balloon guys - higher up so the pilot can catch it!
Raise the balloon! It needs to be higher!
Time to get out of here. Leave the tower and move further along the bridge.
Get to that pillar - move!
Go to the pillar guys!
Watch it! Don't let the cops take the balloon down!
You'll have to raise the balloon again.
Damn! You've got to raise the balloon again.
Damn swat-van is blocking the route! Move it!

The plan is simple: under cover of darkness, we hit the convoy when they cross Green Bridge. Actually - we'll blow the bridge with explosives! That should stop all traffic, don't you think? We grab the prisoner, put him in a fulton skyhook and make him vanish into thin air.
There's a guy in the Long Island Prison who might know where Kento is. Let's get him out.
We're going to hit a prison transport on Green Bridge, guys.
Executed like true professionals! You got your guy, and I'm sure that explosion was heard all over the city!
Cover your ears now....
When you're ready, give the driver the signal.
That truck needs to be safe. Draw fire away from it.
That's some crappy parking. Get it moved!
Car's blocking the truck. Move it!
Drill the van open. Get it outta the way!
Must be some way to build across those roadworks.
Cops threw down road spikes. Clear them away.
Stingers on the road. Get them out of the way.
Cops got stingers across the street. Clear 'em!
Barriers are up! Crack the power box. That should drop 'em.
Traffic barriers. Find the power box. Get 'em down.
Clear the truck's route, gang!
Collect the ticket. Open the gate.
Grab that ticket at the machine. It'll open the gate.
Find the room that controls those bollards. Gotta be here somewhere. Check the doors.
Keep looking for the control room. Must be here somewhere.
Keep searching. The control room has to be here.
Control room has to be here somewhere!
That's it. Hack that terminal.
There's the control terminal. Hack it!
That terminal will drop the bollards. Hack it.
Good. Keep the cops off of it.
It's working. Keep it that way.
Reboot the hack. And keep the cops off it!
Cops screwed the hack. Reboot it!
Now, let it do it's thing!
Good. We're in business again.
It's done. Now hit the button, and lower the bollards.
Into the system. Now just press the button and drop those bollards!
Who had that ticket? Get it to the gate.
Seven bucks!? We were hardly here!
Time to move fast, guys. Yank that armor off the truck.
Feel the need for speed, gang. Strip the armor off the truck.
Shoot the guards!
Move that car so we can get the hell out of here.
Get that car out of the way.
You need to clear that car.
Alright. Let the driver know you're ready to move.
Great! Signal the driver that it's clear.
Now let the driver know it's clear!
Gang, the cops have the city locked down. Fighting through is the only option, so we need you on the ground. That means the truck is going to stay with you.
Get Hox outta there! Up to the street! Move it!
Driver is waiting on the street. Get Hox up there.
So... Hoxton is taking his good time. I think we might've given him a concussion.
That explosion must have shook up Hoxton pretty bad. Just let him walk it off.
Hoxton seems a bit disoriented - most likely from the explosion - but he'll come around.
It's payday fellas!
Now bring the encryption keys back to Hoxton so he can get to work on the next server.
Good. Now get those keys back to Hox.
The testimonies are somewhere in the Archives. Search through their records and see if you can't find them.
Get looking through the records. Find those testimonies.
Right, that's the files. Get them back to Hoxton!
The missing server is probably lying on the desk of some IT monkey. Get down there and find it.
Great. Now haul it back up to the Operations Room.
That's it. Great! Now return it to Hoxton.
Escort whoever is carrying that server. It's gonna be heavy, and I think the cops will try to liberate it from you.
Stay with whoever is carrying the server. It's heavy. Don't leave them behind!
Christ, don't they organise this stuff. Search through it. Find that evidence. You're looking for evidence that's related to Hoxton.
Nice. Now get that evidence to the lab. Any DNA might help us finger this rat.
Damn, their system didn't allow us to see who the DNA belongs to. Still, we have a sample of the traitor's DNA, I'm sure we can put it to good use. Now get back to Hoxton.
Damn. No match. Keep looking!
Defend Hoxton. If you have cards, you can seal off the entrances.
If you have cards, you can close the barriers. That oughta hold 'em off Hoxton for a while.
This place is locked down tight, but you can use keycards to gain access to different areas. Choose wisely - you probably won't find a lot of 'em.
Keycards are gold here. You can use 'em to open up areas, close areas down. Use them carefully!
A keycard will get you into the Armory. Sure there must be plenty of ammo inside.
If you're low on Doctor Bags, you should consider getting that Infirmary open.
Spend a keycard to access the Infirmary, if you feel like you need a pick-me-up.
Bam! That's one less flank to worry about.
And boom! They're not using that skywalk.
Nice. That cuts their options. Exploit that.
They ain't getting through this way!
Gas, watch out! Wait for it to dissipate!
They're deploying gas! Get out of the room and wait for it clear.
The feds'll do everything they can to stop you from leaving. Get out of there - hurry!
It's a dirty job, but if it means we stay in a job...
There's the house. And, somewhere in there, the rat.
That's the FBI safe house. Let's see how safe it really is.
First things first; get past the outer fence.
Alright. First task: get on the other side of that fence.
Your first job is getting beyond the perimeter.
Check the fence. Always got to be a way over, through or under.
There must a way to get beyond the fence. Check it out.
Open a door or window and the alarm timer will kick in. You'll only have a few seconds to disable it, before it goes to hell.
Look in through the windows and try to find the alarm box. You'll have a limited time to disable it once you're inside, so it's best to be prepared.
Look inside before going in. Find the alarm box. When you open a door or window, it'll start, so you need to disable it fast.
You just triggered the countdown! Find and disable the alarm before it's timer runs out!
And there's the countdown. Now, find the alarm! Disable it before it kicks in.
Phew, the alarm is disabled. No need to worry about opening doors or windows now!
Gang, get into the house. Come on, move it!
The traitor will be in the panic room, so you have to find it. Then we can work on getting it open.
We're going to need a thermal lance to get through that thing. Looks like the Fed's really want this guy kept alive. Bile is in-bound.
OK, looks like the the panic room door is controlled with a code and two keycards. Find them.
Interesting security. OK, the panic room can only be accessed from outside by a code and two keycards. Look for them.
OK. Nice tech! It appears the panic room door is controlled with a code and a retinal scanner.
This is good security. A code and a retinal scanner.
OK. The panic room door is controlled with two keycards and a retinal scanner. No problem.
