Alright. The panic room door is controlled with a code and a special key. Just find that code and key. Simple!
Looks like an entry code and a key are needed for external access. Go look for them.
OK, the panic room door is controlled with two keycards and a special key. Track 'em down.
That door needs two keycards and a key. Start looking for them.
Good, it's searching the computer now. Make sure no one spots the computer when it's active.
Nice. It's searching the archived emails. Keep the Feds away til it finishes.
It's searching now. Christ, wish they spent as much on their servers as they do on their doors. Don't let anyone see.
OK, we got it! Use the code on the panic room!
That's it! Get the code to the panic room!
Alright, here's an idea. We're going to make a little call. Get to the telephone outside the house.
Nice. That's it. Alright, one of you guys monkey up there.
OK. Get access to their comm relay. We're gonna make it look like we're making a call from the house.
Place a call to the FBI HQ. I'll do the talking.
Alright. Put the call through. Let me talk to the Feds.
Yes, hi, this is Agent Dave from the safe house. I need to talk with the informant urgently, requesting today's code. Sorry, didn't get my coffee this morning.
Hi, this is Special Agent, uh, Smith. Can you tell me the panic room code? Our terminals are down. Can't get today's code.
Yes, sir, will do. Thank you!
That's great. Thank you.
OK, for the retinal scanner we need the FBI boss. Find him and take him hostage!
Alright, The retinal scanner needs an eye. Unfortunately, one with a pulse. So find the FBI boss there and take him hostage.
Gang, lead him to the scanner. Make him use it!
You need to get that guy to the scanner. Force him to look into it.
Gotta get two keycards working on that door.
The key is likely held by someone like an FBI boss. Find him. Get it.
OK, you got the key. Excellent. Now use it!
OK, we go loud! That panic room is secure, so you'll need a thermal lance to get through. It's on the way.
Bile is on his way with the thermal lance. Won't be long!
Bile is en-route with the lance. Hold the line!
Stay alive. Bile will drop the lance soon.
Fellas, fetch the lance!
One of you needs to grab the lance.
Put the thermal lance to good use and get the panic room open.
Get the thermal lance onto the panic room door.
Now get that door open. Time to reveal the rat.
Kill the rat!
Guys, wait... is that... Hector!? What the... fuck? Why the hell... I don't get this. Wait... the Watchdogs job, so that's why the cops were waiting for us. It was an ambush. That son of a bitch.
We can piss on his bones later. Right now, we gotta deal with the evidence littered throughout the house.
We could have used that guy. Ah well. Switch to the back up plan.
Damn, the retinal scanner means we needed the boss alive. Now, we'll have to do it loud.
It's too hot for the van driver. He's bugging out. Don't worry, though. Got a chopper gassed and ready for you.
OK, time to get the hell out of here. Go!
Time to leave, gang! Hurry!
You're done, and it's time to split. Come on, move!
Chopper's here!
Oh crap, the FBI has Ready Teams in the houses next to the safe house. They're coming for you!
Damn, snipers are setting up around the perimeter. Watch out and only go outside if you need to!
Looks like the FBI boss is closs to your position. Don't kill him, he might be useful.
For every bag of evidence you secure, I will provide compensation. Crime.net needs to be protected.
An inside contact has rigged up spy cameras and surveillance drones. You can access them from the gadget on the roof.
An FBI connection of mine has rigged the place with spy cameras and has set up surveillance drones outside. You can control them from the gadget on the roof.
Shit, the timelock has paused. Must be your ECM jammer that's making it go ape! Better holster those jammers.
What?!! You let the FBI boss slip away? He's left the scene! Well, he's not coming back. Gotta switch to plan B.
Guys! You didn't take care of the alarmbox.
Disable the alarm! It's counting down and things are gonna get real messy once it reaches 0.
I think that's enough evidence to kill their case against us, but I won't object if you get more.
Their case against us probably won't recover from the amount of evidence we've stolen, but you're free to steal more.

Alright. Finally, we're going after the rat - the fink who screwed Hox, wants to screw us all. Time to put him down. We know he's currently bunkering down in an FBI safe house outside the city. These safe houses are usually built along the same lines. Nice big houses, grounds, 24 hour security, and most likely a panic room somewhere inside. See where your tax dollars go? The plan is simple - get in there, find our informer and finish him. Now, I'm betting there'll be evidence against us in there too, so be good to clean that up too.
Alright. First goal - get inside. Front door's right ahead, but maybe show a little guile and look for other ways in.
First job is getting inside. The front door is right there. But there's maybe other ways in.

Right, let's try and get this security shut down. You need to find the circuit boxes that power the system. Get hooked in to them. I can hack them to power down the system without tripping their wires.
Let's see if we can shut the security down. Its weak points are the circuit boxes scattered about. If we can hack them, we can power things down without triggering the alarm.
That's the lasers shut down! Move on, let's see what's next.
That's the last box. Cutting the power. Done! Lasers are down! Move on!

Next step... Two time locks. You need keycards to get past each. Guards won't have 'em - but the civvie researchers probably will. Find and, y'know, persuade them. They'll give up their keycards soon enough.
Hmmm, couple of timelocks. Alright, you're gonna need keycards to go through. These rent-a-cop security won't have them, but I am sure the civilian researchers will. Get them to give those cards up.
Rat! Time locks have kicked in. Alright. Forget keycards. We're going to force this.
OK, time locks are history. Now, get down there and get that final door open!
That's it for the time locks. Just get through that last door!
The lights are showing your path across the room. You see? Each light corresponds to a tile. Stay on the right tiles!
You're through. Look at it. It's beautiful. Now grab it.
You got it. The Diamond. The goddamn Diamond.
Damn! Cops are sending everyone they got. Time to make this a blood diamond. Find security!
Hey, where's the Diamond? They've lowered it into the floor! Wasn't expecting that. Calls for brutal method - break through with a drill!
In, but the alarm is counting. Find the lockdown and shut it off before it goes off. Let's try and keep this quiet.
Gas! Shit, get out of there! Now!
Alright. Give it a moment - let the gas dissapate.
The gas will clear away. Give it a moment.
OK, the gas is gone. Get back in there!
Gas is cleared. Get back in there.
The chopper is on standby. Call it when you want but be warned - soon as it appears things are gonna go loud. Choose your moment.
There's a helicopter standing by to get you out. But as soon as you call it, things are going to get loud fast. So pick your moment.
See that open window? As long as things stay quiet you can secure loot by tossing it out there. A contact will pick it up for us.
We have a zip-line that can help you get loot out of there, nice and quiet. Make sure you use it.
Damn! The zip-line is useless now. Forget about securing loot on it!
Our guy at the zip-line had to run, so forget about boosting loot on that now.
Surveillance operator is out of commision. You don't need to worry about those cameras anymore!
That's survellance dealt with. You don't need to stress over the cameras anymore.
Surveillance is blind. Cameras are out of action. Should make things easier.
Alarms are off the display cases. You want to snatch some extra goodies, now is the time. Can always shift these artifacts.
Display case alarms are off now. Get your Dr. Jones on, fellas, and grab some antiquities. I know a guy who can fence this stuff. Trust me.
Listen, each path you create will only last a limited time. You can re-create the path - just make sure you aren't standing on one of the tiles.
The path will reset after a predefined time window. You can always create a new one. Just make sure you're not standing there when it resets,
Will you look at this place. Not your usual vault, huh?
Get a keycard and swipe it through the time locks. Check civvies for cards.
Time locks can be taken down with keycards. Civilians have the keycards. You see where this is leading?
We came, we saw... We robbed a whole bunch of old Roman shit.
Don't get distracted, guys. Keep an eye out for... Oooh wait, is that from the First Triumvirate?!
Supposedly, it was Genghis that found the Diamond. He did pretty well out of it.
Woah, look at this stuff. It can't be real... Can it?
I loved this room as a kid, but now... Makes me uneasy.
Some nice loot in these displays. But some cheap counterfeit crap too. Look for alarms. That'll mark the good stuff.
Some nice stuff in those cases. Some knock-offs too. If you're going to snatch it, snatch the real stuff - look for cases with alarms. I'm sure a clever crew like you can figure it out.
Looks like every cop is headed your way! You're not driving out. Light a flare, and we'll get you an air extraction.
That's a full load. Hang tight. The chopper will be back.
Damn, that was the wrong tile!
Quiet... Quiet. You're doing great.
Keep it quiet, gang.
The cops messed up the time lock! Get it going again!
This whole enterprise will be for nothing if you dont get that time lock tick-tocking again.
Good. Now keep the cops off of it.
Great. Now, please, keep the cops away from the time lock.
Alright. Now hook me up to that terminal again.
Get me hooked up again.
Police helicopter coming in!
Look up - police chopper in the sky!
Eye in the sky - watch out!
Police are flying in - heads up!
Our chopper is coming in.
That is our chopper arriving.
That's our chopper landing.
Heads up our chopper is incoming!
Chopper coming in - it's ours.
Chopper landing on the roof.
Chopper is inbound - setting down on the roof.
We got a chopper landing on the roof.
Chopper is bound for the roof.
Damn, what is this place?
A prison? Not my favourite thing...
Let's find a way into the prison.
We probably need to enter the prison...
Looks like this gate requires a keycard. Find one guys!
Spin it, let's see what happens.
Soooo the wheel stopped on sniper...
The wheel stopped on sniper!
The wheel has decided, looks like we have some more snipers incoming.
It landed on flames... That can't be good.
The wheel stopped on flames. Things are about to burn!
Ok the wheel landed on flames again, watch out!
The wheel stopped on smoke, no idea what that means.
Yep, it's smoke again!
Drills? Not sure what that is...
Watch out! It stopped on drills again!
Hmm.. I wonder what the question mark means.
Question marks? What could that be?
The wheel stopped on... dozer? Be careful guys Im not sure what that means.
They interrupted the timer! Restart it!
Restart the timer! They stopped it.
Once the reboot is over we should be back on track!
When the reboot has ticked down it should restart.
Great the timer is done! Grab the keycard!
Good job. Now lets get moving.
Now that you got the keycard lets move on.
Now let's enter the prison. Use the keycard to open the door.
Get that keycard into the panel and pull that switch. Let's see what happens.
Let's see... Place the keycard in the panel and activate that switch. Hope we're not in for a big suprise...
There's a slot for the keycard. My guess is just put it in and see what happens...
Go by the panel and pull that goddamn switch
What are you waiting for? That switch isn't gonna pull itself.
If you wanna leave, there's an escape panel on the top floor. Check it out if you wanna call it quits.
Same procedure as last time - grab the loot or leave this prison on the top floor.
You know the deal, grab the loot or escape.
I'm sure I don't have to explain what you need to do.
You know your way around this prison, you know what to do.
Same procedure as always.
That timer on the wall's ticking fast! Get the loot into the vent!
Careful guys, time's running out! 10 seconds!
Time's almost up!
10 seconds on the clock!
Get together in a group, guys!
Stick together team.
The place is starting to fall apart, get out!
There's a zipline leading to a train up on the bridge. Zip through the sky!
Hold on guys, I'll send some C4...
What's that, extra loot? You sure you wanna do that?
You sure you wanna be greedy now?
Run, heisters, run!
Get to the escape! HURRY!
If we wanna get Hoxton back, we gotta follow the Dentist's plan. Step one: bust up the motel.
Commissar's boys are crawling over this place like roaches. Exterminate them before they burrow into the rooms.
It's a roach motel - only the roaches are Russian mobsters. No matter. Get in there and put them down.
That's about half of 'em.
That should be all of them. Nice work!
That's it for the mobsters, gang. If they're not all dead, they're running. Either serves our purpose.
Those motel rooms look like good candidates for a little wrecking. Get in there and get your rockstar on. Smash the TV's, lamps - anything you can find.
Looks like the Commissar has spent a few roubles on those rooms. Smash 'em up! Don't forget to grab any valuables there too.
We'll send these Russians to hell. And their cars. There's a gas station nearby. See if you can find something to help the fire.

According to the Dentist, the Russian's shift a fair bit of meth out of this flea pit. Probably have a home brew operation up in one of those rooms. Smashing that up would really piss off the Commissar.
The Commissar has a methlab! I know you guys have torched a few labs in the past. Or brew a little magic, if you think got the time and can find a formula.
There's plastic explosive in the DeLorean. Set it on the Commissar's gas station, and make it go up like Sputnik!
Keep breaking things, gang.
Keep going, keep trashing!
You're doing great. Keep smashing!
Like a bull in a china shop!
Some men just want to watch the wheels burn.
Nothing I like seeing more than cheap foreign cars going up in smoke.
Commissar's men don't look like the kind of guys to have fire insurance.
That's a beautiful car. Shame. But it's part of the job.
You need to cause damage to get the Commissar to call us. Smash rooms, burn cars, kill his thugs - that should get his attention.
Get in there, and just mess the place up. Trash the rooms, light up the cars - whatever you can do. Go crazy. The Commissar is bound to give us a call.
Damn, he hung up. Somewhere in the city. Keep breaking.
The trace is working but I need more time. Get him back on the line. Keep trashing.
I'm almost there, gang. He's gotta be close to the centre. Could be... Damn, still too vague. Keep going.
Damn, I almost had his location. Definitely near the centre. Keep at it.
So close to nailing his location. Keep going. Just get him back for a little longer.
Got him! Foggy Bottom!
Found him! He's in Shaw!
Got it! Downtown!
Got it. Georgetown!
That's as far as I can take it. Look around for something that might narrow down his location.
Gang, there's got to be something in the motelrooms that can pinpoint the Commissar's location. Keep looking.
Keep searching the motel, guys. There has to be some clue to where the Commissar is.
A second hatch. What's the Commissar hiding in there?
Hey, maybe that hatch hides something that can help us locate the Commissar. I got an idea how we can crack it. Bile is bringing you something.

There's gotta be more to this dump. The Dentist says the Commissar keeps his best loot in a fortified basement. I'm sure you wanna know what's in there. Search the ground floor rooms. See if you can find anything suspicious.
Bingo! Steel reinforced hatch. I've got an idea. Bile will close on your position. Get ready to fetch your present.
That's the hatch! I've got an idea for it. Bile is going to be Santa, and since you're such good boys and girls...
Happy birthday, clowns. Here's your present.
That bag's holding a heavy cable. Use it to connect the hatch to the pick-up. Start it up and let's crack open that basement.
All connected? Good. Only need to get that pick-up working.
You sure remember how to hotwire an engine. Start it up!
Is it working? Nice. But damn, that hatch is strong.
I've seen that equipment pull a two-ton Roadwarrior out of a bog in ten seconds, but that hatch is holding tight.
Credit to the Commissar. He hasn't been cheap with the hatch. The pick-up is pulling strong.
Two minutes!
Only one minute to go!
About halfway open now!
The cops killed the engine! Restart it!
Purring like a kitten. A 400 brake horsepower kitten. Good job!
Georgetown. Search through the files, the maps on the wall - anything that can pinpoint his exact location. Remember: it's Georgetown.
The Commissar is holed up somewhere around Georgetown. Find a clue. Something to do with Georgetown.
We know the call originated in West End. Look for something to give us a precise address. West End.
We know the Commissar is around Foggy Bottom. There must be something there that can narrow it down. Maps, files - anything.
The Commissar is bunkered down somewhere around Foggy Bottom. Find a clue for that place.
Shaw! That's where he is. But we need to narrow it down to a precise address. Look for maps or files related to Shaw.
Those crates are headed out to the Commissar's other dirty dens. Get those labels and check them at that code reader.
Those stacked crates are due to be shipped out to the Commissar. Check the labels. Get the right one to the code reader, and that should lead us straight to the Commissar.
The adress is in the wrong district - try another code.
Excellent job! We know where he is. Now hustle back to the car. Grab any loot before the Fed's get it. You know... Those crates gave me an idea...
Dentist said they ship meth outta here. So there must be manufacturing. And meth means money.
What's that? Russian loot? Get it to the DeLorean. Hurry!
The Russians stash their loot here? Nice bonus! Toss it in the DeLorean.
Great work. Now, let's see if the big fish will bite...
Alright. Great. Lets see if he takes the bait...
That should be it! Great stuff! Come on, Commissar... Call...
OK, drill's done. Get into the basement.
Gimme a couple of minutes to confirm the barcode. Hold on.
Checking the barcode now. Keep the cops off it.
Connect that cable to both the hatch and the truck.
Police breaching their way down. Heads up!
Chopper on the scene, but it ain't the feds!
Who's flying that chopper. Not the cops.
That pilot's had enough. Yeah, back to base, asshole.
Uh-oh, looks like Commissar's chopper is back for another bite.
It's firing! Get outta the way... Now!
Remember - track down the mobsters. Track them down, and put them down.
Neighbors must've heard gunshots. Police signals just went nuts.
Another mobster taken care of. Keep at it.
Now get that gasoline on a car and torch it!
Good! Get back to the lot, and start some fires!
Guys, I think the cops just shape charged another entrance!
What the hell! Cops just breached another way in.
Commissar's hiding at Downtown. Look for a clue for that. He's Downtown.
Guys, don't forget: douse those cars with gasoline. Light 'em up.
You got to fetch some gas and torch those cars.
I loved chemistry in high school. By that, I mean I love stuff being blown up. Good work!
Some C4 on that gas station should send a message. Get to it.
Damn! I felt that all the way over here.
Haha, you guys give new meaning to going loud.
Hmmm... He can't be in here... Neither there...
Yes! I got the - no, wait. Can't be. Damn. Almost had it.
This district matches with... Hmmm, give me some more time...
Come on, come on... Piece of Russian crap...

The Dentist has sent us after a Russian mobster - calls himself the Commissar. He's got criminal interests all over the East Coast, including this motel down in the Heights. We don't know where he is, so you need to apply a little pressure. We've dropped him a hotline to us. Bust that place up as much as you can, and he should call. And when he calls, we can trace him. We're doing this for Hoxton.
Alright, we got the address for where the Commissar's at. It's an old apartment complex. Place is a run-down dump. Hard to say what security you can expect. Suit up, and let's finish this.
Commissar's holed up in a run-down apartment block. We're sneaking you in, but this is still going to get loud. Move out.
The Commissar is dug in tight as a tick. This is one of his operations. Wreak havoc. If you can smash this dump up enough, he should give us a call. Then I can trace him.
To get to the Commissar, we have to find the Commissar. This motel is one of his operations. Cause as much damage as you can. If he calls, I can track him.
Get those masks on, gang.
Get your mask on, and out of the damn crate.
Get out of the crates. Hit 'em with surprise.
We need to put the Commissar in a wooden box. Not stay in one ourselves. Move!
I give you these toys and all you want to do is stay in the box. Move it!
Thats him! Drop him!
Damn, the fat rat's riding the elevator. After him! Catch him before he gets away!
He's taken the elevator! Get up there after him. Do not let him escape.
He's headed up in the elevator! Chase him! He escapes, the Dentist will be pissed.
SWAT coming in! They were nearby. Wonder if they were already ready to hit him.
SWAT on their way. Guess they wanted to talk to Commissar about the battle at the motel.
Go, guys. Dont lose the scent!
Try to get up to the next floor.
This is it. Commissar's apartment. Get through.
Where is he?!
Did the rat jump off...? No. Can't be.
Has that tricky bastard vanished?
That crafty bastard! He's using his vault as a panic room. Let me drop you a thermal drill.
A vault! The Commissar is pulling every string to keep his ass alive. I'm sending over a thermal drill.
He's locked himself in his vault, the crazy Ivan! Break it open. I'm sending you a thermal drill.
Drill is dropped. Get it. Get that vault open.
They're making a last effort. Make sure to stay away from that helicopter!
Put out those fires with the sprinkler system.
Hope you didn't get too toasty. Great job.
Fires are out. Nicely handled.
That's the fires dealt with.
Fires' are under control. Now, back to the job.
The door is open! Now, time to put this caper to bed. Deal with him.
The vault is open. Get in there. Finish him. The Dentist is watching.
Drill is done. Time for the Commissar to be done, too.
And that is the end. Comrade Asshole is dead. Chopper is in-bound. Great work today. The Dentist, and Hoxton, will thank you.
Caught 'em! Now, Commissar is around here somewhere.
Our inside man provided you a handful explosives. Grab it and knock on that door.

The good news: Commissar has a HUGE stash of coke up in his penthouse. The bad news: he's flushing it as fast as he can. That's a lot of money swirling down the crapper - the faster you get there, the bigger the bonus!

Woah, the Commissar has a lot of coke here, but he's employing scorched earth tactics like a true Russian. In other words: He's flushing the product and if you don't get there fast, you miss out on a whole lot of extra income!
Damn! They just flushed another bag of cocaine! Hurry, gang! Get up to the last floor!
More coke just got flushed. That stuff is uncut - it's worth a fortune. Get up there!
Powder's flying like it's a goddamn bakery in there - if you want in, you'd better book it!
Hurry up, they're wasting thousands of dollars worth of coke every damn second!
They're flushing that coke down like their lives depended on it! Hurry up!
They're dumping that coke like the mean it! Get up there and stop them!
Don't get stuck anywhere, keep moving up! It'll be worth it, but it's wasting away quickly!
Throw in another gear, will ya? That pile of coke is getting smaller at an alarming pace!
Run like you mean it! Just kill whoever's in you way, don't waste time and bullets on anyone else!
If you get up there fast enough, we'll make a fortune. Come on! Make an effort!
Aw, this is gonna give me an ulcer, seeing all this coke being flushed and you guys straggling!
Pick up the pace, guys! Every second wasted is money lost! I'm going insane here!
I don't know what's taking you guys so long, but that coke is NOT waiting around for you.
Hell, this coke couldn't get ruined faster if a bomb exploded up in that room! Get! Up! There!
There's not much left now... If you just hurry up you might make a few extra grand.
There's just scraps left now! Even if it's less than I hoped for, it's still extra money, so go for it!
Well! That's the last bag down the pan. Sorry, gang - no extra income this time around.
OK, whatever... There's still another way to win: Find and kill the Commissar! I bet you're motivated now!
Hm... That's sad, but we have not time to lose! Focus on the Commissar now - track him and whack him!
Guys, you're not on a date. Quit strolling and get hustling. Move it!
You're doing this for Hox, so let's get a move on!
What the hell is Commissar working in this room?
Commissar gets his hands dirty with some nasty stuff, including kidnapping.
Dunno what that guy did to piss off the Commissar, but it must have been bad.
Drill that gate, guys.
Looks like they haven't had time to get the wiring behind the wall. Find the switch.
You should be able to track the wires and find a way to open this door.
The staircase is blocked off! There must be a way up nearby!
Staircase's blocked. Gotta be another way up.
Great. Now wait. That rat will be ours soon.
Don't forget to plunder that vault. Haul the loot to the chopper. Always nice to make a little extra money, gentlemen.
There's the coke. Outstanding, guys! Bag as much as you can.
That's the coke, gang. I knew you would do it! Now bag it.
Commissar's gonna be antsy after the motel attack, but he won't be expecting this. Masks on and give the rat what he deserves. Good luck.
Work faster!
Guys listen. Much more hard-headed opponents on the way!
SWAT is stepping up guys. This will get hairy!
Bite down. The cops are throwing in another gear. Heavy units moving in!
Shit we got bad cops moving in - real bad cops. Keep your heads down!
A lot more cops are coming in. Seem to have more weaponry as well.
Juicy score in the diamond district, people. Ice for everyone.
The owner of this store will have a month of insurance paperwork to do. Nice take boys, back to the house.
Nice job snatching all those gems guys. I'll called ahead to my diplomatic contacts - they are hungry for this. Let's feed 'em.
That was a real pleasure, makes me think of the old days. Starting out small, the simple things, right? Good work.
OK, I'll get right on fencing this. It won't be hard - this is the perfect kind of merchandise. Nice work!
Looks like this store is pretty packed with jewels. Everyone getting ready for the holidays I guess. Anyway, I'm looking for at least four bags of jewels.That ought to cover us nicely.
OK, time for a jewelry hit. We need at least six bags. That could prove a challenge - but you guys can do it!
OK, time for a jewelry hit. We need at least ten bags. That's kinda crazy - but you guys are good at crazy!
Let em have it, gang!
Find Locke's crates, gang. Look for the ones with the strobe on.
Come on, crew. Locke needs us to find those crates. Show him how we do it.
We better follow Locke's directions on this one. Take the charges to the door.
Sounds a little unhinged. Best do it.
Locke sounds a bit...mad. We'd better do what he says.
There should be a security room close by. Use the arc welder to cut through and green llight the airlock.
Locke wants us to cut through to the security room. Find it, gang, then approve the sequence
Get the bags up to Locke as soon as you can, crew. Look for the large vertical shaft around there.
Find the shaft and zipline those bags up to Locke ASAP.
That's him. Locke.
Locke's escape plan depends on blasting the radars, gang. See to it.
Nicely done, guys. Locke transferred our cut. I don't know about this guy, yet, but let's see how things pan out with him.
Hurry, guys! Into the hold!
Hustle it, guys. You need to get on the ground near the money.
That money needs to be tightly secured by the straps before Locke can take off.
Ensure all of the straps are secure. Don't give Locke an excuse to accidentally drop the money.
The hell he have in mind?
What's he thinking?
You heard what Locke said, guys. Into the boat and let's get out of here.
Hope you're okay up there, crew. Here's Locke.
We want at least two bags of jewels from this store. Understand?
Check in the back too.
Get those bags to the car.
Bags to the car people.
Almost enough.
OK, that's all we need.
That's enough for Vlad, but get more if you feel brave.
Plenty for Vlad - is it enough for us? Your call.
Come on come on, we can do better!
Get him the tiara and take everything else in the place if you have time... Lot of incidental income you don't want to waste. Just once you decide to make your move, make it fast.
OK, this is it. Quick in, get Vlad's tiara. You want more, it's your call.
Halfway mark. Hurry up!
Halfway mark, people. Hurry it up!
Got a minute till the van leaves - with or without you.
30 seconds till the van leaves.
That's 30 seconds till the van leaves.
Ten seconds.
Someone got away.
There's a good chance there's a security camera in there. Keep an eye out.
Loot van is on the way. ETA: One minute.
The wheelman's going to be there in one minute with the escape van.
The wheelman had to run, too hot. He's relocating.
Hang tight, too many cops for a pick-up.
Hang on - too much heat for a pick-up.
OK, maybe tiara is somewhere nearby. Gotta be in the building.
Take a look around - Vlad's tiara has to be in there somewhere.
It has to be there, the tiara is there somewhere.
Goddammit - they locked you out! Find a way around!
OK, that's it. Get it to the escape van... Vlad will be pleased.
We're on the clock, people!
The escape van just left. I'll get him to come round for another pass but be ready this time.
Goddammit, you just missed the getaway.
The getaway just left without you. Sorry guys, you're gonna be spending some time behind bars.
You guys are looking for a necklace, remember?
Guys the tiara is probably in a safe or on display somewhere...
Remember, check the Murkywater shipping containers for the vault.
Gang, find that vault. It'll be in a shipping container. Probably those Murkywater ones.
Guys, the vault - find it! Check the Murkywater containers.
Vlad wants to talk to you...
These vaults have one weakness. A failsafe will open the door if the temperature inside gets too high. Look around for crowbars in the warehouse, and jam them into the rear fans.
Look around for crowbars in the warehouse. Stick them into the vault's fans, and wait for thermodynamics to do the rest.
My guess would be the crowbars are inside the warehouse.
The warehouse is where you're most likely to find a crowbar.
Okay, great. The temperature is climbing. Wait it out, but jamming more fans will speed it up.
That's it for the fans. Temperature is spiking fast. What the hell is in there?
That's the last fan. Man, look at that temperature climb. I got a bad feeling about this.
I... uh... okay. So we're boosting nuclear warheads. Guys, be very, very gentle with those things.
Vlad, smashing malls is one thing. Stealing tiaras is one thing. But nukes!?
Those warheads are damned heavy. Use the forklifts to shift them.
Those forklifts will be useful for moving the warheads.
Look for a way to get to the train quickly. Don't want you guys handling those old Russian nukes longer than you need to.
That's it. Now you can get the hell out of there, or head back and snag more Murky loot.
We're done. You can leave that crazy Ivan with his nukes, or head back and grab more loot.
That's the last one. Now you can get far away, or return to the warehouse for more loot.
We're done. Now bail! Leave Vlad with his nukes.
That's the last one. My advice? Get far away, as fast as you can!.

"We're hitting the Murkywater warehouse for Vlad. Don't know what the target is, or where it is, but it's tucked away in a vault, which itself is in one of their branded shipping container. Get in there, find the vault and get out whatever it is that crazy Russki wants. Murkies will be on high alert when you get there, and the cops'll be quick to respond, so you gotta get in there and do the job fast. Fast means loud. No tip-toe'ing this one. It's safeties off from the get-go. And, don't forget, there's loot all around. See what you can grab."
Got memories of this place at 4am...
Lot of activity. Stay frosty.
There it is. Do your thing, guys, but Gage prefers you do it quietly. Front gate is dead ahead, but maybe you can find alternative routes.
There it is, right ahead. Do your thing, guys, but do it quietly. It goes loud, and I'll have to pull you out fast.
That's the depot. You know what you need to do, but keep it quiet. If the alarm goes, I'll have to pull you out.
Look around. Search the Murkywater containers. Just grab any valuables you can.
Used dinars. Hard to trace. Perfect.
A nice stash of used dinars. Good find.
I hope they weren't giving this marching powder to our boys.
This coke won't be funding any more terrorism. Just good old American crime.
Columbian. Bolivian. Mexican. Wherever it's from, it's ours now.
Gold bullion. Probably taken from the enemies of freedom.
Never get tired of seeing gold bullion getting bagged.
Great work. There's always a market for untraceable guns.
Rifles, pistols and bullets. This will make Gage happy.
Who knows what's on that server. Blueprints, records - maybe the password for Area 51.
I can't wait to see what these shady assholes were hiding on that server.
I think I saw a documentary about that on National Geographic.
People will pay fortunes for this ancient Babylonian shit.
I bet the mad dictator ate off those silver plates.
Saddam had his enemies heads served on that platter.
That'll do for Gage, but you can stay for more.
There's the main gate. Could be watched. Maybe find another way in?
Those Murkywater containers are brought direct from the world's hotspots. Crack them open. They'll be your best bet for loot.
Open those Murkywater containers. If anything has illegal loot, it will be them.
I'm shutting this down. Make sure you're with the driver when he bails, or it's a long walk home.
Why isn't that chopper on any flight plans?
He saw you! Deal with it!
That's bag one. Keep bagging, gang.
You're nearly done. Only one bag to go.
Just the last bag to go, guys. Don't mess up now.
Armor of a Shogun. Nabunaga. Thought lost for centuries, but... here it is. Get the pieces bagged.
I can't believe we scored Oda's armor. Outstanding work!
Gage has arranged for one of the dumpsters to be used to stash some loot.
There's a dumpster down there. Gage says you can use it to stash some loot.
Gage's guy is in a nearby parking lot. Throw the loot over the wall to him.
Move quick. Guards will notice that open door.
Hustle! The murkies will notice that open vault!
That was text-book whisper mode, guys. Great work.
Ninja's in socks tiptoeing on thick carpet make more noise than you. Expertly done!
You need to disable or destroy the anti-air defenses. Find a way, otherwise we're screwed.
Gang, you need to take care of those anti-air guns ASAP. Find a way!
Hook up the laptop to the anti-aircraft gun!
Okay, give me a minute or two. I'll disable this AA gun.
I bet you there are some explosives laying around here. See if you can find any.
Plant the C4 and enjoy the moment.
Place the C4.
Stand back, gang!
Take cover!
They are about to blow, stand back!
Perfect! They won't be able to use that anymore.
Nice drop, Bile! Gang, the EMP is in the yard outside the lumber mill.
The EMP has been dropped. Head over just outside the lumber mill and pick it up.
Ok, gang. We need to find a way into the lumber mill. This might be crazy, but maybe we could use the anti-air gun we hacked earlier? Just redirect its position and blow the wall up?
Hell yeah! That was crazy, gang! Now get in there.
That's how we do it! Good job, guys. Get inside the mill now.
Protect the EMP! The mercenaries will do anything to stop you!
Gang, you need to protect the EMP while it charges! Prepare to fight!
Damn it, they stopped the charge!
The mercenaries interrupted the EMP charge! Every time that happens, the EMP is slowly discharged!
Good, the EMP is charging again.
But just stick to the plan and we should be good. Get inside the laboratory through the hatch and find the scanner and the test-subjects.
Gang? I'm not sure you can hear me, but you know what you're supposed to do: enter the laboratory via the hatchet.
That's it! The EMP did its job! Now enter the laboratory via the hatch.
Guys, can you hear me? Hello? Enter the laboratory via the hatch. It should be open.
What the hell! The whole room is filled with gas. Quickly! Find out where it's coming from and find a way to shut it off!
Damn it! The bastards have filled the room with gas to stop us. Gang, be quick and find a way to shut it off!
You need to find a way to shut off the gas.
There must be some way to shut off the gas!
Good job, guys. That should get rid of the gas in the scanning room.
Good, that should get rid of the gas. You can most likely enter the room now.
Damn it to hell! What is wrong with a traditional security door that you can drill? Looks like you're gonna need the actual lead scientist for hand print authorization. Find him.
Look for the lead scientist and get him to the security door.
Damn! They killed the lead scientist? I don't know, guys. We still need his hand for authorization...Do what you have to do...
Jesus, that's nasty. Well, you got what we need. Place it on the scanner, I guess?
Wow, you really did it... You guys are cold. Bring it to the scanner and let's forget this ever happened.
Yes, it worked. It doesn't seem to matter that the scientist was dead. Technology is cruel. Well, get started with the scanner.
Okay, the authorization worked. Get the scanner working now.
Look like the power is back, gang.
Looks like the power is coming back.
Alright, gang. You need to look for the test-subjects and get them to the scanner. They are supposed to look pretty much the same.
If the intel is correct the test subjects that you need to scan are identical.
Alright. Now find the test-subjects, and get them to the scanner. You are looking for some bald guys.
Get that body over to the scanner.
Body is in place so start scanning, gang.
Guys, the bastards stopped the scan! Get it working again!
Great, the scanning is up and running again.
The scan is back in progress. Now keep it that way.
Great job, gang. The scan is complete.
The scan has been completed.Well done, gang.
They pulled the power!
Argh, they pulled the power for the scanner!
Great! Power is back. Get the scanner working again.
Okay, good. You got the power back. Return to the scanning process.
Okay, the data is being transferred to the server in the other room. You can either go and get it or stay and scan more bodies. I'm sure Jimmy can find use for it and that means more cash for us.
The data from the scanning is being collected on that server in the other room. You can stay and get more data, or you can leave. But I'm sure Jimmy would pay us for the trouble.
The data is being stored on the server in the other room. You can get it and get the hell outta here, or you can stay and scan more bodies. I'm positive Jimmy will make it worth your while.
Excellent decision, guys. If you scan all the bodies Jimmy will pay us good for it. Money doesn't seem to a an issue for him.
That's it! Now make sure you get out of there alive.
Haha, you read my mind, guys. I do want that briefcase.
How did you know I wanted that briefcase? It doesn't matter, good job!
Nothing more to do here. Let's go.
Alright, that's the radar controlling the anti-air gun. Blow it to hell.
Seems that radar is controlling the anti-air gun. You need to blow it up.
Bile dropped some explosives close to your landing spot. Find them.
The radar is still operational. Use the explosives and blow it up.
Guys, the radar is still operational? You need to destroy it. Use the explosives Bile dropped!
That radar needs to be taken down somehow. See if you can use the anti-air gun to blow it up.
We need to take that radar out of action. The missiles from the anti-air gun should do the work. See if you can use it.
The radar needs to be taken down ASAP. Maybe you could redirect the anti-air gun and blow it up?
Bring those missiles over to the radar!
Those missiles will do the work. Get them over to the radar!
Get the missiles close to the radar and activate them. Things are about to go BOOM.
To disable this we need to hack the laptop that is hooked up to it.
The EMP will do two things: It will get us a way in to the hidden lab. But more importantly: It will knock out whoever they are doing tests on, from what I heard fighting them is not an option.
What the hell happened to this guy?! Whatever, we need this guys hand.

Of all the times to grow a conscience, you decide now is the time? I can't say I like it, but I can't say you are making a mistake either. Based on what this Jimmy character is telling us, Akan really needs to be stopped. Your destination is a lumber mill in the middle of nowhere, that is secretly a laboratory run by a strange Russian organization. Jimmy tells me they are conducting some experiments that involve things out of this reality. Break into the lab and get the data Akan is after. Good luck, gang.
Damn! They have anti-air defenses set up around the whole factory. Turn the plane around, Bile! Gang, you need to use the parachutes and get out! Right now!
Enough destruction and this client will rethink his whole stance on protection money. Dirty job but you like getting dirty, right?
That's it guys. Vlad's going to get his message through. Let's cash in.
Mall destruction: check. Pissed off police: check. Let's go get paid from old Vlad.
Go into the mall and rough up whatever you see. Keep civilians out if you can - we don't need unnecessary heat.
OK, the mall's up ahead. Get in, hit it with everything you got, and get out. Try to keep people to a minimum. This is strictly material, not personnel damage. This means you, Wolf.
To show just how serious Vlad is, we are going to destroy 50 grand worth of pretty things.
10 grand dollars worth.
You're at 20 thousand! Keep on going!
Two-Five-Zero-Zero-Zero, half way! Keep going!
30 thousand guys, keep it up!
45 thousand.
Almost there guys, forty-five thousand.
50 grand, woah, is there anything left?
50 grand worth of stuff down the drain!
If you guys wanna keep going, Vlad's giving us a bonus for everything over 50k!
Hurry down guys. We don't want the police to wreck our ticket for escape.
Wait guys, I've got a chopper inbound.
The limo has arrived. Taxman is here.
Alright to repeat: Taxman is IRS, making a shady deal with some big corporation. He's selling them a server some with vital data.
We screw 'em over, snatch both Taxman and the server. With those, we'll make a $25,000,000 hack. Alex, crane ready?
Okay guys, at the right moment, disrupt the deal. Then Alex lifts the limo outta there. Ready now!
Gang, we need to do this right; both the Taxman and the server is needed, otherwise it all goes to shit. Make sure he has the server on him.
Don't mind that, it's my police scanner. There's no cops here.
Attention gang, the corporation representative is close.
The customer is about a minute away.
Two minutes until the customer is on the scene.
That's... two. Two guys.
That's the bluechip hired henchmen.
I'll eavesdrop and tell you what's being said.
That's four guys.
I see four guys.
He's at the trunk. He um....
He's approaching the trunk and...
He put something inside his shirt.
Yes, that's the server! 25 million dollars gang! Now we need to get our hands on that server and get the codes.
That is the server, gang! 25 million dollars can be ours! Now we need to act.
