Police arriving at your location in 40 seconds.
Pretty far out but cops will be here in 60 seconds.
The police have been alerted and are closing in. They'll be there any second.
Police are on their way.
Police en route - coming in fast!
Front entrance. Consider it a way in only.
Back offices. Best place to find local terminals, which may help with time locks.
This is where you're most likely to find terminals for time locks. And bankers.
time lock door. Likely lasers too. Be careful.
Areas pretty open. Lots of side offices where the mice count the cheddar.
Areas open, with elevation and side corridors. Hard to lock down.
This is just outside the main vault, so expect a lot of heat to hit here.
Vault's here. Dont know exact location of door though.
I know the vault is here. Not sure the exact position though.
This is where the vault has to be. Door could be in several places though.
Here's the security room for the vault. Two rooms. Two buttons. Likely guards, so find a way to deal with them.
Skylights here can offer an alternative way into the bank. Good for spotting too.
Here's the crane. You get into it and you can position it over the main hall skylight.
The crane here can be positioned over the main hall skylight.
This is the manager's office. Good chance to score a keycard there. His computer might be useful too.
Alternate entrance. Electronics, wire box, and a good place to hide bodies.
This is where the zip-line to access the crane will be.
This is the main lobby. Impressive. Use the elevation, but take care - wherever you are, you're going to exposed to some place.
Main lobby. A lot of space. Use it, but take care when it goes loud. Cops'll tag you from anywhere.
Those crates in the basement got me thinking. We can use them to get into the Commissar's place - undercover like. He won't be expecting this.

We got wind of a mountain of coke on the top floor. They'll do everything to keep you off that stash. Get to it before the Commissar destroys it. You know what they say: "The early bird catches the grade-a product".
Commissar is known as a ruthless bastard. Kidnapping, torture and executions are well within his M.O. Likely to see a few hostages around the place.
Well, as Vlad said...the coke is in the goats, and the goats are...well, all over downtown. Track 'em down.
What sort of noise?
That should be all of them! Time to ride out. Get in the wheels and get out of there.
That's all the goats secured. Now get in your car and high tail it out of there.
Gang, it's time to bug. Get in the car!
Crew, you got the goats, now hit the gas!
Job's done here, guys. Time to roll! Into the car!
You'll close this out quicker if you use the car to move the goats.
Gotta get them goats back quickly. Use the car!
Gang, don't forget one of those goats is up in the apartment.
Don't forget the goat in that apartment block.
All these apartments have sprinkler systems. Just look for the valve.
These places are required to have sprinkler systems. Find the valve!
Look for the valves. Get the sprinklers going!
Great, those sprinklers will put out the fire.
Let it rain!
Great. It's working!
Outstanding! Fire's dying down.
Fire's out. And people think all we do is cause chaos!
That's the fire dealt with. You guys are civil heroes!
How did the goat get up there? Whatever...look for the circuit box to stop the fan.
A goat in a fan? This day gets weirder. Find the circuit box to halt the fan.
Sure there's gotta be a good reason that goat is up in the fan. Just find the circuit box. Stop the fan.
That goat is carrying a live charge. Disable the power.
Goats are great conductors of electricity. Turn off the power.
Beware the goat! Guys, you need to disable the power first!
The goat is deadly! Kill the electricity first!
The goat is electrictrified! Turn off the power!
Uhhh...no, that didn't work. Try another one.
Great. You can safely grab the goat now!
All right, nice. Now fetch the goat!
I can't work out how it...
What was it doing up...?
I still can't figure out how.
There's another one! Caught in the scaffolding! Watch out! Looks like it's electrocuted! Disable the power!
Gang, you see it? Another goat in the scaffolds! But - woah, be careful! Looks like that ladder is electrocuted!
Look, up in the scaffold! Another goat. But, hold up! It looks like that ladder is electrocuted. Disable power!
Don't forget the goat in the scaffold.
Remember - there's a goat stuck in the scaffolds.
Looks like the goat managed to nibble through the power. Ladder's electrocuted. Disable the power!
That goat's a trouble maker. He somehow turned on the power. Disable it at the power box.
The goat managed to electrify the ladder. Look for the power box to turn it off.
You need to deal with the power box to use the ladder!
Check inside that store. Likely one of our goats wandered in. Drill it open!
I'm guessing a goat managed to get into the store. Drill the door!
Goats love shopping! Drill your way into the store.
Open for business! The business of finding goats!
Store is open! Find that goat!
That goat climbed up there. Got stuck. We need him down. Saw the streetlight!
You're not going to tempt that goat down with nice words and treats. Saw the streetlight!
Remember, you need to get a saw on the streetlight to bring down the goat.
That's the streetlight done. Now grab that goat!
The cops are taking our goats! Get them back!
Cops are rescuing the goats! Is this what tax money pays for!?

This Honduran cartel has a truck moving its product through Downtown. Vlad has arranged to have it hit. We're on clean-up. We go in afterwards, make sure the product gets out. Boots on the ground, you know?
Drop them, crew!
Don't let them close, gang!
Take them out!
That gunfire will bring the cops. We can't let them get the goats.
The shooting's bound to draw the cops. We need to get the goats away.
Oh, that voice is familiar. Just hope he doesn't crash.
Hope he doesn't hit a hill. Keep the cops at bay.
Let's hope he stays in the air this time. Hold the cops off.
I'm sure you'll find something in that barn to close off the windows.
You know what to do guys. Go out there, grab the cage parts and assemble it.
Okay gang - now get out there and assemble the cage!
Don't dawdle, crew. Assemble that cage!
There's way too much heat here. I'll have my guys assemble the cage at the silo.
Too much fire here. We'll assemble at the silo!
Oh, there's a lot of firepower here! The guys will assemble the cage at the bridge.
Okay, I'll have the guys put the cage together on the road.
Too much going on here. The road looks best for the guys to assemble the cage.
Good! Now grab the goats and throw them in!
Okay. When you're ready, raise the balloon and the pilot will collect the cage.
Now just raise the balloon and let the pilot do the rest.
There's the balloon. Hey, you see it, guy?
You heard him, gang. Just keep the heat off the goats.
You know what to do. Get out there. Assemble the cage!
Okay crew. Same thing. Get out there, and get the cage built.
Excellent! Now get outta there! Grab your car from the truck!
Fantastic! Time to leave. Grab the car, crew!
Outstanding! That's all the goats! Now time to hit the road, gang!
Come on, crew. Don't fuck up now. Get the car, and hit the road!
Guys! We're done here. Grab your wheels and burn rubber!
Why you still there? Come on, into the car and floor it!
Woah, wait til everyone is in the car!
Hold it, hold it - wait til everyone's in the car.
Back in the car! Time to ride!
Okay, listen. Twitch is waiting for you up ahead, just on the other side of the bridge. He's got a truck. Just drive straight up on into it, and this caper is closed.
Damn, the cops turned the bridge! Get into the control room there, and turn it back. You need to be on the other side!
Use the button in the control room to reset the bridge.
See that control room? That is where you can reset the bridge.
Bridge is back! Finally. Now, everyone - back in the car and bail!
Sweet! The bridge is fixed! Now into the car, people! Time to leave this behind!
Twitch's truck is ahead. Just drive straight up into the back!
The truck is coming up. Just hit the gas and drive into it!
Get into the house and see if you can find Hector's cooks.
Get into the house.
Make sure no one else is there.
We have to hurry! The cop's radio is buzzing like crazy. They're already on their way!
Alright, the process is on, it's cooking. I have a contact with a specialist through Hector. I will guide you guys through it.
Here they come guys. Choppers and SWAT vans all over the place around you. Stay on your toes!
SWATs incoming from the lumber mill. Keep them away!
They are coming in from the lumber mill, watch out!
The railway bridge! They are coming in from the railway bridge, keep them away.
You kept them away. Good stuff! They aren't backing though, so get ready for more of them.
Good work! Get back to the cooking. Use the time between waves to find more ingredients.
Remember to be careful! We can not use the wrong ingredient. You need to be careful!
You need to add the muriatic acid to keep the process going!
Add muriatic acid, to continue the process!
You need to add the hydrogen chloride to keep the process going!
Add hydrogen chloride to continue the process!
Good, it's continuing. Keep an eye out, and keep defending...
Wow! Guys? Are you OK? I told you to be careful!
Ah,what!? Guys, you have to be careful with that stuff, I told you!
Good job. Four bags is good enough to go and do the trade.
No bags!? The trade will not be good to us. Hope you guys has some tricks up your sleeve for the trade.
Good thinking! Use those boards to barricade more windows.
The gangsters should be waiting up ahead. Keep your fingers off the triggers unless you want this to get messy. Keep your eyes open for anything suspicious.
OK, time to give them the meth.
We can't go through with the trade without the meth. You'll have to scout the nearby apartments and take the information yourselves.
Watch out though. If you get caught, they'll likely try to destroy the intel.
Although we didn't bring the amount of meth that we promised, we can still go ahead with the deal. But be prepared in case things go south.
They'll likely try to destroy the intel if things get heated.
Hurry, they might destroy the intelligence before you have time to reach it!
Looks like they burned the intelligence, we'll have to leave empty-handed!
That's the bus, take them all out.
I'm sending a chopper in for you guys to unload the loot. It's close by, shouldn't take too long. Stay tight.
Be careful around that C4 guys.
Oh no! It exploded, watch out! Stay out of that fire!
Good job, the rat is dead, escape helicopter is waiting, unless you want to try to go for the money in that bus, get to the chopper and we'll get you the hell out of there.
Cops and SWATs have arrived, be careful!
Watch out for that chopper, it's close enough for the cops to do him some good damage.
Remember we will need at least four bags of meth.
Here they come guys. Choppers and SWAT vans all over the place around you. Stay on your toes!
SWAT incoming from the lumber mill. Keep them away!
The rail way bridge! They are coming in from the railway bridge, keep them away.
SWATs incoming from the lumber mill, keep them away!
Be careful! They have snipers incoming!
We are going to need ingredients, so scout the place and see what you can find.
You need to add an ingredient, make sure you don't use the wrong thing. One wrong step and the lab will torch up like a christmas tree.
Remember to be careful! We can not use the wrong ingredient. You need to be careful!
You need to add the muriatic acid to keep the process going!
Add muriatic acid, to continue the process!
Add caustic soda, to continue the process!
Add hydrogen chloride, to continue the process!
Ah, what!? Guys, you have to be careful with that stuff, I told you!
We can't use the lab any more, it's gone, take what you have and lets leave.
Get the bags to the van to secure them. Don't let the cops run away with your hard earned meth!
Guys, it's fewer bags than we expected, but we can still do the trade and hope they agree to give us the information.
No bags!? The trade will not be good to us. Hope you guys has some tricks up your sleeve for the trade.
Good thinking! Use those boards to barricade more windows.
I'm sure we don't have long before the law shows, either, which is in keeping with this spectacular run of bad luck we've been having.
If you can't stand the heat get out of the kitchen eh? Well done. We got enough meth to deal with Hector. Let's get back in town.
My crew, all master chefs. You got so much product out of that cook we should all break bad and do this full time!
Deal's on, people. You made enough crystal to make royalty blush. Hector's going to be singing your praises if he isn't high as a kite. Well done.
We came up a little short. Let's just play along and try to solve the Rat problem for Hector another way. We're inventive...
Straight ahead and to the right, you'll see an old two story house. Surprise, surprise, this is cook central.
Get in, save Hector's cooks and get the drugs out of there before anything else goes wrong.
The lab, if you can call an rundown dump like this a lab, is straight ahead. Get in and watch for Mendoza's soldiers.
Oh yeah, get the meth out before the FBI arrives - they've been tipped off, as if you weren't feeling lucky already.
A rat in their midst has sold them out to the Cobras street gang - vicious pricks that even Hector's people don't deal with. Which is where you come in... Trade the meth with them for the info.
I guess they cared more about their fix than information. Junkies aren't great with abstraction. Meanwhile the Mendozas are leaving for the airport in a rented bus, escorted by undercover FBI.
Mendozas are headed for the airport. Bring that briefcase. I bet we can figure out something to do with it.
That was like Baghdad all over again. You need to roll. Hector's got a line on the Mendozas on their way to the airport. We're gonna hit their convoy like a ten ton hammer.
OK, remember, this should stay peaceful. Trade the meth for the info, surplus meth for cash. Easy and clean, walk away without bloodshed.
We need to catch up with the Mendozas before they jet out of this country.
Just try to keep it in your pants this once and do the trade quiet. OK? OK.
Let's just get it over with and hopefully without bloodshed. We have enough of that ahead of us.
That's the bus, take them all out.
I'm sending a chopper in for you guys to unload the loot. It's close by, shouldn't take too long. Stay tight.
Oh no! It exploded, watch out! Stay out of that fire!
I hear the cop radio, law enforcers are on the way, they arrive in 30 seconds.
Cops and SWATs have arrived, be careful!
Watch out for that chopper, it's close enough for the cops to do him some good damage.
Well, turns out the FBI are escorting the Mendozas out of the country. Maybe they have a deal, maybe they don't. Frankly I don't give a crap whether they're renditioning them or whatever.
All the heads are on that bus, money and all. Get the money, eliminate the Mendoza top guys, and end this story. We'll go in by chopper.
No more Mendozas. You gave them a true Viking funeral, except they're not Vikings. Sad.
Great job, people. The Mendozas are out of business and their liquidity is riding shotgun in our chopper. Sweet.
That's a relief, you aced this one. Whatever bad rep we had with Hector is all good now. I feel relaxed enough to smoke a victory cigar, in fact.
Great score, folks. Let's see if Hector's going to throw us a party, shall we?
OK, the Mendoza bus is on the bridge, which means we land to take it out in ten minutes. Hit the bus, finish off their people, take the money. Simple.
Damn, looks like the cops had been staking the place. Move it!
Running low on ingredients? If you want to stay and cook a little more, there's a supply drop waiting in the wings for you... Just signal the helicopter. Or you can bail now. Your choice.
This place is running low on supplies. If you wanna go for more ingredients, signal the chopper with a flare. This pilot's on the clock, so make it worth while. Or you can bounce. Your call.
OK, now wait for the pilot.
There's the drop. Snatch it and place it by the lab.
There're the ingredients. Grab 'em! Secure them in the house.
Be careful with the cooking, gentlemen.
Great. Let's cook a little more product. Just don't set anything on fire.
You know the deal: signal the helicopter to catch more ingredients. Or leave the place, up to you.
You know what to do. Signal the chopper, and we'll drop off more ingredients. Or bail. Your choice.
Out of ingredients again? No problem, signal the chopper for more. Or get out of there. Your call.
There's supplies waiting for you, gentlemen. Secure 'em by the lab.

This is a simple job, but that doesn't mean it will be easy. We're going to head out to the forest. You remember the place. We did some work for Hector out there. Anyway, I scoped the place out and it is still intact. So, we're headed there to cook up as much meth as we can. You can stay as long as you want. If you run out of supplies, I'll get more flown in. Should be easy money.
You guys remember that sketchy old house out in the forest? Where Hector's guys were cooking up meth? Well, we're headed back there.
We're headed back to cook in the meth lab in the forest. None of Hector's shit this time. This is just for profit.
Well, you got a decent amount. Just about covers the gas money. Maybe next time we can push it further.
Nice haul! This will bring in a nice chunk of change. Good job!
It's a dirty job, but easy money.
Cops killed the lights - get it back on.
Get that power back or this turns ugly in a flash.
Careful, I see movement outside the house.
Get into the house and see if you can find Hector's cooks.
Remember we will need at least 3 bags of meth.
Goddammit! Someone got here first... Careful...
Check that place for the competition.
So... If the cooks are dead... Then we... Need to do the cooking ourselves.
Hectors cooks are dead. We need to do the cooking ourselves... OK...
OK - looks stable, for now. Add more stuff...
Shush! What's that sound... Hmm, seems, nah seems OK.
OK, OK good.
Alright on this webpage. What did you just add? Alright. OK, OK.
Mmmhmm, fine fine.
OK, let's try that.
OK, solid.
Nice... Seems to be OK.
Legit... I'm sure. Cooking fine.
OK, keep that smoke to a minimum... Keep going.
They're in the house!
They are climbing into the building!
Cops climbing the outside. Get to the windows!
Shit, you got crawlers outside. Watch those windows!
They are coming up on the balcony!
Ah, OK... Muria, muriatic acid. Add more.
OK, so add caustic... No, wait, add acid - muriatic acid.
Cooking away fine - needs more acid though.
Looking at this site... Says acid is used in this step... We got muriatic, right?
Hm, yeah it is not caustic soda... Yeah. It should be acid. Yep, sure that is it.
I'm 100% it is muriatic acid now. Just add it.
Says we need club soda to get this temperature up... Sounds odd. What can you get?
Try caustic soda... Or hydrogen... No no, wait, soda... Go for that. Yeah.
It needs hydrogen chloride, for sure... OK wait, soda... Yeah, caustic soda!
I'm 100% it is some caustic soda needed here. Drop some in.
This site says something else... Chloride soda hydrogen mix. I don't know, go for it - something.
It needs hydrogen chloride - for sure.
Fuck me, we needed those cooks. I'm going with hydrogen.
I'm not 100% but I think it is hydrogen chloride now. Yep, should be.
I guess that wasn't it.
Nope. No, that wasn't right...
Oops.
Oh, that wasn't the right ingredient after all.
Woah. What are the odds? Yeah maybe they weren't that good...
Every now and then, just don't trust me, guys.
Nah, no... that wasn't right...
Death by meth...
So hydrochloric acid was the same thing... huh, you learn something new every day.
So sodium hydroxide was the same thing... huh, you learn something new every day.
Shit. Just... shit.
I had a feeling that was the wrong stuff...
Now we need...
Okay, what comes after that...
Uh... mhm...
Muriatic acid.
It's muriatic acid.
Acid. Muriatic acid.
...muriatic acid?
Oh I'm going with muriatic acid.
We'll go with muriatic acid.
Caustic soda.
It's caustic soda.
Soda. Caustic soda.
...caustic soda?
We'll go with caustic soda.
...caustic soda?
Hydrogen chloride.
Chloride. Hydrogen chloride.
...hydrogen chloride?
We'll go with hydrogen chloride.
Find some, and pour it in.
You got some of that somewhere?
Go for it.
Add it.
Add some.
Hold up!
No, wait!
Nope, that's not it!
Wait a minute!
Wait!
Hold it! You didn't put it in yet, right?
Shit!
It's supposed to be muriatic acid!
That should'a been muriatic acid!
By method of elimination it has to be muriatic acid.
It's supposed to be caustic soda!
We need caustic soda!
Yeah it's soda, caustic soda.
By method of elimination it has to be caustic soda.
That should'a been hydrogen chloride!
We need hydrogen chloride!
My bad. It's hydrogen chloride.
I messed up. It should'a been hydrogen chloride.
...unless I've missed something...
...I'm sure. I'm pretty sure.
...for sure. Or, most likely.
...that's my best guess.
...that's my very best guess.
...it has to be.
...this is not my forte.
...this website better be accurate.
...these internet descriptions are iffy at best.
...and cross your fingers.
...it's a toss-up, really.
...I'm 93% sure.
...I'm 91% sure.
...I'm 84% sure.
...I'm 72% sure.
Watch that C4 - they rigged the whole bus.
Get to that chopper people. We want to get off this bridge too.
Use the codes to defuse the C4!
Use your code - defuse the C4!
Great! That is all of them.
Awesome you got them all - I think.
Get out of there!
That's a clean sweep. All the Mendozas are history. Get to the chopper or go for the money they got on that bus.
Get him!
Shoot him! He's getting away!
Shoot him!
This startled the whole town! The cops are locking everything down!
It looks like the whole area is being flooded by cops. Be careful!
You gotta get moving!
Go! Keep moving!
I can't believe you're chasing this guy AGAIN!
Chasing Matt like this again, what are the odds?
You can't let that bastard get away!
Take that bastard out!
Get that bastard!
Finish this once and for all!
Keep moving, they're locking you down!
Matt seems to have crashed his car! Go on forward!
There! It's just after the underpass!
There it is! Right after the underpass!
You gotta get Matt out of the van.
Look around, see if you can find some gasoline.
We'll try to smoke him out - find some gasoline.
Bring some gas cans!
Find some fuel!
Alright, fry that bastard, see how long he lasts.
Medium rare or well done? Go for well done!
He's sweating bullets by now.
He should be turning red by now.
He should be running out of oxygen soon.
The fire is dying. You need more gas!
More fuel to the fire, guys. Find it!
It'd be easier for Bile to pick you up if you go to the top of the overpass.
Go on forward guys!
You heard him guys. Clear the pickup zone!
Ok, clear the pickup zone!
Clear the pickup zone so Bile can get in there!
You gotta clear the area of cops or Bile won't be able to get close!
Clear the area of cops!
You need to shoot the gas can to set it on fire!
Shoot the gas can!
Shoot the gas can to set it on fire!
Okay guys. Remember who you're dealing with here. Locke is a smelly fish. There's bound to be more sides to this than what he's telling you. Keep your eyes peeled.
What... it's Matt Roscoe! Of course that weasel had to be involved! Maybe you should just kill him here and now!
What... it's Matt Roscoe! Of course that weasel had to be involved! Maybe you should just kill him here and now!
It's Matt Roscoe! Don't let him get away! Maybe you should just kill him!
What... it's Matt Roscoe! Of course that weasel had to be involved! Maybe you should just kill him here and now!
It's Matt Roscoe! Don't let him get away! Maybe you should just kill him!
This area is usually full of spoiled, rich movie stars buying useless junk.
Get in character gang, time to meet Cabot's boys.
Suck in those guts guys, let's make a good impression. Go meet the gang.
C'mon guys, let's be professional, not late.
Why would Gensec have a truck out there?
Easy gang, let's not start the party early.
Whoa guys, don't blow it open too soon.
Cop chatter on the radio just went off the charts gang!
Radio's going crazy. Cops all around!
Comm systems just went haywire. Cops incoming.
They knew we were comin'. Gimme a second here...
Bastards were just waiting. I'll have a backup plan in a minute.
Plan B time guys, they knew we were comin'.
It's behind that security door.
The employee lounge has a network router. If you patch me in, I can unlock the door.
Get me into the network via the lobby computer and I'll take care of the lock.
How's that network connection coming?
My access got cut off. Check it out.
Connection lost. What's going on?
Lost the signal, restart it gang!
Strange blockers on the network. Almost done though.
Got it. You can open the door.
Door is unlocked.
Hurry up guys, check that vault.
We need to take a look at that vault guys.
First thing to do is mount a couple drills on that door.
First, we need holes. Get two drills on that door.
How's that door coming along?
What's happening with those drills?
Wait, STOP! It's electrified!
Cops don't do this kind of crap. Something new is brewing.
Crap. This was supposed to be a milk run.
Hey, on the upper floor there's a high-voltage box. Sabotage it and you should be fine to handle the vault.
Blueprints show a power box on the upper floor. Get to it and cut the power.
That did it. Get to drilling that door.
Get out of there guys!
Better hang back until the gas is gone unless you really want to risk it.
Prolonged exposure can kill, so you gotta decide if you want to risk going in now or wait it out.
Looks safe now, go ahead.
Gas has disappeared, get into that vault!
How long were those guys in there?!
WHAT!? How long must they have been waiting?!
Some loose stones over there if you wanna grab them on the way.
First drill done.
The first drill's finished.
Great, the drills are through.
Great, now Mr Blonde brought some liquid nitrogen to help crack that door. Mr Blonde?
OK, the special ingredient for the vault we're going to use is liquid nitrogen, courtesy of Mr Blonde.
So what? You thought it was a good idea to just leave them there? Alright gang, go get 'em.
Don't forget that nitrogen.
You still need to get the nitrogen tanks.
C'mon guys, get that liquid nitrogen.
Great, you now need to empty the nitro into the vault door.
Trust me guys, this science stuff is gonna work.
I did the research, this is gonna work great.
Got those tanks mounted yet?
Hurry up guys, mount those tanks.
Tanks on the door ASAP.
Great, now just let it pour in there.
Perfect. Now let the nitrogen fill the door.
Can't be much longer for the tanks to run out of liquid, so Bile will be there shortly with a delivery.
Nitrogen must almost be gone by now. Stand by, Bile is on the way with a little present.
Nitro tanks are empty by now. Doors should be supercooled.
Looks like the tanks are empty.
Hear that noise? Some C4 just dropped through the roof. Go pick it up and stick it to the vault.
Bile's package of C4 just came through the roof. Go up and get it, then stick it on the vault.
That crash in the roof you just heard was your C4. Get it and blow that vault!
Explosives on the door, ASAP!
Vault should crack like and egg!
I knew that would work.
Now you just need to start moving loot to Mr Blonde's car.
Start carrying all the loot out to the car so Mr. Blonde can get away with it.
Ok gang, let's give Mr Blonde some help with a distraction. Lure away the cops by getting out through the bazaar by the Big John's Burger Joint.
Right guys, if you make your way out by the Big John's Burger Joint, the cops will hopefully follow you so that Blonde can get the car out of there.
Ok gang, let's give Mr Blonde some help with a distraction. Lure away the cops by getting out through the shopping street.
Ok gang, let's give Mr Blonde some help with a distraction. Lure away the cops by getting out through the shopping bazaar.
Let's give Mr Blonde a diversion. Make a break for it over by the Jack Rabbit Slim's so the cops will follow you and not Mr. Blonde and the loot.
You need to distract the cops. Shoot up the store, then get out of there.
Watch the rooftops guys! Something's coming, I can smell it.
Twitch is waiting for you on the other side of that door! Hurry!
Go through that door right there. Twitch is waiting!
Get out of there guys.
Twitch is waiting and getting antsy!
Hurry up guys, my grid is lighting up like crazy.
Comm chatter is getting real busy, you gotta go. Now.
Great job gang, but now --- get out of there. My systems --- lighting --- a Christmas tree here .--- Something is up.

Guys, we need to talk about what happened up in Alaska, but I've got another job first, while you're still out west. So, the son of an old friend of mine in L.A., member of the Cabot crime family needs help hitting a jewelry store for a haul of diamonds. I owe him big from years ago, when his dad got me out of a jam, so I promised him a little extra muscle as payback. These guys are pro's, real characters. They even use code names! You guys up for it?
We're helping an old friend of mine in L.A. He's got a diamond problem.
Ah that's no good!
Aw shit!
OK, no good, no good at all!
You've defeated the first wave of cops!
Ok, here comes the first wave!
You've defeated the second wave of cops!
Nice work! The second wave was beaten back!
Ok, here comes the second wave!
You've defeated the third wave of cops!
Get ready for the third wave!
You've defeated the fourth wave of cops!
Nice work! The fourth wave was beaten back!
Ok, here comes the fourth wave!
You've defeated the fifth wave of cops!
Ok, here comes the fifth wave!
Get ready for the fifth wave!
You've defeated the sixth wave of cops!
You've defeated the seventh wave of cops!
Nice work! The seventh wave was beaten back!
Ok, here comes the seventh wave!
Get ready for the seventh wave!
Nice work! The eighth wave was beaten back!
Get ready for the eighth wave!
You've defeated the ninth wave of cops!
Get ready for the ninth wave!
You've defeated the tenth wave of cops!
Nice work! The tenth wave was beaten back!

Listen up! Someone has tipped off the cops about suspicious activity at the Safe House. Units are on their way as we speak to do a search and seizure. They don't know it's you, though - boy are they in for a surprise.
The cops are about to raid the Safe House. Grab your weapons!
Hey! They took one!
Cops are taking your money, guys!
Defend the bags!
Don't let them take the bags!
The bags! Remember to watch those money bags!
Ok gang. My mole in the police will take care of this. He'll send his guys to clean up and then report that the area was searched and they found nothing. No one will know you're here, you can relax.
I'm disappointed in you, guys. You can't even defend your own home.
Here they come! Prepare to beat them back!
Here they come! A wave of cops incoming!
Police attack wave incoming - they're swarming in guys!
Great job! You beat them back!
Great defense, gang! None shall pass!
This is your home, guys. Don't let the cops invade it. You've got to fight them off and stop them from taking your hard-earned money.
You've got to keep at least 1 bag!
You've got to keep at least 4 bags!
You've got to keep at least 5 bags!
You've got to keep at least 6 bags!
You've got to keep at least 8 bags!
Yeah yeah, just put on your mask now.
That fence over there is your way in. Cut it open.
Now keep moving. And as much as you hate this, this is still a real thing. You get discovered you'll trigger the alarm.
Your instincts are correct my friend. You'll have to take him out.
Nice to see you still have a keen observation. Take him out and do it quick.
Yeah, I agree. You'll have to take him out.
Quick! Answer his pager and make some crap up.
Great. Bag that body and get it out of sight before someone sees it.
Dallas, come on, you're standing next to a dumpster.
How about that dumpster?
You're done? Good. Now keep going.
There's another guard. Stay out of sight.
Yeah, you're not getting past that guy without too much risk. Take him out.
Don't forget to hide the body.
A contact of mine stashed a few body bags nearby just in case.
A contact of mine has stashed a few body bags nearby if you need more.
There's a few body bags stashed nearby.
Remember, you'll have to pay for these kinds of "special" favors in the future. My contacts don't work for free.
I got your back this time, but in the future you'll have to pay for these kinds of "special" favors. My contacts are good people and they expect good money in return.
All right, head back and get that body out of the open.
Now get back and hide that body.
Damn! Someone saw the body! Take him out before he calls it in!
Damn! Someone must have found the body! Take him out before he sounds the alarm!
Good job. You reacted fast. Time to dispose of the bodies.
Behind those crates should do. Now, get the other guy. Remember to grab another body bag.
Hiding them behind those crates should be good enough. Don't forget a body bag for the other guy.
Okay, with that mess taken care of, it's time to find the server room.
God dammit! Another guy, and this one's watching the server room. I guess you have to take him out as well.
The Control-Guy seems to be a real dumbwit but we can't fool him forever. I'm betting he's sounding the alarm next time.
We're lucky that Control-Guy is stupid as hell, but he's getting suspicious. Next time he'll most likely sound the alarm.
Do you see the flash drive? It should be in a laptop or something.
Now, find the encrypted flash drive we came for. It should be in a laptop.
Excellent. Now, remember to steal something. We need to make it look like a clean-cut robbery and nothing else.
Great. Now find something else to steal. We need to make it look like a simple robbery.
Yeah, yeah, we got what we came for.
Good find. That will certainly do.
Excellent. We're almost done. Bear with me.
Be real careful now. Another guard is patrolling the area, probably looking for his partners. Do not kill this guy, you hear me? Do NOT kill him.
If you see a target you can "spot" it to keep track of its movements.
You can "spot" targets to keep track of them.
I know I'm sounding like a broken record, but don't kill him. You won't be able to trick the Control-Guy again if you try answering the pager.
Careful. Wait for him to move.
Don't rush it. Just let him pass then you can move.
Easy now, Speedy Gonzales. Hang back and let him pass first.
Wait for him to pass then you can move.
Dallas, my man. You still got it. Now, throw the loot in the back of the van and let's get the hell out of here.
Good job, Dallas. You still have it in you. Now, throw the loot in the van and let's leave.
It was a bit of a bumpy ride, but it turned out a-ok. We got the flash drive and the gold as a bonus. It should give you some nice cash to get started again.
Shit, the alarm went off! This heist is over. Try and escape before the big guns arrive. Hurry!
Break into the Police storage compound and get your hands on some access codes we will need later.
Your job is to break into a Police storage compound and look for some access codes that we will be needing later.
All right, this is the place. Remember, we're here for the access codes.
Time to show me some more of your stealthy skills. The rest of you wait by the van and keep a lookout if things would turn south.
The database should be on the second floor of the building.
Forget about the main entrance. Put on your mask and cut through that fence instead.
The main entrance would be suicide. We're sneaking in from the side instead by cutting open that fence.
I'm not taking any chances. Now, get that door open.
You get to make a lot of money if you do as I say. Now, proceed inside and get that door open.
Use your ECM Jammer and disable it. That will give you the time needed to lockpick the door.
I don't get what you're doing. You need to get rid of that camera. Just do as I say and deploy the ECM Jammer
Good. Now, try lock picking that door.
Nice. With the camera out of the way, you can safely lock pick that door.
Why did you shoot it? I told you to use the ECM Jammer...
That was unnecesssary, Dallas... Destroying cameras will not go unnoticed.
This is what happens when you're away from the life of crime for too long.
Gensec have upped their game, that's for sure.
Damn! Incoming security guard outside! Deal with him before he sees the broken camera and triggers the alarm!
Dallas! There's a security guard outside and he's gonna see the broken camera. Take him out before he calls it in!
Get back out again! There's a security guard outside that will spot the broken camera. Deal with him fast before he sounds the alarm!
Good. Now answer his pager and hide the body in that dumpster.
Good job. Answer the pager and then hide the body in the dumpster.
Now get back inside and look for the computer.
Sneak by it and look for the security room. If we do that, we can disable all cameras at once.
Act fast now! Answer the pager and hide the body in that janitor closet
Hurry and answer that pager, then hide the body in that janitor closet.
Ok, see if you can find that keycard.
Stay under the cameras and they wont be able to spot you.
Remember to sneak under the cameras so they won't spot you.
Keep your head down and avoid the cameras.
Use the keycard you picked up to open the door. But, be ready to quickly take out anyone inside.
Use the keycard you picked up and enter the room. Just be ready to silence anyone inside.
Answer the pager and we should be fine. The cameras won't present any more trouble.
Hurry up and answer the pager.
Get that pager call and we should be good.
That console panel should control all the cameras. Give it a go and see if you can find the computer we're after.
Good! Get your ass over there and start the hacking.
Just try and sneak past him. Don't rush it.
You don't want to get detected when we've come this far. Try and sneak past him.
Put in the flash drive and get started.
Time to use the flash drive.
Perfect! Now, give it a few seconds and we should be done.
Grab the USB flash drive and get outta there. And, Dallas, don't get sloppy here.
Get the flash drive and leave. And, Dallas, don't let them see you on the way out.
Bring the flash drive with you and get out of there.
Well done, Dallas. Head to the van and get out of there.
You did good, Dallas. Now, get to the van and get out of there.
Job well done, Dallas. The van's waiting for you.
They saw you! God damn it!
Damn it, Dallas! You've been spotted!
Look what a nice guy I am. I had one of my contacts stash more body bags for you.
Make sure you grab an extra body bag. My treat this time.
Dallas! What are you doing? If you keep destroying cameras, they'll send more guards!
Damn it, Dallas! I told you to wait for me to say you should use the ECM!
What the hell, Dallas? I told you not to use the ECM until I said so!
That was some damn good sneaking, Dallas. I am impressed.
It looks like Dallas still has what it takes to perform heists in the big leagues!
We're here. Time to get your sneak-on.
Remember, don't put on the mask. Case the place first.
These civvies have their own lives to think about as long as you don't scare them.
These civilians don't get paid enough to care about your business. Don't scare them.
The manager's office is where the coke is, but watch out for mobsters.
You'll find the coke in the manager's office but it will be guarded, so stay on your toes.
Take him out, or try and get by him unnoticed.
That's one of the mobsters. Sneak or kill: Your choice.
You got two options: Sneak by him or take him down.
Okay, yeah. You're not getting past that guy without taking him down. It's show time.
That guy won't move on his own, so that means it's time to force him.
And down they go. Okay, I'm betting the cocaine is in that safe so it's time to drill.
Take a look around the office while you wait for the drill. Might be some other loot we can take.
See if you can find anything of interest while waiting for the drill to finish.
Dallas! The cops are here, you know what to do!
Holy...! They setup a sniper in the building across the street! Keep your head down and take him out!
The cops brought in a Sniper! He's in the building across the street. Take your aim and take him out!
The SWAT-team is here! Dallas, you need to take 'em out!
The bastards called in the SWAT-team! Okay, Dallas, show me you're no god damn rookie and take them down!
Get inside the nightclub and retrieve the stolen cocaine.
This is an easy one. Get in, get the coke, and get out.
We're at the night club. Time to get your dance-on. Start by "casing" the place before the fun begins. Take a look around first and keep things casual.
I'm getting a helicopter to pick you up, but it's gonna take some time.
I'm calling in a helicopter to pick you up!
Heads up, the SWAT-team is here!
The bastards called in the SWAT-team! Give 'em hell!
Don't just stand around! Help your teammate up!
Your teammate is down! Help him!
Your buddy needs your help! Go!
Don't forget the coke in the van, or all of this would be for nothing!
Dallas! Get the cocaine from the van before the cops!
Excellent. Now, take the hostage to the back, away from the cops.
Too many bullets flyin' here! Get the hostage to the room in the back.
Okay, good. Now, take the hostage to the room in the back.
I'll negotiate a deal with the cops, so we can get our friend back. You just sit tight.
All right, I made the deal. Un-cuff the hostage so we can get our teammate back.
OK, take this time to heal up. Drop the cocaine and put down a doctor bag.
Good. Now, don't forget to pick up the coke again.
Nothing some meds can't fix. Pick up the cocaine now.
Okay, you should be fit for fight again. Grab the cocaine.
Time to go. No time for lock-picking, just shoot off the door handle.
OK, time to leave. Don't lock-pick that door, just blow off the door handle.
Wait! Don't shoot that cop, he's alone! Intimidate him to work for us instead!
Time to head for the roof where the helicopter will pick you up!
Heads up! SWAT!
Watch out, Sniper!
Sniper! Take cover!
They brought in a Sniper!
Damn, that's a SHIELD! Try and get behind him!
Helicopter's there now! Throw in the coke!
That's it! Time to go! You still got it, Dallas!
There is a room behind the kitchen, go there, I've prepared the starting kit for you.
I got the pre-order kit in the back for you. Go get it!
There we go, now put your mask on.
OK, I trust you hear me loud and clear. Alright, we don't have any time to waste, let's just get to it.
First of all, besides from that starter kit, another package is awaiting you in the back alley.
My accomplice will assist you. He's waiting.
Look up.
Pick it up. It's your money that I laundered. Some extra in there for your generous contribution to OVERKILL.
Alright, count that up.
Cool - 25 large. Spend them well.
OK that should be 5k to start with.
Some cash, look at it as a welcome gift to get you started. I expect you will pull in much more.
Don't worry, no one will hear you back here. But keep it down to be safe...
Now, pick up the money.
So, as you surely know, this isn't everything this safe house has to offer, let me show you what I'm working on.
I know you want to get out there and start working, but I have to make sure you know the drill. Times change, new equipment, new toys. I just want to make sure you got it all in check.
Gentlemen... Welcome to your safe house.
OK, to your left is your Crime.net station. This is where you get your contracts. To your right are your security cameras. Look around and I'll tell you more.
Yeah, straight ahead there is your own private vault. We're gonna stack that up.
Down there - your own vault. To the right is your camera system. Left your Crime.net station. Let's roll.
Welcome to Crime.net. This is your crime community. I will hook you up with crime contacts all over DC looking for guys like you. This net is built on mutual trust and money.
We've been growing this for over two years. There should be plenty of new contacts for you to make on your own as well.
You got a new contact. His name is Vlad. Look him up on Crime.net and let's see what he can set us up with.
New contact on Crime.net, guys. Got a shady politician with ambition. We call him The Elephant for now. Look him up.
Your Crime.net is updated. There is a heavy duty drug cartel head in town. His name his Hector Moralez. Look him up.
Doors. You can try these out too. Keep in mind that there are lots of ways to get one open. In our line of work, closing doors is pointless - opening 'em is what matters.
I know this is elementary for you, but practice is practice, right?
Good luck - those things are tricky.
In the field, if you trip an alarm, the cops come buzzing. DC's got a lot of them.
Oh yeah. Pagers.
Tricky business. Gensec started mandating everyone wear 'em.
I set up a little test case for you to see how these work.
You'll wanna answer the pager before too long.
Living on borrowed time, as it were.
But hell, if you're good - that's the edge you need.
Now if you're a good liar... That's a whole other ballgame.
Oh. The best room in the safe house. The vault.
Your money is here. Your spendable cash is piled on that table.
For now, just enjoy the view. We'll put more in here, I promise.
Otherwise, any questions? I'm sure you can figure out the rest. Feel free to come here whenever you want.
Here's your mask area. Pretty self-explanatory.
Of course you can customize masks like you can customize weapons.
We'll hang all your completed masks right here.
I love this place. Cops don't swing by too often.
Keep a low profile though. Never know who is looking.
Hit the Crime.net station to get out of here.
Go hit up Crime.net when you are ready.
Alright, time to get to it.
Let's do this.
If you missed any info, just use the button to play a pre-recorded message.
When you return next time I won't be here, but you can always press that button to play a pre-recorded message.
Get out to the alley.
Try answering the phone.
Have you tried answering the phone?
Looks like he broke free and took a gun! You gotta help him!
Watch those windows, there might be snipers.
Something's fishy here - I think there might be snipers in those windows.
Stay sharp, guys, this whole place smells of sniper.
Find the sniper and take him out before he takes the shot!
Find that sniper and take him out!
Take that sniper out!
Get the sniper guys!
Take the sniper out!
Guys! The sniper! Get him!
The guys in the street - take 'em out!
You gotta clear the street!
Take those guys in the street out!
Clear the street so Charon can move!
Watch out, they're deploying more snipers!
Snipers! Take 'em out, gang!
More snipers!
They got more snipers incoming!
More snipers incoming! Watch out!
More snipers? These guys mean business!
You really showed the NYPD how to dance. And I have a feeling they'll send more dancers.
A rough day for the NYPD. And it'll get rougher - I'm sure they'll send more reinforcements.
More cops are arriving!
More cops incoming, guys!
Damn, there are more cops incoming!
You heard him guys, get going!
Ok guys, go across the roof!
It's the roof, guys. Get moving!
Hurry up! Move to the next building.
Come on guys! Move to the next building.
Move into the other building. You gotta rendezvous with Charon!
More snipers! Take 'em out!
Snipers again! Take 'em out!
That gate looks tough. See if you can find some thermite or something. You have to get that briefcase.
That thermite will open the gate for you in no time. Get the briefcase!
Get the briefcase! You'll need to drill the gate.
Ok! Get the briefcase!
Great job! Now get that briefcase!
Get down that elevator shaft so you can meet up with Charon!
Twitch is on his way with the van. One minute.
What's wrong, Charon? You ok?
Charon? What's up, you ok?
You'd better find some cover and make sure it's nothing bad.
You should get in cover for a moment and make sure it's ok.
You sure? Better duck down and make sure it's ok.
Move up to those windows so you get a good view of things!
You gotta get those police cars out of the way so the escape van can move in!
Make space for the escape van - get those police cars out of the way!
Guys! Don't forget Charon!
Remember Charon, guys! Don't leave him behind!
Don't leave Charon behind!
Make sure you don't leave Charon behind!
Make sure Charon gets to the van!
Guys, make sure Charon gets to the van!
Help Charon get to the escape van!
Watch out - there's more of them down there!
There are more of the attackers down in the street!
You'll need a crowbar to get those elevator doors open!
You'll need to break through those doors! Maybe there's a crowbar around here somewhere?
You'll need to break into the elevator shaft! See if you can find a crowbar!
Don't forget to get the briefcase!
You need to get that briefcase, remember!
Remember to bring Charon's briefcase!

You're going to New York tonight. The Continental called - one of their key staff has been ambushed and is being held by unknown assailants at an address in Brooklyn. We have the location from a call he made just as they took him. The target's name is Charon. We need to get there fast, take out whoever's got him and send him back to the Continental safe and sound.
You're going to New York on a rescue mission for the Continental.
The Continental in New York need you to rescue one of their own. They pay well.
Ok, guys. Find the target and get him out of there.
No need for tip-toeing now. I'm sending the drill.
That's the turret recovered. The driver will be back for the ammo.
Looks like we got everything, gang, Your pick-up is on its way.
Ammo secured, I'm sending your pick-up ASAP. Be ready!
We can hack open a train vault if you plug that hard-drive into its security panel.
Nice, I'm in. Wow, pretty nifty security. Who are these guys, section 9?
Alright I'm in! *whistles, impressed* These guys aren't messing around. Lots of additional firewalls.
They've blocked me. I need you to disconnect their security buffer.
One of their security buffers just kicked in. Disconnect it!
Another security buffer kicked in.Need to be disconnected manually.
Alright, I'm back in.
Those railcars are locked down. That card should help with that.
We can sell those shells, if you can carry them out. But focus on the turret.
That's volatile stuff. Try and get it out, but don't lose sight of the goal.
One high-tech, high-value piece of military badass right there. Drill en-route.
Great. Get it moving!
That's the stuff. Keep going!
Good job. Now get it to the pick-up.
Great. There's no shortage of buyers for these military rounds.
Well done. It's all extra gravy, thanks to the US Army.
The drill is almost done. Stand by, gang.
Your getaway is ready Get as much ammo as you can, and then get yourselves out.
OK, your pick-up is ready. It can carry as much ammo as you can get to it, if you want a bonus. Up to you.
OK, your getaway is standing by. Bail now, or use it to clear out the ammo. Your call.
That's live high explosive, so be gentle.
Handle that stuff with great care.
Gently does it. Very gently.
That's the alarm, guys. Expect a fast response!
Damn, that's the alarm. Get ready for action!
No need for tip-toeing now. I'm sending the chopper with the drill.
There's the alarm. Camera feeds are down. Drill the vaults till you find the turret.
That's the turret recovered. Give me a moment. Your pick-up is on its way.
Great. There it is. Disassemble it and then move the pieces out.
We're past the first lock. Now let's see what's inside.
Woah! Be careful with that stuff. That's military grade explosives you're throwing around.
Those shells have an angry temper. And a dollar value. Be careful with them.
OK, the chopper is almost there. Stand by.
OK, the drill is on the ground. Get it and get those vaults open.
Keep your eyes open for a keycard.
Maybe some of those workers have a keycard for the railcars.
Shake those workers down. Maybe one of them has a keycard.
Guys, get into those cars and find the one with the turret.
Drill is dropped. Get it working on the vault.
You need to dismantle that turret.
Guys, you need to get those pieces to the pick-up.
That's the pilot with the lance. Get it.
Our pilot's deploying the lance. And by deploying I mean kicking out of the window.
Chopper is on its way with another lance.
These are the shells for the turret. Valuable, but not the main prize. Get the turret, and then come back for this ordnance.
That's the turret ammo. We can take that later, but keep after the turret.
They're blasting the train doors with demo charges. They really don't want you guys in there!
They're blowing the doors off the railcars. You're going to be exposed to sniper fire in there, so be careful.
Paydirt! That's what we came for, gang.
One high-tech, high-value piece of military badass right there.
We can't get the ammo out until all those turret pieces are in the vehicle. Stash the ammo for later. Focus on securing the turret.
Absolutely outstanding work! There's going to be heads rolling down the corridors of the Pentagon when this train arrives.
You need to get close and locate the right railcar. Once you've ID'd it, look around - you might be able to find an access card for the railcars.
Alright, get in there and find the tiara.
Move it, guys!
Let's do this!
It's go-time!
Careful with the cameras!
Guys, the place is wired up - stay frosty.
Damn it! Someone just tripped the alarm!
We don't have long. The cops are coming now!
Keep looking for that tiara!
Stay frosty! Here they come!
It's rock'n'roll-time!
I'll be back with a new position.
Hang tight, I'm looking for another escape point.
We're moving the escape car. Hang on.
Escape car is there. You need to be finished soon fellas. Hurry!
OK, escape is here. You need to push through the cops - there is no other way!
Escape is here, so whenever you're ready!
The cops are all ready on the scene. They've must have been close by.
Everything except the tiara is for us!
Don't pass out, the place is loaded with loot!
I hate to see all that gold go to waste!
Has anyone found the tiara yet?
Are you looking for the tiara?
Guys, if you haven't found the tiara yet - you better find it soon. We're running out of time!
Check the stands in the shelves.
Check all the cases, maybe it's there.
Did you check the whole place? Check the whole place!
It might be in the front too. It doesn't have to be in the back!
It just got to be in there somewhere.
It's a tiara, keep your eyes open. If it's not in the safe, it could be anywhere.
Keep the civilians in check!
Keep it clean! Keep the civs out of the line of fire!
No one has heard you yet, keep going!
The broken window gave you away!
Someone heard the drill!
The alarm's been tripped!
A neighbor saw you. She called 911.
You got made.
They must have just installed that metal detector.
Aw, so it's empty!? Keep looking!
Alright, keep going! It's got to be there!
OK! OK, it's empty. Just keep looking!
Damn it! I think you just tripped the cameras.
Great work! Metal detector down.
Metal detector seems to be down. Great work!
You can use a shape charge if you have one. It's faster than the drill, someone might hear it though.
Aw, that's a civilian casualty! Be careful!
They're calling in snipers. Too many civilians casualties.
Police snipers, damn it! Now we're really in for it!
Snipers deployed, keep your heads down!
Snipers! Too many civilians dead, can't stay there!
Snipers are here. We can't stick around!
Al right, that's the tiara we're looking for!
There it is! Finally!
Awesome! That's extra cash for us, drinks are on me!
Serious haul. You guys did well!
I knew you were pros and no one even heard you. Amazing!
Great! You guys can escape now, but choose to go for more of the extra loot.
Alright, the choice is: escape now - or - go for more loot, your call!
OK, we're off. Tiara goes to Vlad and he'll get the revenge he wanted. I'm glad we could accommodate him. See you at the safe house.
Nice, jewels and tiara. Time to collect from Vlad. He's going to be happy.
Nice run team. The tiara is secured and Vlad can't contain himself with joy. Let's go see the crazy Ruskie.
What do they call that? Bling? Anyway time for a payday.
Now that's a knockover. Good job getting everything there, that was a lot of work. The tiara is a bonus in this case and Vlad is happy as hell.
Remember. Go in, get the tiara, hit the store for more jewels if you feel lucky - the place is loaded. But watch out for guards, cameras, metal detectors.
The owner is nuts about security. Escape van will be near the dropoff.
Keep an eye on the heat guys don't want cops here too soon. Avoid cameras and guards. Take any extra jewels they have if you can. We leave with the same van we came in.
Escape's here! Saying again, escape's here!
Escape has arrived. We are good to go!
Escape is here, get ready!
Escape just drove in. You ready?
Escape is on the scene. Whenever you're ready gentlemen!
Bring the bags to the van.
Get those bags into the loot van.
Keep moving the bags to the van, guys.
Get the bags in the van guys.

Ok, guys.This is it. The Greatest Heist of All. What you've been training for. The fucking White House! Inside is the answer to all our problems, an important part of which is a set of documents- Presidential pardons, still legal and valid, but without any names on them! If you can get them, you'll be able to get off scott free and retire. Henry's Rock. Every crackball conspiracy theory you've ever heard about classified scientific experiments and corporate occult rascality, gathered in one facility. Locke says that Murkywater's top men are up to some rather nefarious skullduggery there. Security footage we hacked shows they have two more gilded cases like the one Commissioner Garrett had in FBI lockup. One of them may even be the very same piece we recovered for the Dentist in Vegas. It isn't clear yet how they connect to Bain's search, but they're obviously important enough to the Murkies that we should probably take them off their hands, and maybe serve them a little comeuppance while we're at it.

OK gang, we have received a communique from the Elephant. He claims to want to help us. Seems that in the early 1900s, a Kataru member stole what he calls "a family heirloom". This person then bought his way onto the famous Shacklethorne expedition bound for Antarctica. His presence, according to the Elephant, doomed the voyage from the start. The familiarity of this is not a coincidence, despite the Elephant's caginess.The ship and crew were lost, until recently, when the wreckage was found crushed in the ice, far from the original planned route. A couple of miles from the wreckage, they also found a mummified corpse who looks to have died rather horrifically, and a sled along with a collection of artifacts. The items recovered are going to be auctioned in secret to a bunch of decadent society types, and the Elephant says that one of those items will help us with the device in the kitchen.
